kun du 'khrugs/ /shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad kyis ni/ /pad mas g.yogs par rnam bsgom bya/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /drag tu dgod pa chen po sogs/ /rtag tu de yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /de yi gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /khro

chen khro gnyer rim par ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /ji ltar rigs par kun bskyed nas/ /sgom par byed pa de der bshad/ /khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngo/ /'jig rten gsum 'jig 'phrog byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyi ye shes su/ /'joms pa po ni rab tu gnas/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun du gang / /yi ge'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ /bdag nyid snying gar rnam bsam bya/ /snying ga'i

gzugs ni de rnams su/ /lha yi rnam par sgom par byed/ /slar ni sngags pas bsdu bar bya/ /de nyid la ni gzhug par bya/ /cho ga shes pas bskal pa'i mer/ /bsams nas bsam gtan yang dag brtsam/ /zla 'od lta

bur 'bar ba ni/ /btsun mo rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /lha nyid yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya/ /rang gzugs snying gar bsams nas ni/ /de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya/ /rang gzugs snying gar bsams nas

ni/ /ha yig tu ni rnam bsgom bya/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /'di ni dang po'i bsam gtan brjod/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /rtag tu rigs kyi bdag po yis/ /

bskal par bsreg par rnam bsgoms nas/ /sngags pas de yi rnam pa der/ /bsam gtan brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi rab sbyor gyis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /rang gi gzugs kyis kun

bskyed nas/ /ba spu'i khung bur 'di spro bya/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun du bkang / /'od zer lnga yi rab sbyor gyis/ /rang lus su ni rab gzhug bya/ /rig ma'i rgyal mo sogs

sbyor bas/ /de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' khams ni/ /yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya/ /rang lus su ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /thams cad der ni rab gzhug bya/ /gnyis su med pa
mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po

gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang chen rig ma'i tshul gyi las gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /dpag tshad kyi ni grangs kyi khyon/ /kun nas yongs su zlum
por ni/ /gsal ba gsal bar mtshungs bsams nas/ /dbus su bdag nyid rnam bsam bya/ /'bad pas gnas lnga rnams su ni/ /rnam snang mdzad chen gzugs bsams nas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /

de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya/ /snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /yang dag bskyed nas rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas nyi rnam par/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gang bar byed/ /lha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /slar

yang de ni rab gzhug bya/ /de nyid tshul ni dge ba 'di/ /rigs kyi dbye bas rtogs par bya/ /gzhan du gsang ba'i bsam gtan ni/ /rnam par spangs pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog

pa'i rgyal po chen por rig ma'i las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi tshul bzlas pa'i cho ga ston par mdzad do/ /nam mkhar

'phrul ni ston par ram/ /gang du sems ni rab dgyes byed/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod bsgom bya/ /me tog bzang po de dbus su/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /rang gzugs

phyag rgya chen po ni/ /bsgom bya gzhan du brtson mi bya/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni/ /gsal ba 'od dkar 'bar la sogs/ /chu yi rnam par dgod par bya/ /de la sngags kyi

yi ge'i tshig /dang po gsang ba rnam bsgom bya/ /rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgoms nas/ /slar yang de nyid la sbyar bya/ /blo dang ldan pas gnas lnga ru/ /gzugs brnyan yang ni yang dag bskyed/ /de nyid yi ge'i tshul 'thun pas/ /bsam

gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya/ /cho ga shes pas yig rnams kyi/ /phreng ba bskyed nas bsgom par bya/ /nas kyi tshad 'di thams cad du/ /bsam gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya/ /rab tu 'bad pas 'og der ni/ /rtag tu nam mkha' gang bar

bya/ /de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gang ba de la grags pa yin/ /yi ge gcig gi gsang sngags kyi/ /rang gzugs rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rigs kyi bdag po 'byung ba ni/ /yi ge gsum gyi rtag shes bya/ /yi ge lnga la sogs

gzung bas/ /ji srid yi ge 'byung ba'o/ /'od dkar 'bar ba'i phreng ba sogs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams kyi/ /thog ma tha ma 'di bya'o/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab rnam par/ /in dra nI la

mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'od zer 'bar 'khrugs gtso bo'i yum/ /yid kyis bsams pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad ma rA ga dbang mdog 'od/ /dmar po 'bar ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'jig rten khams ni kun nas su/ /cho ga shes pas snang bar bya/ /

ge sar ser po dang mtshungs pa/ /ser po 'od zer 'bar la sogs/ /sgom pa'i go 'phangs kyis bsgom bya/ /the tshom med par bsgrub par bya/ /de nyid 'byung ba gang gsungs pa/ /rang gzugs yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /snying gar me

tog bsams nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor de la bsgom par bya/ /cho ga shes pas de'i steng du/ /snying po phyag rgya rnam bsgom bya/ /ji lta'i go 'phang kun bskyed nas/ /ye shes de nyid rnam bsgom bya/ /b+ha gar a yig nges phyung nas/ /

sangs rgyas mchod pa la sogs bya/ /'jig rten khams ni kun nas su/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /thog ma bar dang tha mar ni/ /slar yang bsdu bar bsam par bya/ /zla 'od lta bur yang dag sbyor/ /rang lus su yang bsgom par bya/ /'di ni de

nyid tshul dge ba/ /rigs gsum du yang rtogs par bya/ /bya dang byed pa yang dag sbyor/ /sgom pa de ni 'grub par byed/ /sems kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyis/ /gal te chags la chags par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan 'dus la rab zhugs

nas/ /de la gzhug par bsgom par bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa po/ /sgrub po rnams kyi de nyid 'di/ /dngos grub bsgrub la dam tshig mchog /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas/ /

ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin bzhin pa/ /sangs rgyas slob dpon yang dag bskyed/ /snying gar de ni dgod par bya/ /rang sngags mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ /bsams nas de yi snying gar dgod/ /'thung dang za ba'i dus rnams su/ /nye bar

longs spyod byed rnams su'ang / /dri dang gzugs sogs bya ba rnams/ /'di ni de kho na nyid brjod/ /lha sbyor sangs rgyas slob dpon gyi/ /rang gi bde ba rtag tu ni/ /cho ga shes pas dbul bar bya/ /gzhan du 'grub par byed min

nyid/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyis/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /ye shes rnams ni kun gyi gsang / /sngags kyi dngos grub byed de nyid/ /rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi/ /'chi ba de bzhin 'phrog

par byed/ /de bzhin rang gzugs bsams la sogs/ /bsten dang yon rnams kun dang ldan/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub pas/ /rdo rje ye shes

sprul pa'o/ /gnas bzhi rnams kyi kun sbyor gyis/ /lha yi sbyor ba mtshungs pa la/ /cho ga shes pas gzung bar bya/ /rig pa 'dzin par de brjod bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /de nyid bya ba dri med bzang / /de yi sngags kyi sku
byed pa/ /bsdus pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /thun bzhir bsam gtan 'di nyid ni/ /de nyid dam tshig gar mkhan no/ /thams cad du ni rigs dbye ba/ /bsdus pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam

bsgoms nas/ /'khor lo de yis rnam bsgom bya/ /rang lag tu ni yang dag bskyed/ /ji srid srog de gtang mi bya/ /rdor sems la sogs sgom byed pa/ /bsdus pa yis ni rigs gsum du 'am/ /rdo rje sems dpas byin brlabs pas/ /

sgrub pos rtag tu bsgrub par bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /sngags rnams kun gyi mnyes pa dang / /dngos grub dam tshig ston pa po/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di ston par mdzad do/ /

dam tshig dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa/ /gang de thams cad nyid bya de/ /shar du rang gi phyag rgya yis/ /mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya/ /lho ru de la cho ga las/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bri bar bya/ /cho ga shes pas nub tu ni/ /'od dpag

med ni mnyam par bri/ /cho ga shes pas byang phyogs su/ /don yod grub pa mnyam par bri/ /dbus su rtag tu bsdus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas slob dpon kun du bri/ /rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /

rnam kun sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya rnams ni thams cad du/ /ut+pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rtse mo bcu gcig chen po yi/ /rdo rje'i rnam par kun du bri/ /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /phyag rgya thams cad kun du bri/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya chen po ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba zhes bshad do/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /pad ma dang ni ut+pal bri/ /rin chen bzhi yi kha dog tu/ /

de rnams dbus su mnyam par bri/ /'dod pas lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /lha gzhan de ni yang dag 'byung / /sgo ru bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang / /'thun pa ru ni mnyam par bri/ /dkar po nag po de bzhin dmar/ /ser po ljang gu nyid dang yang / /

rtag tu bsam gtan gdan la gnas/ /de la dgod par bya ba yin/ /cho ga shes pas de re rer/ /'joms byed bdag nyid can gyis gzhom/ /de la rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod/ /sgo bzhi ru ni rab tu brtsam/ /slob mas ma dang chung

ma mchog /sring mo dang ni bu mo bri/ /cho ga shes pas longs spyad bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /rgyal byed rgyal ba'i rigs de la/ /phyag rgya dgod par rab tu grags/ /dziHrdo rje chen po'i rigs mchog la/ /dzA yi

rnam pa rtag tu bya/ /dzaHphyag na pad ma'i rigs byung la/ /AHyig dag ni rtag tu bya/ /AH'dod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga las/ /ji ltar rig pa'i aHyig go/ aH/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya
ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs s+ho// //de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa dang nye ba'i sgrub pa ston par mdzad do/ /nya chang bza' ba'i gsang mchod sogs/ /mngon dgyes gyur nas gang du sems/ /

sems can mi ldan gnas par byed/ /de la dam tshig chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor brtsam par bya ba ste/ /de yi sangs rgyas sogs dngos grub/ /zla ba gcig gis de mthar phyin/ /ye shes 'khor los bskul ba yis/ /de tshe de

ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /thog mar zla ba gsum du ni/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs 'byung la/ /'dir ni sngags chen bsgrub par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa rnams

kyis dngos grub kyi dam tshig rin po che 'ching bar byed pa gsungs pa/ rnam par snang mdzad zhes gzugs su/ /de ru bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags tsakra~M zhes brjod na/ /'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rnam par

snang mdzad ces bshad par/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags kha T+ga~M zhes brjod na/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags

pad+ma~M zhes brjod na/ /pad ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags tri shU la~M` zhes brjod/ /rtse gsum rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rnam par snang

mdzad zhes bshad par/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags badzra~M zhes brjod na/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags a~M ku sha~M byas na/ /

lcags kyu zhes par mngon brjod 'gyur/ /rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad zhes/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags pA sha~M` zhes brjod na/ /zhags pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya che sogs mtshan nyid kyis/ /

rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /de nyid yid bzhin nor bu mchog /rigs gzhan dbye bas rtogs par bya/ /'di ni dam tshig bsgrub thabs te/ /sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya/ /skye ba 'dir ni grub par 'gyur/ /rang sngags

ril bu'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang nyid bdag po rang nyid du/ /khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /cho ga shes pas gzhi rnams kyi'ang / /de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /gzugs kyi dbus su rnam

bsgoms nas/ /myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /gzugs su sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /rang sngags ut+pa la~M` byas nas/ /ye shes rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dbus su rnam bsgoms

nas/ /nam mkha'i steng du yang dag brtsam/ /snying gar rdo rje yang dag bskyed/ /ye shes rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /rdo rje rin chen rnam bsgom bya/ /ji srid dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod/ /de srid

mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed/ /rdo rje pad ma lag par dgod/ /pad ma'i spyan ni bsgom par bya/ /sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas

'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru rnam bsgom bya/ /'od zer lnga yis kun bkang nas/ /sangs

rgyas sku dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /bi sta ra shaHnyi ma'i gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas/ /las kyi rdo rje snying gar dgod/ /rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ /rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms

nas/ /badzro ha~M zhes bsgom par bya/ /snying gar rtse mo lnga pa 'am/ /rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs su rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gzugs/ /sems dpa'i
gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed/ /'khor lo 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa/ /rang gi gzugs ni sangs rgyas gzugs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs ni yang

dag bskyed/ /pad ma 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa/ /rang gi gzugs ni chos kyi gzugs/ /chos kyi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /dkar po 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa/ /'dod pa'i mchod pa

rang gi gzugs/ /'dod mchod gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dang por yi ge gcig pa sogs/ /rig pa'i rgyal po stobs po che/ /rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yis/ /rang gi phyag rgya sogs bsgoms pas/ /sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje ru/ /mchog tu phra ba'i bdag can bya/ /de nyid dam tshig dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni sgom pa'o/ /nyi ma'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /mu dro ha~M zhes sgom pa ni/ /snying gar sngags yig byas nas ni/ /bskyed
de 'dir ni the tshom med/ /sngags pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can/ /bsams nas dbus su gzugs bsgom bya/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /bsam gtan 'byung bas bskyed par 'gyur/ /nye

sgrub cho ga byas nas ni/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga las/ /de yis 'jig rten gsum sgrub 'gyur/ /dang por rang gnas ri gnas su/ /zla ba drug tu bzlas byas nas/ /sgrub pa po yis

rtag tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par gnas/ /ji ltar klu mo lha'i bu mo/ /mi mo'am yang na lha min mo/ /ji ltar rigs par bkug nas ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /rnam par dben dang yid 'ong dang / /

nags dang dgon pa rnams su yang / /de ru bkug nas nyer longs spyod/ /'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyis/ /ye shes rdo rje rab bskul bas/ /dam tshig mnyan par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang / /cho ga

shes pas dgug par bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya de rnams gzugs/ /rang gi brjod pa de rnams sngags/ /de nyid phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /rang gi sngags 'di bzlas par bya/ /mtshan mo phyed du ji ltar bya/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang

de bzhin brjod/ /lcags kyu'i snying po de nyid kyis/ /de rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /bskal pa bsreg pa ltar bsams nas/ /rdo rje mtshungs pas/ /snying pos lcags kyu sbyar byas nas/ /bkug la dbang du bya ba yin/ /

khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /de bzhin nyid du rta mgrin dang / /rdo rje'i dbyug dang bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por brjod/ /khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba/ /khro gnyer can yang gang zhig 'gyur/ /khro bo chen po stobs po

che/ /khams gsum pa yang dbang du byed/ /bdud rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni skrod par byed/ /rig ma chen mo dri sogs ni/ /bcas pa'i

phyag rdor stobs kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang / /khams gsum pa yang 'bebs par byed/ /pho nya chen po rdor sem mo/ /rab gtum la sogs rdo rje can/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi/ /dug ni skad cig

las 'joms byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig thams cad rnam par skrod par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i

sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo badzra dz+nyA nA ya/ sa ma ya sa twA nA~M`/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+ya~M` b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarba big+h+nAM da ha da ha/ sarba bi nA ya kA~M`/ mUr+d+ha Ta kadzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ma hA bi kr-i ta/ rU pi Ne pa dza pa dza/ sarba

ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra hA~M/ Sha da mu kha/ ShaDa b+hu dza/ ShaT tsa ra NA/ ru dra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu ma na ya/ brah+mA d+yA~M` sarba de bA mA na ya/ mA bi lam+ba ma bi lam+ba/ la hu la hu/ maN+Dal ma d+h+ye/ pra be sha ya/ sa ma ya/

ma nusma ra/ hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de nyid sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang

mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par gyur to/ /rang gi gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du bkang nas/ ched du brjod pas ched du brjod par mdzad do/ /

e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyis ni/ /rdo rje mi phyed bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gang / /sa yi gong bur 'gyur bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje sgyu mar brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di ston par mdzad do/ /oM badzra khu ra bi kri tAn na hU~M` phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam la/ /bcom ldan chos 'chang de nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun

kun skrag pa'i/ /ched du brjod 'di ched rjod mdzad/ /e ma ho sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /rnam kun de nyid ston pa po/ /'joms byed rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par gyur/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun du snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngags chen po 'di ston par byed do/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa

bi d+h+wa~M` sa ya u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer gyis

kun du bkang nas ched du brjod pas ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyis ni/ /sngags kyi tshul gyi bdag nyid nga / /sangs rgyas kun gyi sangs rgyas nyid/ /zla ba drug gis thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das slar yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gsal bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man ta badzrA NA~M a tsa la

kAn he he mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi Sha A bi Sha/ ma hA ba la man+tu tsa la d+hu na d+hu na/ ti na ti na/ khAd khAd/ big+h+nA~M` mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TA na bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ sarbA+ai ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi Sha ma badzrA s+phA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/ hU~M

hU~M tri ba li ta rang+gA narta kaHA~M hA~M A~M hA~M A~M hA~M/ a tsa la tsa Ta/ s+phA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya hU~M` a/ sa man+ti ka trAT/ ma hA ba la/ sA ta ya/ trA~M hA~M` mA~M` shud+h+ya tu lo ka stu sh+yastu/ badzrI na maHtsan+da pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+ya dz+wA la ya trAT/ a sa ha/ na maHswA hA/ de nas

mngag gzhug gi khro bo 'di gsungs pa tsam la/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs sna tshogs 'chang chen po de nyid thams cad yang dag par bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du ched du brjod

pa 'di ched du brjod par mdzad do/ /e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /de nyid 'byung ba bstan pa nga / /rdo rje mi phyed rang bzhin gyis/ /ye shes rtog gis bskyed par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kun du skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo b+ha ga t+yai b+h+rI ku T+yai/ o~M` b+h+ri ku T-i ta rang+gA bi dz+yam+b+hi ta badzra ma hA ba

la hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la 'dod chags chen po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi chos kyis kun du snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gnas pa ched du brjod pa

'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /chos kyi 'dod chags kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste/ /sngags kyi dngos grub ces bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang kun nas spro ba'i

rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje stobs po che zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bid+h+waM sa ya u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam

la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa gang yin pa ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /e ma ho sngags

rnams kun gyi ni/ /rdo rje'i dbye ba bla na med/ /de nyid dam tshig kun du dag /rdo rje yid bzhin nor bur bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje bdud rtsi thab sbyor du brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ grIh+Na grIh+Na/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wA la pra dz+wA la/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kAM/ bid+yA d+ha re/ ke lI ki la dz+wa li ta hu ta ba ha shi ra ma hA/ b+hai ra be nir+g+ho Sha/ saM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ma hA badzra d+hA ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bdag che ge mo'i/

bi nA ya ka hr-i da yAM/ s+pho Ta ya/ gan+d+harba/ hri da yAM/ s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga hri da yAM/ s+pho Ta ya/ yak+Sha hr-i da yA~M s+pho Ta ya/ brah+ma rAk+Sha saM/ hr-i da yaM s+pho Ta ya/ sarba gra ha hr-i da yAM s+pho Ta ya/ sarba dz+wa ra hr-i da yaM/ s+pho Ta ya/ sarba tsA tuR+tha ka hri da yaM s+pho Ta

ya/ hUM kA re phaT phaT/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi kurba bi kurba/ A bi sha A bi sha / ma hA badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kun du dgyes pa ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /e ma ho sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /de nyid rdo rje bla na med/ /dam tshig thams cad yang dag 'byung / /de nyid mi phyed kun bsdus pa'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje gAn+d+ha rI chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gAn+d+ha ri tra yA nAM rat+na nAM sa t+ye na/ a kaD+h+ya a kaD+h+ya/ ba la te baM/ ma

he shwa ra~M`/ ga ru TaM/ biSh+Nu~M` ku mA raM/ brah+mA Na~M/ in+d+raM tsan+d+ra~M/ A ti t+ya~M/ ya ma~M/ ba ru Na~M/ ku be ra~M/ d+h+ri ta rASh+TaM/ bi ru D+ha kaM b-i rU pA k+Sha~M/ shang+ku kaR+N+Na~M/ dwi kaR+N+Na~M/ tri kaR+N+Na~M/ go kaR+N+Na~M/ s+thU li kaR+N+Na~M/ ma hA kaR+N+Na~M/ nAn+di ke shwa raM/ b+h+r-i ki rI TiM/ nA ya kaM/

bi nA ya kaM/ pAny+tsi kaM/ lo ha kaM/ ShaSh+Thi de wI/ ko Ta gi riM/ o~M` kA riM/ durgaM/ kA t+ya yi NIM/ tsaN+Da kA t+ya yi NI/ ma hA kA t+ya ya NI/ ai shA nI/ nai ri t+yAM/ kA lI/ ma hA kA lI/ badzra kA lI~M/ ya shwi nI~M`/ sa kA lI/ b+ha tra kA lI/ ag+ne yaM/ ba ya byAM/ ha li kA/ birtaM/

shak+ti/ sha tA k+Shi/ iN+d+ra NIM/ bat+mA NIM/ kau be bI mA he shwa rI/ baiSh+Na bI~M`/ su b+ha gAM tsA muN TAM/ rau tri/ bA rA hI/ kau be rI/ ye tsA n+ye/ ma ma ye na/ tiSha n+ti/ tI n+yA brta/ yiSh+yA mi/ shI g+h+raM/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ hu lu hu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/

mu lu mu lu/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ rang+ga rang+ga/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ A bi Sha A bi Sha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA badzra gAn+d+ha ri sid+d+ha Sh+tsaN Ta/ badzra pA Ne/ rAdz+nyA pa ya ti/ hrIHhaHhaHhaHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'di gsungs pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis bskor bar gyur to/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig ma de sgrogs par byed pa 'di ched du brjod pas ched du brjod par mdzad do/ /e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /

kun gzhi 'bad par byed pa bdag /rdo rje rtse can gang 'di dran/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'bebs par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang zhi ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sen mo

zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM e h+ye hi badzra na khi/ badzra mu khi/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ rang+ga rang+ga / alpa alpa/ A bi Sha A bi Sha/ ha ya grI ba/ pa ya ti/ swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la ji srid
du dug chen po de rnams thams cad de rab tu sgoms pas bcom pa bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas rig ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rab tu btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /
e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /dug rnams thams cad sel ba bdag /pho nya'i mchog gang de brten nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rdo rje gsum mi phyed

pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /o~M` dzi na ri Ti Ta~M` hU~M` hU~M` phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan

'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po 'di sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i nor gyis nye bar bkang nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /bskyed pa yang dag 'byung ba
bdag /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub don/ /bskal pa'i rgya mtshor bdag gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang chos kyi dbyings su spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas/ rdo rje ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba'i rig ma'i rgyal po mchog 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba bid+yA ga Ne b+h+yaH o~M` e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa ti/ yak+Shi NI ye/ mA pe Ti i Ti phaDa Te dzo su ra pra ma

tha ni a ka dza Ti ni rak+ta sa hi ta de bi ma bi he Tha ya ni/ ri bi ti ri ka ri/ ta yI ri/ ka pA la ts+tsha tra/ pri ye ma hA ka pA li/ ma hA ba la/ ma hA tsa pa le/ sid+d+hi sarba aR+tha/ sA d+ha ya/ sarba satwa big+h+na pra sha ma ni swA hA/
de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das pad ma 'chang ba de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad rnam par spros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan du gnas nas ched du brjod pa
'di ched du rjod par mdzad do/ /e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid can 'byung ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi zhi gang de/ /rnam par bsgoms pas mchod par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

'khor lo thams cad kun du skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po khro gnyer can 'di gsungs so/ /oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ya trA sa ya b+h+r-i ku Ti ta Ti bai ta Ti shwe te dza Ti ni swA hA/
de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das zhi ba 'chang ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par mdzad do/ /e ma'o sngags rnams

kun gyi ni/ /Ta gang sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung / /chos kyi yum ni rab bsgrub don/ /'di ni bskyed par gsungs pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang ye shes 'du bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rang gi rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M` A ro lika /de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

rigs kyi yum 'di gsungs so/ /o~M` ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ne sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rang gi sku rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di

gsungs so/ /oM shang+ka ri shAn+ti ku re g+hu Ta g+hu Ti g+hu Ti ni g+hu Ti ni g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ g+ha Ti ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas rang gi sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM swa te pAN+Da ra bA si ni dza TA ma ku Ta d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs

so/ /oM d+huHde nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hU~M/ grI h+nA pa ya grI h+nA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAM bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos rnam

par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas nyon mongs pa za ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM kle shA sa ni bi dza ye swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i

gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ /oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dIp+ta tsakra hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

gzi brjid phung po 'di gsungs so/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ /oM dza yoSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ban+da ban+da/ da ma da ma/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha ha ha na hU~M` phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dkar po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M` ma ma ma ma hU~M` niH de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

rig ma chen mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so/ /oM tA re tuta tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nges par sgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo gzegs

ma'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so/ /oM ka ni d+hu ni hU~M phaT/ 'jig rten gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags shin du ma rungs pa'i las te ji srid du gdon gzhan 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms

pas las rnam pa gsum byed do/ /mi g.yo zhes bya'i khro bo che/ /gshin rje mthar byed gsum 'byung ba/ /kun nas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su/ /khams gsum pa yang des 'joms byed/ /khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / /

khro gnyer rim par ldan gyur gang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang / /khro bo 'di yis 'joms par byed/ /stobs chen bdud rtsi zhes grags dag /mi shes 'jig cing 'phrog byed pa nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs
pa yang / /the tshom med par 'joms par byed/ /'bum du
bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun du son par byed pa yin/ /blo ldan sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'ang / /'gugs par byed par the tshom med/ /khro gnyer tsi ka Ta rig ma/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed/ /
lha min chen po sogs sbyor bas/ /g.yul du sbyor bar byed pa yin/ /khro bo gzegs ma'i mchog rtser skyes/ /sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya/ /khro ba'i sems kyis sbyar byas na/ /nges par sangs
rgyas kyang 'jigs byed/ /lag par de ni yang dag bskyed/ /mi smra der son bsam pa yis/ /pha rol dpung ni rengs par byed/ /brgya byin gyi yang the tshom med/ /gzi brjid phung po bzlas nas ni/ /
'bum phrag gsum du legs bskor na/ /brgya byin sde yang rengs par byed/ /'ga' zhig min par 'joms par bstan/ /sgrol ma sgrol len yang dag 'byung / /'bar ba'i ye shes dge 'byung
bar/ /'og gi sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis/ /rdo rje'i sde yang rengs par byed/ /de yi snying po'i mchog skyes gang / /rigs dang rigs dbang rig par byed/ /de dang yang na 'di nyid du/ /sbyor bar
bsams nas bsam gtan gyi/ /ting 'dzin bsgom pas ser po'am/ /gzhan du dmar por nges sbyar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /
sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bcwa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngags thams cad kun las/ btus pa'i le'u gsungs
so/ /zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las la/ /rang gzugs rnam pa bsgom pa yis/ /thugs kar ye shes yang dag 'byung / /cod pan ye shes chos dbang phyug /sangs rgyas gzugs
su rnam bsgoms nas/ /rin chen sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rnal 'byor pas bsdus gong bur bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /khro bo rnams kyi ston pa 'di/ /rdo rje 'byung ba sgom byed
pa/ /de yis ngo bo rnam bsgoms pas/ /rigs dang rigs su 'di bstan no/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas/ /kha dog lnga pa legs mdzes par/ /sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgom bya/ /slar yang rigs kyi

bdag po'i sngags/ /'di nyid bsgom par bya ba ste/ /gtsug tor yang ni rnam bsgom bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dgyes dang mgu bar byed par bshad/ /dngos grub thams cad byed par 'dod/ /rdo rje ye shes sogs

rdzogs byed/ /rig ma la sogs thams cad kyi'ang / /rig pa'i rgyal po rnam 'joms byed/ /pho nya mos kyang thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom pa/ /'dod 'gyur sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /rang gzugs

rnam pa sgom pas so/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi dam tshig 'byung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phan 'dod pas/ /rdo rje dpa' bo'i mchog gis gsungs/ /sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i
le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skrod par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so/ /skrod par la sogs bya ba la/ /sangs rgyas de nyid ye

shes can/ /khro bo gsum po bsdus pa yi/ /rdo rje 'byung bas grags pa nyid/ /gshin rje gshed ni ye shes rigs/ /bsdus pa'i don la mchog rtser skyes/ /khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni/ /chos kyi ye shes rigs

su bshad/ /stong phrag gam ni brgya yang rung / /ther 'bum gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas shes pa yang / /cho ga shes pas skrod par byed/ /thod pa gsum la kun bzhag nas/ /lho yi phyogs kyi

dur khrod du/ /'dod pa 'di ni yang dag brtsam/ /rdo dang shing gi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po med pas yang dag brtsam/ /rdo dang phub ma yang dag ldan/ /bza' dang gsal byed rnam par spangs/ /khrag dang phabs su yang dag ldan/ /

nim pa'i 'dab mas bza' bya ba/ /ta la'i 'dab ma la bri bya/ /sngags pas 'khrul 'khor smad par bya/ /tsher ma can gyis bris nas ni/ /nim pa'i 'dab ma khar bcug nas/ /sbyor ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /lha

chen po yi 'og tu ni/ /dri ma med pa kun gzung bya/ /cho ga shes pas lan bdun du/ /mngon par sngags te yang dag brtsam/ /dgra yi sgo 'am yang na grong / /grong khyer ram ni kun 'byung ba'i/ /gnas 'di rnams su phung po ni/ /kun

nas skrod par byed pa yin/ /snying po de la mdor bsdus pas/ /bya ba tsog pu'i stan la 'dug /dri ma med pa'i gzugs byas nas/ /khro bo khro bo'i mchog 'byung ba/ /yon tan stong phrag kyang bskyed nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas kyang thob

byed/ /nyi ma bdun nam so sor byas/ /gal te 'ga' zhig mi 'gro na/ /mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /mi phyed rdo rje rang gis gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skrod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas slob dpon 'dab bzang nyid/ /rdo rje'i dkyil dkrung du gnas te/ /bya dka'i nye bar

longs spyod kyis/ /gang de 'tsho zhing gnas par byed/ /brjod pa'i lhag ma bstan par bshad/ /'gro ba dang ni gar nyid dang / /de bzhin 'bel gtam du mi 'gyur/ /mthon po min nyid slob ma yis/ /chos kyi dus su'ang
sdig pa sogs/ /gnas bya gal te rmongs pa de/ /mnar med gnas su 'tshed par 'gyur/ /sngags tsam gal te tshangs pa la/ /lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag brtsam/ /ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung / /
mnar med gnas su 'tshed par 'gyur/ /bud med gsang min brjod bya min/ /gang zhig la la slob dpon ched/ /bde dang lus sems sdug bsngal ba/ /sbyor ba ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /gal te slob

dpon rnams kyi bka'/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis byas gyur na/ /de tshe bdag la sangs rgyas sogs/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de la ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /brda yis kun du gnas par bya/ /dku ru brten pa'i

lag pa sogs/ /ji srid 'tsho bar mi bya'o/ /dngos grub 'bras bu don gnyer bas/ /slob dpon ming nas smos mi bya/ /ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung / /mnar med dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes so/ /bza' ba la yang rang slob shes/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ /de yi ming gi yi ge gang / /ji srid 'tsho bar brjod mi bya/ /sangs rgyas grangs med bsad byas na/ /sdig pa

'di ni khyad par 'phags/ /gang tshe kha cig yon tan 'dis/ /bstod na bsod nams yang dag 'byung / /de tshe slob dpon rtog med pas/ /gzhan du gal te rmongs pa bdag /de tshe ngu 'bod ngu 'tshed 'gyur/ /gang tshe de me pa

yA ti/ /gus pas nyan sogs bsnyen pa gang / /de tshe slob ma sngags zhu dang / /ji ltar kha cig slob dpon rnams/ /bde ba dngos su mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig la la slob dpon rnams/ /bdag nyid thig nag 'tshod

cing 'tshed/ /de dag ngu 'bod ngu 'tshed 'gyur/ /slob dpon gang zhig tshol byed pa/ /de ni de la dbul bar bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid/ /ji srid slob ma'i ma brtag slob dpon gyi/ /chung ma'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /yang

na sring mo de byin nas/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /slob dpon gang zhig slob ma'i phyir/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni bsgrub par bya/ /bskal pa drug bcur de dmyal ba'i/ /sdug bsngal myong bar 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de ltar

yon tan khyad 'phags kyi/ /zla ba drug gis rab gsal bya/ /gal te gzhan du bdag rmongs na/ /mnar med lta bur 'tshed par 'gyur/ /gang nyid slob dpon tshol byed pa/ /de nyid so sor bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes rab bskul

bas/ /dngos grub yangs par der 'gro 'gyur/ /yon tan 'di rnams gang gis 'gas/ /bsod nams 'byung bar shes par bya/ /slob dpon 'di yi rgyud la sogs/ /de lta bu sogs gsal bya min/ /de ltar bdag nyid dag pa thob/ /

chos kyi de nyid cho gas gnas/ /de yis slob dpon rab gsal bya/ /myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /sangs rgyas gnas la gnas pa yis/ /gang de mgu nas rdor sems mchog /myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min/ /sangs

rgyas sangs rgyas nyid thob pa/ /de mgu byed pa mchog 'byung 'gyur/ /de yis 'jig rten gsum 'grub ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rang nyid kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed
pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sngags thams cad kyi le'u gsungs so/ /skyed mos tshal dang rnam par dben/ /chu klung rab

tu 'bab pa dang / /ri dang rnam par bkra ba ru/ /sgrub pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya/ /zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te min na de 'grub min/ /dben dang gzhan pa'i yul rnams su/ /sems ni gang du rab dgyes

byed/ /gsang sngags 'bar bas byin brlabs pa/ /de la sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni chu klung che/ /ri bo chen po'i rtse rnams su/ /yan lag tha dad min sngags bzlas/ /nges par zla bas 'grub par

byed/ /ske tshe dug dang yang dag ldan/ /tig ta'i shing gi sbyin bsreg gis/ /bsnyen pa sogs ni de bskyed nas/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa kun spyad bya/ /de la sdom pa gzung nas ni/ /nges par 'grub byed gzhan du min/ /gsang
sngags cho ga kun thob nas/ /sngags pas bsnyen pa 'grub par byed/ /de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi/ /sdom pa so sor bsgrub par bya/ /gang nyid sdom par yang dag brjod/ /de nyid brtul zhugs can

gyis bsrung / /gzhan du nam mkha' ji srid par/ /mnar med dmyal bar kun tu 'byung / /ji srid 'tsho bar cho ga bzhin/ /slob dpon sdom pa srung ba la/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /sna tshogs 'dzin pa kun gzhi yi/ /

mnyam med gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub/ /zla ba gcig gis 'jig rten gsum/ /de yis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /rnam shes las kyang byung ba'i sngags/ /'bum phrag drug

tu bzlas nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpar phyag byas nas/ /zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i rab dbye bas/ /nges par sangs rgyas kyang thob byed/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba rab bkod pa/ /nges par lha rnams spyan

drangs med/ /ngag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa/ /de nyid rtag tu 'bad bya'o/ /mkhas pas rab mchog sangs rgyas la/ /sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing byas nas/ /de rnams sngags ni bzlas nas ni/ /rtag tu nges par sbyin par

bya/ /sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang / /gal te sangs rgyas bu mo'ang rung / /bzung nas nye bar longs spyad bya/ /ji srid yid ni tshim par 'gyur/ /dug dang skye tshe yang dag ldan/ /yungs kar til mar bsres pa dang / /rus pa rdo bar

yang dag ldan/ /ma ti ta~M de phye mar bya/ /bshang dang gci ba rab bcug nas/ /rtul zhugs can gyi khyad par gyis/ /zur gsum mgrin pa'i me la bsreg /nges par myur du 'grub par byed/ /lha sbyin zhes ni byas nas ni/ /

gang gis 'di ni rab gsal byed/ /gal te 'dir ni sangs rgyas rung / /gang de thal bar byed par 'gyur/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo phyed la yang / /nyi ma'i gung la sbyin bsreg bya/ /bskal pa gcig gi bar gyi yang / /sbyin

byed gzhan du nam yang min/ /gal te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig /rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'das na ni/ /mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /byang chub sems ni rang gis gsungs/ /rengs dang 'bebs pa dang por grags/ /

gnyis pa sa zhes bya bar brjod/ /gsum pa lha yi mchog yin no/ /bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang / /phyag na rdo rjer grags pa yin/ /snying po kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bya ba myur du 'grub par byed/ /reg pa sna

tshogs sogs dang gnas/ /skyed mos tshal dang dga' ston che/ /dkyil 'khor de la bya ba ni/ /bdug pa byin nas yang dag brtsam/ /gal te brgya byin nam tshangs pa/ /sangs rgyas sam yang blo gros che/ /cho ga
shes pas zhag bdun gyis/ /'joms 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cho ga shes pas khrag gis byugs/ /rang nyid rang gi lus su bya/ /skra grol gtsug tor gyur nas ni/ /mi sdug mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed/ /

dur khrod khyim du yang dag sbyor/ /rang gis de yi ming bri bya/ /stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'dzin byed/ /cho ga shes pas gsher ba'i gos/ /khro bo'i sems kyis rab zhugs nas/ /

ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'joms/ /khyab 'jug lha min la sogs lha/ /rkang par byas nas brtsam par bya/ /cho ga shes pas nyin bdun gyis/ /khams gsum po yang 'joms par byed/ /

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sngags thams cad 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gsang ba chen po'i le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sgrub

pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i le'u gsungs so/ /bshang dang gci ba bza' bar bya/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal de nyid ni/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ rma dgu las ni yang dag byung / /'ga' zhig

tu ni bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ 'dod chags bza' bar bya ba ni/ /phan dang bde ba thams cad sbyin/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug

go/ zhe sdang bza' bar bya ba ni/ /rdo rje ye shes rab rtogs byed/ /de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ gti mug bza' bar bya ba ni/ /ye shes thams cad rtogs pa po/ /de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po/ /sangs

rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/ /bde sdug bza' bar bya ba ni/ /slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/ /slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /chos dang chos min bza' bar bya/ /

de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog de nyid ston pa po/ /ji srid 'tsho bar 'ga' zhig tu/ /sems can khams ni bza' bar bya/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ ji srid 'tsho bar smad pa yi/ /

bya ba thams cad mi bya'o/ /de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar

thob nas rdo rje 'chang thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar te gang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na/ gzhan lta ci smos zhes so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags
yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i le'u bstan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas lngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ /byin brlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis/ /de nyid sna tshogs rnam

bsgom pa/ /cho ga shes pas de steng du/ /yi ge bzhi ni rnam bsgom pa/ /bdag nyid dbus su son byas nas/ /rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshon pa/ /rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung / /cho ga shes pas kun dgang bya/ /
de yis sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /sgom pa 'di nyid rab sgrub byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bzhi lnga'i yi ge
rnam bsgom nas/ /yi ge lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par/ /o~M` yig ser po dang mtshungs pa/ /'od zer lnga po kun du 'khrugs/ /der son bdag nyid sngags pas sgom/ /
dbus su hU~M yig yang dag sbyor/ /rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya/ /'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gzugs brnyan tshul gyis bskyed nas ni/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /yid du 'ong ba
bsgom par gyis/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan de rnams su/ /'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ /rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar/ /bsams nas cho ga shes pas der/ /

bsdus nas de la ltung bar bya/ /zla ba 'char bas mtshan pa yi/ /mnyam med gzugs ni bskyed nas ni/ /gsal ba'i ral pa 'chang zhi ba/ /cod pan lnga ni 'dzin pa po/ /sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam pa'i 'od/ /sangs
rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas/ /dkyil 'khor du bzhugs bsams nas ni/ /de yi sngags ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas/ /gtsug

tor de yi bzlas pa bya/ /khro bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang / /rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang / /bskyed pa'i cho gar 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje gsum kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs s+ho// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas de thams cad/ /oM yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas
rnam brgyan pa'i/ /hU~M yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /dbus su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / /phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /rnam
par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas/ /'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /bsams nas de yi thugs ka ru/ /zla bar sngags kyi yi ge bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
rdzogs s+ho// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas/ /dbus su ha~M yig sgom

pa ni/ /ngos su rang gi gzugs ltar byas/ /rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya/ /dbus su chos 'chang bsams nas ni/ /pad ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa/ /phyag na pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su rnam bsgom pa/ /
thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// //cho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas/ /
ngos su ha~M yig yang dag sbyar/ /dbus su rang gi rnam pa bsgom/ /'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'dod mchod gzugs ni bskyed par bya/ /lag tu mdung rtse gsum bsgoms nas/ /de yi snying gar
dkyil 'khor dgod/ /chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgoms nas/ /phyi nas bya ba yang dag brtsam/ /sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs s+ho// //
yang na brtul zhugs can gyis ni/ /bsdu ba yi sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya/ /gtsug tor sngags dang khro bo dang / /rig pa'i rgyal po rigs bcas pas/ /las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags/ /go rims bzhin du

de bzlas bya/ /dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni/ /ngos su lha rnams dgod par bya/ /snying po sbyor ba de rnams su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge mchod bsgoms nas/ /de yis rnam pa

rnam bsgoms pa/ /thams cad kyi ni lag par ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma bsgom/ /mdung dang yid bzhin nor bu yang / /bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed/ /sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

pa yis/ /ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor/ /dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya/ /bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi lus la dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas/ /'di ni rengs par byed pa'i
mchog /dus rnams kun du rnam bsgoms nas/ /nges par bskal par de gnas 'gyur/ /cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod bya/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni/ /thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di/ /bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub na/ /yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog /

phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po/ /cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya/ /myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min/ /phyag rgya chen por rab bsgoms nas/ /nam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni/ /dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i/ /dkyil
'khor dge ba bsgom par bya/ /sngags pas dkyil 'khor las ngos su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /bdag po'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya/ /rin

chen bzhi byung sgo nga ru/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyis rab tu dgang / /sngags kyi yi ge rnam bsgoms nas/ /bsam pa de yis sbyin bsreg bya/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su hU~M` gi yi ge 'gengs/ /'bar

ba'i phreng ba 'thibs pa ni/ /kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed/ /de la gnas pas lha yi gzugs/ /tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas/ /cho ga shes pas gtsug tor gyis/ /gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya/ /
bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis pa'i/ /ut+pal chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de nyid kyis ni
bsgom par bshad/ /rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che/ /uta pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /A li bcu drug yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu bsgom bya 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i/ /rtse gsum ser

po dang mtshungs pa/ /cho ga nyid kyis bsgom byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /pad ma las kyi rdo rje dang / /yid bzhin nor bu gsum pa can/ /bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ /myur du sgrub

byed gzhan du min/ /'khor lo de bzhin pad rdo rje/ /bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las/ /sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen po mdung sogs bcas/ /'bar ba'i phreng
ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi/ /rjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas/ /ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i sems/ /'phro zhing 'thibs pa kun du 'khrugs/ /khru gang tsam du yang dag

bskyed/ /khro bar byed pa'i khyad par bya/ /pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ /sgom pas mchog tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbyug pa tho ba dgra sta

dang / /zhags pa paT+Ti sa bsgom pa'i/ /cho gas bsgom par byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bsgom pa ste/ /rdo rje ye shes can gyis gsang / /

ye shes dngos grub can du brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /cho ga shes pas sbyin bsreg bya/ /de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rnam
pa sna tshogs sbyin bsreg brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las/ /rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed/ /o~M` yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis/ /sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhi ba can la dkyil 'khor

zlum/ /rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog /dbang bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o/ /zhi la me yi dbus son par/ /bdud rtsi lta bur bsgom par bya/ /de nyid la ni lha yi gzugs/ /rang gi tshul

gyis bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung / /kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas/ /me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi/ /sngags pas lce yi dbus son par/ /hU~M yig

de yis bsam par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das sbyin bsreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas 'o ma sbrang / /mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad/ /mar khu chen po'i bye brag las/ /ye shes rdo rje'i rigs
su brjod/ /zhi la rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /snying ga'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas/ /'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go/ rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan che/ /pad ma'i
yon tan 'byung ba la/ /gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog gi/ gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rje can/ /las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las/ /sngags kyi yi ge dgod byas nas/ /bcom ldan
'das gsang ba'i sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid
bzhin nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying
po'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po/ /'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po/ /sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs/ /de yi bsam gtan rab bskul bya/ /dam tshig ye
shes sangs rgyas kun/ /rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /o~M` yig ye shes dbye ba yis/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /ral pa'i cod
pan longs spyod pa/ /kha dog dkar po shin du mdzes/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs pa/ /me stag 'thibs pas kun du 'khrugs/ /rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs/ /brgyan cing dkyil 'khor
la sogs pa/ /cod pan du ni rdo rje sems/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas/ /'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go/ sku yi rdo rje'i sogs sbyor gyis/ /
mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las/ /rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas/ /thod pa can gyi gtso bor brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes/ /rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs
so/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya/ /nag po shin du rnam 'gyur khros/ /ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs/ /me stag 'thibs po 'bar ba ste/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs

par byed/ /phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas/ /dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor las/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul brtan pa'o/ /rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub/ /rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ /'dod chags rdo rje

rab bskul bas/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos 'chang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ /dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /dmar po 'dod chags
'dzin pa 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /phyag bzhi pa la yid 'ong bar/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas/ /de yi cho ga bsgom pa ni/ /'di ni 'dod chags tshul bstan pa'o/ /gsung gi

rdo rje gtso dngos grub/ /rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub/ /sgom pa yang ni myur 'grub byed/ /chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rigs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i
dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/ /gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya/ /khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog /spyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /kun du dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs/ /me

stag tshogs ni kun du 'khrugs/ /phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis/ /bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub/ /rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /thar

pa'i ting 'dzin snying po can/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bsgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin/ /rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba/ /de la lha nyid rab tu grags/ /
slar yang 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam/ /yang na rigs kyi rig
pa yis/ /rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis sam/ /brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos/ /thams cad las can sngags kyis dang / /gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya/ /'di de sngags rnams
thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas/ /rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags/ /rgyas pa can la
rigs kyi sngags/ /sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed/ /dbang du bya ba'i cho ga las/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya/ /thams cad las can sngags kyis ni/ /mngon spyod rnam par sgom par byed/ /skrod
par byed pa'i cho ga las/ /gtsug tor du ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags shes pas ni phur gdab sogs/ /pho nya pho nya mo bsam bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /'od zer lnga yi
tshul gyis ni/ /rtog pas de la bsgom par bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid/ /sgom pa rnams su shes par bya/ /rigs kyi las kyi rab dbye bas/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa'o/ /sngags
kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ /bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ /bsgoms pas dngos
grub thob par 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa/ /steng du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis/ /'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go/ dkar nag dmar po'i sbyor ba las/ /bsam

gtan thams cad du brtag bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid/ /sngags rnams kun du bzlas par bya/ /hU~M` yig o~M` yig dbye ba yis/ /swA hA hU~M` yig gzhan gyi gzugs/ /skyed pa'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /
bsnyen pa gang zhig nges bsgrub bya/ /rigs gsum la yang hU~M` yig dang / /o~M` yig ye shes rigs mchog yin/ /sngags kyi yi ge la sogs rnams/ /dpral bar bkod nas rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /spro ba dang ni gnas par bya/ /'di ni dngos grub tshul bstan pa'o/ /sgrub
par rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la/ /'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go/ bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la/ /bdag po'i gzugs dang yang
dag ldan/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su rab bsgrub pa/ /gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi/ /rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje phra rab dbye
ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o/ /grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun/ /'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob/ /de yi mchog tu bsgrub par bya/ /dngos grub chen po'i yon tan 'byung / /
bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por sngags thams cad kun las btus pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems

dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi gsung gi lam nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ston par mdzad do/ /gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa

med/ /ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /kun nas ye shes bdag med pa/ /gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan/ /mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che/ /kun nas 'dod pa yang dag

'byung / /rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gtso bo'i ye shes ji ltar gnas/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa/ /rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob/ /byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can kun skyes can
gyi mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gzhug mdzad/ /rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog /sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos sku thar pa chen po ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che/ /sems can

kun dgyes byed pa po/ /dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sor 'dod par bya ba gang ci ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
pos byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /the tshom med par mnyam par shes/ /sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya/ /the tshom med par 'du shes pa/ /chos rnams thams

cad 'dod par bya/ /'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs

spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to/ /rigs
kyi bu mdor bsdus na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la dad par ci ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka'
stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa/ ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/

'di lta ste/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa'i gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i tshul 'di blta bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ya mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas/ de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so/ /

e ma'o ye shes ye shes che/ /rdo rje chen po rab tu mthong / /rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyis/ /ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gA'i
klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phyung nas shar dang lho la sogs pa'i/ phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i gang gA'i klung
gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyis gang bar mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas/ byang chub
kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub rang bzhin yang dag thob/ /byang chub sems dpas snying po byin/ /nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i/ /rdo rje byang chub
rab tu gnas/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la/ /spros pa dag ni yod ma yin/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin ye shes kyis/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to/ /sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das phyag na rdo rje skyes bu chen po de yi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sgrom bu/ nges par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang
gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do/ /de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs
nam mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pa'i
ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// //'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba
zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// //mkhan chen thar pa lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe'i/ gseb
nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyid stod smon/ // //
tho'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pas/

dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin du byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu ston

gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no// //rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yi/ /chos min sun dbyung bya phyir dang / /dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags/ /

'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang / /rgya dpe'i dpe spang ma rnyed cing / /don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la/ /sa~M` skr-i ta la ma byang bas/ /sgra don ji bzhin ma 'byor pa'i/ /nongs de mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing / /

phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/ /ma dag shes na bcos par zhu/ /rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las/ /dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa/ /de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig / //

bkra shis par gyur cig /'di la dbu nas shog lto gcig ma tshang bas rnyed na bsgyur bar bya'o/ /'di dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba gcig tu 'dod pa yang 'khrul bar snang ngo / /'dis 'khor ba sdug bsngal
gyi rgya mtsho chen po myur du skems par gyur cig /rgyud 'di la kun mkhyen gnyis pa bu ston zhabs kyi 'gyur mi 'dra ba gnyis 'dug pa las/ 'di ni 'gyur bde ba de nyid las bris pa yin la/ rgya dpe zubs
pa'i bar skabs nas tshigs bcad rkang pa re re gnyis gnyis tsam gyi hor kor ma tshang ba rnams su rgya gram gyis mtshan ma btab yod pas shes par bya'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya tan tra yo ga ma hA rA dza a dwa ya sa ma tA bi dza ya nA ma badzra shrI wa ra ma hA kalpa A di/ bod skad du/ dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang

ba rnal 'byor chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje dpal mchog chen po brtag pa dang po'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal rdo rje

sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa yi/ /dus gcig tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi ni/ /b+ha ga

la ni snyoms par zhugs/ /gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba/ /gsang ba chen po 'di lta ste/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /gsang ba pa rnams ma lus pa'i/ /sku dang gsungs

dang thugs rdo rje/ /byang chub sems kyi snying po che/ /chos kun mnyam pa nyid dgongs pa'i/ /mnyam nyid gnyis su med pa'i gnas/ /spyod pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de nyid ngang la
gnas pa yis/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med la/ /gzigs shing mi phyed rdo rje las/ /ma g.yos lham me lhang nger gnas/ /mi 'gyur gsang ba 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rig pa'i
lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /sna tshogs 'khor rnams 'dus pa ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs rnams las/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun du bzang pos gsol ba btab/ /rang gi stan las langs

nas ni/ /bla gos phrag par gzar gyur pas/ /pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar te spyis btud nas/ /gsang ba zhes ni gang la bya/ /ches gsang ba ni ji lta bu/ /gsang ba chen po ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis gsung du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'khor rnams kun la rjes brtse bas/ /rdo rje gsang ba kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni snang ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal yongs su dag /nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos bdag nyid/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus dang spros pa'i

tshul/ /bskyed dang gnas dang sdud par mdzad/ /nyan thos rang rgyal la sogs las/ /gsang ba bya ba spyod pa ste/ /pha rol phyin pa'i mdo sde las/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor rgyud du grags/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i rim shes

pas/ /gsang chen rnal 'byor bla med rgyud/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /stong pa snying rje dbyer med phyir/ /bde chen byang chub sems mchog gsang / /de nyid dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/ /zab dang rgya che'i snying
po nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /gnyis med mnyam pa ro gcig pas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'di ni/ /thun mong ma yin rgyal po che/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin/ /legs so legs
so sems dpa' che/ /kun du bzang po legs par nyon/ /rgyud rnams kun du ma bshad cing / /khyad par dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rim pa bla na med pa'i chos/ /snying po khyod la bstan par bya/ /e ma'o
sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems mchog bla na med/ /rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i mchog /'dod chags can gyi skyes bu rnams/ /rab tu gdul ba'i
don ched du/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa mchog gi chos/ /gzhung nyung rtogs par sla ba'i don/ /'dus pa chen po rdo rje'i tshig /rtogs dka' sangs rgyas spyod yul pas/ /sdom pa gsang ba rgyas gdab phyir/ /

dri med ye shes 'byung gnas gter/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i yul/ /thabs las ma lus sangs rgyas 'byung / /'di nyid gsang ba'i chos

nyid can/ /sku yi gsang ba ma skyes pa/ /sems can lus dang snang ba khyab/ /gsung gi gsang ba ma 'gags pas/ /thams cad sgra dang dbyer mi phyed/ /thugs kyi gsang ba skye ba med/ /phyag rgya chen po lam gyi mchog /

'khor 'das chos dang ro gcig pas/ /sbas pa gsang ba mi shes rnams/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /dri mas khebs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba lnga sogs dag tu 'khod/ /gsang ba'i yi ge'i don ma mthong / /

ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar/ /ka kha ga mtha' na dz+ha'i mtha'/ /da d+ha'i mtha' dang ma mthar bcas/ /de de rtsa ba'i yi ge gsum/ /

thog mtha' gsang ba e dang ba~M/ /dus gsum rdo rje'i yi ge'i gnas/ /'byung dang 'byung las g+hur sgrar bcas/ /'dus pa 'di ni sbas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rgyud tshul sna tshogs rnams/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa

yis/ /du ma nyid du dbang bskur bas/ /thabs dang shes rab spyod pa yi/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i phung po yin/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi/ /khyad par rim pa gang gis ni/ /mdo don mngon par bsdus pa yin/ /

a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aH/ a ni skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma'i bar/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i chos rnams kyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i

gsung rab mchog /snying po'i yan lag dag tu bshad/ /thub pa chen pos chos phung po/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa las/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i snod yin te/ /de bas 'di ni rgyud kyi rtsa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung

thugs/ /yon tan phrin las rdo rje sogs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa ni/ /snying po kun las 'di bsdus yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal
rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag
par 'dus te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog rnams kyis/ /nges par bgrod pa'i lam gyur
pa/ /rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal don/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed don bshad gsol ces gsol ba btab pas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos ji lta bar mkhyen cing thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams

cad kyi sgo la 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rang bzhin dag cing bdag med

pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni spros dang bral/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni/ /rang 'byung dag par 'char ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub kyi/ /'bras bu nyams snang sna tshogs pa'o/ /khams gsum
sems can thams cad la/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /phrin las dag
pa'i stobs su 'char/ /de nyid gzhan du mi rnyed de/ /shes rgyud gcig gis bsdus pa'i phyir/ /'brel pa can du brjod par bya/ /khyad par chos ni brtag dka' ba'o/ /stong gsum zhing 'di sprul pa yi/ /

dkyil 'khor rgya che 'jig rten khams/ /gsal ba dri ma med pa ste/ /dag pa rang 'byung ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs chos nyid gcig pa las/ /kun du khyab pa dga' ba'i gzugs/ /rang bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku/ /spro bsdu'i

sprin gyis kun du khyab/ /phyogs bcu 'od kyi phreng ba yi/ /snang bas rgyas pa 'phro zhing 'khrugs/ /gsal dang gsal min gnyis ldan pa'i/ /rin chen pad ma'i phreng ldan pas/ /phyogs rnams kun du dus gsum gyi/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul che/ /rigs lngar 'byung ba rnams dang ni/ /phyogs kyi dbye bas gnas pa yi/ /lha rnams thams cad 'byung ba ni/ /yang dag ting 'dzin dbye ba yis/ /zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang / /
yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig ste/ /rigs lngar gyur pa 'di dag gis/ /'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pas/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dag dang ma dag gyur pa rnams/ /'dir ni rigs la gnas

pa ste/ /rags dang phra ba'i cha brten pas/ /lus sems chos ni rab tu dbye/ /lus ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam par 'byung / /ngag ni brag cha lta bu ste/ /dbyer med rdo rje lhan cig skyes/ /rten
dang brten pa dbyer med pas/ /thams cad chos nyid sems la gnas/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su btags/ /snod bcud snang ba'i yul rnams dang / /brtan g.yo khams gsum rang rig pa/ /srid

gsum ma lus chos nyid de'i/ /snang ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ /dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / /thams cad chos nyid bag chags 'byung / /rgyu las 'bras bu bskyed pa'i phyir/ /gcig las du ma'i chos kun shar/ /

du ma nyid du dmigs med de/ /thams cad stong phyir ma skyes pa'o/ /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po

la sogs pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing yi rang te/ bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa thob nas lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs rdo rje la rab tu gnas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /

e ma'o rang lus sgyu mar grub pa dag /nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med/ /dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /stong pa nyid ni rdo rje'i sku/ /lus ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/ /dag pa chen po ye shes lus/ /ngag ni

brag cha'i sgra dang mtshungs/ /brjod pa'i dus na stong pa ste/ /pi wang sgra bzhin rten 'brel gyis/ /rang grag brjod pa tha snyad tsam/ /sems ni rang 'byung dag pa la/ /ye shes chen po rang gnas nyid/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs pa

bral ba las/ /snang ba tsam du'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos chos thams cad la zab pa'i tshul la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

sku gsung thugs rdo rje bla na med pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ ma skyes mi 'gag rol par gang 'byung ba/ /byang chub sems ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med ston pa'i sku/ /sgyu 'phrul rgyal po bde chen
'di nyid de/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /mtshan ma med cing mi 'gyur 'ja' tshon ltar/ /gnyis med gnyis su med min mnyam pa'i sku/ /shin du dri med nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /

hU~M badzra d+h+rika /b+h+rU~M` dzi na dzika /trA~M` rata na d+h+rika /hrIHa ro lika /kha~M` pradz+nyA d+h+rika /la~M` dwe Sha ra ti/ ma~M` mo ha ra ti/ pa~M rA ga ra ti/ ta~M badzra ra ti/ ya ya mAn ta krita/ ma pra dz+nyAn ta krita/ ta pad mAn ta krita/ ka big+han
ta krita/ rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / /'khor lo bsnams pa'i 'od 'phro ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs tshul lha rnams kun/ /yab yum bde ba nyid du bzhugs/ /dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa'i

mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rdo rje gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / gsung

rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston par mdzad pa'i phyir gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis chos thams cad las rnam par rtog pa med cing rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor

'dus pa rnams la yang dag pa'i snang ba ston par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bla ma nyid du ston par mdzad/ /sngags kyi spyod

pa spyod mchog gis/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di spyad pa na/ /gang spyod de yis ye shes 'thob/ /tshul 'di shin du 'da' dka' ba'o/ /mkha' dang mtshungs pa mnyam 'gyur bas/ /rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las/ /yang dag sku

ni rab tu 'byung / /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha+/ oM yo ga shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ dag pa'i sngags kyi sgra rnams dang / /sngags dang rlung du sbyar ba nyid/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i ye shes

lnga/ /chos rnams yi ge stong par brjod/ /rdo rje mi bskyod rgyal mchog ni/ /zhe sdang can gyi gdul bya la/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /gtum zhing gdug pa thams cad 'dul/ /dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen gyis/ /nga rgyal can gyi gdul bya rnams/ /

rin chen rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /ser snas 'jungs pa thams cad btul/ /tshe dpag med kyis 'od byed kyis/ /'dod chags kyis ni bcings pa rnams/ /pad ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sred pa can gyi gdug pa btul/ /
thogs med grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ /shin du phrag dog che rnams la/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sems can ma rungs las can btul/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor yangs pas ni/ /rmongs dang ma
rungs mche ba can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /gti mug mun par tshud rnams btul/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid rigs ni lnga ru bshad/ /shin du bsdus pa'i sbyor
bas ni/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes mchog /khru ni bcu gnyis tshad mnyam pa/ /ngos bzhi dag la mnyam pa yis/ /bcu gnyis sa ni mngon rdzogs pas/ /bcu gsum pa la gnas pa yin/ /gsung gi

dkyil 'khor bla na med/ /khru ni nyi shu mnyam pa ste/ /ngos re la yang lnga lngar brjod/ /rlung bcu sngags bcur gnas pa ni/ /blo gros ldan pas shes bya ste/ /de brjod pas ni mchog tu brjod/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor

khru bcu drug /ngos rer bzhi bzhir ldan pa las/ /bden pa bcu drug rtogs pa yis/ /ye shes skad cig de snyed do/ /mi bskyod rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /tshe dpag med pa'i snang ba dang / /rdo rje rtag pa chen po ste/ /

bsdus pa sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /lus ngag yid ni rnam dag phyir/ /yang dag don du snang ba'o/ /gcig nas gsum dang rigs lnga ste/ /dgu dang bcu gsum nyi shu lnga/ /sum bcu rtsa gcig bar dag tu/ /rtsa

ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ /rigs lnga dag las 'byung ba ni/ /de re nyi shur dbye ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid las/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar yang dag pas/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgya ru 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs
tshogs mtha' yas pas/ /'dus pa chen po 'dir brjod byas/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams shes par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus
pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla na med par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad chos ni

ston pa la/ /gsang ba chen po rnam par rgyal/ /rgyud 'di yang dag ston par mdzad/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog /sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu rgya

mtshor gyur/ /phung po lnga rnams sangs rgyas sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sra ba sa yi khams yin te/ /zhu ba chu yi khams su 'dod/ /dro ba me yi khams yin te/ /rgyu ba rlung du rab tu bsgrags/ /
mi shigs pa ni thig ler gsungs/ /bde ba nam mkha'i khams yin no/ /gzugs ni thogs par bcas pa ste/ /tshor ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /'du shes dmigs par bcas pa ste/ /'du byed lus ngag

yid sbyor ba/ /rnam shes sgyu mas don sgrub byed/ /reg pa las ni sa yin te/ /lha mo spyan du shes par bya/ /dro ba me ru rab tu grags/ /gos dkar mor ni shes par bya/ /sdud par byed pa chu yin pas/ /mA ma
