kI yi ngo bor 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i bya ba bskyod pa rlung / /sgrol ma'i ngo bor brjod par bya/ /thig le snang byed bde skyong ma/ /bde ba rdo rje reg bya ma/ /de nyid bde chen ye shes ni/ /skad cig tsam du nyams myong bas/ /phral
du yid ches byed yin te/ /log rtog ma lus 'joms pa po/ /dngos dang dngos med log rtog dag /bgag nas rnam par mi rtog pas/ /bskal pa stong phrag du mar yang / /gnas nas ye shes sbyor bar byed/ /
de yang cung zad goms byas pas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas yang dag pa'i ye shes khyad par du
gyur pa bla na med pa las mngon du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /gang dang gang gis 'ching ba rnams/ /
de nyid shes pas grol gyur te/ /'di la nges par 'khor ba yi/ /rgya mtsho'i nang nas dri med 'thob/ /sems can rnams kyi ye shes kyis/ /rgyud ni nges par grol 'gyur ba/ /khyad par las ni rtogs
pas na/ /tshe 'dir sangs rgyas gnas su 'gro/ /gang du yang dag bla ma yi/ /drin gyi ye shes yan lag bdun/ /phra ba'i yon tan mngon du byed/ /sku gsum dbyer med la phyag 'tshal/ /'di ltar gyur pa'i
rnal 'byor pa/ /tshe 'dir 'bras bu thob pas na/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/ /ring na bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te/ /don kun sgrub par byed pa'o/ /dga' dang

dga' bral dag gi dbus/ /mtshan nyid dmigs pa brtan par gyis/ /thun nam zla phyed zla ba lo/ /bskal par ye shes che la sbyor/ /mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /sgrib pa rang dag lhun gyis grub/ /bde ba chen po mngon

byas pas/ /stobs sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad brtag par bya/ /de las byung ba'i thabs bstan pas/ /bde ba'i khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu yi yan
lag bdun 'byung ba/ /bla mas brten pa'i rten 'brel gyis/ /ye shes dbab pas sbas pa'i tshul/ /ye shes mthong ba lus dang ngag /rtags 'char sgrib pa rang bdag ste/ /byin gyis brlabs las 'char ba yin/ /

bla ma slob ma'i khyad par dag /ye shes dbang dang cung zad kyis/ /ye shes mthong ba'i spyod yul yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshan dpe ni/ /blo la gsal bar rang lus la/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par bzhugs/ /

kha sbyar e ba~M` rnam pa gnyis/ /thabs dang shes rab rtsa yi gnas/ /bde ba chen po thig le yis/ /'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes can/ /snying rje chen po tshad med bdud rtsi'i rtsa/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bde ba'i

byang sems 'bab/ /phrin las stobs ni gzhan don thogs pa med/ /de dag don du yang dag rang bzhin med/ /stong nyid rtogs pas dngos la chags mi 'gyur/ /'di ni rgyu yi dus zhes bya ba ste/ /lam gyi dus ni dbang

gi ye shes te/ /mtshan ldan rig ma yongs su dag pa la/ /sa phyogs gtsang zhing rab tu dben pa'am/ /rgyal nyid skyes gzhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su/ /bshang gci chu la sogs pa byug pa 'am/ /rgyal ba mchod

phyir rtag par rab tu bya/ /nu ma'i dbus bar spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar/ /cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar/ /lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras/ /rigs lnga rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya/ /rab tu

dge ba'i chos ni dri ma med/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes mtshungs med pa/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /bde chen mchog tu dag pa 'dir thob byed/ /'bras bu'i yan lag bdun ni tha mar brjod/ /rang byin brlab pa'i lam

gyis gang thob pa/ /mtshungs med 'dren pa bla med ngo bo nyid/ /nus pa brtan dang rdzogs pa mngon gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang / /gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi mtshan gyis

shin du mtshan spras pa/ /cho ga 'di yis bsgrub pa nyid tu bya/ /'grub pa'i 'bras bu nus pa brtan pa yis/ /tshe 'dir skad cig gcig gis rdzogs byang chub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po

gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don

gyi phyir yang dag par snang ba'i ye shes rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gsang ba 'di lta bu gsungs so/ /'khor ba dag la mi gnas pa'i/ /ye shes rdo rje khyod nyon cig /

dngos po dngos min dang bral ba/ /dngos po gnyis ka spong ba ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i chos zhes bya/ /dag dang ma dag spang byar med/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i bar du yang / /dbus su mnyam par gnas pa yis/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang dbus

su ni/ /ma 'dres pa de mnyam par sbyor/ /rten dang brten can dbus su ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyal ba 'byung / /lus ni mnyam par gnas pa dang / /ngag dang sems kyang mnyam gyur pas/ /mnyam par lta ba mthong ba rnams/ /

ye shes mnyam par rnam par rgyal ba zhes gsungs so/ /kun du bzang po sems dpa' ches/ /ji ltar mnyam par lta ba dang / /gnyis su med pa'i chos dag ni/ /bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes rang bzhin gnyis med chos/ /du ma ma yin gcig min te/ /gsang ba'i rim pa bla na med/ /dang po las kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lam gyi rim pa rab sbyor bas/ /cig car 'jug pa phyag rgya che/ /zung du 'jug

pa'i rim pa nyid/ /bde ba chen por rtogs par bya/ /chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum bcu bdun/ /ting 'dzin ro mnyam rdo rje yis/ /gsang chen gnyis med rgyal ba 'dir/ /gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo

ba rlung / /mi shigs thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /rang lus rdo rje'i rang bzhin la/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /sa lam rdzogs tshul lugs 'byung dang / /lugs las bzlog pa rim min pas/ /rgyud du sbas pa rnams gsal ba/ /de

nyid nges par bstan pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la mngon sangs rgyas/ /ces gsungs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag shin du rmad du byung ba'i tshul zab mo la ngo mtshar skyes te slar gsol pa/ ye shes thob pa'i lus can dag /

tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas pa/ /'di nyid rnal 'byor ji lta bu/ /mi gtsang lus las ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnam rtog ngan pa'i bag chags kyis/ /dri mas bslad pas 'di ma mchis/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'chang gis der bstan pa/ /dri

ma bag chags bzlog bya'i phyir/ /lam gnyis rang gi gsang ba'i chos/ /'dir ni rtog pa ngan pa'i tshogs/ /rags pa dang ni phra ba'i chos/ /rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa yis/ /'gro ba gsum po rnam rmongs la/ /blo dang ldan

pas legs bltas te/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni sbyang bar bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /slob ma yongs su smin byas shing / /ye shes rgyud la bskyed pa yis/ /gcig char lam gyi stobs kyis ni/ /'dir ni yang dag rdzogs

sangs rgyas/ /goms pa chung ba'i stobs kyis ni/ /yon tan 'thun snang ma gyur te/ /dri nga'i lus ni rgyal ba'i sku/ /sems ni dri med pad ma lar/ /skyon gyi 'dam pas ma gos so/ /ji ltar 'dam pa'i lus dag las/ /ye shes

lus ni rang dgar 'byung / /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor lam/ /rdzogs pas gnas lugs mngon byas te/ /ye shes spyod pas rnam sbyangs pas/ /shin tu dri med dag par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /thabs kyi myu gu

dag gis ni/ /ban d+hu ka ni rgyas pa bzhin/ /sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te/ /yon tan dri med de nyid kyi/ /me tog rgyas pa'i chu skyes pa'o/ /rdo rje theg par sbas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /bden gnyis zung 'jug

rtogs pa las/ /spros bral mtha' dang bral ba'i chos/ /sgom pa'i lam zhes sa rnams bsgrod/ /skad cig ye shes 'char tshul la/ /gom pa goms pa'i lam gyur pas/ /sku bzhi'i go 'phang mngon du byed/ /ces bka' stsal pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang

po la sogs pa rnams bde ba dang yid bde ba dang dang ba khyad par can thob nas stan las langs te/ phyag dang bskor ba du ma byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang 'byung rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /rdo rje

theg pa gsang ba las/ /phyi ma'i dus na gang byung ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams de bzhin gshegs/ /shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan dus dag tu/ /rdo rje'i theg pa gang 'dzin pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas sras nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje

sku gsung thugs la nges gnas pas/ /byang chub sems mchog rnams la rtag mchod byed/ /zhes gsungs te/ me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen po nges par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa thams cad la/ /mchog ni ston phyir yang dag bzhugs/ /e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog /e ma'o snying

po kun bsdus pa/ /e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba/ /e ma'o rdo rje rnam par rgyal/ /ston ka'i nam mkha' sprin med pa/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun gsal ltar/ /gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes ni/ /bdag gzhan bcas pas snang

ba'o/ /ston dus sprin med nam mkha' la/ /nyi ma gsal bar shar ba bzhin/ /thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa ni/ /don dang sems bcas snang bar byed/ /sprin med mkha' dang mun lta bu/ /snang byed ye shes goms byed pas/ /

rang rig rtsal las grub pa yi/ /sgyu ma'i lus ni len par byed/ /de yang yid kyi lus ldan pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khams gsum du/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas/ /mthar ni rang gnas bde bar 'gro/ /sgyu ma'i

lus tsam la brten la/ /ril por 'dzin dang rjes zhig gis/ /dngos po thams cad bcom nas ni/ /de nas dag pa'i ngang du gnas/ /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ /snang ba thams cad nub byas nas/ /rang 'od rig ma dbyings kyi ngang / /

snang ba'i ye shes khyab par 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa yi/ /rnam rtog dra ba bsal nas ni/ /bdag med dmigs pa med pa ru/ /mnyam nyid ye shes khyab par byed/ /snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /snang ba tsam yang 'dzin med

par/ /yang dang yang du don dam pa'i/ /bden pa mngon du byed pa can/ /'ja' tshon lus kyis 'bad med pa'i/ /'dod pa thams cad nam mkha' las/ /'bad med par ni stsol 'gyur te/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams bde bar 'tsho/ /rdo rje 'od

kyi lus bzung nas/ /bdag dang gzhan don sgrub 'gyur la/ /dmigs pa thams cad zad byed pas/ /bgrod med gnas su bde bar 'gyur/ /rang 'od ye shes ldan pa'i sku/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du mtha' mi dmigs/ /stong pa gsum

la 'das pa po/ /thogs med snying rje 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po sa ni chu la thim/ /chu yang me la thim 'gyur te/ /me ni rlung la thim gyur nas/ /rlung yang rnam par shes la thim/ /rnam shes bzung ba de nyid ni/ /'od gsal bar yang 'jug

par 'gyur/ /dang po sgyu ma lta bu la/ /dang po smig rgyu de nyid kyang / /'od zer lnga dang ldan par mthong / /gnyis par zla ba lta bu dang / /gsum par nyi ma lta bu dang / /bzhi par mun pa lta bu la/ /lnga pa sprin med nam mkha' las/ /mi rtog

mtha' dbus med par 'char/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs la sogs pa'i/ /che ba'i yon tan rnams brgyan pa/ /bden gnyis sbyor ba zung 'jug sku/ /bde ba chen po des thob 'gyur/ /mkha' 'dra chos sku stong pa las/ /rtog

med ye shes mkha' 'dra ba/ /tshogs dang smon lam stobs dag gis/ /'bar dang bral bar lhun gyis grub/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku lus ni/ /'bad pa med par sprul pa'i sku/ /mtha' med rdul bral ji bzhin pas/ /sems
can don kun sgrub par mdzad/ /gang dag gang gis 'dul gyur pa/ /de de bzhin du so sor snang / /mos pa'i dbang gis tha dad par/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /lhun grub bde ba chen po'i sku/ /rang

snang rig mas nyer brgyan pa'i/ /'og min gnas su dus rtag tu/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar bas bzhugs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ltar/ /'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi don/ /che ba'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /

bde ba che las de 'byung 'gyur/ /rim pa thams cad kun rdzogs pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid du gnas sems kyis/ /khams gsum pa rnams 'jig byed pa/ /thams cad nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //

de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje che/ /dbyer med bde ba ston pa pos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /mnyam nyid ye shes stong pa yis/ /bdag nyid gzugs ni sbyang bar bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes stong
pa yis/ /bdag nyid gzugs ni sbyang bar bya/ /mnyam nyid gnas pas thams cad du/ /ye shes can gyis sgom gyur pa/ /'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i yi ge bder gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gsang chen ni/ /sems can kun gyi lus la gnas/ /de nyid ye shes snang ba po/ /ko ta k+Sh+ya/ ko ta wa/ ko ta k+Sh+ya wa d+ha/ ko ta ba sha / ku ti d+ha ri/ ko la k+Sh+ya/ ko la wa/ rko la lo wa/ ko la wa shu/ ko la tASh+tha/ gnas bcu

sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /thabs dang lam gyi khyad par sku gsung thugs/ /lta ba sgrub pa spyod tshul bla na med/ /'bras bu byang chub sems kyi dbang bsgyur bas/ /stobs bcu rdzogs pa gang yin rnal 'byor che/ /snying po

'di ni rgyud rnams kun du sbas/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams/ /dngos po'i rnal 'byor 'jig 'gyur ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad ma'i gdan dag bsam par bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas

par/ /gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor can/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag /rgyal po rol pas bsam par bya/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams la/ /ye shes chen po'i dngos grub gsol/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis/ /

shes rab 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur/ /'od zer 'bar ba ma bu ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mchod pa'i mtshan nyid yongs ldan par/ /stong pa nyid du mnyam gnas pas/ /gnyis su med pa rnam rgyal ba/ /lhag pa'i

lha ni bskyed bya ste/ /'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mnyam par bzhag nas bsgoms pa yis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /mnyam med sngags ni bzlas nas su/ /sgrub po bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub/ /zla ba gcig grangs

sngags kyis ni/ /khams gsum 'grub par the tsom med/ /rnam shes las ni sngags 'byung ba/ /mtshan nyid drug ldan bzlas nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas/ /zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur/ /de la brtul zhugs

spyad pa med/ /sngags med bgrang phreng 'dzin pa med/ /gzung dang sbyang ba sna tshogs dag /gcig nas gcig tu ldog 'gyur te/ /ya yi don gyis gang yang rung / /dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni/ /ra la sogs pa gsum po

nyid/ /rim pas 'gro don la 'jug bya/ /me dang rlung dang dbang tshon dang / /chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor du/ /thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni/ /las ni gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur/ /mchod la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur/ /

bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag /me la sbyin bsreg brtson pas 'byor/ /bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa thob/ /sngags pas de ltar shes nas ni/ /byis pa'i tshul bzhin spyad par bya/ /spyod pa'i tshul ni bla med pas/ /yang dag ye

shes rgya mtsho 'thob/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo med/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin gang med de/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang / /ye shes ldan pas zhus

pa'i don/ /dam tshig de nyid ston pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ /sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor du/ /yid 'ong phreng ba kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pa ye shes che/ /bla na med pa'i thabs mchog las/ /rdo rje sku yi

bzlas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas skur ni byin gyis rlob/ /mnyam med ye shes thob pas na/ /rdo rje gsung gis ngag byin rlob/ /nam mkha'i ngang las rang byung ba'i/ /thugs kyi rdo rje sems nyid kyi/ /gnyis med ye shes rtogs gyur pas/ /

zab dang rgya che'i tshul gnas pa'o/ /'dir ni rtog pa rnam spangs te/ /brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin khyi dang ba lang dang / /srog song mi ste ba lang chen po'i sha / sna tshogs sha yi sbyor ba dang / /khu ba dang ni raka tar bcas/ /mi bskyod pa

dang snang mdzad dang / /go ro tsa na snying ga nas/ /gang byung g+hi ta~M` stobs ldan pa/ /sgo dgu las ni gang byung dang / /srog chags yan lag lus las byung / /rdo rje kha sbyar rdzas bcu dang / /rdo rje can gyis myos byed ldan/ /rim par sbyar ba skye bdun sha /

gang las rnyed pa stobs mchog las/ /ril bu tsa na ka yi tshad/ /sbyar te zos par gyur na ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /thugs rjes dgongs te

gzigs 'gyur te/ /gtso bo gzi can mdangs ldan pa/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len/ /rkang mgyogs mig sman sa 'og dang / /ral gri ro langs bum pa dag /sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub par gsungs/ /

dngos grub kun gsol dam pa yi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho nges 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par

rgyal ba las dngos grub mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes chos thams cad zhi ba'i dam tshig gi

mchog bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen 'byung gnas dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba grub pa la sogs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa ni/ sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje nyid/ /ye shes snying po nam mkha'i dbyings/ /chos rnams kun gyi snang ba po/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis ye shes kyi snang ba'i

tshul las byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor ye shes las grub pa kun du snang bar byed pa mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od kyis khyab pa bkod pa tshad med pa'i phrin las yon tan thams

cad rab tu 'byung ba'i gnas rin po che sna tshogs 'dus pa las rang byung ba/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs rim pa du mas mdzes pa/ rdul med cing rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ sgo phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/

pho brang nang du ni dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i ka bas bteg pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i gdung gis bcad pa/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga rab tu gnas pa/ khyams phyi ma'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor drug dang bar

chad srung bar byed pa 'byung po kun 'dul dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /mtshams bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor te bar bar du ni sangs rgyas stong mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul

bla na med pa 'thob pa'o/ /rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa 'phyang ba/ ye shes lnga'i rtsig pas 'khor yug tu kun du 'khor ba/ sgo bzhi glo 'bur du snang ba/ phyi nang med par gsal ba/ so so'i bye brag

gi dkyil 'khor ni rgyas shing yangs la rnga ma dang mda' yab dag gis mdzes pa/ 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni bkra shis pa'i mchod pa dang rol mo sna tshogs kyis khyab par byed par kun rgyu zhing gar byed pas mchod pa'o/ /

ri dgas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dag bsgreng bas mtshan pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba ston par mdzad do/ /'og min bde ba can gyi pho brang

dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa de nyid du dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i pho brang rang byung bar gyur to/ /de dag gi ni spyi dang bye brag tu/ /dkyil 'khor sum bcu

rtsa drug rab tu 'byed/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'od 'phro dang / /'od dpag med pa gdon mi za ba rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dbus dang rnam pa lngar bzhugs so/ /mA ma kI dang spyan ma gos

dkar dang / /sgrol ma rnams ni mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /byams pa sa yi snying po shar du ste/ /lhor ni lag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /nub tu 'jam dbyangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /byang du sgrib pa rnam sel kun

du bzang / /mtshams kyi grwar ni gzugs sgra dri ro bzhi/ /phyogs kyi sgo skyong khro rgyal chen po bzhi/ /phyi rol mtshams bzhir mi g.yo mgon po dang / /'dod pa'i rgyal po stobs chen dbyug sngon can/ /steng phyogs gtsug tor 'khor

los sgyur ba dang / /'og phyogs gnod mdzes rgyal po ste/ /lhor ni gsang ba'i bdag po dang / /byang du tshangs pa chen po'o/ /mtshams su 'jig rten skyong rnams ni/ /shar lhor yul 'khor skyong ba la/ /lha chen brgyad kyis bskor

ba dang / /lho nub 'phags skyes po la yang gza' chen brgyad bcas gnas pa'o/ /mig mi bzang ni nub byang du/ /klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba'o/ /byang shar rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /gnod sbyin chen po brgyad ces pa'o/ /lha

srin sde brgyad yongs kyis ni/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po yongs su bskor/ /gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la/ /lag na rdo rje drag po'i tshogs/ /brgyad ces 'jig rten gsum 'dul te/ /'di dag rnam par bshad pa'o/ /

sangs rgyas stong phrag gcig ni khyams su bkod pa dag /shar phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang / /mngon dga'i zhing khams shel gyi 'od du 'bar/ /lho phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang / /rdul dang bral ba bai

dUr+ya yi 'od/ /nub phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga po/ /bde ba can zhes pad ma rA ga'i 'od/ /byang phyogs rnga sgra sgrogs pa gser gyi mdog /nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lngar yod pa dag /nyi shu dag ni rnam pa mtshon phyir gnas/ /
rim pas phyogs su gnas pa dag /rgyas pa'i dbye bas 'di bzhugs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bla med gzhal yas khang / /rten dang brten pa mnyam med chos kyi dbyings/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa rnam gsal

ba'i/ /rtsa ba'i lha tshogs rnams dang spros pa dag /'jig rten 'das pa'i sangs rgyas stong bzhugs shing / /'jig rten mgon po lag na rdo rje dang / /tshangs pa mi mjed bdag po la sogs te/ /rgyud 'di la ni smin par byed pa'i

dbang / /dkyil 'khor chen po khru ni brgyad bcu bar/ /ngos re zhing ni nyi shur mnyam par brjod/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sum bcu gcig /de dag re re la yang de nyid kyis/ /rim bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil

'khor ro/ /thub pa'i dbang pos 'dir ni gsal bar bstan/ /lag na rdo rje'i 'khor dang rdo rje yi/ /drag po'i rnam pa khro bo brgyad bkod pa'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / /rdo rje drag po rdo rje stobs nyid de/ /rdo rje rnon po

rdo rje be con rdo rje mche ba'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor du bstan pa ni/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin rdo rje can/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po rad na ku be ra/ /ljon pa rta mgo gtsug

na rin chen bcas/ /thags bzangs ris dang mkha' lding rgyal po dang / /srin po'i rgyal po dri zar bcas pa'o/ /'di dag gsal bar nges par mtshon pa ste/ /snying po bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid de/ /cho ga phra mo rim pa ji

bzhin du/ /mdo rgyud rtogs pa rnams las rnam par rgyal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal
ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po gsang bar ston pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga la sogs pa de dag thams cad rang gi ba spu'i

bu gar thim par mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par

zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang gi gzugs rnams bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas de nyid kyi ba spu'i bu ga rnams las 'thon par gyur to/ /de'i

phyir btsun mo thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che'i mchod pa thams cad bkod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par mchod pa ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar bya ste/ slar sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs

rdo rje rnams la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i lha mo de dag bde ba chen po'i kun du spyod pas yang dag par mchod pa byed par gyur pa ni la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu sa'i bdag

mo'o/ /la la ni mA ma kI ltar chu'i bdag mo nyid do/ /la la ni gos dkar mo ltar me'i rnam pa'o/ /la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma ste rlung gi khams la kun du spyod do/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rdo rje
lta bu ste/ dus dang rnam pa thams cad tu yang dag par mchod pa'i rgyun gyis mchod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa 'di thams cad kyi sngags dang / bla na med pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika hU~M swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi sngags

so/ /oM AHbadzra spar she hU~M swA hA/ rig ma bla na med pa'i sngags so/ /oM AHdzi na dzika hU~M swA hA/ oM AHrata na d+h+r-ika hU~M swA hA/ oM AHA ro lika hU~M swA hA/ oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika hU~M swA hA/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sngags so/ /oM AHdwe Sha ra ti hU~M swA hA/ oM AHmo ha ra ti hU~M swA hA/ oM AHrA ga ra ti hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra ra ti hU~M swA hA/ lha mo spyan la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM AHbadzra rU pe hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra shap+da hU~M swA hA/

oM AHbadzra gan d+he hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra rA se hU~M swA hA/ gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o/ /oM AHbadzra mi tri nA tha shri ye hU~M swA hA/ oM AHk+Shi ti gar+b+hA hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra pA Ni ye hU~M swA hA/ oM AHA kA sha gtaiM ya

hU~M swA hA/ oM AHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya hU~M swA hA/ oM AHmnya dzu shrI g+ho ShA hU~M swA hA/ oM AHsarba ni ba ra Na biSh+ka~M` bi ne hU~M` swA hA/ oM AHsa man ta b+ha dra ye hU~M` swA hA/ sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ /oM AHya mAn ta

kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AH pradz+nyAn ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AHpad man ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AHbig+h+nAn ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AHAr+ya a tsa la hU~M phaT/ oM AHTak+ki rA dza hU~M phaT/ oM AHnI laM daN ta hU~M phaT/ oM AHma hA ba la hU~M phaT/ /

oM AHuSh+NI Sha tsakra brti hU~M phaT/ oM AHsu~M b+ha rA dza hU~M phaT ces khro bo'i rgyal po bcu'i sngags rab tu gsungs so/ /sngags 'di rnams kyi nus pa ni/ /thogs pa med pa nyid yin te/ /'byin dang sdud par

byed pas na/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'di legs par sbas shes gsungs so/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M`/ gsal ba sems can kun gyi sems/ /zhi ba nyid ni 'od gsal ba/ /dngos po du mas ma gos

pa/ /de nyid zhes bya bde ba sgom/ /sangs rgyas sku yi cho ga shes/ /de bzhin nyid du nye bar spyad/ /gzhan du sngags la sogs pa kun/ /dge ba 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags

mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thub pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs/ /gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu gsol/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /thams cad chos ni ston pa po/ /

mchog tu dga' ba bdag med pa/ /rgyal bas sngon dus bstan pa ni/ /sems can mos pa'i don du bshad/ /bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog /rtog pa'i rnal 'byor gsang mtha' ru/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i dbye ba yis/ /

ngas ni rim pa gsum du bshad/ /dman pa mchog dang 'bring rnams te/ /tha ma mos spyod tshul dag tu/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi tshul rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad bsdus pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad lus la gnas pa rdo rje'i sku/ /mi chod

mi shigs rang byung phra ba'i gnas/ /rtog pa'i rlung tshogs 'byung ba'i ngang du dag /rang rig sems ni gar yang g.yo mi 'gyur/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo bcu la gnas 'gyur gang / /rlung bcu 'od kyi snang ba khyab byed cing / /

mi shigs thig le rab tu dang ba yi/ /bdud rtsi rab rgyas snang ba khyab byed pa'o/ /yi ge sgra yi rnam pa gar yod par/ /dran pa skyed byed srog gi rtsa bar 'gyur/ /kun la khyab byed snying po ye shes rlung / /rten dang brten pa mnyam

gnas rin chen sems/ /gser dang gser 'od rab 'bar mtha' yas bzhin/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho rab dngas rgya che la/ /zla zer 'od kyis khyab cing snang ba dang / /nyi shar mdangs kyis snga phyi med par 'byung / /rtog pa med

cing mun pa rang sar dag /blo yis snang ba rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /gang du lus can rnams kyis ni/ /'byung dang byung las gyur pa yi/ /dngos po'i snang ba bcings pas na/ /yid kyis lus ni brtag dka' bas/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nyid shes pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /'di ni bsgrub pa de nyid yin/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur spyad/ /rnam shes sgyu ma'i ye shes lus/ /yongs su rdzogs pa rang byung ba/ /de nyid mi shes

byis pa rnams/ /slar yang 'khor ba'i gnas pa'o/ /ji srid 'od gsal gnas kyi nus/ /'byung ba thim 'gyur rtog pas stong / /de srid sgyu ma phra ba'i lus/ /rlung dang rnam shes ldan pas ni/ /'byung dang 'jug

dang gnas par byed/ /gzugs ni dngos por ma grub pas/ /thogs med rgyu zhing mtshungs par ldan/ /'on kyang byin brlab nus pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga der mi 'jug /chos dang chos min ldan par 'gro/ /rang lus

lus byung ye shes me/ /thams cad kun nas 'bar ba ni/ /me 'od 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /'og nas steng du blo yis ni/ /rab tu dmigs pas kha ba 'bab/ /thams cad du ni tshig par bsam/ /

phyi nang gsang ba'i ye shes 'od/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab bsreg pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'bras bu smin/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed pa ni/ /bdag nyid nam mkha'i ngo bor 'gyur/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis/ /thabs dang thabs

ldan byang chub sems/ /du ma nyid du mi dmigs shing / /rnal 'byor dngos po ldog par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor zhes bya rdzogs ldan dus/ /rjes su rnal 'byor gsum ldan te/ /shin tu rnal 'byor gnyis ldan nyid/ /rtsod

ldan dus ni rnal 'byor che/ /yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /rdzus te skyes pa dang po'i mi/ /'od kyi lus tsam gnas pa dag /lha yi bdud rtsi spyod pa'o/ /de dag lus de spangs nas ni/ /shin du phra ba'i khams zhugs shing / /sgyu

ma'i lus su gnas gyur pas/ /srid pa mngon par len par 'dod/ /bag chags dri mas kun bslang ba'i/ /'dod pa log pa mthong ba yis/ /chags pa'i yid kyis lus la 'jug /tshor ba rnam gsum myong ba yin/ /sa zhag ro

dang zas gzhan gyis/ /lus nyid rags pa nyer thob pas/ /dang po'i dngos po log gyur te/ /bu ga dgu ldan dri nga'i lus/ /nyon mongs kyis ni dkrugs gyur te/ /bsod nams stobs nyams dman sar lhung / /rdzus te skyes dang drod gsher

dang / /sgo nga las byung mngal las skyes/ /'di dag rim pa rnal 'byor can/ /snyigs ma'i dus su rab tu 'byung / /ji srid pad ma'i sems can gyi/ /lus ni shin du phra ba ste/ /rnam shes lus byung sgyu mar gnas/ /rigs dang ldan pas

dus gsum shes/ /stobs ldan de la rtog pa yod/ /rang nyid sgyu mar ma shes pas/ /dngos 'dzin bdud kyis glags rnyed 'gyur/ /'di dag rgyun las bzlog pa na/ /srid pa nye bar len mi byed/ /skad cig gsum gyis ye shes

thob/ /'chi med bde ba'i gnas thob ste/ /dag pa'i skus ni 'gro don 'byung zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis

su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las mchod pa dang gsang sngags mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje sgyu 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i ye shes bla na med pa'i ngang las rab tu dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med pas sgom

pa med/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom bya min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /sgom pa dmigs pa med pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs

so de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos

po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /bdag med chos las kun du byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin

chen dpal gyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos

rnams la/ /ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha' gnas su sbyor ba yis/ /de ltar dngos por rab tu grags shes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po gdon mi za ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal

ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za bas gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad

kyi btsun mo spyan mas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srid med mya ngan 'das med pa/ /'di ni rdo rje bde chen po/ /sgom pa med cing bsgom pa'ang med/ /

dgos pa mchog tu bsgrubs pas bde/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo mA ma kIs sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ stong zhing snang med gnas

kyi mchog /rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can/ /sems kyi rang bzhin sgom pa ste/ /ji srid du yang med pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo gos dkar mos sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbyangs dang yi ge rnam bral te/ /de ni sems dang thig le min/ /'di ni dam pa'i bde chen te/ /dbri zhing bsnan pa yod ma yin zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo sgrol mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku

gsung thugs mi slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /de bzhin bsgom bya'i dngos gang yang / /stong zhing snang med gnas mchog ste/ /de tshe sdig dang bsod nams

dag ces gsungs so/ /de nas lha mo gzugs rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis mchod pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dper na chu dang zla ba ni/ /bden min brdzun pa'ang ma yin pa/ /de bzhin dkyil

'khor 'khor lo 'di/ /dang zhing gsal ba'i rang bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lha mo sgra rdo rje nam mkha'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rjes tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ stong zhing snang med gnas gyur pa/ /

rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /sems kyi ngo bo sgom pa ste/ /ji srid yang dag bdag med pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /lha mo dri rdo rje kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ bde ba chen pos 'gro khyab pa/ /bde ba spangs na rigs pa med/ /bde ba 'bar bas srid pa 'ching / /bde ba sus kyang bzlog mi nus zhes gsungs so/ /lha mo ro rdo rje dam tshig chen pos mchod pa kun du rgyas pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos rnams bden pa ma yin zhing / /brdzun pa'ang ma yin pa yi don/ /blang dang dor bar byar med pa/ /de nyid ye shes mchog tu bstan zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i rdo rje spro ba'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bsam gtan med cing dngos po med/ /sngags med lha yang med pa nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang byung ba/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ye shes lnga yi rab

sbyor bas/ /bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang med/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa nyid/ /du ma nyid du mi dmigs so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dngos po dang dngos

po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags med bzlas pa'ang med pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba gsum kun yod pa ste/ /sgom pa med cing mngon

rtogs med ces gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dam tshig la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kun rdzob
tu ni 'jig rten yod/ /dpyad pas 'jig rten gang na'ang med/ /rtag tu 'jig rten ldan par 'jug /dag pa dang ni gnas dag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung

rdo rje ye shes mchog rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skye ba med cing dmigs pa med/ /mi phyed nam mkha'i 'byung gnas te/ /zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin can/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i rdo rje chos thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /don dam kun rdzob rten 'brel tsam/ /
yang dag tu na gnas pa med/ /chos rnams dag pa ye shes che/ /gnas med dmigs pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dag pa'i chos/ /'gro zhing ldog pa'i khyad par gyis/ /rtog pa yang dag mi dmigs pas/ /spros med gos pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po

chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa rdo rje mi zad pa sgyu mar rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos dbyings ye shes khyab pa'i sku/ /rtog pa med cing dri ma med/ /kun du 'byung zhing dus gsum du/ /

phra zhing bdag med tshul mchog go zhes gsungs so/ /de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin/ /thams cad chos nyid dag pa las/ /mi rtog nam mkha' dri ma med/ /snang ba sna tshogs rang grol ba/ /

sems kyi mtshan nyid rtag tu med ces gsungs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje yis/ /mngon par byang chub la zhugs te/ /sgyu mar snang ba rmi lam tshul/ /rtog dang nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan/ /'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes

mchog /phyag rgya chen po yang dag pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo pad ma'i dam tshig mchog /rin chen 'byung gnas la brten te/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /skye med rten 'brel rang dag pa/ /chu rlabs g.yo ba

rang bzhin med/ /gnas pa med de ston pa po zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa des/ /byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes tshul/ /'gro rnams byang chub sems rang bzhin/ /khams rnams stobs su gyur pa dag /

dag pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas te/ /ye shes brten pa de las 'byung zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon/ /mkha' dbyings ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ /rtog pa thams cad dag pa'i dbyings/ /chos rnams thams cad

rkyen la brten/ /rang 'byung ye shes thob byed pa/ /gnas pa med pa nyid du 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo Tak+ki rA dza rgyal/ /bsam gtan rdo rjes rten pa nyid/ /yang dag ye shes dga' bas brgyan/ /lus dang lus med brtan
pa med/ /ye shes lus ni dri ma med/ /rtog pa med cing 'gag pa med ces gsungs so/ /khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin/ /'jigs par mdzad pa khros pa'i sku/ /snying rje chen pos gdug pa 'dul/ /ye shes chen

po 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /byams pa'i thugs kyis khyab pa po/ /sems can mgon po dag pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /gtsug tor dam tshig khro bo ni/ /rig pa'i stobs mchog la gnas pas/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rgyas pa po/ /

bstan pa'i don ni thob pa ste/ /nyon mongs zad byed ye shes mchog /gnas pa med pas ston par mdzad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo che/ /rab tu 'byung gnas la brten nas/ /yang dag stobs ni dag pa che/ /

chos kyi 'byung gnas 'gag pa med/ /rol pa'i sgyu ma ston par byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ /sku gsum mi phyed la gnas pas/ /rtog pas mi shigs bdud rnams

'joms/ /kun du spyod pa kun du spyad/ /log rtog thams cad gnas su dag /ye shes 'byung gnas chen po'o zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems rab tu brtan pa ye shes kyi rol pa sna tshogs su ston pa rang 'byung

ba'i rgyud rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal
ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'byung ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus nas sangs rgyas dang

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha mi rnams dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / khro bo'i tshogs thams cad la yang dag par bstod pa/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog

dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi sku/ /rtag pa'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /

rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /mnyam med dag pa mchog gi mchog /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob/ /ye shes dag pas yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /don grub rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /gos pa med pa'i ye shes can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /mo ha ra ti'i sngags las skyes/ /sa yi khams ni rnam dag

cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum gyur pa/ /lha mo spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dwe Sha ra ti'i sngags las skyes/ /chu yi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje rigs kyi yum gyur cing / /mA ma kI la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rA ga ra ti'i sngags

las byung / /me yi khams ni rnam dag cing / /pad ma'i rigs kyi yum gyur pa/ /gos dkar lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /badzra ra t-i'i sngags las skyes/ /rlung gi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /las kyi rigs kyi yum gyur pa/ /sna

tshogs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ /rtsa rgyus khams ni dag pa'i sku/ /nyon mongs rnam dag byams pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen

po/ /mig gi skye mched sbyong mdzad cing / /sa yi snying po de bzhin gshegs/ /sku yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni/ /rna ba'i skye mched rnam dag pa/ /phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs can/ /thugs kyi

rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni/ /sna yi skye mched sbyong gyur pa'i/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i mchog gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /lce yi skye

mched dag byed pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bla na med/ /gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba che/ /yid kyi skye mched rnam dag cing / /dag pa'i sems mchog 'jam dbyangs sku/ /nam mkha'i

rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' theg pa che/ /lus kyi skye mched dag pa po/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel mdzad/ /dam tshig rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal dbang po/ /'gro ba'i sems rgyud sbyong mdzad pa/ /

kun du bzang po ye shes rol/ /chos dbyings rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gzugs ni yid du 'ong / /snang stong kun du rol pa yis/ /chos rnams sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ston/ /gzugs kyi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni yid du 'ong / /sgra

dang sgra min las grol ba/ /stong nyid rang sgra 'byung ba po/ /sgra yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i dri ni yid 'ong mchog /sangs rgyas thugs mchod bde ba che/ /log pa sad par byed pa po/ /dri yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje ro ni

dga' ba'i sku/ /dri med bdud rtsi 'thob byed cing / /dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod byed pa/ /ro yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /ya mAn ta krita sngags las skyes/ /sku yi gsang ba khro bo che/ /dbang po mnan cing shar phyogs bzhugs/ /gshin rje

gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pradz+nyAn ta krita sngags las skyes/ /thugs las skyes pa'i khro rgyal ni/ /gshin rje mnan cing lho phyogs bzhugs/ /rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad mAn ta krita sngags las skyes/ /gsung mchog

pad ma rang 'byung ba/ /chu bdag mnan cing nub phyogs bzhugs/ /gsung mchog rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /big+h+nAn ta krita sngags las skyes/ /phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po/ /gnod sbyin mnan cing byang phyogs bzhugs/ /

bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par rtog pas mi g.yo zhing / /ye shes gsang ba'i don ldan pa'i/ /khro rgyal byin za'i steng bzhugs pa/ /mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs chen po mi bzad pas/ /

log 'dren dpung rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal bden bral steng na bzhugs/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po srid gsum 'joms mdzad cing / /snying rje'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sku/ /rlung bdag steng gnas khro bo che/ /

dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes mchog gis dbang bskur ba/ /khro rgyal dbang ldan steng bzhugs pa/ /stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug gsum rtog pa dag byas shing / /

sna tshogs sgyu mar gar mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i steng bzhugs lha yi gtso/ /'khor los sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sku/ /spros med de bzhin nyid las byung / /kA la kro d+ha gnon mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal gnod

mdzes phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems las rang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu ma dag la spros med sku/ /'od gsal bde ba'i bsam gtan nyid/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya

las/ /rlung sngags las byung rang dag cing / /thams cad chos ni yongs rdzogs par/ /snang ba ye shes rang bzhin tshogs/ /spro dang bsdu ba nyid gyur pa/ /zung 'jug ting 'dzin la 'jug gang / /dbye bas ye shes dag pa'i gnas/ /mchod

pas yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid bla ma'i sku nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa

nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa'i mchod cing bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // rdo rje mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po rdzogs s+ho// //de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las kyi bkod pa du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa du ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba bla na med pa'i rdo rje mngon

par rdzogs pa'i tshul mi zad pa rdo rje 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can nam mkha'i mthas klas par gyur pa'i khams brjod du med pa'i gnas kyi chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid du rab tu ston pa/ rab

'byam chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po tshad dang rgya yongs su chad pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas kyi zhing khams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas 'gyur ba med par gsang ba'i

'brug sgra sgrogs pa'i spyod yul/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad bcu mngon par bsngags pa dang / rnal 'byor ma skul byed ma dang / 'od zer can dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / ri khrod lo ma can dang / ku ru kul+le dang / rdo rje

dbyangs can ma dang / dri ma med pa'i rnam par rgyal ma'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mi zad pa bsngags pa rdo rje dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje la sogs pa ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rnal

'byor ma'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu/ gsang ba'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba ye shes bde ba chen po'i rol pa la yongs su spyod de/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu bde ba'i ros

khyab par byed cing rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po mchod par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'dus pa dpal mchog chen po

snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rtogs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer gyi rtse mo du ma las phyung ste gsang ba chen po'i chos gnas kyi don mngon par brjod pa rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa

ston par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /chos rnams thams cad dmigs med par/ /sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa gang / /gsang ba'i ye shes rang 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis

rnam par thar pa'i rdo rje bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /bcings pa med cing grol ba med/ /thams cad

rnam par dag pa'i dbyings/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis rdo rje mi zad pa byams pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rmi lam mtshungs pa las/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas/ /dmigs pa rnams las yongs grol ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sgyu ma lta bu dmigs pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag /srid

gsum mig 'phrul mtshungs med par/ /stong pa nyid ni dag pa'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i tshul

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos dang chos nyid med/ /thams cad rnam par mi rtog pas/ /brjod pa kun las 'das pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan
pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ges ye shes sdong pos brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di la rtog

par gyur pa med/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa dngos po nyid du rnam par grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal gyis/ dri ma med pa'i snying

po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba byang chub sems kyi gsang / /chos kun snying po rdo rje'i sku/ /lhun gyis grub pa ye shes dbyings/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog kun nas gsal ba'i snying pos ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med/ /dag pa'i ngo bo ro mnyam pa/ /phung po lnga ldan nyid kyi ngang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

me tog gnyis pa kun du snang ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rang gi sems rtogs bya/ /de nyid chos kun

rtsa ba ste/ /snying po 'di nyid sbas par gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs snang bas rang dag par ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba gang 'gyur dbyings nyid la/ /ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi thugs/ /dam pa 'di ni 'dus par gsungs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i ded dpon rgyal pos 'gro ba sems can thams cad yang dag par sgrol ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji

ltar pad mo chu klung las/ /rab tu skye ba zil 'phro ba/ /de nyid sdong bu 'dir rtogs bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lag chen rgyal pos 'gro ba thams

cad yang dag par 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i tshul zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam med nam mkha' yangs pa ni/ /kun la gnas shing mi 'gyur ba/ /dri ma med cing 'bar

ba'i 'od/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mi zad pa'i dpal gyi ri rab brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mi phyed rdo rje ni/ /stong nyid byang chub sems rdo rje/ /snying rje'i snying po dran par brjod/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

rgyu skar rgyal pos dran pa'i snying po rin po che'i snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni chos rnams stong pa nyid/ /chu dang zla ba mtshungs pa ste/ /sgyu

ma nyid du 'gag med 'char/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman mi zad pa'i ye shes stobs kyi rgyal pos phun sum tshogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du snang la rang bzhin med/ /stong pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ /rol pa rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i tog chen pos 'od mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang nyid rgyal ba'i

'byung gnas te/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rnam gcod pa/ /rang las 'char gyi gzhan las min/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po mi zad pa'i dpal

gyis zla ba kun du ston par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro kun brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /dngos po mnyam nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gcig dang du

mar dmigs su med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i phung pos ye shes kyi sprin rnam par bkod pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la kun rtog bral/ /dus gsum mkhyen pa dus mi dmigs/ /yang dag nyid du kun grol ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po mi zad pa'i snang bas chos thams cad yang dag par khyab pa mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

so/ /snang ba rnam bral mun pa med/ /gang du rtog las rnam grol zhing / /grol ba'i rgyu ni bden pas stong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying

pos kun du khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa gang / /de nyid srog chags

srog gyur pa/ /sems can byang chub snying po can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis snying po kun du rnam par

rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bdud kyi tshogs kun yang / /rang gi sems las byung bas na/ /phyi rol nye bar dmigs su med/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu la 'di lta ste/ sa bla'i lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang /

gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i bar gyi me tog gi rnam pa la 'di lta ste/ pad ma dang / uta pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun d+ha ri ka dang / pad ma ge sar dang /

dzim pa ka dang / na ti ke sa ra dang / mnya dzu sha ka dang / mnya dzu sha ka chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po la sogs pa ste/ 'dab ma lnga pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / bcu pa nas 'dab ma

stong dang ldan pa'i bar du me tog gis mngon par gtor/ rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor cing lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams mngon par rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su mchod par byed do/ /kun du mchod par byed

do/ /legs par rab tu mchod cing lha'i dbyangs kyis legs so zhes brjod par byed do/ /de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis mchod pa la 'ong skad lha'i rgyal po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po

brgya byin dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po stobs bzangs ldan dang / srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can gyi bu mo yid 'phrog ma dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal
po rata na ku be ra dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser lus stobs ldan dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas so so nas mchod cing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la mgo bos phyag byas shing lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas

shing nam mkha' las song ste mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig tsam gyis so so'i gzhal yas khang du stan la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas sa gsum du khyab pa'i 'od kyi snang ba chen po mi zad pa byung ste/ sems
can thams cad bde ba dang reg par gnas pas khyab par byas te slar log nas bdag nyid kyi sku lus kyi ba spu'i bu gar mngon par zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las 'dus pa chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa thog mar bstan pa ste le'u bcu
gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'khor lo'i snying po rdo rje kun du khyab par bskor ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin can/ /ye shes snang ba mi zad pa'i/ /'od gsal brjod du med pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad mo rin po che 'byung ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad byang chub dam pa'i gzhi/ /lugs 'byung chos kyi rang bzhin dbyings/ /lugs zlog gsang ba nyer bstan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po ye shes kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba med cing dpe

med pa/ /mtshon pa tsam gyis rtogs dka' ba/ /'dzub kyis zla mtshon bzhin du snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal zla ba'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med myu gu bskyed pa yi/ /sa bon 'dis ni kun khyab pa/ /chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phreng ba 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don la rab tu sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba 'di ni rags pa'i lam/ /mched pa 'di ni phra ba ste/ /thob pa mchog tu gyur pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

stong pa dngos po yul gyis bral/ /lus kyis stong pa rten 'brel 'byung / /shin du stong pa phyi nang med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par gzigs

pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i sprul pa du mar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu 'thun gang yin byed pa ste/ /'bras bu dbang

sgyur rnam par smin/ /dri ma med pa lhan cig skyes/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me snang ba'i 'od mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi 'od zer gyi sprin 'phro ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu rkyen nye bar len pa dang / /lhan cig byed pa'i spyod pa can/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i ngo bo yi/ /
byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpung yang dag ldan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du brtags pa'i rnam pa can/ /de yi dri ma rnam sbyangs te/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kun du snang ba dam pa'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams 'di

gzhan gyi dbang du brjod/ /spyi dang khyad par dbye ba med/ /skye ba med phyir brjod par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi stobs kyi snying po glog gi 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos nyid yongs su grub pa las/ /ngo bo bden par 'gyur ba med/ /pha rol phyin pa'i tshul mchog

ste byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu rab tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten pas ni kun du ston/ /'das pa'i ye shes dag pa'i lam/ /mi 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan ldan dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljon shing rgyas pa'i bsil grib ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'dod khams sgra dang dngos pos stong / /gzugs kyi khams ni lus kyis stong / /gzugs med khams ni yid kyis te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal

gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byams pa chen po'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun du 'byung ba dag /ye shes rig la rnam dbye bas/ /dman

pa mchog dang bar ma ste/ /rigs ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' ba pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje

chen po'i gru ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad chos nyid gcig pa'i phyir/ /'di ni theg mchog yangs pa'i lam/ /grub pa kun du spyod pa nyid/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal mtshan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba chen po yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos sku de bzhin nyid yin te/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku bde chen brjod/ /sprul sku sna tshogs 'gro don byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa sgra can ye shes kyi snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btang snyoms tshad med pa rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku

gsum gcig tu bsdus pa ni/ /tha dad rtog pa spang ba'i phyir/ /snying po ye shes gyur pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba bla med khyad par ba/ /zung 'jug 'bras bu rab gyur pas/ /rim gnyis gcig tu sbyor ba

nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi khang bzangs bkod pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying po kun du bskul pa ni/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul pas/ /myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'i lam/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshig bstan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dran pa yang dag par skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems

kyi yi ge gsum/ /spro dang bsdu ba mi byed pas/ /bskul ba phrin las spyod pa min/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nyid shes pa'i gnas yin te/ /'di ni sgrub pa'i de nyid

yin/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur spyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs
pa'i kun du spyod pa'i snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'gying ba dpal gyi sdes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glang po'i stobs

mchog snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /srog ni rlung la brten pa yin/ /khyab cing snying por ldan pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad mi 'khrugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing khams rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rig ma lha mo khro tshogs bcas/ /thugs ka nas ni bskul ba shis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa lhun chen 'bar ba'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi phung po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam grol

snying po du ma'i phung po dag /bcings pa med cing rnam par 'thor med pa/ /tshul 'di thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di nges par bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying po rab tu 'joms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzang po yongs su rgyas par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes sku/ /bkra shis dge ba'i mtshan gyis spras/ /de nyid kun gyi rnam par stong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

sdom pa rab ldan dgyes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe byad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sdom pa thams cad snying po ni/ /'dir ni thabs dang shes

rab nyid/ /gnyis med de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnyems pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid gsum brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /dngos po mi dmigs snang med pa/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid gyur phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

rin chen dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /de nyid ro mnyam gcig pa'i bdag /

rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan pa yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad ma'i spyan rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas du ma'i rjes su 'gro ba ston pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spyan lnga ye shes spyod yul du/ /gnyis snang thams cad nub nas ni/ /zung 'jug ye shes mi gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi sdes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi tshul

sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye ba med cing gnas med pa/ /rang 'byung rang bzhin rang gnas pa/ /gnyug ma rgyun chad med pa'i ngang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa me tog 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'bar ba'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer gyis/ /snying gi pad mo sad mdzad

pa/ /de nyid mi 'gyur bde ba thob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes dgyes par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par rgyas pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams gsum ma lus sangs rgyas zhing / /dbyer med ye shes rgyas pa'i thugs/ /'gro ba'i mtshan ma dmigs su med/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshogs drug rang snang rtog pa med/ /rnam shes brtags pa rnam bral ba/ /gzung 'dzin kun las rnam grol ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa snang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa kun nas sgo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /don dam rnam par mi dmigs pa/ /
yod med mtha' las 'das pa ste/ /gzigs byar med cing rtag tu stong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa snang ba mi zad pas bde bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang la rang bzhin ma grub pas/ /mi rtag g.yo ba dngos la

ni/ /bden pa dmigs su med pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i sbyin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying rjes bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems ni dri mar bcas pa dag /bag chags rtogs pas rab dkrugs pa/ /sa ler bzhag pas rang dngas 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs pas 'gro ba'i blo rang chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang 'byung
ye shes nam mkha' ni/ /tha snyad rnams las yongs grol ba/ /'char ba med cing nub pa med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod mthong bas

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu rgyas pa'i nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dad dang ldan pa'i skye bo ni/ /shes rab snang ba

rab bskul ni/ /mun pa la ni snang ba bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus sbyin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri rab brtsegs pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam rtog dri ma spangs zhing gsal ba yi/ /kun nas kun du 'jug pa'i yi dag kyang / /rgyun las bzlog na rang bzhin med par 'gro/ /

nges par gsang ba byang chub bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang skyong gis 'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi dmigs mtshan ma med/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin gnas med par/ /mnyam rjes mi dmigs grol ba'i mtha'/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab mo'i spyod yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'khor ba'i gnas ni sgyu ma ste/ /sgyu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas pa/ /ye shes mngon par 'byung bas na/ /ngo bo nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /

ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa dag /phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings bcas par/ /dpag med dug lnga'i rtogs tshogs ldan/ /skye bo shin du gtum pa dang / /chags dang ser snas 'jungs pa dang / /rmongs dang ma rungs las brtson

rnams/ /rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las/ /sgrol mdzad dkyil 'khor chen po lnga/ /rgyun mi 'chad par don spyod cing / /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa/ /de dang de yi skur bstan nas/ /ris 'thun lam du ston

mdzad de/ /thams cad dbyer med dag par 'gyur/ /'di nyid bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi ste/ /rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur ba dang / /dgongs pa lung ston gsang ba'i rgyud/ /ye shes rdo rje bsdus pa ni/ /khyad par ston pa 'phags pa'i chos/ /

bzhis bsdus lha mo'i gsang chen dang / /thun mong ma yin ston pa yi/ /gsang ba bla med rgyud 'dir nges/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
gsang ba bstan pa mi phyed pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med bdud rtsi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku bdud rtsi 'bar ba rgyas pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rang gi sems las gzhan med de/ /snang zhing gsal bar gyur pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni rang rig nyams myong ltar/ /gal te sems nyid ma yin na/ /'brel pa med phyir snang med 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos nyid dang ni sems nyid dag /gang du rtog pas dpyad

gyur kyang / /gcig dang du mar mi dmigs pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa mi zad pa'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spyod yul shin du zab pas na/ /rang sems byang chub snying po can/ /gdod nas dag pa de nyid de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya sna tshogs kyi yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zab dang

rgya chen dbyer med pas/ /snang stong tha dad med par 'dres/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni de la gsungs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i kha lo sgyur bas sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri bcas rang rig ltos med phyir/ /rang 'byung ye shes de nyid de/ /rig pa'i phyir na gsal ba nyid/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zab pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig yin phyir mi rtog pa/ /rkyen skyes gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir/ /mi rtog rtog pa byed med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i lhas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems nyid rnam par mi rtog pas/ /gsal la rtog med ye shes nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen

pa'i spyod yul can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud kyi ba dan rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig 'od gsal nam mkha' 'di/ /gdod nas ma bcos par rtogs gang / /sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal mi dgos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi lag pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /blo bur dri ma byung gyur kyang / /rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la/ /gos dang ma gos med par gsal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi glang po'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yod med gnyis ka las 'das pas/ /phan tshun ltos pa ma grub phyir/ /tshu rol ma grub pha rol bzhin/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba tog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yod med tha dad ma grub ste/ /gnyis tsam du yang med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par brjod med dmigs pa bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

legs pa'i seng ges srid gsum thams cad lhang nger gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sems nyid dri med kyis/ /rnam 'phrul gzugs skus bsdus

pa yi/ /zhing khams rnam par dag par snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzangs kyis chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa/ /ngo mtshar ba yi rnam 'phrul dag /nam mkha'i mthas klas khyab par 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
'di gsungs so/ /gang zhig sgrub pa gang bsgrub la/ /de sgrub pa la gnas med med/ /bsgrub par bya ba sgrub ma yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
