sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba mi zad chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes rdo rje rol par bstan/ /bla med gnas ni tshul thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen gyis pad ma'i snying po kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i
'dam las skyes pa yi/ /rang sems pad ma'i sdong bu ni/ /zil par ldan pa dri ma med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
gtsug na nor bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rab tu spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun nas kun du sangs rgyas kyi/ /zhing
'di'i snying po dad pa ste/ /mos dang brtson 'grus stobs de bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul can
zhes bya ba'i zab pa'i snying po gzhal med khang rnam pa du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa 'di kun gyi
brten pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems la kun brten kyang / /gnas pa med cing 'gro 'ong med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
seng ge'i stobs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha'
kun du gnas med pa/ /de bzhin rtog bral dri med sems/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /shes bzhin smon lam dbang gis ni/ /mngal
'byung rim pa gang yin dang / /zhing dang zhing du so sor yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'dir ni yang dag brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /gzhon nu'i rol pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin bzo
gnas yang dag bstan/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spros/ /'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med/ /sngon gnas pa ni sbyar mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad
pa ni/ /thams cad rdo rje'i dngos gzhi la/ /dus gsum lam gyi mthar thug pas/ /thams cad 'di bzhin blta bar bya/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba sku gsung
thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa ston
pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa dri ma med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/ /rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa yis/ /snying po sgyu ma'i snang ba nyid/ /byang chub
tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po kun du bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag kun rdzob dag pa la/ /brtan g.yor bcas pa'i snang ba ni/ /rang bzhin med pa nyid du snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rnam par brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/ /sems nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa dngos/ /de nyid kun rdzob stong nyid do/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o
zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sgyu mar ston pa'i rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma 'khor 'das dag /sems nyid dag dang ma dag pa'i/ /snang ba bag chags khyad par nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan
pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtshos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yid bzhin nor bu rang las rnyed/ /de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /bla ma sangs rgyas drin gyis rnyed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan
pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag skyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la/ /yod med mtha' las 'das pa ste/ /mi rtog ye shes kun rdzob nyid/ /byang chub tshul
'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sku gsum 'dul ba'i zhing / /ma lus lus pa med pa rnams/ /thams cad byang chub sems kyi rgyan/ /byang chub
tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pas bkra shis dga' bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho stong gsum ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la rdzogs/ /thams cad ba spu'i tshogs las kyang / /spros nas byang chub

sems gsungs so zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa chen pos yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsang ba bde chen byang chub sems/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul mchog ste/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od zer stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi tshul 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun

gyi gsang / /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes tsam nyid na'ang skye ba med/ /gsang ba'i tshul chen bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

'gro ba ma lus pa'i dbyings la yang dag par dbang bskur ba'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /gnas pa med las gnas pa'i

chos/ /gnas tsam nyid na gnas pa med/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis 'byung bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i 'od

ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang / /dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs tsam nyid na dmigs pa med/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa'i chu klung skems pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong / /'gro nyid na'ang 'gro ba med/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho rtog pa rang 'byung ba/ /rtog tsam nyid na'ang rtog mi gnas/ /tha dad med pa'i

tshul mchog gis/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bus rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rol pa lding ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcings pa med cing grol du'ang med/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam grol ba/ /ye shes brjod pa dang bral ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun brjod tu

med pa ste/ /gsang ba zab pa'i gnas nyid la/ /brjod tsam nyid na brjod du med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'khor los

sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /don dam rtog pa'i yul min phyir/ /chos sku ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /rang rig ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan bde spros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnga sgra kun du sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal po dpung

bcas yan lag ldan/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa bzhin/ /ye shes rgyal po stobs chen ldan/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi gaN Di phyogs bcur

sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /theg pa sna tshogs drang ba'i phyir/ /lam 'di rim par bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba'i theg pa gcig pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dung 'bud pa rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho rmad du byung ba'i chos/ /gsang chen theg pa mchog gcig pu/ /ma lus dus gsum rgyal ba'i lam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje'i spyan/ /gzigs pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas dang / spyod yul dang / zab pa dang / rgya che ba'i de kho na nyid chos nyid nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin las ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi

khyab pa la dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la smras pa/ gang du dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa'i chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos

yin te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa ni rang bzhin med pa'o/ /rten 'brel las skyes pa'i chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dmigs su med pa ste gnas pa med cing rang bzhin med pa stong

pa nyid de/ de yang dngos po bar dngos po med pa gnyis su dbyer med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa de dag

thams cad kyi sems kyi rtog pa yongs su chod nas legs so legs so zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po
gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i me tog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yongs su dag par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ /rang sems dri ma bkru bar bya/ /

dag pa'i thugs ni ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don legs sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dag pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /pha rol phyin nam dag pa'i gnas/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i thun mong yul/ /snying po dgyes pa'i rtsa ba ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sprin spro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba chos nyid dag

pa nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul mchog gis/ /'gro ba'i blo yis mun sel ba/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das blo grags pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes

glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi dang nang du dngos po'i chos/ /du ma nyid du mi rtog ste/ /thams cad brten pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das spobs pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin rtog pa'i tshogs 'byung ba/ /rnam par brtags pa rang byung gang / /

sems gsum snang ba'i ngang du dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni byang chub mchog /spros bcas spros med tshul dag gis/ /gsang ba spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phan par bzhed pa rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po

khyab pa'i ye shes kun du 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni gang du rnam shes dang / /ye shes gnyis su med pa ste/ /kun gzhi rtog pa med par gsal/ /byang chub rten 'brel

tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rol par ldan pa'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji srid nam mkha' stong ba min/ /rang sems stong nyid nam mkha' las/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes stong nyid de/ /kun ston tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang bral ba'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye

shes rdo rje'i dra bas yongs su 'brel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med cing rang stong pa/ /bde chen phyi nang dmigs med pa/ /ro gcig ye shes sgyu mar snang / /zhen med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi snying po dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang

zag dang ni chos dag la/ /bdag med rtogs phyir sems dpa' che/ /sa la gnas dang rigs kyi dang / /legs spyod tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe sbyin dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po

che'i gter gyi bum pa bzang po'i brgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos don snying po ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung ba yi/ /zab mo gter 'dra rang las rnyed/ /gsang

ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i 'byung gnas rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug du ma yis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa'i tshul kun la/ /rang gzhan khyad par don 'byung bas/ /spyod pa'i tshul mchog ldan pa ste/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das skye dbang

mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang 'byung ba snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rab rib med pa'i tshul can gyis/ /drang srong skyob pa'i spyod gnas te/ /thub pa mngon

par nges 'byung ba'i/ /yon tan tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das stobs kyis gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par 'byung ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma med cing tha ma med/ /dbus su 'byung ba yang dag spangs/ /ye shes nye bar brgyan pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das blo gnas

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa kun du bzang po ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ri bo sna tshogs 'dus pa la/ /ri rgyal brtan par 'gyur ba gang / /rtog

med lhun po'i gnas su spro/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs mdzes pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings/ /kun du rtog med lham mer gnas/ /de nyid rab tu mi gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das gtso bo mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang phyug spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shing dbang drung ni rdo rje can/ /mi 'gyur ye shes e dang ba~M/ /pad ma b+ha

ga'i dbyings can te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du 'phags pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yul gyur pa/ /chos kun bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /zab mo'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

dpal seng ge'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bdag gzhan tha dad med/ /

byams pa chen po'i snang ba yis/ /mi phyed chos ni don grub rgyu/ /sems kyi spyod tshul 'di bstan no zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ldan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du mar me tog rgyas pa

cher spro ba'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag ye shes bzang po nyid/ /rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i blo yi nor/ /bdud rtsi'i snying po rang las rnyed/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes lhun grub pas/ /'di nyid rtog med rab gsal ba/ /bsam pa'i dngos po 'jug mi 'gyur/ /sems kyi kun rtog rab zhi ba'o zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las rab tu mi gnas pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gdug pa can ma lus pa 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shin du rgyal ba dri ma med/ /

sems kyi glang po bcing mi bya/ /rang grol gsal ba dag pa'i lam/ /rgyal bas tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa bskyed pa snang

ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /chos kyi phung po de snyed las/ /rtog pa'i ye shes gyur pa na/ /tshul 'di gcig tu

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog gi ri bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma bar dang tha mar yang / /byang chub mchog tu gnas pa nyid/ /nges pa bskyed pa 'byung ba yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu dga' ye shes

'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde gshegs ye shes gdung rgyud ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'dzin/ /'byung po

du ma lam la 'dzud/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang sems rgyal po rang 'byung gnas/ /shar nub med pa'i nyi ma las/ /rtog med cir yang gsal ba nyid/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das stobs kyi lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid kyis dbang

bskur ba/ /thob pa'i khyad par sems las byung / /'di ni dus gsum kun du 'byung / /byang chub zab pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phreng ldan yon tan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

yon tan dpal rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor du ma gsal ba yi/ /yon tan rin chen tshogs spro ba/ /phyi dang nang du rnam phye bas/ /ye

shes zab pa'i tshul brjod pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni snang ba bla med pa/ /rgyun du rang sems chos kyi klong / /rgyun mi 'chad pa chos kyi sku/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan brgyan pa'i zhal sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dag pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog pa/ /gsal ba brjod bral thams cad mkhyen/ /'od gsal snying po ye shes

sku/ /spros pa med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par sbyangs pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so sor ma 'dres pa dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyab dang rdo rje sku nyid dang / /mi 'gyur dus ni thams cad du/ /brtan pa med par rang 'byung gnas/ /bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zil gnon rdo rjes sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa/ /spyod yul thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /rnam par grol

ba'i 'bras thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes la rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba ro gcig rdo rje 'chang / /gsang ba gsum na sku gsung thugs/ /de nyid lngar ni rab bsgrags pa/ /dam pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas pa'i spyan sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par dben pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams ni/ /rdo rje gsum du rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku

gsung thugs/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bden par gsungs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'od kyi dra bar 'char ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni kun khyab pas/ /de nyid sku la rab snang ba/ /zhing khams rdul phran skur 'dus pa/ /mi zad tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi ye shes dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni kun sgrog pa/ /de nas gsung du rab brjod pa/ /sna tshogs sgra ni gsung gyur pa/ /

de ni gsung gcig tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gnas pa med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thugs ni bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes mkhyen pa gcig pa'i thugs/ /dri med mnyam pa nyid gang yin/ /rtog med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das mtha' yas gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes rdo rje mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam nyid gnas pas blang dor med/ /dus

gsum tha dad gzigs pa med/ /skad cig ye shes bde ba'i dngos/ /chos nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od mi zad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phas kyi rgol ba zlog par mdzad pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpa' bo seng ge'i lta stangs kyis/ /mu stegs bdud tshogs las rgyal ba'i/ /tshad med snying rjes bskul bar bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen rtog gis chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje 'bar
ba 'od 'phro ba/ /ye shes zla ba la gnas pa/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzin pa yis/ /dri med chu rgyun tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas the tshom rnam par spangs pas sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi me tog gi snye ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig tu mchog gnas mi 'gyur ba/ /tshig don dbye ba dam pa'i chos/ /bstan pa'i snying po bla med lam/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus la/ /rab 'byam mchod pa'i sprin gyis ni/ /kun du khyab cing ston pa po/ /'di ni ye shes kun gyi gter/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku

gsung thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ 'byung 'jug gnas par dag pa kun du ye shes ston pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan rnams

rdzogs pa ye shes sku/ /dngos po med cing snang ba'i dngos/ /rtog pa med pa mi gnas pa/ /khyad par tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rnam par mthong ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba'i

cho 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba zhi ba'i lam/ /bcing med ye shes bkod ma'i chu/ /dam tshig gsang ba sdom pa las/ /gsang ba'i tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /rtog med 'bras bu dag pa'i ngang / /chos rnams stong nyid snying rjer gcig /tha dad spangs pa lam gyi mchog /zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog rgyal mtshan

thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs bdud rtsi las/ /'thung ba ye shes bcud kyis rgyas/ /tshe 'dir grub pa
mchog ster ba/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ri dbang gi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /dus gsum 'byung ba rtag pa gang / /thams cad bdag nyid bde bar gshegs/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa spyod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

rnam pa kun du sdom pa gang / /rigs kyi gnas su gang byung bar/ /sku gsung thugs ni ye shes can/ /dran pa ma lus tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad gzigs pa'i

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams ma lus pa la byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad ye shes gcig par sdom/ /de nyid 'gyur med zag pa bral/ /snying po

rol pa rang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa grags pa mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi me long zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang / /phung po la sogs rtog bral ba/ /'di ni kun rdzob rnam thar sgo/ /rdo rje tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgra gcan lhas de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun nas ye shes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu ni/ /kun nas dkris pa sna tshogs pa/ /stong nyid

ye shes mes bsreg pa/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'khor ba sna tshogs pa'i mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba bde ba yi/ /'jig rten lha las 'das nas ni/ /snang ba med pa'i dbyings su 'gro/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das rin chen snying pos srid pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba'i mtshan ma'i dngos po rnams/ /srid gsum rang bzhin

med mthong bas/ /ye shes 'od gsal mi phyed pa'i/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du mthor gshegs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid gcig pa'i lam zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba dang ni mun pa dag /rtog pa'i chos nyid gzigs med phyir/ /tha dad snang ba nub pa'i dngos/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos kyi lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni sgrib pa med pa'i lam/ /

sdug pa rab zhi brtse ba can/ /byang chub sems kyi snying po nyid/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug rings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po mig 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad ye shes snang ba'i dngos/ /sems can rtog pa yul med phyir/ /gnyis snang ma lus bcom nas ni/ /gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dbyings su gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snod

bcud ma lus rin chen gzhi/ /lha mi'i snang ba ston pa che/ /thub pa 'gro ba'i don spyod pa'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye

shes 'pho ba med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus la 'pho ba'i ye shes gang / /rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brten nas/ /gcig pu mi 'gyur

dngos med sems/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dang po'i lus ni lha yi dngos/ /lus dben snang ba rten 'brel te/ /sems nyid ye shes stong nyid de/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mkhan sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni kun rtog ye shes che/ /bde ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las/ /zug rngu bral ba byang

chub sems/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs mi zad pa'i ye shes chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gnyis med mnyam pa'i dngos/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /mi zad phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi/ /dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa bla na med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag gzhan dbyer

med byang chub sems/ /bde ba chen po sems la rnyed/ /ngal so'i gnas ni bla na med/ /dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni gcig sbyor ba/ /byang

chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis/ /rjes su bsngags pa brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du srog dang snying po med/ /gnas pa med cing kun 'byung ba/ /bar ma do yi rnam shes ltar/ /

'byung ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das srid mtha' gzigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /dbang po yul la rnam spro ba/ /de nyid bzlog ste sems gnas pa/ /lam du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das glog gi 'od sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba ye shes 'od kyis ni/ /rtog pa'i dri ma rnam sel ba/ /de nyid rnam grol bstan pa gang / /gnyis med

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od mchog ma lus pa rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med lhun grub ye shes rang 'byung ba/ /'od gsal chos dbyings snying po bla na med/ /chos nyid chos can dbyer med bde ba che/ /mnyam nyid gnas pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas seng ges byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dag pa'i sa yi dbang phyug gar/ /rdzogs pa'i gtsug tor dam tshig che/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal bas rgyal

mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgyal mtsho kun gyi rang bzhin thugs/ /dus
gsum sangs rgyas skye med ngo bor mnyam/ /rnal 'byor rang sems gcig pur gnyis su med/ /khyad par med pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas mchog dga' grags pas sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying po sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /chos nyid yongs su dag pa gang / /sangs rgyas ngo bo

nyid kyis 'grub/ /'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la spyod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba gnyis po ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rang la gnas/ /rang nyid rtog med ye shes sku/ /'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grags pa rdzogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdul bya'i snang ba nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus med dbang po'i phug gnas

shing / /ring du 'gro zhing gcig pur rgyu/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems 'dul byed/ /'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsnyems pa dang bral bas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /blo ldan sa gsum 'grub pa'i gzhi/ /yon tan 'byung gnas rin chen sems/ /bsam pa'i dgos 'dod skong byed la/ /khyad par tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das mchod 'os lhas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyab bdag dpal ldan rdo rje'i sku/ /'di nyid lus ni dri

ma med/ /chos can ma grub rang sar dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po zhes bya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi g.yo ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phung po la sogs dngos med pa/ /gang zag bdag med stong pa nyid/ /chos la dmigs pa rtog pa bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ril por 'dzin pa bsdu

ba dang / /rjes su gzhig pa spro ba nyid/ /gnyis med bsam gtan la gnas pa/ /gcig pu byed pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spos dri zhim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid bde ba chen

po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes bde ba chen po'i ngang / /rtag tu bzhugs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rang 'byung 'gyur med snying po che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mchog 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med

sgyu ma'i chos nyid ni/ /yod med tha dad las 'das pa/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /'gag med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang rnam par bral bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi blo'i

mun pa sel ba ye shes kyi rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di nyid rang bzhin mi dmigs pas yongs su dag par shes par bya/ /zung 'jug de bzhin nyid las ni/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i 'gram pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rtog med dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam pa nyid las gang 'byung ba'i/ /bde chen rang 'byung rang nyid ni/ /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo ste/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

gnyis med mnyam pa rang byung rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba rang byung brtan g.yo bcas/ /thams cad rang nyid dkyil 'khor dang / /bde chen zab pa'i tshul rdo rje/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das skyon rab zhi bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sgron me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtag tu dmigs par bcas

pa yi/ /phyag rgya chen po dngos med de/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid du dag /rin chen tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'chang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig 'phrul ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' che/ /kun du bzang pos slar gsol pa/ /dri med mnyam pa ye shes sku/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de/ /gnas dang ston pa rang byung ba/ /che ba'i bdag nyid slad gnas pa/ /dpal mchog gsang ba 'di nyid du/ /skal ldan rgyal

ba bla na med ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rang byung du bstan pa'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa

mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las le'u nyi shu pa'o// // de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bcas dpag med dang / /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /rigs dang

lha mor bcas pa dpag med dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po du mar bcas pa dag /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus byas nas/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i bdag po la/ /tshogs pa 'dus pa brjod kyis mi

lang ba'i/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis dpag med ldan/ /mchod pa'i rim pa phyi nang gsang ba dang / /de kho na nyid rnam pa mtha' yas pas/ /ye shes rgyal ba mi zad dam tshig gi/ /rin chen sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ /mgo bos phyag 'tshal

nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus 'dus pa kun gyi gsang ba'i don/ /thog ma dbus mthar gnas pa ye shes che/ /gsang ba rdo rje snying po lhan cig skyes/ /brjod bya bla med gyur

pas 'dus pa'i chos/ /snying po'i 'bras bu kun gyi rtsa ba gang / /thabs dang bstan pa de yi khyad par mang / /bcom ldan dri med gsang ba bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems rdo rjes/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /gsang ba byang chub bka' stsal to/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /rab tu gzigs nas dgyes gyur pas/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /gnas 'di zhus pa shin du legs/ /legs so legs so sems dpa'

che/ /zab cing rgya che mchog gi yul/ /'on kyang 'dir ni bde gshegs kyang / /the tshom 'jug pa'i gnas yin na/ /de las gzhan par gyur pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshogs/ /de las spyod yul lta ci smos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thams

cad/ /mchog don ngo mtshar spyod pa dang / /thun mong gnas la dmad gyur pa/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che la/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi bdag po la/ /'di skad ces ni zhus par 'gyur/ /gnas dang dus dang phyag rgya dang / /'dus pa khyad par gyur

pa la'ang / /gsang ba dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /tshad med ye shes zhing khams kyi/ /snang ba rab tu rgyas pa la/ /rgyu thabs khyad par gyur pa yi/ /gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi gsang / /de nyid 'dus pa 'di mchog tu/ /ston pa 'phro bar ma gyur pa/ /de srid du ni kun

mkhyen gyis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dus pa las/ /lus ngag yid ni byin brlab cing / /khyad par mchog dbang bskur mdzad de/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i rim phye ba/ /bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang / /shes rab ye shes de

bzhin du/ /rab tu bskur bas smin byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba byang chub sems rdo rje/ /rtogs dka' mi phyed dam tshig gis/ /gang phyir dgongs te bshad pa dang / /dgongs min drang ba'i don

gyur dang / /nges don ji bzhin pa dang ni/ /ji bzhin ma yin rnam phye bas/ /yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don/ /sbas pa gsum dang mthar thug gnyis/ /dang po gcig dang tshul gnyis ldan/ /dpag med rdo rje'i tshig gi rgya/ /nges phyir rab tu

ston pa nyid/ /'jug bya de dag lus ngag yid/ /rim pa gnyis kyi bde ba dang / /yid bde rab tu myong bgyid pa/ /thabs zab rgya che myur ba'i lam/ /yan lag dam tshig ldan pa yi/ /thob bya thob byed khyad par pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla med pa/ /mngon pa'i ye shes bla na med/ /mngon par byang chub gnas gyur pa'i/ /'bras bu yang dag thob gyur nas/ /gsang ba'i rgyud mchog bstan du gsol/ /de ltar gsol ba btab gyur pas/ /de nas bla med

bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yis/ /gsang ba byang chub sems rdo rje/ /de bzhin gshegs pa du ma rnams/ /stong pa nyid du 'jug pa yi/ /dpag med zil gnon rdo rje zhes/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po de/ /'od gsal dri med dbyings nyid la/ /ye shes 'jug pa'i ngo bo yis/ /dbyer med gnas par gyur ma thag /rdo rje'i lus kyi rtsa gnas ni/ /stong phrag bdun bcu la sogs pa/ /rtsa yi

bu ga khong stong dag /thig le zhu ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /byang chub rdo rje'i rnam par ni/ /zhu zhing yang dag gnas par gyur/ /de nyid chos sku'i ngo bo nyid/ /bde dang stong pa dbyer med pa/ /snying rje tshad med rnam pa las/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /rnam par dben don nyid tu gnas/ /sgyu ma sbyong ba'i dam tshig dang / /mngon par byang chub 'od gsal ba'i/ /stong nyid rdo rje rdzogs

pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /rig pa thabs dang shes rab dag /dbyer med bde ba chen po'i sku/ /skyes bu'i rnam par gyur pa dag /gnas pa'i ngang las ldang ba ste/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /yul

dang dngos po rnam dag pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin brlabs pa/ /ye shes chen po'i ngang gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ /sprin dkar dag

pa'i tshul can nyid/ /de ma thag tu snang bar mdzad/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes zhugs pa/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang / /rang 'byung ye shes lhag pa'i lha/ /thams cad bdag po rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal gsum pa la

phyag drug pa/ /sna tshogs rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /in dra nI la 'bar ba dang / /dang po mgon po rnam par sprul/ /dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rang
bzhin gyis/ /rnam pa gsal ba nyid du gzigs/ /de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /'dod chags kyis 'dul 'gro gzigs nas/ /'dod chags
gsang ba'i tshul zhes pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bkod pa rab tu mi zad pa/ /de dag thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /nyid kyi sku la thim par mdzad/ /de

nas 'dus pa'i lha tshogs kyis/ /dbyer med gnas pa'i ngang las ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag /yongs su mnyes pa'i don du ni/ /nyid kyi sku las spros pa yi/ /ba spu'i bu ga'i 'od zer gyi/ /rtse mo

rnams las spros gyur pa/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya rdo rjer gyur pa yis/ /sa dang chu dang me dang

rlung / /tshad med yul dang spyod pa yis/ /chags pa chen pos rjes chags nas/ /bde ba'i rol pa ston par mdzad/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che/ /de nyid me long sogs bdag nyid/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa thub pa'i rgyal/ /

rdo rje mi bskyod rgyal po nyid/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa ma lus pa'i/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyal/ /snying po rdo rje ye shes so/ /de nyid rdo rje btsun mo rnams/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i mkha' dbyings ni/ /dam tshig chen po'i

mkha' dbyings ni/ /dam tshig chen po'i mkha' dbyings te/ /rnyog pa med cing rdul med pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byin brlabs pa/ /phyogs mtshams mnyam par ldan pa la/ /grub pa'i gnas brgyad yongs bskor

ba/ /zhing khams yongs su dag pa yi/ /'dzam gling pad ma'i lte ba la/ /sna tshogs mi shigs e dang ba~M/ /gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi kun du rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab/ /'od
zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug /gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa po/ /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /sum

bcu gsum par ldan pa yis/ /pho brang yangs pa'i gzhal yas der/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong dang ni/ /gnyis dang byang chub sems dpar bcas/ /phyi rol 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /
dbus su yang dag bzhugs gyur pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /mi bskyod pa dang dkon mchog dpal/ /tshe dpag med dang gdon mi za/ /dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thub pa'i rgyal/ /de nyid sku gsung thugs ye shes/ /phrin las ldan par bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas rang bzhin dag pa yi/ /chos kyi dbyings na gnas gyur pa/ /dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i/ /sems can khams kyi snod

bcud dang / /yul dang dbang po thams cad kun/ /rdo rje sems dpas byin brlabs shing / /dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /ye shes kyi ni dbang bsgyur bas/ /de dag thob pa'i khyad par ni/ /tha ma 'bring dang mchog

rnams la/ /bde ba dang ni yid bde bas/ /gsang ba ye shes spyod yul thob/ /de las sprul pa'i sku byung ba/ /bcom ldan de nyid thugs ka nas/ /sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag med pa/ /bye ba grangs med dkye nas

ni/ /gdul bya gdul phyir dbang bskur zhing / /spyi dang khyad par gyis 'dul 'gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas tshogs dag gis/ /bskul bas ched du brjod pa gsungs/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /byang chub
sems ni rang byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu rtog med mi gnas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /sku bzhi ye shes ro gcig pas/ /mdzad pa thams cad rdzogs byed

pa/ /rab 'byam cho 'phrul ston pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nges par sprul pas rgyud nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /phyi rol yul snang rdzas su 'dod/ /g.yag rnga ne'u sing lta bu
la/ /bar du snang mun shong ba tsam/ /sems las tha dad par gnas pa/ /skad cig mi rtag par 'dod pas/ /yul sems tha dad bye brag smra/ /phyi rol yul dag phra ba rnams/ /'dus nas rigs pa 'byung
ba ltar/ /yul dus rnam par nges pa las/ /rigs pa 'dra ba'i rnam par bzhag /yul dgag pa yi tha ma dang / /shes pa skye ba'i thog ma ru/ /phrad par 'dod pa grub pa'i mtha'/ /mdo sde pa yi dgongs
pa smra/ /chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems/ /rnam par rig tsam skad cig ma/ /rang gsal rgyun gnas spros bral 'dod/ /rang rig skad cig gsal ba dang / /mi gsal sna tshogs rtog bral du/ /

rnam med rnal 'byor spyod pa smra/ /dngos rnams stong pa sgyu ma bzhin/ /snang yang bdag las rang stong pa/ /sems kyi rtog pa rnam bzlog ste/ /mkha' dbyings dri med rtog rgyun 'chad/ /'di ltar srid pa zhi ba las/ /rnam

grol stong nyid snying rje dang / /dbyer med byang chub sems kyi mchog /zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa/ /dpal ldan 'dus 'dir grub mtha' kun/ /blo yi rim pas 'dir 'dus te/ /de bas 'dir ni chos kun gyi/ /snying po 'dus

pa'i rtsa bar gsungs/ /gsang ba bla na med pa'i don/ /ye shes rnam gsum rim 'jug cing / /sgron me 'od gsal snang ba las/ /zung 'jug rdo rje mi phyed pa/ /lha yi 'khor lo sprul nas ni/ /dbyer med mi g.yo ting nge

'dzin/ /mchog ni dri med rang snang las/ /gnyis med ngang du rab zhugs pa'o/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las/ /rtag tu 'od gsal bar gnas kyang / /'gro ba'i don las mi 'da' bas/ /dam tshig 'byung ba'i

ting nge 'dzin/ /byang chub sems kyi za ma tog /bde ba can ni mi shigs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems/ /'gro ba kun la ster ba ni/ /ma chags pa yi ye shes kyis/ /

'dod chags 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma las/ /gdon mi za ba gnas med pa/ /'od gsal 'bras bu mngon phyogs pa/ /dam tshig 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /zag pa med pa'i dga' ba yis/ /

ye shes chen po'i ros khyab pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes gyur pa'i/ /dam tshig bla med ting nge 'dzin/ /yang dag ye shes nor bu ltar/ /rin chen 'od 'phro sprin tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su

yang / /mnyes byed rdo rje ting nge 'dzin/ /zag pa bsdus byas bde ba las/ /bcu drug 'gyur gyis khyad 'phags pa/ /'dod chags rjes su 'dzin byed pa/ /chags par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /sku gsung thugs nyid

rdo rje las/ /mi phyed 'od gsal bar thim la/ /sgyu ma slu ba rdo rje nyid/ /snang ba thim pas ting nge 'dzin/ /ye shes me long lta bu las/ /srid gsum snang bar mdzad pa ste/ /snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo ni/ /mi zad sku

yi ting nge 'dzin/ /snang ba gsum las 'das pa yi/ /rang bzhin mngon par byang chub pa/ /rnam par dag pa rdo rje yi/ /'od gsal ba yi ting nge 'dzin/ /srid zhi mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sku/ /chos rnams gnyis
med ro gcig pas/ /rin po che ltar 'byung ba'i gnas/ /yon tan gter gyur ting nge 'dzin/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /gang las 'od gsal chos kyi sku/ /mngon par byang chub pa yi tshul/ /mi

phyed rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bla med mngon par byang chub pa/ /gsang ba lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes mchog tu 'gyur/ /chos nyid mi zad dbyings kyi ngang / /snang stong tha dad

med pa ste/ /ro gcig 'du 'bral med pa nyid/ /stong dang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med pas/ /kun du stong zhing ma bcos pa/ /lhun grub rdo rje'i ngang gnas pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge

'dzin/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /'od gsal 'bar ba rdo rje yis/ /tshe dpag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /snang ba'i dngos po sna tshogs pa/ /sgyu ma rkyen skyes zil gnon
pa/ /rdo rje 'od gsal ting nge 'dzin/ /dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje can zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' bas khyab cing dgyes
pa chen po yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba gsum gyi dngos/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di gsungs so/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi zad pas/ /lus skams gyur cing sdug bsngal gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyi ni

sems dbyings te/ /de la dngos grub gzhan du gyur/ /brjod pa thams cad yi ge ste/ /kun gyi rtsa ba a las byung / /de las chos kyi phung po ni/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong dag tu snang / /dbyangs dang gsal byed ngag yin te/ /ngag ni rlung

gi rtsa ba can/ /sgrar snang tsam nyid kun rdzob ste/ /thim pa don dam brjod pa'o/ /yang gnas 'di la sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i yul la rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes gnyis su med par

spyad pa spyod par byed de/ rang rig pa'i ye shes sgyu ma dang mtshungs pas spyad pa spyod par byed do/ /'di ltar chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / brag cha dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / chu zla

dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / sprin dang / mig g.yor dang / glog dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sgyu ma'i rnam par blta ste/ de lta na yang don dam pa ni rnam par dmigs su med do/ /chos thams cad ni rang

bzhin med pa'i phyir rten 'brel tshogs pa'i snang ba dgag tu med do/ /de yang dag par bden pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa rnams kyis

mngon par dga' ba'i yid kyis dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la legs so legs so/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyod pa ngo mtshar zhing rmad du rab tu byung ba rab tu bstan pa gsang ba'i spyod yul la dgongs te rang rang gi stan

la gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dman pa'i spyod pa las ring zhing lam bde

ba chen pos ye shes la rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gsang / /gsang ba gsum du gnas pa gang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngor/ /gsang ba rab tu gyur

pa gsungs/ /gsang ba'i yi ge rtogs dka' ba/ /ma 'ongs skye bo gdul slad du/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /phyi nang sbas pa rim pas bstan/ /e yi rnam pas lha mo spyan/ /ba~M gi rnam pa bdag mar brjod/ /ma

ni lha mo gos dkar mo/ /ya yi rnam pa sgrol mar brjod/ /shU ni byang chub sems rdo rje/ /tA~M ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /me long ye shes e zhes brjod/ /ka ni m-i bskyod rdo rje ste/ /smyin zhes don yod grub pa nyid/ /rin chen

'byung ba sa zhes bya/ /'od dpag med pa ma zhes brjod/ /rtag pa'i rdo rje ye zhes pa'o/ /b+ha ni dri yi rdo rje ma'o/ /yi ge ga ni ro rdo rje/ /bAn ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma'o/ /sa yi rnam pa reg rdo rje/ /rba ni sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /ta ni chos

dbyings rdo rje yi/ /thA ni sgrib pa rnam par sel/ /ga ni 'jig rten dbang phyug brjod/ /yi ge ta ni sa snying po'o/ /kA ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /ya ni phyag na rdo rjer gnas/ /bAka ni kun du bzang po'o/ /tsita ni byams par brjod par

bya/ /ta ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /hri da ya ni snying po nyid/ /ba ni dbyug sngon can du grags/ /dzra ni stobs chen 'bar ba ste/ /yo ni mi g.yo gtum po'o/ /shid ni bya ba nan tan te/ /b+ha ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o/ /ge ni gtsug tor

'khor los sgyur/ /shU ni bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /bi ni shes rab mthar byed do/ /dza ni gshin rje mthar byed de/ /ha ni mthar byed pad ma 'dzin/ /ra ni so sor rtog pa nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba/ /phung

po lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /'byung bzhi lha mo bzhi ru brjod/ /yul lnga 'dod yon lha mo lnga/ /rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub sems/ /lus tshig la gnas khro rgyal bcu/ /bsdus pa ye shes lngar sbyor ba/ /bde ba chen po'i ye

shes ni/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi dngos/ /mig dang mi yis gnas pa las/ /de nyid kyis ni sbyar ba yis/ /de las gyur pa'i grangs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor de snyed rnams su 'gyur/ /phyogs dang gdengs ka gdong pa

dang / /ris byed rigs kyis phye ba gang / /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa ste/ /gzhan du 'phros pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /ka nas bzung ste rim bzhin du/ /de bzhin ha yi bar dag tu/ /de dag sna tshogs rgyur gyur pa/ /stong phrag sum bcu'i

bdag nyid do/ /thabs dang shes rab ngo bo nyid/ /stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa dang / /cha 'thun yan lag rgyud gyur pas/ /de dag sde dang bcas pa yis/ /gsang chen rgyud sder brjod par bya/ /rnal

'byor rgyud ni thams cad du/ /lha 'di rnams ni thog mar bzhugs/ /'dis ni rgyud rnams gsang chen kun/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ces rgyas btab pa'o/ /mdo sde rnams la gnas sogs pa/ /thun mong dbye bas phye ba nyid/ /yi ge

bzhi ni thun mong du/ /bsdus pas chos kyi bdag nyid can/ /mdo kun yul du gyur pa'o/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal la sogs pas/ /rnam pa kun du ma bshad de/ /'di skad bdag ces dang por brjod/ /

dus gcig dus gsum skad cig ste/ /ston pa rang 'byung che ba'i sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gshegs/ /de bzhin du ni rtag gshegs la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes/ /pad ma'i ming can btsun mo'i gnas/ /der ni mngon

par bzhugs par mdzad/ /btsun mo rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rin chen chos dang bcas pa yi/ /rdo rje las kyi sems mar brjod/ /de dag kun gyi bde ba'i gnas/ /bskyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan

nyid can/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /yul rnams thams cad rten pa'i gzhi/ /yang dag btsun mo'i b+ha ga der/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams/ /mngon par rab tu zhugs mdzad de/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i ngo

bo nyid/ /rab tu mi gnas dbyer med bzhugs/ /mdo dang gsang bar spyod pa'i tshul/ /don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang / /thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang / /dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas phyir/ /gsang sngags theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /

gsang ba bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud/ /shin du ches gsang rnal 'byor rgyud/ /rnal 'byor bla med gsang chen no/ /'di ni sku gsung thugs gsang ba/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rnams dang ni/ /rjod byed rang gi mtshan nyid de/ /phung po

khams dang skye mched sogs/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa ni/ /mkhas pa rnams la bsngags pa yin/ /rmongs pa de ltar 'dod pa rnams/ /skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa dang / /

rgyud gzhan rnams la nges bstan pa/ /rtag tu rten 'brel tshul de brjod/ /'bras bu rgyus ni rgyas btab cing / /rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gdab par/ /bsam gyi gzhal du dngos grub ni/ /bskal pa bye bar yang mi 'gyur/ /rgyud

kun la ni gsang chen gyi/ /snying po phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir/ /de nyid gsang ba yang dag par/ /mi phyed par ni bstan pa yin/ /sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa/ /sku yi gsang ba rtag pa nyid/ /sems can kun

gyi ngag la ni/ /gsung gi gsang ba rang byung du/ /sems can kun gyi snying la ni/ /thugs kyi gsang ba snying po bzhugs/ /de nyid snying po gsum ldan pa/ /bde gshegs snying po 'jug pa nyid/ /sems can sangs rgyas sgras

btags so/ /sku yi dngos grub snang ba'i dngos/ /mi zad sprul pas 'gro don spyod/ /gsung gi dngos grub brag cha ltar/ /brjod pa du ma'i sgra ru ston/ /thugs kyi dngos grub rtog pa'i tshogs/ /ye shes bde chen bsam

mi khyab/ /ting 'dzin sems kyi spyod pa ni/ /stong nyid ye shes dngos grub bo/ /de nyid byang chub sems rdo rje/ /bla ma nyid du bsdus pa yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /'dzin pas dug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /

dug nyid nye bar zhi gyur na/ /dag pas dug med byas pa yin/ /bdud rtsi rim gyis bsten na ni/ /bdud rtsi nyid du nges 'gyur yin/ /de nyid ngo bo yongs shes pas/ /rgyud 'dir lam du gyur pa yin/ /sngags 'dun
thabs dang shes rab ste/ /dbyer med de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /shes rab b+ha ga'i brdar brtags pas/ /dbyangs su brjod pa gsang ba'i tshul/ /A li bcu gnyis rten 'brel te/ /ma rig la sogs 'gag par

bstan/ /ro hi ta la sogs pa dang / /khyim ni bcu gnyis rlung dag ste/ /dus sbyor ba dang mtshungs pas na/ /lugs 'byung de nyid lugs bzlog par/ /de nyid yang dag rim pas bstan/ /kA li sum bcu rtsa bzhi po/ /

thabs kyi yi ge pha zhes brjod/ /mi gtsang rdzas ni sum bcu bzhi/ /dag pa byang sems rang bzhin te/ /khams ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i/ /de dag dag pas ye shes che/ /dag pa'i dus ni dpe byad dag /nyis 'gyur dag
gis bstan pa ste/ /thabs dang shes rab phrag gnyis bstan/ /A li shes rab ma ning bcas/ /'di dag mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis/ /cha gnyis rab tu dbye ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa/ /

kla zhes bya ba chu yin te/ /sla zhes bya ba sa yin no/ /l+la zhes bya ba me yin te/ /sh+la zhes bya ba rlung yin te/ /'byung bzhi'i dbye ba ma ning ste/ /ye shes dag pa chen po nyid/ /yang dag lam gsal phyogs tsam dang / /mi

gsal ba nyid rgyud las 'byung / /rkyen nyid tshogs gnyis rdzogs byed pa/ /bsod nams bla med 'bras bur 'gyur/ /gzhi ni khong na gnas pa'i don/ /sems can kun gyi lus la gnas/ /de yod pas na 'gro kun kyang / /

ye shes snying po can gyur pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu ru bshad/ /ma ning ye shes dag pa nyid/ /gnyis med ye shes 'bar ba yi/ /A li snang ba thabs kyi cha/ /mched pa ka sogs shes rab cha/ /ma ning thob

pa gnyis med pa'o/ /sbyor ba don gyi yi ge bzhi/ /sbas pa'i tshul du bstan pa'o/ /cha ni stong pa tsheg drag dang / /thig les brgyan pa bde ba che/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /kun du bzang po sems dpa'
ches/ /gsang ba zab dang rgya che ba'o/ /lhag pa'i gsang chen rgyud kyi don/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /khyad par nges shes bskyed don du/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa nges gsal ba'i/ /bla med

dgongs rgyud bshad du gsol/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa po/ /rdo rje 'chang ba tshul 'di dag /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don/ /gsang ba rin chen snying po gsungs/ /gsang chen gling gzhi'i khyad par dang / /rim pa

gleng slong gyur pa dang / /gsang bar bya ba'i gzhi gang dang / /gsang ba'i dam tshig nges pa dang / /gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang / /'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ji ltar bstan/ /gsang chen rnam bshad thabs dang ni/ /de nyid dang

'brel brjod bya gang / /rjod byed thun mong bstan pa'i tshul/ /lam la 'jug pa'i dbye ba dang / /gsang ba grub pa'i 'bras bu dang / /gsang ba lhag pa'i lam dang ni/ /gsang ba mchog gi spyod pa dang / /gsang chen rnam par

bsdu ba'i don/ /mi 'gyur rkyen gyis ldog bya dang / /dgag sgrub gsang chen 'byung ba'i tshul/ /phyogs dang thub pa'i rnam dbye ba'i/ /gsang ba 'di dag gnas shes bya/ /'di nyid 'jug pa'i tshul shes nas/ /grub pa

sgrub pa'i tshul spyod do/ /gsang ba rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dang po'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /dpal mchog gsang ba 'dzin pa yis/ /'dus

pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba zab pa'i rgyud 'di ru/ /spyod pa'i tshul 'di shes par bya/ /dang po'i sa ni pad ma ltar/ /ge sar kha dbye'i 'od 'bar ba'o/ /gnyis pa chu rgyun lta bu ste/ /dri ma sbyong zhing

'byed par 'gyur/ /gsum pa rab tu gsal ba yi/ /'gro ba'i snang ba ye shes sgron/ /bzhi pa ye shes 'od 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i snying po ltar 'char pa'o/ /lnga pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ /'dzag dang smyin cing

sdud pas sbyor/ /drug pa sgyu ma'i gzugs brnyan ltar/ /chos rnams rang bzhin shes pa'o/ /bdun pa lta ngan phyogs las ni/ /rgyal 'gyur seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin/ /ri bo mchog ltar ting 'dzin rgyal/ /ji srid rlung ni mi
rgyu dang / /snang ba mi g.yo bar gyur pas/ /bdag gi dngos por rab tu brtag /thabs ldan byang chub sems mchog gis/ /don mdzad 'khor los sgyur ba'i stobs/ /legs thob phyir mi ldog pa'i lam/ /sems dpa'

chen po bla ma nyid/ /ji srid sprin ni sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog dbyibs ni tha dad pa/ /mkha' dbyings dag tu 'byung 'gyur zhing / /deng nyid du ni ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad kyang / /snang ba gsum gyi rgyun
chad dngos/ /ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni/ /de nyid du ni rang thim 'gyur/ /snang ba gsum po dag pa'i lam/ /rin chen sprin gyis 'gro don du/ /bsam pa'i tshul gyis char pa 'bebs/ /'dod chags rnam

par dag pa'i dngos/ /de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i yul/ /'di ltar zhe sdang rnam par dag /de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/ /gang du gti mug dag pa'i ngang / /de ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /snang ba dag
pa'i yul gyur pa/ /thams cad 'od gsal ngang gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mngon 'dus pa'i/ /'od zer snang ba bsam gtan mes/ /dri ma ma lus sbyangs gyur pas/ /mngon par byang chub dag pa'o/ /ye

shes chen po'i dri ma med/ /snang ba med cing dngos med pa'i/ /ma 'dres 'od kyi snang ba 'gyed/ /pad mo rin chen ge sar las/ /nor bu sna tshogs sdong pos brgyan/ /ma rig mun sel chu bo'i rgyun/ /thabs dang shes

rab dbyer med pa/ /bde chen sa ni bcu gnyis pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas/ /rab tu mi gnas dngos med pa'o/ /zung 'jug chen po dag pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rtog med pa'i/ /sku gsum rdo rjer
gcig pa'i bdag /sar gyur pa ni bcu gsum pa/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/ /rang 'byung 'gyur ba med par bzhugs/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa gang / /dbang phyug brgyad ni dag pa'i dngos/ /sgom
pa'i lam ni 'di nyid du/ /lam gyi khyad par bstan pa'o/ /mthong lam yan lag bdun ldan pa/ /sku gsum rtogs phyir yan lag brjod/ /tshogs lam dang po dag la ni/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang / /

smyin byed dbang gis gzhi bzung bas/ /bum dbang lus ni lha ru ste/ /gsang dbang tshor ba bde ba nyid/ /gsum pa chos ni ye shes dran/ /bzhi pa sems ni 'od gsal du/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag phyir brjod/ /

tshogs lam bar pa nyid la ni/ /ting 'dzin ma skyes bskyed pa dang / /skyes pa brtan phyir bogs dbyung dang / /yang dag spong ba bzhi po dag /de nyid goms par byed pa la/ /dgag dang bsgrub pa'i phyogs gyur pa/ /

spangs thob rim par ldan par brjod/ /tshogs lam chen por gyur pa dag /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhir nges pa/ /chu rlung rdo rje mgon po yi/ /mA ma kI yi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /snying ga'i gnas su yang dag ldan/ /me
rlung pad ma mgon po yi/ /gos dkar mo yi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /gyen rgyu mgrin par brjod par bya/ /sa rlung rin chen mgon po yi/ /sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /thur sel gsang bar brjod pa

nyid/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor lte bar ni/ /las kyi mgon po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /me dang mnyam pa'i las shes bya/ /re re'ang lha mo bzhi bzhi ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa
yi/ /lam du rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis brjod/ /gnad ni rnam pa bzhi dag ste/ /lus dang dus dang yul dang ni/ /rlung gi gnad du shes par bya/ /dang po'i ye shes bla na med/ /pad ma ltar gsal rab 'bar

ba/ /sa ni thog mar mngon par bde/ /rgyu lam yan lag bdun ldan pa/ /'jug gnas rgyu lam rang bzhin bcas/ /dbang gis 'jug dang rang byin brlab/ /phyi nang gsang ba mchog tu gyur/ /'bru gsum e ba~M ma yar

bcas/ /'bras bu snying po phyag rgya che/ /rang bzhin med pa dag pa'i dbyings/ /'od gsal mngon par byang chub pa/ /tshad med snying rje bsdu dngos kyis/ /nges par rab gang mi dmigs pa'o/ /sems can sna tshogs

'dul don du/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni yang dang yang / /sems bskyed gyur pas lam sbyangs te/ /mdzad pa du ma'i cho 'phrul rnams/ /rgyun mi 'chad phyir sems bskyed pa'o/ /dri med sems ni rnam kun du/ /rang rig
ye shes thog med pas/ /'gag pa med cing skye med kyang / /sems can don du 'khor zhing lding / /byang chub sems ni mi zad pa/ /de phyir phrin las rgyun mi 'chad/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pas/ /kun
mkhyen ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings/ /gdul bya'i khams dang 'thun par 'jug /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgyu 'phrul gar/ /de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes brjod/ /rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /yon tan

du mas rab brgyan cing / /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang / /ye shes skus ni gzhan don phyir/ /snang ba'i 'od 'byed dag pa'i don/ /rtag tu bde ba can du bzhugs/ /bde ba chen po dbyer med cing / /thabs dang shes rab mi

phyed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das/ /kha sbyar sbyor ba gsang ba che/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /me tog dang ni de yi dri/ /dbyer med rten dang brten par gnas/ /mchog tu dag pa bdag med pa/ /sku

gsum tha dad bstan pa ni/ /gdul bya'i dbang la gyur pa yin/ /khyad par yan lag nges par ni/ /sku gsum gcig tu bsdus pa'i don/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen mchog /'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa zhes/ /

thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa yin/ /sbyor ba'i lam las yan lag bcu/ /rlung gi gnas su brjod par bya/ /rtsa ba'i rlung lnga dbang po lnga/ /stobs lnga de yi khyad par te/ yan lag rlung gi gnas pa yin/ /snga ma'i
go rim la ltos nas/ /khyad par gong du 'phel ba sten/ /dad pa la sogs chos rnams yin/ /'bras bu'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsang ba ye shes stobs bcur ni/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa sogs/ /khyad

par thob pa bstan pa'o/ /mthar phyin lam ni rnam gnyis te/ /slob pa'i zung 'jug dang po yin/ /rang rang rig tu bcas pa yi/ /tha dad med pa'i bde ba'i lam/ /rang bzhin dag pa gzugs kyi sku/ /blo bur dri ma rnam
bsal ba/ /mnyam rjes khyad par gang gyur pa/ /rtog pa sbyang ba sems mngon gyur/ /'dir ni ngo bo nyid med pa/ /de nyid chos rnams chos nyid de/ /de ni yang dag mi slu ba/ /de rtogs

sangs rgyas yin zhes brjod/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes lam/ /sangs rgyas snying po byang chub sems/ /stong nyid seng ge'i nga ro yis/ /log par lta ba'i tshogs skrag mdzad/ /de las snang ba med pa'i dbyings/ /

sku gsum yongs su 'byung dang po/ /mi slob zung 'jug gnyis pa ste/ /dbyer med rig ma'i skyes bur bcas/ /rgyas btab drug ldan bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rol par 'char/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ste/ /

sems nyid 'od gsal snying po nyid/ /chos sku dri ma med pa las/ /lus sbyangs ye shes ro gcig pa/ /rdul bral cing grol med pa nyid/ /ting 'dzin mnyam nyid tha dad med/ /byang chub mchog ces bstan pa yin/ /'od

gsal de nyid dus kun du/ /chos nyid dang ni bsam gtan dang / /lam du byed pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /brgyal dang gnyid dang snyoms 'jug ste/ /thams cad du ni 'gyur ba med/ /rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis ster/ /sa bon rkyen

dang phrad pa bzhin/ /myu gu rten 'brel tshogs las 'byung / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sa dang lam rnam par nges pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi/ /yi ge gnas kyi ston pa po/ /shrI gnyis med ye

shes mchog grub pa/ /bde legs kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i/ /dpal ldan rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ /shes rab snying rje dbyer med pa'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po bla na med/ /mthar thug chos rnams rab 'jug pa/ /sgyu ma'i rol pa bsam mi

khyab/ /byang chub sems las kun du 'byung / /bde ba mchog las mchog grub pa/ /'khor 'das spang thob med pa nyid/ /srid zhi mnyam pa nyid rtog pa/ /byang chub sems kyi spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam/ /bde don

spros med ngang du 'dus/ /khams gsum rlung las sprul pa ni/ /rnam par shes pa yul la 'jug /de las bdag dang gzhan du rtog /rten bcas rang stong g.yo ba yin/ /'dir ni rlung sems 'dres pa las/ /snang ba gsum gyi rang

bzhin 'char/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyis bdag dang gzhan/ /tha dad mi rtog spyad pa bya/ /kun gyi bla mar gyur pa ni/ /mchog gi phyag rgya chen po'i gnas/ /kun rdzob snang ba sna tshogs pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rang stong pa/ /gnas gsum

tshul ni rgyud gzhan las/ /snying po 'od gsal mngon byang chub/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i yul las gzhan/ /ting 'dzin nges par 'dir bstan pa'o/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsang chen rgyal po zung 'jug lam/ /

sku gsum dbyer med nam mkha'i ngang / /ye shes tha snyad las 'das pa'o/ /yon tan rdzogs shing kun dbang sgyur/ /mchog ldan rgyal po mdzes shing 'bar/ /zab dang rgya che gnyis su med/ /rang gzhan gnyis med chen po

yin/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dgongs pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du rnam bshad pa/ /lha mo rnams dang skyes bu yi/ /gsang ba'i rgyud 'dir gnyis med brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba

'dus pa las gnyis su med par ston pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi gnas nges par bstan pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes gtan la phab pa zhes

bya ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// // brtag pa gnyis pa rnam par nges pa gsal ba zhes bya ba ste gsang ba'i dpal mchog chen po ye shes kyi de kho na nyid rab tu brjod pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sku gsum

mchog tu brtag pa nyid/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum gyi ngang / /brtan zhing mchog tu bzang po che/ /snying po byang chub bla med pas/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rnam pa gsal zhing dag pa'i sku/ /

bsdus pa'i pho brang rgya che bas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' dag /gcig tu gtso bor gyur pa'o/ /khyab par snang mdzad dkon mchog dpal/ /'od dpag med dang gdon mi za/ /rigs kyi dbye ba lnga ru brjod/ /spyan dang mA ma kI

mchog dang / /gos dkar mo dang sgrol byed ma/ /mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi/ /gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo bzhi/ /bar khyams gnas pa grwa bzhir dgod/ /byams pa sa yi snying po dang / /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /'jig

rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sgrib sel kun du bzang po ste/ /sems dpa' brgyad ni lha khyams la/ /khro rgyal bzhi dang ldan pas na/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga nang du dgod/ /phyi khyams dag la khro rgyal drug /de ltar sum cu rtsa gcig

gis/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yin/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba/ /tshangs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /sum bcu gsum par gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid ye shes ston pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid du mngon par brjod pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mi dmigs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams du mar snang ba'i dngos/ /ljon shing 'bras bu ldan pa bzhin/ /phra ba'i dbye ba shes par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du gzigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i spyod tshul kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
gnas med gnas pa'i mkha' lta bur/ /mi rtog rang byung 'od gsal ba/ /don dam dmigs med ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes

'bar bas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba dag par sdom pa'i ngo bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos rnams dngos

med cing / /ngo bo nyid dag ye shes sku/ /bden pa 'dis ni khyab par byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid

ye shes gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba skyug bro rmongs pa can/ /rab rib ldan pa'i rtog pa nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho ltar mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpag med ye shes rgyal mtshan tog /yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po las/ /rang bzhin bde chen gnas mchog 'grub/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha'i lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba ma lus

kun gyi gsang / /ye shes rol pa bde ba che/ /tha dad spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas gzigs pa dag pa'i dbyings kun nas sprin

gyi snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /tshad med bde ba'i char 'bebs pa/ /rang 'byung ye shes rgyal po nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa rdzogs pa dpal rgyal po bden pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo kun tu 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rgyal ba ma lus pa'i/ /ye shes sku ste skyon med pa/ /bsam pa blo yi yul las snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med

pa'i dpal rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun snang ye shes cir mi rtog /nam mkha'i

dri med mtha' khyab stong / /rnam rtog ye shes me 'bar sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rdo rje dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi zhing khams rin po che'i sprin kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri ma med pa dag pa'i zhing / /pad mo rgyas pa snang ba'i dbyings/ /rin chen

'od 'phro mi zad dang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sra ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rol pa ston pa'i dpal rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas 'od

kyi phreng ba dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sems su gcig /de nyid ye shes dag pa'i ngang / /dbyer

med rtag pa'i tshul mchog ste/ /bde gshegs gsang ba 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog spyan yangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' dbang dam pa rnam par 'phrul ba dri ma med pa'i

dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes dbyings/ /gsang ba 'gro snying rnam dag pas/ /blang dor med pa'i bde ba thob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par dbyes pa'i sku'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kun du sgrogs pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i dba' rlabs kun/ /dbu mar gcig tu thim gyur pas/ /ye shes rgyas pa'i snying po dbye/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa

chos kyi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i ye shes 'byung ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du seng ge'i rtsal gyis ni/ /zil gyis

gnon pa rdo rje zhes/ /yongs su bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba'i yon tan 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i yon tan

du ma ston pa mi gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun nas snang ba med pa'i ngang / /rtog pas bskyod par mi 'gyur ba/ /mnyam nyid ye shes lhang nge bzhugs/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i rol pa sna tshogs su ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung ba rnams dang srog bcas dang / /mi zad rtsa lcug ma lus kun/ /de bzhin nyid las snang ba yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun

tu 'od mi zad pa'i rin chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i mig rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lus can thams cad la/ /gdul

bya dus la bab gyur na/ /nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung nas/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas der ston mdzad ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dkon pa'i tog rang 'byung du 'char ba'i ye shes rol ba rdo rje
