zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rang 'byung ston pa po/ /ye shes 'jug pa 'bad med par/ /thob bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rang rig rang las rnyed par

'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma phan par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun du ston cing 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dag /gdul bya'i blo yis mthong bar byed/ /de nyid bsam pa'i tshul gyis 'byung zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje

'dzin/ /tshe 'dis 'grub gyi gzhan du min/ /lus ngag yid ni legs gnas pa/ /med par 'grub par mi 'gyur gsungs/ /gsung gcig rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyal po che/ /

'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyun mi 'chad/ /'di med rol pa rgyu med 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa nyer bsten pa/ /zhen med ye shes longs spyod pa/ /bde bar bstan pas sangs rgyas 'thob ces gsungs te/ yang dag pa'i longs spyod pa'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las shin du bde ba
chen po'i gnas mngon par ston pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mi zad pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byed pa

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha'i gnas mi 'gyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dmigs pa kun bral ba'i/ /snying rje chen po'i 'od zer

gyis/ /yul rnams sgyu mar spyad par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag med gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi

snying po gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du stong nyid chos kyi sku/ /de nyid snying rje dbyer mi phyed/ /'bras bu snying po byang chub sems/ /ye shes tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gdugs khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro

ba ma lus kun gyi snying / /mi shigs ye shes gcig pur bzhugs/ /'gro 'ong med cing khyab par 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes stobs mchog seng ge'i

sku can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dus gsum du/ /phyogs bcu'i

sems can ma lus la/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa'i blo can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis

khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams gsum skye 'gyur lus can gyi/ /lus ngag sems ni mi dmigs par/ /

byang chub snying por dbang bskur mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' ba'i blo can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par rtogs pa'i

dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dbang / /rtag cing khyab pa'i tshul du bskur/ /de nyid rnam dag dbang bskur mchog /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po mi zad pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'tsho ba ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /glang chen myos 'dra'i spyod spangs nas/ /bar snang bya bzhin rjes chags med/ /thams cad dus su snyoms par spyad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod snyoms spyod pa dran par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du grong khyer rgyu ba sogs/ /sna tshogs

spyod lam bag yod pas/ /dran pas ma yengs gzhan don phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di spyad pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen thob sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam rnam par dag pa'i dpal zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'gro dang 'chag pa dang / /nyal dang zas kyi dus la sogs/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang las ni/ /ma yengs tshul bzhin spyad par bya zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshul

bzhin ma yin rnam spangs nas/ /bag med gnas las bzlog par bya/ /'di ni ye shes bdud rtsi yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rnam par dag pa'i dpal sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa dag pa'i snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lus sems bde gnas shing / /ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /dkar

po'i chos la spyod par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos/ /chud mi za ba nges 'byung phyir/ /shin du dag tshe sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de nyid phra ba rtogs par dka'/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshul bzhin ma yin

rnam spangs nas/ /bag med gnas las bzlog par bya/ /'di ni ye shes bdud rtsi yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi nges pa'i lta ba yang dag pa dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dag pa'i 'bras bu bde ba ste/ /ma dag pa las srid par ltung / /rnam par nges pas

ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i lam rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges 'byung lam/ /de ni thar ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ /rang sems dag pa tshul khrims mchog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rab rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams mi zad pa'i gter 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bla na med

pa'i nor bu ni/ /zhen med ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /kun du longs spyod rang las 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro

ba skyob pa dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub ye shes nam mkha' ltar/ /bdag med phung po la sogs stong / /stong nyid sgyu mas snying rjer gnas/ /de nyid

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thugs yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sangs rgyas thugs ni chos kyi dbyings/ /'gyur ba med cing kun rtog bral/ /mi g.yo mtshan ma med pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro

ba'i gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi shes nyon mongs nad kyis gzer/ /de sel dam pa'i bdud rtsi bstan/ /bla med thugs rje'i sman gyis gso/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen po nor 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'phags pa rnams kyis sbyangs pa'i lam/ /nang las byung gi phyi las min/ /de nyid 'bras bu mchog las skyes/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi tshul byin gyis rlobs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni khyad par byin rlob cing / /dpag med bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /

dus drug tu ni byin rlob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /gnyis med ye shes dag pa las/ /ci ste min na ldog pa ltar/ /de bas sdug bsngal brgyud ma las/ /mthar phyin sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /

mkhas pa dag ni ye shes spyod/ /ji ltar chu yi thigs pa ni/ /rgya mtshor bab na lan tshwar gyur/ /lan tshwa 'o ma'i mtshor zhugs pas/ /de nyid slar yang bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi longs spyod pa'o/ /

rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas

kun gyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpag med stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /bdag po de nyid kun 'dus pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos byin gyis rlob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu srid pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa rnams/ /so so'i rig pa'i rtsal gyis ni/ /snying po gcig par shes par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa med pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i dbyangs kyis 'gro ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du zhing khams sbyong ba dang / /gang du 'gro ba 'dul ba dag /nam mkha'i dbyings

kyis kun du brdung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang byung stong nyid sgra/ /gdul bya mos pa'i snang ba la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis kun du bsgrags/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa bde gnas dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i gnas mi phyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams zag med 'od gsal ba/ /skye

ba med cing shin du phra/ /mtshan nyid dngos pos stong pa'i chos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa 'byung ba

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs sems can sems rgyud ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rang stong pas/ /mi phyed ye shes gnas pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

kun du ma smin smin byed dang / /smin pa grol phyir 'bad pa ste/ /ye shes spyod pa byang chub che/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen rgyal ba kun du rtog pa nges par sel

ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po mi rtag skad cig ma/ /de nyid slu ba'i chos can phyir/ /'dzin pa med pa'i gnas shes bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong

ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa'i dngos/ /dbu ma ye shes rtog bral bas/ /mtha' las 'das pa zung du 'jug /gsang ba gnyis med tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad skye ba med/ /chos gang 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /rnam par rtog pa rab zhi ba/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla

med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtog pa'i dra ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /rtog pa med cing

dmigs med pas/ /mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i sku/ /snying po byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i gdul dka' ba spangs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes

'brug sgra'i dbyangs sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying po rdo rje stong nyid dang / /dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag /rtog pa med cing dmigs

med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i stobs rims nad med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du nad rnams bya ba'i gzhi/ /las dang nyon mongs rtog las spyad/ /de nyid gnas las dag par bya/ /thams cad ye shes spyod pas sbyong zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par snang ba'i dpal sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi ljon shing dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi sdom pa mchog /gsang ba zab dang rgya che'i dbyings/ /spang blang med par grol ba nyid/ /gnyug ma byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

ye shes kyi snying po don sgyu 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /gcig las du mar snang byed cing / /de nyid du mar yongs

sprul pa/ /sgyu 'phrul byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan 'dzin pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung ba rnams dang khams gsum dang / /rnam shes ye shes khams 'dus pa/ /rten dang brten pa sbyang bar bya/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa skyes bus byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma'i snang ba kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa dag pas snang

ba dag /rang lus dag pas rnam shes dag /ye shes spyod pas rnam par sbyang / /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog yin zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul zla ba'i snang ba zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rmi lam dag par ni/ /rdo rje blo yis rnam par sbyang / /de nyid ye shes rgyal ba yis/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje phal cher sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba pad mo rnam par rol pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

zhing khams kun gyi snang ba'i gnas/ /rin chen 'od kyis rnam par spras/ /sgyu ma tsam du ston pa nyid/ /snying po ye shes gzhir gyur pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi zhing ma lus par bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho sprin tshogs las/ /dus gsum kun tu dge ba yi/ /zhing khams ye shes 'od kyi

sku/ /chos rnams sems kyi snang las 'byung zhes gsungs so/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug bcom ldan gyis/ /ye shes spyod pas bsgrub pa yi/ /lhan cig spyod pa bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar mi

gnas nam mkha' ni/ /khyab cing mtshan nyid med pa nyid/ /don dam de nyid dmigs med de/ /brjod pa spangs pa stong pa che/ /mi shigs gsang ba bla na med/ /kun du bzang po zhes grags pa/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug

phyag rgya che/ /ye shes rtag pas chos kyi sku/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan gang / /rnam pa gsal bar 'char ba ltar/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas ye shes ni/ /snang ba me long lta bur brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi/ /ye shes rang rig gzhan rig pa/ /tha dad med par thugs chud pas/ /de nyid mnyam nyid ye shes brjod/ /gdod nas dag cing skye ba med/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes la/ /so sor rtog

pa zhes brjod do/ /kun nas ma lus sangs rgyas kyi/ /mdzad pa sna tshogs la spyod pas/ /bde bar gshegs gnas cig mdzad pas/ /khyab pa nan tan ye shes brjod/ /gang tshe nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/ /thams

cad las grol de yi tshe/ /rnal 'byor mchog thob rdo rje 'dzin/ /shin du rnam dag ye shes brjod/ /mchog gyur rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas ni/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pas/ /rab tu mi gnas ye shes gzhi/ /dam tshig

shin du 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rang byung dri ma med pa ni/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis/ /gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid/ /mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bsam mi khyab pa nyid kyis gcod/ /

rtog pa'i dri ma'i dra ba yis/ /rin chen sems ni dri mar byas/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid/ /dri ma bral phyir sangs rgyas brjod/ /ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyis

gsang chen gyi gnas yongs su brjod pa la rab tu dga' ba'i don ched du brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med

pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad stong pa mi 'gyur che/ /ye shes dam pa ston

pa pos/ /kun du gsang ba bka' stsal to/ /dam chos snying po bcud las byung / /sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul/ /shes rab thabs ni tshul thob byed/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams

dang / /'dod yon kun la sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad longs spyod tshul gcig pas/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bshad do/ /mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs sku ste mtshan nyid med/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyis sprul pas na/ /sprul pa'i sku zhes 'dir bshad yin/ /phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub phyir/ /shes nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgom/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /rgyal ba chos sku ye shes nyid/ /bla

ma'i byin brlabs skad cig gis/ /ye shes mi zad rgya mtsho ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi phyed rdo rje dbang phyug nyid/ /gnyis med mnyam par ro gcig pas/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rang byung du/ /grub pa bde chen ngo bo nyid/ /thob

med thob pas gcig car grol/ /spangs thob med pa mnyam nyid che/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gnas 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i rdo rje ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /snying po ye shes bde chen po/ /byang chub sten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa stobs mi zad pa sred med kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbyangs kun du bskul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag med dngos po

med pa ru/ /ma skyes zag pa med pa'i ngang / /spros pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba skyob dbul po nges pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po'i

rtsal thog pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de/ /rang sems zla ba kun da ltar/ /sa

bon gnas te rgyu yi cha/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa ye shes mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i mdzod rdo rje dbyings zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs/ /rab tu mi gnas brjod med pa/ /byang chub sems su gcig pas na/ /thams cad dbyer med dag par brjod/ /

ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i nor bu'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag

nyid gang / /stong gsum 'jig rten rang gi lus/ /phyi nang gnyis med ye shes che/ /gsang ba zab pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tog gi 'od zer sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi snying po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba skyob pa'i don du ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can cho 'phrul gyis/ /gdul bya ye shes lam

la bkod/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi mchod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mkha' lding rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du byams pa'i 'od kyis ni/ /'gro ba kun la khyab par bya/ /des ni dpag med gzhan don du/ /mtshungs med ye shes gnas thob pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa dpal gyi snying po sbas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byams pas bdud dpung 'joms mdzad

cing / /snying rje g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyis phyir mi ldog /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes rdo rje'i

stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen 'bar ba glog gi 'od/ /dri med chu shel zer 'bab pas/ /tha mal lus ni rgyal bar bsgyur/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes don grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rigs sna tshogs su ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du

lha mo bye ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig tshogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brgya dang / /bde gshegs stong sogs tshul 'dir bstan zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lhun po brtsegs pa

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po sgyu ma'i rol pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos/ /ngo bo nyid dag rang byung ba/ /bdag

med ye shes gnas med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' 'dul ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas la spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mchog tu sa yi mthar thug pa/ /bcu gsum ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /bde ba'i 'byung gnas bla na med/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i 'od

zer rnam par rol pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas mi zad pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mnyam nyid ye shes dang / /'gro ba'i bla ma chos don gyis/ /

tshad med thugs rjes yongs su bsdu/ /de nyid mi rtog gsang ba'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas chos kyi sgra 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bsdud cing spro ba dang / /mtshan bcas dmigs pa med pa ru/ /ye shes rgyal la phyag rgyas btab/ /'di ni dag pa'i don ston pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grogs rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba nges par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis

nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang ba til 'bru bzhin/ /sems can smin cing grol byed pas/ /ye shes mngon par bsdus pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyon mongs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phro

ba'i sprin bkod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dngos dang dngos med pas/ /mi phyed ye shes bde ba che/ /sna tshogs 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang / /ye shes phyag rgya chen por

bstan zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam bu'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

nam mkha'i khams kyi spyod yul bas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mi dmigs bzhin/ /don dam thob tu med pa'i don/ /gzhi med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzang rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi snying po'i 'od zer kun nas rgyas pas lta ngan skrag par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan gzhi med/ /gang du ro mnyam zung 'jug

pas/ /dbyer med rtogs pa rgyal po che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor rangs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su 'gro ba ston pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi g.yo 'gyur ba med pa las/ /de bzhin nyid du bstan pa yis/ /'jug cing 'byung ba gsang ba che/ /snying po ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde grags dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos grub snying po bdud rtsi'i bcud/ /grub pa'i

bla ma'i gdams pa las/ /thob 'gyur de bas gzhan du min/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mdzad pa'i sna tshogs gdul don du/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par/ /

phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul dag gis/ /theg pa mchog tu yongs grags pa'i/ /rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyur 'di/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i/ /thugs kyi snying po gsang ba yin/ /sku dang gsung gi rdo rje 'dir/ /snying po kun du 'dus pa'i phyir/ /

rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spros/ /'dir ni sngon chad bstan pa'ang med/ /ma 'ongs pa na'ang 'byung bar dka'/ /de bas gsang chen rnyed dka' bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten du/ /'byung bar 'gyur ram ma byon yang / /gsang

ba'i yi ge rnam dag pa/ /'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i gnas/ /gsang chen rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid/ /dpal mchog 'di ni bsdus pa'i tshul/ /ye shes chen po'i tshul bstan pa'o

zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gsang ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar dka' bar gdams shing bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

srid mtha' gzigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis srid pa'i chu klung skems pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni srid pa'i dra ba dag /rnam par gcod cing ye shes

mes/ /sdug bsngal gnas 'di bsreg par bya/ /de nyid bde ba kun gyi gnas zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgra can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i ri bo 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa sna tshogs las bcas pa/ /g.yeng bas sdug bsngal phung por gyur/ /de bsal ye shes byang chub sems/ /blang dor med pa'i ngang du gnas zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du phyag rgyas rgyas

btab pas/ /mi phyed ye shes bdag nyid gyur/ /de nyid phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas/ /thams cad sdom par shes par bya zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan seng ge'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos

kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems rgyud sna tshogs chos nyid gcig par gyur/ /de nyid ngang la dag pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog /dbyer

med byang chub sems kyi snang ba las/ /gsang ba bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan dgyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam rtog gi ri bo 'joms pa

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rtog las rnams byung ba/ /de nyid 'joms pa'i rdo rje ni/ /stong nyid bde chen byang chub sems/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du byams pa'i

ting 'dzin gyis/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i don gang spyod/ /sna tshogs ngo bo nyid med pas/ /de nyid mi dmigs tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes

la rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po snang med pa/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don/ /gnas med bden gnyis dbyer med pa/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa mi 'gyur ba dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba dbyings/ /thos bsam bsgom pas rtogs dka' ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes dag pa che/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'i zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gsang ba rdo rje dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam dag 'od gsal dri ma med/ /ma skyes nam mkha'i

bdag nyid kyis/ /sgyu ma dngos las rnam grol byed/ /de nyid tshul 'di bshad pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer snang ba'i ngos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi glu'i dbyangs rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi bdag nyid can/ /'dus byas rtog las rnam grol ba/ /'dus ma byas pa rdo rje'i ngang / /de nyid dag pa'i tshul

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod spu ldan pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/ /dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /'du 'bral med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub gdul bya la ster bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir
ni so so rang rig pa/ /ye shes rgyun chad med pa'i lam/ /de nyid lam du bsgom pa'i mchog /bsam gtan ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi na bza' mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nor bu'i snying po bsam 'phel bzhin/ /rtog med bsam pa rdzogs byed pa/ /rang

byung chos kyi sgra ston pas/ /mi gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog rdo rje'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid dang zhi bar mi gnas pa/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dam pa'i dbyings/ /sku gsum lam gyi ye shes bcas/ /sa gsum dag pa'i dbang phyug thob ces gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bkod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che sna tshogs pa'i mdangs bkod pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rjes su dran pa'i gnas ni mthong ba'i lam/ /ye shes skad cig dga' ba bcu drug las/ /phyi nang gnas pas 'od gsal don rtogs pa/ /stong nyid rang 'byung rnam dag tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang chen seng ge'i nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i rgya mtsho mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs snang ba du mar 'char ba nyid/ /

yul ni sgyu ma dngos po gdod nas dag /dag pa'i ngo bo chos dbyings nam mkha' che/ /sems snang rol pa gsang ba 'dir bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang

ba rmad du byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma btsal ma spangs ngang gis dag pa'i sku/ /rnyed par mi 'gyur rab 'byams bde ba che/ /bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ni lhun grub pa/ /byang chub sems

chen gsang ba theg pa'i mchog ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba mtshan rab 'bar ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams/ /sems can kun gyi lus la nges par bzhugs/ /dbri bsnan med par 'char bas gsal bar byed/ /de nyid sbas pa'i don du tshul 'di bstan zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gzhal yas khang nye bar brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang / /tshad med

bkod pas rab spras pa/ /rgyan rnams bye brag mtha' yas tshogs/ /snang ba de nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma dmod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma'i chos rnams mkha' lta bur/ /dag pa'i ye shes rang srog go/ /snying gi pad ma sad par bya/ /de las ye shes blo rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de dag kun gyi gsang / /ye shes dam pa mchog grub pa/ /gsang chen
ye shes lam 'di yis/ /'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa

nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba chen po'i ye shes kyi don gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i 'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i ye shes la

dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes mchog tu gsang ba gang / /de nyid bsdus par gyur pa ste/ /rtog pa'i dra ba gcod mdzad yin/ /

de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sangs rgyas 'od zer snang bas khyab/ /de nyid 'dom gang 'od ni dba' rlabs gnyis/ /gnyis med gcig tu dag pas dbu ma nyid/ /dbyer med ye shes tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi shing mchog la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen brtan pa'i ljon pa'i shing / /de nyid byang chub sems las byung / /skyes pa sems bskyed rten gyur pas/ /rang byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o/
zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thos chen po rnams kyis dpag par dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
zab pa shin tu zhi ba'i gnas/ /rdul med rnyog pa med pa'i thugs/ /bsam gtan rdo rje tshad med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal rgyal po

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thos dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis brtag par dka' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / gnas pa med pa'i gnas
gyur pa/ /khyu mchog chen po byang chub sems/ /rang gzhan mi phyed mi dmigs pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa kha lo sgyur ba sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi gnas rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i rgyun 'di mya ngan 'das/ /de nyid spang du med
pas na/ /ye shes shes rab rab gnas pas/ /dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes phyir mi 'ong ba rnams

kyis rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang phyir ldog pa med pa'i sems/ /'di ni ye shes chen po'i ngang / /bla na med pa snying po'i sku/ /de bzhin

nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug na rin po che'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams gsum snang ba sems yin phyir/ /sems de stong nyid rgyu med pas/ /gang du dri med gzhan don 'byung / /'di ni tshul chen gsang ba yin zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa snyems bral sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa rnams kyis

dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du zag med 'byung ba med/ /khams dang dbang po yul med par/ /shin du dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lus kyi kun du spyod pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul snang ba bstan nas 'dul byed pa/ /rang 'byung bsam gtan thob ste ltos med pa/ /gsang ba 'dir gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba tshangs pas dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma med cing mtha' med

pas/ /srid rtser mi gnas dbang phyug che/ /dngos po med cing rtag pa che/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas brgya byin gyis

dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du ma 'khrug rtog pa med/ /ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi yul/ /gzugs sogs yul ni rtog tu med/ /thams cad dag pa'i tshul bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lha drag pos dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyon mongs

'ching ba dag pa yi/ /sred len rkyen grol log pas na/ /dmigs med ye shes gsang ba nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dga' ba'i rtog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba khyab 'jug

gis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang nas gang du khyab bya ngo bos stong / /thams cad bdag med stong pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /sems can khams med 'jug

par mi gnas pas/ /ye shes chen po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan lha'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba lha ma yin rnams kyi dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sa 'og sa steng dang / /sa bla rnams su bstan pa yi/ /dngos grub bdud rtsi thob byed pas/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal na

tshod bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba klu rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku/ /dug med gdug pa rnam

bral bas/ /skyon med gtsang ba'i rang bzhin can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa mngon par rol pa srin mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag med mnyam pa nyid thob pas/ /grub pa med pa'i gnas la ni/ /'chi med ye shes tshul mchog gis/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rin chen phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa ye shes nam mkha'i bu mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mkha' la spyod 'gro ba'i/ /gya gyur spyod pa'i ye shes can/ /

de nyid de zhes rnam brtags pas/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba thams cad kyi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

rin chen gter 'chang mdzod po che/ /nor gyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas/ /de nyid sa dbang bde gshegs rgyal/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gnas pa'i dpal

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa 'jig rten pa thams cad dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi skye dgu'i chos las dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /skyes bu chen po thams cad kyi/ /ye shes gnas ni mnyam med pas/ /rang gzhan mi phyed byang chub che/ /sems dpa' tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /gang du 'gro la gnas gyur pa'i/ /

gsang chen 'dir ni gnas gyur na/ /gang la'ang dri mar mi 'gyur zhing / /dgag par bya ba ci yang med/ /las rnams thams cad byas kyang ni/ /rang byung skur ni rnam par grol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dag pa'i skyes bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchod rten 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med ye shes dag
pa'i gnas/ /rin chen phung po gsal ba yi/ /dang zhing yid 'phrog 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /sa le sgrib med tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par skye ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mngon par 'byung ba 'phags pa'i lam/ /nyes pa spangs pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /
rnam par mthor gshegs 'og min te/ /zab pa brjod med tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po mthong ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgyal ba'i gnas shes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /chos kun mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa/ /dri med tshul
'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/ /mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun rtog pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig dang
du ma'i rang bzhin gnas/ /cher mi g.yo ba rang bzhin med/ /rtsol med 'byung ba dag pa yi/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta chen po

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe byed las 'das pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcom ldan so so rang rig pa/ /gtso bo dpe bral ye shes te/ /
bdag po kun 'gro kun khyab pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po mi dmigs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byed pa po dang 'phrog pa'ang med/ /'di ni dpal ldan rang byung sems/ /dngos
po gsal dang mi gsal mdzad/ /ye shes snang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba bkod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chen po bla na med pa bde ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis med gnyis las grol ba yi/ /ye shes rang las skye bar 'gyur/ /de nyid mngon rgyu spong byed pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdegs par mdzad pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad snang ba yang dag pa rdo rje gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med pa sgom pa min/ /dngos por yang dag bsgom du med/ /gang du ro mnyam mchog gi dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi

glang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa 'di/ /'jigs pa med pa'i ngang gnas na/ /

bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'od 'phro'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes blo gros mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba

'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes rab mkha' la rnam par gnas/ /snying rjes sad pa'i mda' yis ni/ /bde ba chen po'i rnam par 'bigs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshan rnam par grol ba'i dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems dang shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ /

rnam grol mtha' la mi gnas pa'o/ /dgos pa kun gyi 'ching ba bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen spos bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje mi

zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis med bde ba mchog tu zhi/ /mkha' mnyam rtog pa las grol ba/ /gnyis med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos bstan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gnas pa che/ /brtan g.yo dag pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /dbyer med tshul 'di dag pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag

shul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud dpung thams cad pham par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa ngan pas brtags pa yi/ /phyi rol yul

ni rdzas stong pas/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam dag nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nor bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dra ba gcod pa rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po gcig nyid kyi/ /nang du snod bcud dngos po'i chos/ /kun rdzob bden pas stong pa'i phyir/ /'dus pa
der gnas tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang pos byin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab skems par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gnyis med ngang gnas pa/ /rang bzhin brtag tshogs rab zhi bas/ /snang gsum ye shes dag gyur pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma sangs rgyas srid pa'i tshang tshing 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi rol nga rgyal log bcom ste/ /ye shes

gcig pu bdag dag pas/ /rang byung bsam pa rnam par dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis log rtog 'joms pa'i ri bo rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun tu rtog pa rab spangs nas/ /'dod chags chags bral ye shes las/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ gsang ba tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur/ /'dir nyid tha dad rtog min zhing / /gzugs dang rnam thar sgo thim pas/ /chos rgyun thob phyir bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba rtags dang bcas 'byung ba/ /

gang yin mtshan ma spangs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /rang byung ngo bo ye shes bdag nyid de/ /rtogs pas stong pa'i bde ba mi zad yin/ /rlung gi rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug pa na/ /bde ba rang sems ngo bo dam pas ni/ /tshim 'gyur de

las gzhan du g.yo mi 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid gnas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dam pa'i mdzod chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bstan pa'i don to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi 'gyur ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba dri ma med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs kun 'dus pa yi/ /sangs rgyas spro bsdu'i 'khor lo yis/ /rtse mor gyur pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa legs par skyes pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chos rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang byung ye shes zhi ba'i

dngos/ /dag pa rnam dben mngon par 'byung / /phun sum tshogs pa lam gyur gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dpe med pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba

rigs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lha dang lha mo dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dpag med pa/ /ye shes las skyes mtshungs med pa/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /gdug pa can rnams gdul bya'i phyir/ /snying rjes gtum pa'i nga ro yis/ /tshar gcad pa nyid bla med bsgral/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden

pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha dang lha min lto 'phye dang / /
grul bum la sogs sna tshogs pas/ /bstod cing mchod pa'i ye shes gnas/ /rin chen 'khor lo brjod pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub chen po sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi ye shes rin po che'i nor bu rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nas ye shes nor bu ni/ /sna tshogs 'dod pa don byed pa/ /dpag med

yon tan 'byung ba'i dbyings/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad ma'i phreng ba rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'dam skyes me tog dang / /chu skyes pad ma gsal ba yang / /'bar ba kha phye 'od khyab pas/ /dag pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las kyi ral gri rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rtog pa gcod pa dag /

rnam par bdud tshogs rab 'joms pas/ /ye shes me 'od rgyas pa yis/ /kun du rgyas pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs

'dul ba rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i drung / /gsang ba mi zad mchod pa'i gzhi/ /de nyid kun du khyab byed pas/ /

gsang ba dag pa'i mchod pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sku yi 'dul ba mtha' yas pa/ /sna tshogs zhing khams spyod mdzad pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sbyin pa

'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni brjod pa kun gyi gzhi/ /thabs dang shes rab sgra rnams las/ /sna tshogs

skad du chos ston pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /dag par byed pa khrus yin te/ /sgrib pa 'phyag byed spyod lam du/ /thal sbyar 'dud pas bag yod lam/ /dran ldan tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi yon tan rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen sna bdun rang byung ba'i/ /yon tan sgyu rtsal sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad bsam pa'i stobs yin pas/ /

de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtsho byed gsung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las rdo rje rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bzang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sna tshogs dbang po'i rim/ /de nyid thabs tshul tha dad pas/ /ldog pa'i dbye ba du mar bstan/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa na tshod bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rigs can

sna tshogs du ma'i snang ba la/ /ye shes rang 'byung 'gag pa med par ni/ /thugs rje chen po mi zad stobs la 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i

tshogs can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khro bo rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gdug pa 'dul byed pa/ /'byung po ma lus tshar gcad cing / /rjes su

gzungs phyir khro bar bstan/ /de nyid thugs rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par nges pa'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dmigs pas 'jug med par/ /sna tshogs khams gsum skye gnas pa/ /mi g.yo ngang las snang med par/ /chos dbyings gcig par tshul bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gang gi skye bas bsdus pa'i dngos/ /stong nyid gcig tu ma skyes pas/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul can te/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi rig pa rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo mtshar sna tshogs 'phrul ba yi/ /gzo yi gnas dang gso sbyang sogs/ /mkhyen pas

thabs la mkhas par bya/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /blo snang yul dang dbang po yis/ /du ma'i dngos po snang ba la/ /ldog pa dang ni rjes su 'gro/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lus gnas cha shas

med par rtogs/ /nges 'byung de bzhin cha shas med/ /cha shas can dang cha med pa/ /shes nas 'dir grol the tshom med/ /dngos po thams cad mnyam pa ste/ /myur du 'jug pa dka' ba nyid/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs rnam par spangs/ /

rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal zhing / /gnyug ma 'dir ni snang ba ste/ /spyod pa'i yul las 'das pa yin/ /rtsod med zhi ba mtshon bya med/ /nges pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /skal ba med cing rgyu ba med/ /shin tu stong zhing

rdul med pas/ /sgra las 'das shing yon tan spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dngos po rnam dag pas/ /yul rnams sgyu ma'i
mtshan nyid can/ /dus gsum cig par bsdus pa yis/ /thams cad mkhyen par tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul las ni/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam gcad cing / /dben pa nyon

mongs las ldog gang / /tshul 'di gsang ba thob pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rab zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don du/ /dpag med dka' spyad khur byed pa/ /ye shes bzod pa chen po yin zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nor bu'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyir mi ldog

par gzhan don du/ /byang chub sems kyi brtson pa yis/ /tshad med dbugs 'byin chen po nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam

gtan rdo rje mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten bsam gtan bzhi gnas shing / /ye shes bsam gtan mchog spyod pas/ /phyi nang rtsol med ngang las ni/ /byang chub

sems kyi tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa brtul zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /snying po byang chub mchog sems las/ /tha dad rgyas thebs gcig pa'i sku/ /ye shes de nyid tshul bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro bas kun du mchod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /kun du dri med dge ba ni/ /rten 'brel sna tshogs spyod pa'i ngang / /rkyen las 'byung ba bla na med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i tshogs 'chang ba

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud tshogs rnams las rnam rgyal ba/ /de nyid

ye shes rlung las ni/ /zag med zhi bas mchog tu bde/ /gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad

pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams rnam dag rnams dang ma dag dang / /gdul dka'i sems can rnams phyir 'dul bar ni/ /bung ba me tog bzhin du

rab 'jug pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang chen seng ge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes gang du 'du ba yi/ /ye shes mngon par 'byung ba gang / /de nyid chags med rnam dag pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi snying po dbang phyug gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du rgyas pa'i gnas bstan pa/ /rnam par 'phrul ba'i dbang phyug gis/ /lhun

grub phyag rgyas rab rgyas pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spong ba'i rdo rje mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa mtshungs med spyod/ /'di ni sngags kyi spyod mchog ste/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul thob pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be'u rab tu rgyas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal gyi stobs mchog

ste/ /dri med chu skyes yongs 'dzin pa/ /phra ba ge sar mchog thob pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa'i gnas rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun du dri ma med/ /bskyod pa med cing 'dzin bral bas/ /chos nyid ngang du ro mnyam pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mnga' dbang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'brug sgra dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams kun gyi snang ba ni/ /

rtogs dka' bdag med mtshan ma med/ /byams pa'i rang bzhin gzhan phan brtson/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du

'jam dbyangs ka la ping ka'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gsung gi gnas/ /yan lag drug bcu thog med du/ /'gyur ba'i

brjod pa las skyes pa'i/ /skad du ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje dgyes pa'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam par ma bzhag stong pa yis/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i tshul gnas nas/ /'gyur med sna tshogs khyab byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i chu klung skems par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa 'di nyid spang med par/ /

mi gnas mnyam pa'i ngang las ni/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rlung shugs bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i 'jug pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye gnas 'byung las gyur pa la/ /'dod pa'i snang ba 'gro zhing lding / /de nyid sems can gnas mthong phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa

'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la dgyes pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha klu thams cad kyis mchod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du mchod phyir ye shes kyi/ /chags med kun tu bzang po yi/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs thogs med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las rnal 'byor chen po'i 'dul ba don yod pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rgyal

po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi mthar/ /rdo rje bkod pa snying po che/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa'i/ /ye shes snang ba bstan pa'o/ /rang lus lhar gsal byang chub

sems/ /gang du srog dbus bzhugs pa na/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /man ngag gis ni rlung bsdus te/ /de tshe bzlas pa brtan gyur pas/ /de nyid ye shes mchog thob 'gyur/ /mi g.yo mi rtog phra ba'i sems/ /mi mngon gsal

min dbu mar bzhugs/ /de nyid rnal 'byor mchog ces bya/ /stong pa nyid dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'o/ /de nyid gsal bas bde ba ni/ /sgyu ma goms pas 'chang bar 'gyur/ /ji srid sgyu ma la gsal ba/ /de srid

goms pas 'jug par bya/ /rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob pas/ /rang dge'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid ye shes bde chen po/ /thig le'i gzugs can gcig pu nyid/ /snying dbus mi shigs sems gcig bdag /de nyid ye shes

rang stong pa/ /sgyu mar ngo bo nyid kyis gsal/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i blos/ /mkhas pas mthong bas brtag par bya/ /thog mtha' med pa'i ye shes ni/ /ma byung bcos min lhan

cig skyes/ /rang rig gnas ni 'dir thob pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chen po la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal snying po sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du ye shes sa gzhi las/ /sna tshogs myu gu bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /

rten 'brel tshogs phyir thob pa nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyal po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyes

par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs pa/ /rin chen bdun dang nye bdun gyis/ /brgyan zhing mchod pas bde de thob/ /de nyid tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
lus kyang sems la mi gnas te/ /sems kyang ngag la mi gnas te/ /kun du gnas med mkha' lta bur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi sna tshogs mchod pa'i bkra shis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mchog stsol bkra shis rgyun du ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis skyes bu de la stsol ba ster/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden par spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsil ba'i char 'bebs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'dod chags la sogs pas/ /zil gnon de las thar ba yi/ /char pas zug rngu sel byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid sku rdo rje ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams kun la khyab

gyur pa'i/ /lus can kun la rnam par snang / /de nyid rdo rje'i skur gyur pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid

gsung rdo rje ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong gsum khams su grags byed pa/ /gling kun skad cig dbyangs kyis ston/ /du mar de nyid ston pa po/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /gang du 'khor los sgyur ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor los dbang bskur bzhin/ /'gro kun ye shes dbang bskur ba'i/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bsgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gang / /chos nyid mnyam pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /mtshungs

med da ltar 'dir rtogs na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi rtse mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du 'phrul pa'i spyod pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpag med sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /ma dag dag par gang bsgyur ba/ /thams cad blo gros bzang po thob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud

kyi 'ching ba las 'das phyir/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po yis/ /khams gsum kun la khyab par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi 'jig rten snang bar byed pa re re zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'od gsal shin du rnam dag pa/ /dngos po ma spangs ye shes che/ /chos

dbyings klong na bde bar gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dpal gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje'i gdugs kyis khyab par byed pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye bas bsdus pa'i sems can rnams/ /skyob phyir tshad med gdugs kyis ni/ /kun nas kun du khyab par byed/ /byang chub tshul
'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud ma lus pa 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /log lta ma lus mun pa'i gzhi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sgron me yis/ /skad cig gcig la sel mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa go cha bgos pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje mchog tu sra ba snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yan lag bzhi ldan mtshon cha mchog /de nyid bsrung

ba bla na med/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa po zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha lo sgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs thabs rol pa/ /'bar phreng du ma'i spro ba can/ /mi zad ye shes byang chub sems/ /stong nyid de nyid tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa me tog bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dung bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas par/ /rab ston dam

pa'i chos kyi sgra/ /rnam pa kun du grags pa'i dbyangs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thon po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa chos kyi gaN Di rab tu brdungs pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos kyi don ston pa/ /tshad med bsdu dngos bzhi dag gis/ /sdud cing grol byed theg pa'i mchog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i sa 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che sgrog pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa

med pa rin chen rnga/ /bde gshegs gsungs ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu skul ba'i sgra 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos

kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ni/ /rtog med ye shes khams 'jug pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bstan

pa ni/ /byang chub tshul mchog bstan pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis/ /rig pa'i lha mo sna tshogs dang / /thabs gcig rol pa bstan mdzad de/ /gsang ba gsungs pa'i don brjod do/ /ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang / /dngos po ci

bzhin rang rig la'ang / /rgyu 'bras bye brag tha dad pa/ /ma 'dres ye shes tshul du gnas/ /nang gnas ji bzhin phyi rol 'byung / /bar ma gsang ba mchog spyod pa/ /rmad du byung ba chen po ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes gang / /de nyid rtogs pa'i

rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar byed/ /de nyid gnyis su med pa yi/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba bde ba che/ /rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas yin/ /bskrad dang gsad dang dbye ba dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams ni/ /thabs gzhan med

par gyur pa la/ /thog ma dbus dang mtha' rnams su/ /gang gis snying rje ma nyams la/ /de nyid de yis byed par 'gyur/ /gzhan du bstan pa'i don las dman/ /nye bar 'grub par dka' bar gsungs/ /de nyid gsang ba'i spyod

yul min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye
shes 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po chen po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin du mas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang
ba bsdus pa'i dgongs rgyud de/ /mi phyed ye shes mchog sgrub pa/ /bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus shing gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa chen po de dag gi sems kyi kun du rtog pa yang
thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang du yang 'di ltar lhan cig g.yo ba dang ldan pas dbang po sgo lnga'i rjes su mngon par 'gro la

snang ba dbang po don dang phrad par gyur pa mched pa gsal ba las dbang pos dngos por dmigs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'o/ /gal te sems de nyid dngos po'i rang bzhin du ma gyur na de lta na'ang 'di dag sems nyid yin

pas rnam pa thams cad du phyi rol gyi don skye ba yod pa ma yin te 'di ltar ma lus pa'i rang bzhin 'di dag brtags pas stong pa'i sems nyid de/ skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis dag pa gnyis su
med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par yongs su gsal ba'o/ /chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/ /lus dang sems ni dbyer med de/ /rten dang brten pa 'jug ldog gis/ /kun gyi gnas su shes par bya/ /mkha' dbyings

rdo rje stong nyid de/ /dbus gnas mngon par byang chub brjod/ /de nyid me long ye shes ldan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtag /nyi ma mnyam nyid ye shes te/ /bdun dang ldan pa'i dbus nyid tu'o/ /sngags ni dbus su gnas

gyur gang / /sa bon so sor rtog pa ste/ /mngon par byang chub pa nyid do/ /rdo rje la sogs gang gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /zhal gsum rtsa gsum brjod

par bya/ /sku gsum lus ngag yid yin te/ /de nyid mngon par byang chub brjod/ /rnam par 'phro bar bsam bya ste/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma dang / /nor bu ral gri 'bar ba las/ /'gro drug rtog pa gcod phyir te/ /ye shes

drug pa'i bdag nyid can/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas/ /bla med mngon par byang chub brjod/ /lus ngag yid ni byang chub pa/ /gsang ba dngos po'i don yin te/ /lus ni byang chub rnam lnga dang / /rtsa dang byang chub

sems dang ni/ /mi gtsang rdzas dang rnam rtog gis/ /lus kyi chos ni gnas pa yin/ /ngag ni 'byung ba lnga dag dang / /yi ge sgra dang sngags rnams te/ /brjod pa dang ni dbyangs rnams kyis/ /ngag gi chos ni bsdus pa yin/ /sems

ni ye shes lnga dag dang / /thig le bde ba nyid dang ni/ /snang ba gsum dang mi rtog pas/ /sems kyi chos ni gnas pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sems kyi dngos/ /srid gsum chos dang chos min dang / /sa 'og sa steng sa

bla ba/ /skye gnas 'byung ba brtan g.yor bcas/ /sems nyid lus ni nam mkha'i khams/ /gzhi dang rten dang khyab byed pa'o/ /mi gsal phra zhing brtag dka' bas/ /rnam par shes pa'i snang ba la/ /snang ba mngon par thob pa las/ /bag

chags sa bon yul rnams kyis/ /thams cad rang las 'byung ba nyid/ /mi gnas ye shes lus la gnas/ /ye shes lus ni 'gag med de/ /dngos med stong par mi 'gyur te/ /lus med lus ni ro mnyam pa/ /lus la thog ma
