dmigs su med/ /tha ma 'gag pa med pa ste/ /gsang ba gsum du rnam sbas pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sku/ /'di ni 'khor 'das kun gyi rtsa/ /nyams dang myong ba dbyer med de/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong gzugs

can yin/ /bde dang gsal ba mi rtog pas/ /snang ba gsum gyi rnam pa ste/ /de nyid zhen pas 'ching bas na/ /srid pa gsum ni rtag pa'i dngos/ /phra ba'i lus ngag yid gsum la/ /gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs ye shes/ /

rdo rje gsum du gsang ba nyid/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'gro kun bde gshegs rang bzhin can/ /lus ni sna tshogs mi bzad pas/ /sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /du ma'i gzugs kyis ston par byed/ /'gro ba chos

lam dpal ldan pas/ /ngag gi brjod pa mtha' yas pa/ /gsung gi gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /sgra dbyangs so so'i skad du sgrogs/ /sems can sangs rgyas snying po can/ /sems ni dran rtog dpag med pas/ /thugs kyi
gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /sems can sku gsung dbyer med pas/ /lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed pa/ /rdo rje gsum du rtag gnas pas/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i ye shes sku/ /dbyer med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /

gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /kun du bzang pos legs zhus pa/ /rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir gsungs pa yi/ /rlung gi dbye dus mtshan nyid dang / /spro

bsdu rim pa rgyu tshul dang / /khyad par gsang ba bshad tu gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gsang ba'i dbyings nas bka' stsal pa/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /de la

rlung gi mtshan nyid ni/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /mgon po rdo rje re re la'ang / /spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo ni/ /re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ru mngon par brjod/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon

spyod rnams/ /mkhas pas shes nas spyad par bya/ /rlung gi bye brag bstan pa ni/ /tho rangs khyab gnas dus yin te/ /spyi bo'i gnas las kun khyab pas/ /yi ge a ru mngon par brjod/ /de ni sku yi bzlas pa'o/ /nam nangs thur sel

dus yin te/ /gsang ba'i gnas su 'byung bas na/ /A zhes brjod pa dbyangs yin no/ /rdo rje gsung gi bzlas par brjod/ /nyi ma shar ba mnyam gnas rlung / /lte ba'i gnas su brjod pa yi/ /i zhes sgra tsam du brjod pas/ /rdo rje

yon tan bzlas pa ste/ /cung zad dros pas drod yin te/ /snying ga'i gnas su mi shigs pas/ /yi ge I ru mngon par ni/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bzlas pa ste/ /phyed dus gyen du rgyu ba nyid/ /mgrin pa'i gnas las bskyed pas na/ /u

zhes thung rgyu ngag tu gyur/ /rdo rje thogs med bzlas par bshad/ /phyed yol dus su rgyu ba'i rlung / /mig la gnas pa'i rnam pa yis/ /U zhes rab tu brjod pa nyid/ /rdo rje 'dod chags bzlas par brjod/ /dgongs ka rab tu rgyu ba nyid/ /rna ba

la ni rab gnas pa/ /e zhes kun gyi brda ru brjod/ /mtshan mo'i cha la rnam par rgyu/ /sna yi rnam shes ldan pa ste/ /ai zhes gsang ba ser sna 'dzin/ /rdo rje gti mug bzlas par brjod/ /srod la shin du rgyu ba ste/ /lce la mngon par

dbang bas na/ /o zhes sna tshogs sgra brjod pa/ /'gog pa khro bo'i bzlas par brjod/ /nam phyed yang dag rab rgyu ba/ /ba spu'i tshigs kun khyab pas na/ /au zhes tshig tu smra bar ston/ /'di ni dam tshig bzlas par gsungs/ /

srog rtsol dbu mar 'jug pa ni/ /a~M` zhes bde bar ldan pa ste/ /rtsa gnyis gzung 'dzin rlung 'gags pas/ /aHzhes stong pa'i sgo yin no/ /gung gnyis rtsa ba'i rtsa yin te/ /gzhan du yan lag nyid du 'gyur/ /A li bcu gnyis

dag dang 'dres/ /de dag dbye ba rim pa yang / /bla ma'i kha las rtogs par 'gyur/ /rlung gi bye brag bshad pa ni/ /tshes gcig snga dro zla ba ste/ /stong pa'i srod la nyi ma rgyu/ /tshes brgyad tho rangs rlung nyid de/ /nyi shu gnyis la cha bsnyams

pas/ /de yi grangs ni bstan pa la/ /chu ni nyis brgya nyi shu lnga/ /sa dang me dang rlung dag la'ang / /de nyid bzhin du mnyam par 'byung / /dbyug gu gnyis la chu tshod gcig /de la bzhi brgya lnga bcu yin/ /chu tshod gnyis la 'pho ba

gcig /de la dgu brgya phrag gcig ste/ /'pho ba gnyis la thun gcig ste/ /de la stong dang brgyad brgya'o/ /thun ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yin/ /de la nyi khri chig stong ste/ /spyir sdom nyin zhag gcig la ni/ /'pho ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/ /

khri phrag gnyis dang stong dang ni/ /drug brgya 'byung bar rgyu ba yin/ /chu tshod sum bcu gnyis la ni/ /dbyug gu drug bcu rtsa bzhi yin/ /de dag 'byung ba 'dzin pa ni/ /chu sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi rgyu/ /zhi ba'i las ni nyi shu bzhi/ /sa ni nyi

shu rtsa bzhi las/ /de yi dus su rgyas pa'i las/ /gnyis pa'ang de dang mnyam pa la/ /dbang dang drag po'i las la shis/ /rlung gi rim pa de dag kyang / /lugs 'byung dang ni lugs bzlog pa/ /dgra zun du ni rgyu ba dang / /ma dang bu ru

rgyu ba dang / /rang thog tu ni rang rgyu dang / /gzhan thog tu ni gzhan rgyu dang / /pho mo phrad par 'byung ba dang / /ma ning dag tu 'byung ba dang / /snol mar rgyu dang rkyang pa ste/ /de dag don ni gsal rnyed 'gyur/ /sa dang chu ru phrad pa sogs/ /de bzhin

gzhan la'ang sbyar bar bya/ /gsal dang mi gsal rnam pa yis/ /de yi bye brag shes par bya/ /phrin las bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /chu yi rlung ste ngos gzung ba/ /phyogs dang dbyibs dang mdog rnams dang / /ring thung rgyu ba phyi nang gis/ /lha mo

bzhi dang / /dal dang rtsub dang sbom pa dang / /shin du drag pa rnam pa bzhi/ /chu yi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i dus/ /zhi ba'i las ni bya bar bshad/ /sa dang me dang rlung dang gsum/ /gong ma dag gis bsgre bar bya/ /spyir ni rlung gi

rnam pa ni/ /'byung ba drag po'i rang bzhin yin/ /'jug pa dbang dang rgyas pa ste/ /gnas pa shin du zhi ba yin/ /thams cad rlung gis byed pas na/ /sdig pa mi dge ngan song ltung / /'chi dus 'og sgo gnyis nas ltung / /'pho bas 'bras

bu ngan 'gro yin/ /dge bcu spyod pa rlung gi las/ /mtho ris thar pa rnams la ni/ /bgrod pa rlung gis byed pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nas mkha' spyod du/ /'pho bar 'gyur ro sems dpa' che/ /rlung 'khrugs pas ni las rnams 'khrugs/ /

zhing sogs 'khrugs pas las mi 'grub/ /ro snyoms pas ni nad med cing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'byung / /dbu ma legs pa'i lam bzang pos/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas thob nas/ /sku bzhi ye shes lnga 'byung ba/ /

dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub/ /rig 'dzin mos par spyod pa ste/ /dang po las kyi sa zhes pa/ /'dod khams gnas pa'i gzhi yin te/ /de phyir las rnams rlung gis byed ces dpal rdo rje 'chang gis spyod pa'i gnas grol

ba'i don du rab tu gsungs so/ /srog dang rtsol ba rab 'jug pas/ /g.yas g.yon rgyu dang khong nas 'byung / /thabs dang shes rab cha dag gis/ /gsang ba 'dir ni brjod pa yin/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma yi/ /rab tu dbye ba bstan par

bya/ /g.yon dang g.yas su rab sbyor bas/ /rim pa ji bzhin rab tu rgyu/ /g.yon gyi mgrin pa nas brtsams te/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mthar gyur pas/ /zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og tu blta/ /shel dang A li rab 'bab pa/ /g.yas su'ang lte ba

nas brtsams te/ /mgrin pa'i rtsar ni gyen bskyod pa/ /nyi ma'i rtsa ni gyen du blta/ /dmar dang kA li 'byung zhing 'bab/ /'byung byed sna yi bu ga nas/ /rgyu ba rtsa yi mtshan nyid can/ /'jug pa g.yon nas mthur du 'gro/ /'byung ba g.yas

rtsa gyen du bskyod/ /ji srid nyi ma shar ba nas/ /nub kyi bar la nyin mo'i cha/ /ji srid nub pa nyid gyur pas/ /nam nangs bar du mtshan mo'i cha/ /mtshams las bar mar gyur pa dang / /nyin mtshan gnyis la zhag gcig ste/ /de las dus bzhir gnas pa yin/ /

de las nyin dang mtshan mo yis/ /thun tshod brgyad tu 'gyur ba yin/ /yan lag bcu drug dag yin te/ /thun ni phyed phyed dag tu rlung / /sna yi bu gar yang dag rgyu/ /yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas/ /nyin zhag gsum du thun

phyed la/ /zla ba'i rlung ni rab rgyu ba/ /de nas gzhan gsum nyi ma'i rlung / /'dis ni go rims ji srid du/ /yar tshes bcwa lnga'i bar du'o/ /mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung ste/ /nyin zhag gsum du snga dro'i cha/ /grags pa nyi ma'i rlung

rgyu ba'o/ /de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga'i bar/ /thun re yi ni bzhi pa rnams/ /chu tshod du ni brjod pa na/ /nyin zhag gcig gi dus kyi cha/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis brjod par bya/ /de las bsgres pa'i dbyug gu ni/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i grangs kyis

ni/ /phyed phyed bstan pas dbyug gu yin/ /sna rtse'i rlung gi rgyu ba dag /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa las/ /dbugs gcig tu ni brjod pa yin/ /de nyid rlung gi sbyor shes pas/ /dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya/ /srog ni lnga bcu

tham pa dang / /dbugs gsum rkang pa de dang ldan/ /nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi/ /nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yin/ /nyi ma lhor ni 'byung dus kyi/ /mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /dbyug gu re re 'phel 'grib ni/ /dus kyi dbye bas shes

par bya/ /dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas/ /'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib yin/ /dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi cha'i/ /drug chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur/ /thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las/ /phyin ci log tu 'phos gyur na/ /rtsod pa

la sogs nges 'gyur bas/ /mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag /nyi ma bdun gyi bar dag tu/ /phyin ci log tu rgyu ba ni/ /de tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur/ /zla phyed bar du log rgyu na/ /nad chen po ni yang dag 'byung / /zla ba gcig tu log rgyu na/ /snying

brtse'i gnyen phyogs brlag par 'gyur/ /phyed dang gnyis su log rgyu can/ /thun mong dus su shes par bya/ /gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ba/ /mnyam po drug tu nyi ma song / /gang tshe skyes pa nyi ma zla/ /de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus/ /'chi

bar nges pa'i dus yin no/ /dang po dus sbyor gang shes pa/ /gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir/ /des ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song / /mnyam po drug ces bya bar bshad/ /nyi ma'i lam ni thams cad du/ /rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag /rgyun mi

'chad par yang dang yang / /mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya/ /dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung / /bsgrod pa bzhin du 'jug gyur na/ /de yi 'pho ba rdzogs 'gyur tshe/ /srog ni gtang bar the tsom med/ /'dir ni 'chi bdag gzhom 'dod pas/ /nyin zhag gcig gi chu

tshod kyi/ /brgyad cha re re'i bar dag tu/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas ni/ /rtsa gnyis nas ni 'byung ba dang / /'jug pa dbu mar lam gyur pa/ /sbar dang sreg dang bzhu ba dang / /shin du 'bar ba'i dus dag tu/ /lo drug bar du

gnas byas na/ /'chi bdag 'joms pa the tsom med/ /g.yas nas chu tshod bzhi dag dang / /de bzhin g.yon nas chu tshod bzhi/ /dbu mar shin du bsdams byas la/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba thob/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'chi

bdag 'joms pa dang bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis/ /'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ /spyi dang khyad par tshul gyis ni/ /ngo bo rlung gi chos rnams kun/ /rnam

phye rim pa shes par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po 'di shes byos/ /'di dag rgyas par phye ba ni/ /rgyas par gyur pa khri phrag bcu/ /nyon mongs phung po de snyed dang / /rlung dang mnyam par 'gag pa las/ /chos kyi phung po de snyed thob/ /sa re

thob cing rlung 'gags pas/ /bcu pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe/ /dam tshig mngon du gyur pas na/ /nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yin/ /sa brgyad par ni gyur pa'i tshe/ /nyon mongs phung po rags pa ni/ /khri phrag brgyad pos

spangs pa na/ /phyir mi ldog pa zhes brjod do/ /lhag ma drug brgya stong phrag gcig /snga ma'i gnas su rang dag ste/ /las kyi rlung rnams dag pa yin/ /khri phrag gnyis ni zag med rlung / /sa bcu pa la phyin dus su/ /grangs

'bum gyi ni rnam pa nyid/ /dam tshig dag tu bstan pa'o/ /chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ /sa bcu po la gnas pa yis/ /chos kyi sprin du gyur pa yin/ /phrin las rigs lnga'i bzlas pa yis/ /sa lnga pa ni mngon du byed/ /

khro bo dam tshig bzlas pa yis/ /drug pa mngon du gyur pa thob/ /dus gsum dag pa'i bzlas pas ni/ /legs pa'i blo gros thob par byed/ /dam tshig mi 'da' bzlas pas ni/ /sa bcu mngon du gyur pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i rlung

las 'phos pas ni/ /bsam mi khyab du gyur pa ste/ /zag par bcas pa'i rlung dag ni/ /rags par gnas pa de snyed yin/ /phra bar gyur pa'i rtog pa ni/ /khri phrag brgyad las 'das nas ni/ /stong phrag bzhi bcu 'das pas ni/ /

spang bya de snyed dang rtog pa/ /bag la nyal ba spong ba yi/ /zag med rlung ni khri phrag gnyis/ /ye shes dam tshig mngon 'byung ba/ /'bum du brjod pas bsdus pa'o/ /khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag gcig /lhag pa drug

brgyar bcas pa gang / /las kyi rlung du brjod par bya/ /de yang bsdus pas thun grangs la/ /dus sbyor chen po bcu gnyis te/ /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/ /ro hi ta dang mo hi ta/ /b+ha dra pri Sha b+ha sha pa/ /kur ma ma ka ra raN Da/ /

mi ki ra dang bi dri ka /byA ku li dang swa pa na/ /kA ma na ru brjod par bya/ /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa dag /gcig tu gyur pa dbugs yin te/ /dbugs drug chu srang gcig yin te/ /chu srang sum bcu dbyug gu phyed/ /

dbugs drug gis ni dbyug gu phyed/ /dbyug gu gnyis la chu tshod gcig /chu tshod sum bcu rtsa gnyis las/ /thun ni rnam pa brgyad du phri/ /'pho ba'i tshul ni bcu drug go/ /dbyug gu dag pa'i gnas yin pas/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhir

gnas pa'o/ /spyir na sems can khams la ni/ /rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de snyed yod phyir shes pa des/ /rlung yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de yang bsdus pa'i don du ni/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong pas/ /

rnam par dbye ba mkhas pa yis/ /zag bcas rlung ni khri phrag brgyad/ /lhag pa stong phrag bzhi las ni/ /zag pa med pa'i rlung gyur pa/ /khri phrag gnyis kyis dag pa yin/ /rlung rags pas ni rtog pa'i tshogs/ /de dang mtshungs

par 'jug pa yin/ /rtog pa bag la nyal gyur pas/ /rlung ni phra bar gyur pa ste/ /phra rags rtog pa dag pas ni/ /rlung ni shin du phra bar 'gyur/ /rnam rtog dang ni rlung gnyis gang / /mtshungs par mnyam par 'byung 'jug las/ /

rlung gi 'jug pa 'byung med par/ /rtog pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/ /de phyir las kyi rlung dag ni/ /khri phrag gnyis dang stong dag dang / /drug brgya dag tu shes par bya/ /yi ge'i dbye ba'i gnas kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mngon par

'byung ba yin/ /yi ge dang ni rang bzhin gnyis/ /gnas dang rten du shes par bya/ /yi ge dag pas rtog pa dag /rtog pa 'od gsal gnas su spyod/ /yi ge rnam pa lus gnas pas/ /drug gsum rang bzhin brgya drug bcu/ /

nyin mtshan sbyor bas 'byung bas na/ /lus gnas yi ge brgya dang ni/ /drug bcu gnas las 'byung zhing 'jug /de phyir gsang ba'i yi ge yis/ /thams cad za zhing lding bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mtha' med rtag pa'i

don/ /sems can kun gyi gnas chen po/ /dpal gyis 'byor pa bla med rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /A li bcu drug phrag gnyis las/ /zhe sdang las gyur rtog pa 'byung / /de yi rtsa ba thig ler bcas/ /sum

bcu gsum du gyur pa yin/ /kA li sum bcu rtsa bzhi dang / /ya ra la wa da d+ha ste/ /bzhi bcu mngon par gnas pas na/ /'dod chags rtog pa de snyed yin/ /zung gyur drug ldan thig ler bcas/ /mtshan ma bdun gyis mtshon pa'i phyir/ /dbus ma

la brten gti mug pa'i/ /rang bzhin ma rig gyur pa'o/ /snga ma g.yas rtsa la brten pa/ /skyes pa rdo rjer bcas gyur brjod/ /gong du g.yon rtsa las 'byung ba/ /bud med pad ma'i mtshan mas brjod/ /rtsa yi byed pa mi 'dra ste/ /khams

dang rnam shes 'du ba yi/ /rten du gyur phyir rtsa yin te/ /rnam par bzlog na gnyis su 'gyur/ /thi le 'pho 'gyur phyi rol bzhin/ /zla ba lus la 'pho ba ste/ /tshes gcig la sogs rkang g.yon nas/ /the bo sogs 'phel spyi bor gnas/ /

de nas g.yas kyi cha la ni/ /zla ba rim gyis 'grib par 'gyur/ /'phel dang 'grib pa'i khyad par gyis/ /bcwa lnga byang chub sems skyed byed/ /dkar phyogs nag po rim shes bya/ /spyod pa'i tshul ni de bder spyad/ /gnam stong nyi ma

gsang bar te/ /zla ba nya gang tshes kyis rgyas/ /khyad par sgra gcan rim shes bya/ /bla na med pa rags pa dang phra ba'i gnas 'jug ldog bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa pos/ /khyad par sems

gsum rim pa bka' stsal te/ /snang ba zhes bya rnam par mi rtog pa/ /gsal ba'i cha ste gzung rtog spangs pa las/ /'byung ba mi mngon rlung dang bcas pa gang / /lhang nger gnas pa skad cig dang po yin/ /mched pa'i snang ba

rab tu mi rtog ste/ /ches gsal ba las 'dzin rtog ma zhugs pa/ /ye shes phra ba rlung ldan mi snang ba/ /lhan ne gnas pa skad cig gnyis pa yin/ /thob pa'i cha ni shin du mi rtog pa/ /gsal ba tsam du'ang mi gnas shin du phra/ /rlung

sems mi phyed gsal bar 'char ba min/ /lham me gnas pa skad cig gsum pa yin/ /nye bar thob pa dri ma med pa ste/ /rang byung rang gsal bde ba dmigs su med/ /phra rags rab gsal ting nge 'dzin du gnas/ /skad

cig bzhi pa mi 'gyur khyab byed yin/ /'od gsal ba ni bsam gtan zag pa med/ /rdul med sa bon med pas mi g.yo ba/ /lhan cig gnas pa chos sku'i snying po ni/ /lhun grub byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma 'di nyid yod med

las 'das shing / /dbu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas kun rdzob ste/ /chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /'gag pa med pa'i rol pa rang byung ba'o/ /zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can/ /chos dbyings chos nyid dbyer med dag pa'i

sku/ /tha dad rnam bral mi phyed ye shes te/ /gsang ba chen po'i lam las 'dir rtogs bya/ /thun mongs dbang phyug dang ni rtags bcas pa/ /dbang phyug brgyad ldan 'char ba 'di nyid do/ /phra zhing yang la phra bar nub pa dang / /spyod par nus dang

bdag nyid chen po dang / /dga' mgur byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /ci 'dod byed dang dbang phyug don du 'char/ /sku yi dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang / /thugs kyi dbang phyug de nyid phrin las dang / /rdzu 'phrul kun du 'gro ba'i

dbang phyug dang / /gang 'dod bskyed dang khyad par don brgyad do/ /phung po khams dang skye mched bsdus pa yi/ /lnga po'i dbye ba lnga ru byas pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa so sor byin gyis rlabs/ /'khor ba'i las rnams dag

ni rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin dbang po'i phyi rol yul bcas lnga/ /re re zhing yang bde gshegs lnga rnams kyi/ /de la rang rang rtag tu byin gyis rlob/ /ye shes lnga dang gsum du gnas pas yang dag bsdus shes gsungs te/

gsang ba zab pa'i tshul bstan pa rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa

mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las mnyam pa nyid 'byung bar bstan par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// // rtag pa gsum pa rdo rje gsang ba ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rab tu gsang ba'o/ /

de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun/ /gsang chen ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can don du yang dag 'byung / /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /don kun thub pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rgyal ba de la btud byas te/ /gsang ba dam tshig

mkhyen pa la/ /mchod cing bstod pas gsang chen gyi/ /rdo rje dbyangs ni bshad pa yin/ /e ma tshul bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /de nyid rigs brgya bsdus pa'i sku/ /de nyid tshul mchog byang chub pa/ /rigs kyi sangs rgyas lngar

bsdus pa/ /byang chub snying po tshul zhi ba/ /gsang ba rigs gsum bla na med/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni gcig pa nyid/ /rgyas gdab rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /ye shes rim pa nyid du bstan/ /ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin las/ /khyad par

ngo bo rang byung ba/ /yang dag rnam par mi rtog pas/ /bla med mngon par 'byung bar grags/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dpal ldan chos kyi rang bzhin sku/ /rtog pa'i dri ma 'gag byed pas/ /sku gsum ye

shes dkyil 'khor du/ /phra ba'i rnam par gzhug par bya/ /de nyid rnam shes 'pho ba'i dngos/ /gdan bcas sa bon thim par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bar snang khams/ /khyab cing bzhugs par rab bsgom pa/ /yi ge gsang

ba rang sngags la/ /them pa gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /thugs kyi ngo bor bsam par bya/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos kun rang bzhin mtshungs par blta/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sems su yang / /slar yang

bsgoms nas de rab bsdu/ /gsang ba gcig tu dbang bya yi/ /'pho ba sku gsum rim par 'byung / /chos dbyings mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /mi shigs 'od kyi gong bu las/ /nA da tsam du snang ba gang / /mi 'gag rang bzhin dag
par gnas/ /gsang ba rdo rje'i rin chen gyi/ /rab snang byed pa'i ting 'dzin bshad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol

pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams bdag med pa yi dngos/ /gnyug ma dbyer med stong nyid dang / /zad pa med cing 'phel med pa/ /byang
chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba'i tshogs can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i me 'od rin po che mnga' ba sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi pad mo rnam par rol pa'i 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ /skye med snying gi pad ma

ma la/ /sa bon rdzogs pa'i snying po gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bar ba'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang byung gi rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zla ba'i snying po 'od 'phro ba/ /chu rgyun 'bab pa'i zer ldan gyis/ /bsam pa'i ye shes rgyun gyis ni/ /thogs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das srid pa las rgal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sna tshogs dngos po'i chos nyid ni/ /spros pa med phyir snang med pas/ /theg pa mchog gi chos nyid kyis/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa ldan pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dngos/ /rtag dang chad pa las grol zhing / /yang dag don mthong rang

grol gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan par sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri

ma med pa'i chos nyid ni/ /gdod nas dag pa de bzhin gshegs/ /snying po ye shes byang chub pas/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i me tog sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes seng ge'i rtsal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las/ /thub pa don kun rdo rje 'dzin/ /mchod de rdo rje

dbyings 'dir gsungs/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs chen gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pas 'du 'bral med/ /rnam par grol ba'i phung po can/ /bde chen sku ste skyon med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phung po lnga dag pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag /'dus pa las

ni skye bzhin pa/ /de yang yul las rab tu 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khrangs chen

po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid mnyam pa med pa yi/ /rdo rje zla ba 'dus las 'byung / /tha dad dmigs pa rab zhi bas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes skyob pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /ye shes 'byung gnas sa chen ltar/ /de nyid bden mthong chos kyi spyan/ /shes rab zab mo'i spyod yul gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i

'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams yongs su dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mkhyen pa dag pa chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam pa kun tu rang

byung bas/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa/ /thub pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen pos khyab par mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thogs pa med pa'i

gnas pa spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zil gnon chos ni gsang ba che/ /mi zad rgyan gyi sgrub pa'i gzhi/ /de nyid nges pa stobs gyur pas/ /de nyid

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub
kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams ni sna tshogs su/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs kyi phyir/ /rnam rol ye shes spyod pa yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa tshogs can gsal ba'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'gag pa rol pa'i sgra rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams bye ba mtha' yas par/ /mi

'gyur rdo rje'i dbyings gcig gis/ /tha dad du mar khyab byed pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi rtog pa

rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa sna tshogs bsdus pa yi/ /ye shes gcig gis gnas pa las/ /tha dad ting 'dzin dag pa'i ngang / /de nyid tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don yod 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i yul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes rdo rje ro gcig par/ /lan tshwa chu bzhin spyod pa ni/ /skal bzang tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i drang srong skyob pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i rdo rje skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa gang / /rkang gnyis thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ /ma 'ongs bla ma'i

gzugs kyis gnas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul mi zad pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtan g.yo ma lus snang ba'i gzhi/ /de nyid kun du bsgyur ba po/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas sprul/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun brtan pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu dbang gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gdug pa ma lus gdon byung ba/ /de nyid rtog pa'i dra ba las/ /kun byung dag par 'dul byed pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i rgyal po bcom ldan gyis/ /de nyid byang chub sems dpa' la/ /rab tu

bskul te bstan pa gang / /rab tu nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gang du bsgrub pa yi/ /gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa/ /rgyu dang rtags dang go cha dang / /rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa ste/ /'jug pa sbyor ba'i rim pa yis/ /

dmigs pa bsdus pa nyid yin no/ /rlung dang sngags dang sgra las ni/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o/ /gang du sems kyi snang ba las/ /rab dben rim pa gnyis par brjod/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i chos can las/ /bdag byin brlab
pa'i rim par gyur/ /bsam gtan sbyor dang 'od gsal ba/ /mngon par byang chub rim pa nyid/ /de las gnyis med de bzhin nyid/ /rim pa lnga pa zung 'jug lam/ /lus sems ngag gi chos bsdus pas/ /tshul gsum

mngon par byang chub pa/ /de nyid ye shes lnga dag tu/ /rigs kyi dbye bas bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis
su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las chos kyi tshul bsdu ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzang rtog skyes bu kha lo

sgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thabs dang bsam pa gang gang gis/ /lus 'di spyod pas sgyur bas na/ /sems ni ting nge 'dzin gyis te/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ku sha'i rtse mo ltar phra mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes sku/ /rang rig nyid las tha dad med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi bkod ma'i chu 'dzin pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde gshegs gdung ni rgyas pa gang / /thugs rje dag pa'i stobs yin te/ /'gro ba gso

ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /byang chub ye shes bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi shugs 'chang ba ltar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sman pa'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'khor ba yi/ /nad sel thabs mchog byams pa'i dpal/ /brtse sems tshad med srung ba po/ /zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs bsam grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo'i dri ma sel bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin rtog pa'i

dri ma rnams/ /gzung 'dzin chos kyis bsdus pa'i dngos/ /dbu ma'i ngang du rang dag pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chu bo'i

rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos kyi lam/ /tshul gcig theg pa gcig pa nyid/ /byang chub chen po bla na med/ /byang chub tshul

sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i tshogs chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhal med kyi gnas ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad rang bzhin stong pa'i dbyings/ /gzhi med rtsa bral 'dus ma byas/ /brjod med nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan

'grib pa med par bsrung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul rin po che'i zom zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ /pha rol phyin pa

mnyam pa nyid/ /snang ba med cing rnam pa med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros snang ba bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten mun pa sel mdzad cing / /sa gsum gsal bar byed pa yi/ /glog gi 'od kyis 'char ba po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pheg rdob pa'i sgra snyan lta bur ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos kyi don

'byung ba/ /bla na med pa byang chub sems/ /ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur ston/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i mig ston

pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni/ /lam gyi rim pa thams cad

par/ /'dam bzangs chu yi bdud rtsi ltar/ /skal bzangs de nyid tshul shes byos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gnas mtshungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhon nu'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kyi tshul ni zhi ba nyid/ /bcu drug ye shes brgyan pa nyid/ /skad cig bden pa byang chub pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa nor bu'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gis/ /kun du dbang bskur gyur pa yi/ /

skal ba can ni kun tu bzang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rtog pas brtags pa yi/ /snang ba 'di ni sgyu ma tsam/ /de nyid las dang bag chags bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngos

bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi shigs rdo rje'i sku nyid ni/ /rnam pa du mas spungs pa gang / /phra rab dbyer med dag pa'i

rgyal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /kun tu ye shes rgyal ba yi/ /drod dang rtags las 'das pa'i chos/ /bsgom bya med cing dmigs med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzi brjid snang

ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin snang ba med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang / /de nyid sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste/ /bdag

med chos las rang byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa chen po mchog gi ye shes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sprin 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dgos 'dod thams cad char bzhin du/ /rang sems nor bu'i rgyal pos 'grub/ /'di nyid rin chen mdzod chen po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bskul ba tshad med pa bla ma'i snying po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dpal ldan pas/ /rang rig ye shes gcig la rdzogs/ /rgyun du bde ba ster byed pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden par ston pa yang dag pa'i gnas blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bgrod
med lam ni gcig pa'i chos/ /ye shes mig gi yul gyur pas/ /mthar thug snying po byang chub mchog /rgyal ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'dir ni gsang ba'i bka' spyod pa'i/ /byang chub
sems dpa' chen po yi/ /dam tshig ye shes bstan pa la/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa rab ston cing / /'dir ni sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /theg chen chos la rab zhugs kyang / /de don gsal bar mi shes pas/ /gsang

ba'i tshul 'di rtogs dka' ste/ /brda' dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang / /ji bzhin pa dang min drang don/ /dngos po'i chos la mi spyod par/ /sgra dang yi ge'i rjes 'brang ba'i/ /phyi rol bstan bcos la dga' zhing / /tshig don bdud rtsi'i rgyab

kyis phyogs/ /de la dngos grub rnyed dka' ste/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid

rnam par rgyal ba las yongs su dag pa'i gnas rdo rje'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rten 'brel yang dag 'byung ba las/ /kun rdzob nyid kyi chos nyid ni/ /dbyer med don dam rnam par dben/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa stobs sbyin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin chen sgron me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /de nyid dngos por

mi gnas shing / /rang bzhin 'od gsal rtag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri dgas kun du rgyu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje lam du rab zhugs nas/ /nor bu dri med zla ba yi/ /skyon gyis ma gos ye shes nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog pa'i dba' rlabs g.yo ba med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje gsang ba bla na med/ /

mnyam sbyor bde ba dri ma med/ /mi 'dzag mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rlung gi shugs

kyis bskyod pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du mngon par mi gnas pa/ /gnyis med ye shes chos kyi rgyal/ /rnam par mi rtog chags med pas/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ster mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /snang srid ma lus bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad stong pa nyid las skyes/ /de nyid ye shes rgyu 'bras can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /sems nyid mnyam par mtshungs pas na/ /mi 'gag go

'byed khyab gyur pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye dgu'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong nyid dngos po ma yin te/ /dngos min gyur pa'ang stong pa min/ /ngo bo nyid ni rnam dag pa/ /stong nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags

pa chen po rmad du byung ba sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung ba bzhi dag nam mkhar gnas/ /de nyid gang la'ang mi gnas te/ /

sems can sangs rgyas la brten pa/ /sangs rgyas mi gnas tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa thub pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /gzod nas ma skyes dag pa nyid/ /srid zhi mnyam nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro 'ong rnam bral tshul thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

dpag bsam gyi shing lta bur bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sa bon myu gu dang / /sdong bu 'dab ma 'bras bu'i bar/ /tshul brgyad 'gyur ba'i bye brag gis/ /rten 'brel de nyid

tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ljon pa'i shing chen po ltar rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro snying rnam rtog

zhes bya gang / /rang rig byang chub snying po'i gnas/ /de las yon tan brjod mi lang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i sil snyan 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi rtag bdag med zhi ba yis/ /'du shes sems pa sngon rgyu las/ /bag chags spangs pas gnas thob gyur/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra bung ba lta bur lding ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par rig byed las 'das shing / /

de spangs bsam pa'i ldog pa yis/ /dbye bas tha dad shes par bya/ /'di ni snying po'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal zhing

khams bkod pa phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing khams gang / /snang mdzad rgyal po'i 'od kyi skus/ /rten mdzad ye shes

snang ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lha bden sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snang ba bai dUr+yar ston pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gyur ba med pa'i rin po che/ /gcig tu sgyur bar byed pa can/ /nor bu rtog pa'i blo bral ba/ /nges par tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor

bu'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mun pa dmag rum sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i mun pa sel ba yi/ /byin brlabs 'od

kyi sgron ma yis/ /snang ba ston cing 'joms pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po dag pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying por gyur pa rang srog las/ /mi shigs go 'phang gnas spyod pa/ /de nyid rlung sems dbyer med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa bcings pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spro ba dpag med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos

dbyings ye shes spyod yul bas/ /mi gnas mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid/ /tshad med rang byung mi rtog phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mdzad pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nges 'byung rnam par mi gnas pa/ /'khor ba dag pa'i sems gnas pa/ /de nyid ye shes tshul

gsum gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /gang du sngon byung sangs rgyas dang / /ma 'ongs byon gyur de bzhin gshegs/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /gsang ba 'di las yang dag 'byung / /

sems kyi bslab pa la phyogs shing / /zab pa rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /de nyid mdo sder gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba bla na med pa'i don/ /snying po'i don rnams ston byed pa/ /'bras bu rtogs

pa'i ye shes ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la mngon gyur pas/ /thabs kyi khyad par gyur pa ste/ /rdo rje theg pa zhes brjod do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang

ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba bla na med pa'i don yongs su skyong ba'i le'u ste sum bcu drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes

don kun 'dzin mdzad pa/ /dus gsum bdag po dpal ldan pas/ /gsang ba ye shes spyod pa gsungs/ /gnyis med mnyam pa mi 'gyur ba/ /dus gsum rtag tu rang byung nyid/ /skye ba med pa las sprul zhing / /ma skyes

rang bzhin brjod du med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes las/ /sgyu ma tsam du bstan pa yin/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bur ni/ /gnas pa brjod bya

don gyi chos/ /de nyid nges par don ston pas/ /rjod byed sgra yi phyogs su bshad/ /gsang chen theg pa snying po'i don/ /rgyal po che ba rang la gnas/ /mchog tu brtag pa 'dus pa ste/ /bden gnyis zung 'jug ston
pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa lha'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /de nyid gsang ba'i ye shes che/ /snying po phyag rgya chen po'i ngang / /zab dang rgya che'i tshul gnas pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbu sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba kun 'dus rig pa'i ngang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas pas/ /sku bzhi ye shes mchog rtag pas/ /dri med 'dul ba'i tshul

mchog go zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dal gyis bzhud pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems/ /'bad pa med par 'byung ba ni/ /chos rnams dbyer med gcig pa'i sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

brtul zhugs dka' thub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bar 'gro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mthong chos don yod snying po ni/ /'bras bu grub pa'i rkyen 'byung ba/ /

de nyid sad byed rnam par thar/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi skam sar gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yi/ /spyod yul sna tshogs 'byung ba na/ /thar pa'i lam la spyad par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba sgyu ma yis/ /

nye bar 'grub pa yang dag pa'i/ /gsang mtha' tshul 'di nges bstan yin/ /de nyid spyod pa bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang srong
skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsod nams mthar thug stobs chen po/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan las 'byung / /'bras bu bzhis ni thub pa'i

rgyan/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid stong nyid mtshan ma med/ /smon pa med pa byang chub gzhi/ /rnam thar ye shes 'bras thob pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgyu ma lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos gang skye ba med pa dang / /

'gag pa med par 'byung ba dang / /bla med gsang ba'i don bstan pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smig rgyu lta

bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan rmi lam dang / /sprul pa mtshungs par ston pa gang / /de nyid rang bzhin

'byung ba'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rmi lam gzugs snang ltar/ /bag chags snang ba rang dag par/ /dri ma sbyang phyir bstan pa dag /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chu zla lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig gis du mar khyab pa yi/ /ngo bo rang

stong thig le gcig /zhen med phyag rgya 'byung ba yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri za'i grong khyer lta bur 'char ba rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /dag pa'i ye shes yang dag pa/ /bcings pa med cing grol ba'ang med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skrun par mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gang du sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems/ /de sprul dman par mos pa 'dul/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs 'gro dpal sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi chu'i chu bur lta bur mkhyen pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lan tshwa rgya mtshor thim pa ltar/ /dba' rlabs zhi ba'i rang bzhin

gyis/ /thob med ye shes sbyor don 'gro/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa don legs des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig yor stong pa'i dngos po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sad pas sad byed pa/ /kun nas ldang ba zhi ba yi/ /bsnyengs med don gsal byang chub pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog tshad med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid las

grol zhing bde thob dang / /mchog don gnas pa dag pa'i gnas/ /byang chub tshul dag 'khor lo yis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzangs sangs rgyas thams cad

kyis dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bstan pa 'di ni byang chub lam/ /de nyid snying po sdom pa nyid/ /bslab pa

yongs dag 'ja' tshon ltar/ /nges pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glog gi 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ /glog ltar 'byung ba'i yid kyis ni/ /kun du phrin las bya ba las/ /'jug pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin 'phro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum

thams cad du/ /dri med rtag par 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /legs mchod bsam pa'i rgyun 'bab ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba'i rgyal po che/ /'bras bu ston pa'i lam byung ba/ /mi phyed ye shes mnga' bdag 'chang / /zab dang

rgya che'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i che/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos po kun/ /khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /gzod nas dag pa'i ye shes gnas/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas med/ /gsang chen bde ba'i go 'phang can zhes gsungs

so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las theg pa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgyal po'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dul ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa'i dra ba bsal ba yi/ /ye

shes rnam thar dag pa yi/ /gsal ba yongs dag rjes 'gro bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba chos 'byung yangs pa yi/ /dag pa dri med gnas kyi cha/ /cha dang cha min rnam spangs pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

nam mkha' dag pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing / /'bar ba thig le nA da bral/ /ye shes sku ste rnam dag

pas/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i gnas rdo rje rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs de byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyogs bcu kun du snang ba yi/ /'od zer 'phro bas 'khrugs pa yi/ /lha mo gar gyis mchod byed pa'i/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang dpe byad dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha dang mi rnams kun la yang / /de

nyid ye shes skal ba can/ /bzang po srid gsum spyad par bya/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i gzhal med dag pa

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams kun du mi phyed pa'i/ /tha dad blo ni rnam spangs nas/ /yang dag ye shes snang ba can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkra shis gdugs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gling rnams

kun gyi sems can khams/ /byams pa'i gdugs kyis khyab byed pa/ /mtha' skor bgrang mi lang bar ston/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi nya'i lto lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i chos kyi gnas/ /'dren pa bdud rtsi spyan yangs pas/ /thugs rjes rgyun chad med par gzigs/ /

de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad ma lta bur ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa'i mthus/ /drang por smra ba'i ljags dbang po/ /ge sar dmar po ltar ston pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi

brjid drag shul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dung lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshad med thugs kyi gter chen po/ /rnam par dkar ba'i chos phyogs

kyis/ /bar mtshams med par gnas thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bum pa lta bu rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /bum pa chen pos don byed pa/ /thog ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be'u rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du tshangs dang brgya byin dang / /

'jig rten skyong bar bcas pa yi/ /mchod cing rdo rje'i dbang phyug sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal

mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa'i/ /kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar/ /mi nub dam pa'i gtso bo yis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par mdzes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang phyag gi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thub pas 'gro ba'i ngan song rgyun/ /yongs su gcod cing sbyong mdzad pas/ /rnam par gnon pa'i mchog mnga' ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa dpa' bo khengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni 'gro ba 'dul don du/ /lus srog

zas dang longs spyod kyis/ /kun la chags med tshul du bskyang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sbrang rtsi'i zhal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan par smra ba'i dpal

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skabs dang 'brel ba'i don 'gyur bas/ /cung zad yang dag don sbyor ba'i/ /phan pa ster ba'i byang chub kyis de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don 'thun pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /mthong na mi mthun med pa yi/ /dpal gyi zhing du bgrod pa'i lam/ /yang dag don la sbyor byed pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi don spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rmad du byung ba'i khyad par gyis/ /gtso bor gzhan don sems pa gang / /kun snang dpe med
mkhas pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ri rab rin chen lhun po ltar/ /brjid cing dpa' ba'i thub pa'i skus/ /sprul pa dngos por mi gnas pa/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug pa mi mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du thog ma mi dmigs

shing / /tha ma med pa'i ye shes las/ /rnam par dben don dag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /ma 'ongs byang chub don gyi phyir/ /dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin/ /

sku gsum snying po bsdus pa'i bdag /'gro don spyod phyir 'byung ba ste/ /stobs chen sna tshogs nags khrod du/ /thub pa dpal gyi rgyal po ste/ /shAkya'i dge slong li tsa bI/ /gzhon nu 'phags pa'i blo can gyis/ /rim dang cig

char rgyas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba dag pa mchog gi

le'u ste sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong khams kha lo sgyur byed pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po dge ba'i stobs/ /dpung chen thabs la mkhas pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi yon tan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /rang sems dag pa'i nor bu ni/ /yon tan du ma 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /mi zad dge ba rdzogs las 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhing bzang po mtshungs

med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dzin pa'i btsun mo rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /mnyam med bla ma

mchog dgyes pa'i/ /tshul 'di dri med 'od du 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje rab rib sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dam skyes pad ma mdangs thon ltar/ /rang rig gsal ba'i ye shes nyid/ /skyon gyis ma gos phra ba nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med ud pal 'bar

ba la/ /rnyog pa'i dri mas ma gos ltar/ /rang grol byung ba'i ye shes mtshungs/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin byed 'od 'phro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgron me

lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam nyid mi 'gyur snang ba bral/ /thob med thob bral 'gro 'ong med/ /dbri ba dang ni gang med pa'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di
bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las/ /'gyur ba med cing 'pho ba med/ /rnam pa kun du mkha' dbyings klong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod

pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du son pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye ba med las gang skyes pa/ /de ni ma skyes sbyor ba'i dngos/ /tshad

med ting 'dzin sbyor ba po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin du bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kun du rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'gag pa bral ba yi/ /chos nyid rang byung lhun gyis grub/ /de ni 'gag pa med pa'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin

po che'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid las dben pa yi/ /don dam dmigs pa'i yul

min phyir/ /'dres pa rdul tsam med pa las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thugs shin du zhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri bo gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas pa med pa gnas pa'i mchog /mchog gyur rang byung mkha' la lding / /thugs stobs chos kun 'bras bu che/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri rab lhun po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang ba'i chos can ma/ /til gyi 'bru bzhin rgyas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho sbyin sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis bdud dang bdud kyi ris thams cad 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud dang log 'dren ma lus rnams/ /byams pa'i ye

shes chen po yis/ /log rtog ma lus zhi mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs dag pa'i dpal zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal be'u/ /'bar ba 'od 'phro nyi ma'i dbus/ /dra ba rin chen nor bu ste/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhal med kyi gnas dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpe med ye shes dag pa'i gnas/ /bkod pa mdzes spras rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rang gzhan dkyil 'khor snang ba 'byung / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thub pa 'od 'phro ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun 'gro dbang phyug rdul bral ba/ /de nyid byang chub dam pa'i

yul/ /btang snyoms dag pa bla med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri med rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dren pa mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lta bas mi ngoms chog mi shes/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs mnga' ba/ /ngan 'gro'i srid pa legs skyob pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su dag par bsngo ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

yul dang dngos po byed pa po/ /rnam par mi dmigs stong pa nyid/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi 'gro ba'i sde dpon dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thar pa'i lam na theg pa che/ /gsang ba dam pa chos 'khor lo/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs bskor

ba/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i dba' rlabs gnon pa rdo rje/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpag med ye shes phra ba yis/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i byis pa rnams/ /skrag nas lam mchog dgod mdzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di
bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /ye shes bla med gnas thob pas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas mchog legs gnas pas/ /bcom ldan 'og min der rtag bzhugs/ /kun du spyad pa'i sa phyogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dag pa de bzhin nyid kyi cho ga ston pa'i le'u ste sum bcu dgu pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad/ dper na nam mkha' gang du yang / /mtshan can kun la mi gnas te/ /de nyid khyab cing bdag med pas/ /mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ /nam mkha'i chos nyid de la ni/ /kun tu rtog pa yod min te/ /

rtog cing rjes su spyod pa yi/ /bdag dang gzhan du rtog mi byed/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rmi lam lta bur snang ba ste/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa bral/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /

rmi lam dam tshig las byung ba/ /de nyid sgyu mar gyur pa dang / /khyad par cung zad yod min te/ /rmi lam dang ni dngos snang gnyis/ /khyad par cung zad yod min te/ /gzhan du de nyid rtogs par bya/ /rlung dang bcas

pa 'pho ba'i gnas/ /'gro ba kun gyi mgrin par skyes/ /yi ge oM bcas gnas pa nyid/ /a nu ta ra brjod pa gang / /gzung zhing bsgyur dang spel ba dang / /sgyu mar dran dang rgyas gdab pas/ /rmis pa bsam gtan lam
du 'gyur/ /kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du'ang mi sems so/ /skyes bu de yang bdag gis rmi lam gyi

chos mthong ngo snyam du'ang sems pa med de/ de bas na khams gsum du snang ba'i bya ba de rnams kyang / /bag chags gzugs su snang ba'i phyir/ /rmi lam lta bur bstan pa yin/ /'khrul pa de nyid rgyu med
pas/ /rmi lam nyid dang mtshungs par bstan/ /snga ma mi gnas rang grol te/ /phyi ma 'byung ba mi 'gag phyir/ /rmi lam las ni 'byung bar bshad/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la bdag med pa rdo rje

yang dag par bden pas stong pa'i gnas su rtogs par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra rnam par bsgrags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rnam par dag pas ni/ /khams dang dbang po mtha' yas dang / /bsam pa'i dri ma rang dag pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtag par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sems can tha ma 'bring dang ni/ /mchog rnams bdud rtsi thob bya'i phyir/ /lhag par spro ba bskyed pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi klu dbang 'dud pa'i rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshe dang gzugs dang longs spyod kyis/ /gling gsum gnas las mngon 'byung ba/ /
las dang spyod pa rtog pa las/ /bzlog dang ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rmad du byung ba rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams ni du ma yi/ /gling rnams kun du 'jug byed pa/ /cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab pa ni/ /'byung ba tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pa sel cing bsil ba tsan dan ltar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /gang du skye dang 'chi ba dang / /nad dang rgas dang rgud las grol/ /chu bo che las sgrol ba po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi rtog sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi spros pa tshad med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gtong ba spro dang smra ba dang / /mtshungs pa rgyan las 'byung ba gang / /de nyid dad pa'i sems grol bas/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di yi 'od zer gang spros par/ /ting 'dzin bskyed dang dad pa thob/ /bde ba skyed la sdug bsngal zhi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma

can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma rig pa dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /byang chub sems gcig

dag pa las/ /gzhan du ye shes ma rnyed pas/ /btsal du med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'du byed rnam par dag pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sangs rgyas zhing dag pa/ /de snyed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i tshogs/ /rnam

dag tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bsam pa dug med pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi can te/ /zla ba tshes pa'i ngo bzhin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal

rgyal mdzes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye mched drug rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /longs spyod gtsang ba'i bsgrubs pa dang / /lus dang

yan lag dngos po yi/ /rdul phran gyur pa legs phul ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med pa'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa'i chos

rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul ni/ /bsod nams tshogs ni sgyu ma ste/ /ye shes tshogs ni nam mkha' ltar/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul sde can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi reg pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
sems 'di gsungs so/ /yan lag bzhi ldan dpung tshogs bcas/ /bla med rnal 'byor pa yi gnas/ /zhing dang bsam pa dag pa yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa bsod nams gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshor ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /'gro ba kun

la snyoms pa gang / /brtul zhugs khyad par bstan pa ste/ /tshul 'di byang chub snying po yin zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par dag pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi dpal dgyes pas khyab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam dag pa/ /zhing khams

'gyur med rang snang ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi len pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed/ /dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas gang / /zhing khams gcig par yongs su dag /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i sgra can sangs rgyas kyi srid pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
so/ /phyogs bcu rnam pa thams cad du/ /gang zhugs bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /mdzad pa gcig pa'i rnam thar gyis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

ye shes phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du ma byon 'byung ba dang / /'das dang da ltar bzhugs

pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khams rgyud gcig pa'i ngang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rga shi rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun rtog pa zhi ba yi/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che'i bdag /mdo dang rgyud dang rtog pa las/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten 'brel dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can smin par byed pa

dang / /sangs rgyas zhing sbyong phrin las dag /de nyid mtshungs pa gcig pa'i sku/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i stan la ni/ /gnas nas dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas

rnams/ /dmigs te sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa/ /dang por spro tshogs blo ldan gyis bya zhing / /dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags pa la sogs bya/ /gang zhig thog

med srid pa'i chu klung du/ /ma lus kun rtog gis bskyed rnyog pa rnams/ /thugs rje che ldan spyan sngar de dag ni/ /rim bzhin cho gas thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /

'phags pa'i tshogs kyis dge ba mdzad rnams la/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang zhing / /byang chub bla med gnas su bsngo bar bgyi/ /sems kyi rol pa ri med zla 'dres bsgrubs/ /snying rje dam pa mi zad pa yi thabs/ /
rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing / /sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi phun tshogs gzhi/ /dngos rnams ma lus ye

shes ngo bo nyid/ /dam pa'i chos la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /'ching ba mtha' dag gnas las grol 'gyur zhing / /snying rje mchog gis bsgrub pa'i dpal dang ldan/ /rab dga' la sogs sa la nges bzhugs pa'i/ /
brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la bdag skyabs mchi/ /bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pas/ /sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag don/ /lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /sems ni dam
pa byang chub mchog tu bskyed/ /rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi lam gcig po/ /sbyin pa la sogs dkar po'i yon tan bcu/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos/ /yang dag tu ni rnam par gnas par
bgyi/ /snying rjes 'jig rten sems can ma lus pa/ /lta bas bcings pa du ma dmigs nas ni/ /yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa/ /sngags pas rig pa 'di ni bsam par bya/ /ngo bo nyid dang bral

phyir stong pa ste/ /de bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med/ /rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni/ /ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol/ /tha dad dmigs pa'i 'du shes log pa yi/ /dri ma'i dra ba rnams ni

legs bsal nas/ /rtog pa ma lus ye shes rgyal ba yi/ /snang stong dri med ngang las 'di don brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAH swa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM badzra swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/

oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de ltar ma lus 'dod pa spangs pa yis/ /bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag rang rig nyid/ /gzugs ni lhar gyur pa la yang dag mchod/ /dam tshig 'di ni bde gshegs
rnams kyis gnang / /rjes su 'thun par 'gro ba'i don rnams dang / /ma lus rgyal ba mchod par yongs su brtags/ /lus la sogs pa'i las rnams de dang ni/ /rtag tu legs par mnyam par gzhag bya / /rnam

pa 'di 'dra'i sems dang lus dang ni/ /ngag gi las rnams ci yang rung ba dag /phyag rgya dang ni sngags kyi rnam pa ru/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de gsungs so/ /de bas lus sogs dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /

rnam pa'i las rnams sems kyi dbang las gsungs/ /de ltar rtog pa ma lus spangs pa yi/ /sems ni nag po'i las su ga la 'gyur/ /dngos po gcig la'ang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /kun du rtog pas bsags pa'i rnam

pa las/ /sdug bsngal bde dang grol ba skyed byed pa'i/ /las kyi khyad par mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rab tu mi gnas ye shes sku/ /'khor ba dag cing rnam par grol ba'i thugs/ /byams mgon rdo rje de yang de ltar snang / /

tshul 'di rtogs dka' phan pa sgrub pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi don 'byung ba rdo rje'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsum ston pa snang

ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang phyug chen po ye shes kyi/ /'byung ba sku ni 'byung las gyur/ /rten 'brel snang ba gsal bar 'char/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can 'dzin rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs pa ltar snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs 'od ni bkye ba yang / /rang rig bsam gtan las byung ba/ /byang chub don gyi rgyu chen por/ /don 'byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas 'od zer don chen byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sku yi tshul gyur pa/ /rdo rje skyil

dkrung gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs rin chen brgyan pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa dag pa rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsung gi dbyangs snyan ma lus pa/ /brjod pa 'gag med rang byung bas/ /'di nyid gsang ba don bsdud pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di
bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchod rten dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
