byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbyings dang ye shes tshul gcig tu/ /mi gnas ldog pa med pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang gnas pas/ /bla med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams glang po ye shes thogs pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku gsung thugs

ni rdo rje'i ngang / /ro mnyam ye shes mtshungs med pa/ /gcig dang du ma las grol phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtog pa gcod par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi tshe la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i/ /yon tan tshad med phreng ba can dpag med

rin chen gter 'chang mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kun gyi las la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkar nag las ni rang dag btags pa tsam/ /snang tsam rgyu 'bras 'dis ni khyad par phye/ /snying po don spyod bsam gtan pa yi yul/ /mchog gyur

don ni 'byung ba'i sa zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
'di gsungs so/ /dran pa'i stobs ni mnyam bzhag pa/ /shes ldan rgyal po bag yod kyis/ /dpa' bo 'gro ba'i don la spyad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos

kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi longs spyod la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /bsrubs pas bdud

rtsi'i zhun ma ni/ /'chi med 'gro ba tshim byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa rnams/ /sems can 'dul ba'i thabs tshul gyis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

zhing khams kun du sa g.yo zhing / /'od dang sgra dang me tog char/ /dad ldan tshul dang lhan cig tu/ /dgongs pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbang mtshungs sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mos pa sgyur ba la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dran dang 'dun dang mos pa dang / /ye shes thogs med dbang phyug ces/ /rtog pa yong

bral mi phyed pa/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rdo rje'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam la dbang ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams gcig nas gcig tu bgrod pa dang / /'jug par sgyur ba'i tshul ni mi zad pa/ /bla med 'phen pa rnam dag khyad par 'phags/ /ye shes dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o
zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la dbang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye ye
shes kun/ /'du ba rgya mtsho'i chu bran bzhin/ /bsdud pa yongs su dag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi chos la dbang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bden pa bzhi dang gnyis dag gis/ /yongs su bsdud pa bcu gnyis dang / /bcu drug rnam dbye

chos 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sbyangs pa'i yon tan ni/ /bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sbyor tshul ye shes gsang ba yin/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshangs par spyod pa tshad med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtul zhugs sdom pas bde

thob ste/ /tshul khrims kyis ni ting 'dzin dang / /bsam gtan shes rab yongs grol skye/ /de nyid byang chub dgra bcom 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi gnas gos pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thim pa rdo rje ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lan tshwa chu la thim pa ltar/ /'dres pas so so dmigs

pa bral/ /gcig tu byed pa'i bsam gtan mchog /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang bzhud pa dmigs pa med

pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun chad med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de nyid 'gro 'ong bral ba'i sems/ /chu la chu bzhag gnas pa las/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can/ /mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran/ /spros pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ /mtshan
med spros pa med pa yi/ /rdo rje glu yis yongs bskul ba'i/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig rol/ /sems dpa' gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /sbyor ba rang gzugs rgyu 'thun pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi/ /

gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku/ /rig ma mngon par bsngags pas ni/ /gnas bzhi rnams su lha mo bzhi/ /rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan gyis mtshan pa'i spyan

la sogs/ /pad mo rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i/ /gsang sngags rab tu bsam pa nyid/ /'od zer lnga ni 'bar ba yi/ /sbyor ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsam/ /rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/ /bde ba phab pas bde thob 'gyur/ /bsrub dang srub

pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /ye shes yang dag bskyed pa yi/ /'byung gnas dbu ma'i rtse ru gzung / /rnam par bzlog cing drangs pa yis/ /rlung dang rnam shes bde chen du/ /ro gcig rtog pa nub pa yi/ /khyab pas rlung dang
dbyer med par/ /gnas sogs rnams su rgyas byed pa'i/ /kun du 'phel ba'i stobs rgyas pa'i/ /dbang bskur dam pa gnas par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i rtse mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid ni/ /ngo bo nyid med spros las dben/ /mnyam pa nyid la rtog mi mnga'/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i 'dren pa gcig pu pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po'i chos las 'das pa gang / /dngos

med nam mkha' dag pa yi/ /ye shes 'di ni rmad po che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dren dge ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtags pa rtog pa rab zhi ba/ /yul snang rnam rig ma grub pas/ /lugs 'byung dag pa'i nam mkha' nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nang stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi nang tha dad mi gnas pa/ /sems de gang du'ang gnas med

de/ /mdor na dngos med rang bzhin can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag bsdus pa'i chos can la/ /ma grub pa yi ngang la gnas/ /de nyid lhun gyis grub pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan stug sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rten 'brel tsam du'ang mi gnas pa/ /rang byung bdag med stong pa nyid/ /gnyis su med pa'i 'od gsal ba/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa klus sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye

shes sgron me 'bar ba ni/ /mi zad du ma ro gcig pa'i/ /dran pas stong pa bde ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don dam pa

stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bsgom du med pa'i dngos/ /bsgom pa tsam du 'dzin med de/ /mtha' las grol ba mi gnas pa/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brgyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus byas stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig las ni byang chub

'gyur/ /rtog pas stong pa'i chos nyid las/ /mnyam rjes lhag mthong spyod pa can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhum pa med pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du zhi gnas ting 'dzin gyi/ /mi g.yo ba las 'das pa nyid/ /lung du bstan pa'i phyogs las ni/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /brjod pas brtags pa rang stong pa/ /lung ma bstan las 'das pa'i dngos/ /mi phyed brjod bral ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

dbyangs byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems la rgyu med phyir thog mtha'

stong pa chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes lugs las bzlog par 'char/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos gang spang bar bya ba dang / /brten bya tha dad med par ni/ /len pa med par rang grol du/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sna tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdod nas zhi ba'i

chos nyid la/ /ma skyes skye med dag pa'i sems/ /'od gsal lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpa' bo chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos

thams cad stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /kun du bzang po bde ba che/ /mi zad lhun gyis grub pa'i don/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i gnas dpal phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med/ /nyi tshe'i stong nyid las 'das shing / /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /dus gsum rjes su mi dmigs pas/ /thog med ye shes

bstan pa nyid/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po rtag pa'i chos nyid med/ /mi rtag 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i chos nyid de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams phung

po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lta ba ma yin mi gnas pa/ /kun gzhi dag pa'i snying po nyid/ /zab cing phra ba rten gyur

pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchog rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor 'das gzung 'dzin snod bcud rnams/ /thams cad bdag med ngo bo nyid/ /stong pa nyid du'ang mi gnas pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /stong pa nyid du mi bsam zhing / /

stong min bar yang bsgom pa min/ /de nyid byang chub dam pa'i gzhi/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen
po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /

dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'khor lo'i gtsos/ /tshangs dbyangs rdo rje'i nga ro yis/ /chos 'byung rol pa ston par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar mkhan thams

cad kyi bdag rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lam tshol lam gyi lta ba las/ /rnam par bzlog pa bla na med/ /chos rgya bzhi ldan rnal mi lam/ /

zab pa zhi ba don spyod pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron me 'bar ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gso ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa bon dang ni myu gu'i bar/ /rim gyis bskyed pa yongs dag pa/ /de nyid 'bras bu ro 'byin pa'i/ /thabs tshul 'di ni dag pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid

phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srog rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam dag zhi ba'i chos nyid ni/ /btags pa'i gnas las

rnam grol ba/ /ye shes rgyal ba kun khyab pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mngal las skye dang sgong nga dang / /rdzus te skyes dang drod gsher las/ /skye ba'i sems can ma dmigs pas/ /sems can spyod pa

mi dmigs so/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
so/ /'gro drug la sogs khams gsum pa'i/ /sems can rnam shes rang nyid las/ /rang 'khrul log shes kyis bcings pa/ /de grol byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa mngon par rtogs pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gso ba skyes bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

btags pa'i yid spyod ma zhugs pa'i/ /snang las ma nges grol 'gyur zhing / /sgrib med rang gsal mthong ba ni/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag rgyas pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi gang zag rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul rkyen rdzas las grol ba yi/ /the tsom rnam bral sgro 'dogs chod/ /rigs med phyir

na ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor shes rab mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shed bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams rgyud dag pa'i sa gnas pas/ /sa rnams bgrod pa go 'phang mchog /rtse gcig rang byung rang grol bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid tshim mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shed las skyes rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba

rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs/ /dag pa ye shes bdag med pa/ /gnyis med mnyam pa rnam rgyal bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab byin pa sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i yul min zhing / /gsang ba'i shes rab ral gris ni/ /log lta

phung po gcod par byed/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spyi dang bye brag bla med gnas/ /yang dag ye shes rnam grol bas/ /zag med tshul ni zhi ba las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa chags med mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshor ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /de bzhin nyid la

legs gnas pas/ /sna tshogs kun spyod mi dmigs te/ /de nyid ye shes chen por bstan zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bos byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji ltar 'dod pa rang grol du/ /sbrul mdud lta bur bcings las 'da'/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo ye shes mthong ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stobs ldan

skyes bu mchog gis ni/ /gang du rtsal gyi rten mthong bas/ /shugs kyis 'gro ba mda' bzhin no/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

slong ba po rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du spong ba sor zhugs shing / /rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /yongs su

shes na rnam grol gyis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang po'i gnas las lhag pa'i stobs/ /stong gsum chos kyi dpal ldan pas/ /ye shes char 'bebs ston pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po shugs 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las sna tshogs ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bsam

mi khyab/ /nam mkha'i gzugs su yongs bzhugs pa/ /'dus pa bla med dgyes par rol/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sku'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gsang ba la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /gtsug tor tshad med gzhal med pa/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi spyod yul te/ /de nyid gsang ba bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yan lag drug bcu'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /yid
'phrog dpag med rdo rje'i gsung / /sems can sna tshogs der ston pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab spyod yul lo zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pas byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
thugs kyi gsang ba'i gnas rdo rje'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems kyi gsang ba dag pa ste/ /sems kyi las ni yongs dag pas/ /sems
can khams dang mthun par 'jug /bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /thub pa don gyi ye shes can/ /sku bzhi ye shes rab rdzogs pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid 'di gsung

bar mdzad/ /gang du gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po 'di 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma 'byung ba rnams ni ye shes dgyes pa chen pos khyab cing gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid

bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob la/ des chos thams cad yongs su dag cing phyin ci ma log par khong du chud pas gnas par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi lha chen po tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang

phyug chen po dang / gu lang dang / drag po'i rigs su gyur pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par chos 'di la bsrung ba'i phyir de 'dzin pa dag la mchod cing rten par byed do/ /'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus 'byung gnas so/ /phyir mi 'ong

ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dgra bcom pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /'phags pa rang rgyal ba la gnas pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung

gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin par rig par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi 'byung

gnas bla na med par rig par bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yang 'di las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /'di ni gsang ba chen po ye shes kun du 'byung

ba'i gzhi gcig par gnas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang
ba yongs su mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas su bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs

pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thog mar byung ba dang / bar du da ltar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i don dang / tha mar phyi ma'i dus na nges par 'byung

ba'i gsang chen nges par 'pho ba'i tshul gyi rnam grangs du ma nga yis bshad par bya yis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas dang dus dang chos kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa du ma 'byung ba nges par zung cig /

'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon 'byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin du srog gcod brtson par 'gyur/ /
bskal pa drug 'dzin zhes bya la/ /sangs rgyas zla ba mi 'khrugs pas/ /thams cad zhe sdang can gyur la/ /srog gcod pa la brtsams pa yi/ /dam chos dgongs te bshad pa la/ /slob dpon chos kyi 'khor lo

dang / /dge slong nag po gtum zhes pa/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rnam spyad pas/ /nag po bdud kyi sha zar gyur/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas/ /thams cad dmyal ba'i srungs mar skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /
sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje can gyis ni/ /zhe sdang rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /srog chags gsad par gyis zhes pa/ /khams gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /'khor ba'i rnam rtog

bsad na ni/ /de ni mi bskyod zhing du skye/ /rdo rje can gyi sdom pa las/ /zhe sdang rigs kyi dam tshig yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab

la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /rnam par shes pa gti mug pas/ /ma byin len la brtson par 'gyur/ /bskal pa gzung dka' zhes bya la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi mchog /

seng ge 'od kyi rgyal po la/ /bstan pa'i dam tshig gnas pa'i tshe/ /thams cad gti mug shes che la/ /gzhan gyi nor 'phrog spyod par 'gyur/ /de dag ldem por dgongs pa la/ /slob dpon seng ge zla ba yis/ /dge slong bzod

pa can zhes pas/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rnam spyad pas drag po mun pa can zhes pa'i/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas/ /thams cad dud 'gro'i gnas su skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad

pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis ni/ /gti mug rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /khyod kyis ma byin long zhes pa/ /chos rnams rmi lam lta bu las/ /'phags pa'i nor rnams blangs nas ni/ /stug po bkod pa'i zhing du skye/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa las/ /gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe

sems can thams cad ni/ /shin du g.yem la sred pa yis/ /mi tshangs spyod la 'jug par gyur/ /bskal pa bcud ldan zhes bya la/ /pad mo 'od 'phro mi bzad zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/ /thams cad 'dod chags

spyod gyur la/ /log par shin tu g.yem par spyod/ /'dod chags kyis ni thar thob ces/ /de ltar dgongs te gsungs pa la/ /slob dpon pad mo dpal zhes pas/ /dge slong rgyal ba mchog ces la/ /rjes su bstan dang gdams pa

las/ /skye ba de yi 'og tu ni/ /drag byed mtha' la gnas pa ni/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pa/ /thams cad yi dags gnas su skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /chos 'dzin pa yi

gsung rdo rjes/ /'dod chags rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /gzhan gyi bud med spyod ces pa/ /chos rnams mig 'phrul mtshungs pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo rnams/ /ye shes bde bar rol par bya/ /shes rab bud med

spyad na ni/ /bde ba can gyi zhing du 'gro/ /chos 'dzin pa yi sdom pa las/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i dam tshig yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtog pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul

ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin du le lo'i dbang gyur cing / /brdzun du smra ba dga' bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa gzi chen snang ba'i dus/ /bde gshegs rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes/ /sangs rgyas de yi bstan pa la/ /'gro

rnams shin du phrag dog can/ /de la brdzun tshig gis grol zhes/ /rgyal bas dgongs te bstan pa la/ /slob dpon rta mchog ces bya bas/ /dge bsnyen zla ba zhes bya la/ /gsung rab don rjes bstan pa las/ /shin du 'khrul pas

gnas par 'gyur/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rnam skyed pas/ /drag byed 'khrul pa can zhes pa/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas/ /thams cad dbang sgyur bdud kyi lha/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs

te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /gdon mi za ba'i phrin las kyis/ /phrag dog rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /khyod kyis brdzun du smros shes pa/ /chos rnams dri za'i grong khyer las/ /thams cad brdzun pa slu ba'i

tshig /sgyu ma lta bur bsgrags nas kyang / /kun rdzob spyod pa'i gnas bstan pa/ /'brug sgra can gyi zhing du 'gro/ /las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa las/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i dam tshig bstan/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag

nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba'o/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin du nga rgyal cher spyod cing / /tshig rtsub dag gis spyod par gyur/ /bskal pa mi
gnas pa zhes la/ /bde gshegs dkon mchog dpal zhes pa'i/ /bstan pa de la gnas pa'i tshe/ /phal cher nga rgyal gyis non cing / /ngag ma bsdams pas gnas par gyur/ /rtsub pa'i tshig rnams smras pa yis/ /

des ni thar pa thob ces pa/ /rgyal ba dgongs te gsungs pa la/ /slob dpon nyi ma'i dpal zhes pas/ /dge slong 'byor pa can zhes la/ /bka' yi dgongs pa bstan pa las/ /gsang ba'i don la rnal 'khrul bas/ /

drag byed 'jungs pa can zhes pa/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pa/ /thams cad lha min srin po'i gnas/ /ri rab sul la gnas pa skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /

yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro bas/ /nga rgyal rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /snga phyi'i chos ni bden mthong bas/ /'khrul pa'i spyod las log pa ste/ /rtsub pa'i chos rnams smras pa yis/ /ye shes thob 'gyur zhes pa la/ /dngos

por 'dzin pa skrag byed pa'i/ /yang dag kun rdzob chos nyid kyis/ /rang bzhin med par bstan pa yis/ /de dag spyod pa don ldan pa/ /rdul dang bral ba'i zhing du 'gro/ /rin chen rigs kyi sdom pa yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon

byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa rgyas par 'gyur/ /bskal pa rgyan bzangs zhes

bya la/ /bde gshegs dpal ldan dri med pa/ /ye shes bzang po'i bstan pa la/ /thams cad nyon mongs lnga spyod pa/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa rags par gyur/ /nyon mongs ma spangs 'tshang rgya zhes/ /rgyal bas dgongs te

gsungs pa la/ /slob dpon kun du bzang po yis/ /dge slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rab la/ /log par spyad pa'i rnam smin gyis/ /sgra sgrogs sde can zhes bya ba/ /chung ma

nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas/ /mi yi gnas su srin por skyes/ /lang ka pu ri'i rgyal por gyur/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /gsang chen rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /dug lnga'i

rang bzhin gyis bsdus brtul/ /nyon mongs ma spangs lam 'gyur zhes/ /chags sdang rang bzhin shes nas kyang / /dug gsum ye shes gyur pa ni/ /gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i lam/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing du skye/ /bla na med pa'i sdom

pa las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig yin/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa gdul ba ni/ /zhe sdang can la khyab 'jug dang / /gti mug can la tshangs pa dang / /'dod chags dbang phyug chen po dang / /phrag dog dga' rab dbang phyug dang / /nga rgyal can

ni brgya byin gyi/ /rigs dang 'thun pa'i char bsgyur nas/ /sems can log pa'i lam du btsud/ /rang gi spyod yul mi 'da'i phyir/ /de la bar chad sna tshogs pas/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul/ /de ltar rdo rje

can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /lha rnams gdul bar mdzad nas ni/ /gsang ba'i ye shes ston par byed/ /de ltar gdul bya gang dang gang gi don du dgongs te gsungs pa rnam par nges pa thun mong ma

yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gsang ba nges pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni gsang ba mchog tu mi 'gyur

ba rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling gru gsum chos kyi 'byung gnas so/ /'di ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi zhing khams kyi snying por gyur pa'o/ /dus phun sum tshogs pa ste/ dus rnams kyi snyigs ma la bab pa thog

ma dang dbus dang tha ma rnam par dag pa ste gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul lo/ /'chad pa po ni ston pa ste/ 'dir dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang

bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pas 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor gyur pa nyid do/ /de dag kyang chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu mi zad pa'i don la rab tu dgongs pa dag go/ /de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /'di lta ste 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes

sems dpa' ni rgyal po zas gtsang mar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dbyangs ni lha mo chen mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lha mo dpal gyi lu gu rgyud ma ni grags 'dzin mar gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ni sgra can 'dzin

to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa kun tu gcod pa ni shA ri'i bur gyur pa'o/ /kun du bzang po ni gnas brtan kun dga' bor gyur to/ /kun du bzang po rnam par rol pa'i sku can ni maud gal gyi bur gyur pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin

ni gnas brtan lha sbyin no/ /tshangs pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i 'od du gyur pa'o/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba shAkya thub pa nyid du gyur to/ /de ltar mdo dang thun mong

du spyod pa'i don du gsungs so/ /'dir ni gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'i don du so sor phye nas gsal bar bshad par bya'o/ /'di lta ste da ltar phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkyil

'khor gsang ba spyi'i don du bstan te/ /gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje ni phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa can gyi kun dga' bor gyur to/ /kun du bzang po ni maud gal gyi bu'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni kun

shes kau Di n+yar gyur to/ /blo gros mi zad pa ni shA ri'i bu'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'od bsrung ngo / /sa'i snying po ni ma 'gags pa'o/ /byams pa ni nye ba'i 'khor ro/ /nam mkha'i snying po ni gnas brtan chen po rab

'byor du gyur to/ /gzugs rdo rje ma ni skye dgu'i bdag mo'o/ /sgra rdo rje ma ni dbyangs ldan ma'o/ /dri rdo rje ma ni rigs ldan ma'o/ /ro rdo rje ni dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma'o/ /reg bya rdo rje ni sa 'tsho mar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas spyan ma ni sa'i

lha mor gyur to/ /mA ma kI ni 'od mchog mar gyur to/ /gos dkar mo ni pad ma grags mchog ma'o/ /sgrol ma ni sna tshogs 'od 'chang mar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa sman gyi bla dri ma med

pa bai dUr+ya'i 'od du gyur to/ /rnam par snang byed de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng ge thugs rjes 'od kyi snang ba mi zad par gyur to/ /'od dpag tu med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od 'phro mi zad par gyur to/ /

gdon mi za ba grub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rin chen 'byung ldan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal rin chen 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'

ni de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes kun du bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/ de ni gzhan yin par mi blta ste da ltar nga nyid yin no/ /gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcu rnams la 'di lta ste/ dpal

gshin rje mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas su gyur/ /bgegs mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya bar gyur/ /dpal rta mgrin ni rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur/ shes rab

mthar byed ni sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo mi g.yo ba ni pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ dbyug

sngon can ni de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam par gyur/ khro bo stobs po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po ni sangs rgyas pad

mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du mngon par 'byung

ba la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang gsang ba 'dzin pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen

po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i 'od dang / gsum gyi sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul gyis spyad pa spyod pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad

byang chub kyi shing brgyad dang bcas pa las mngon par byang chub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs

pa sna tshogs bdag nyid du gcig pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa ta la'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can ni mya ngan med pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar

me can ni tsU ta'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel ni b+ha ta pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub ni ka ra tsa pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bsrung ni par ka ti pa'i shing gi

drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni par ti pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni nA ga ke sa ra'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dus gsum du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad kyi zhing khams na bzhugs shing yongs su skyong bar mdzad de/ gang du rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yongs su
gzigs shing byin gyis rlob par ston pa yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la

bka' stsal pa/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'byung ba'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par gyis shig /de yang gang zhe na/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gang du byon pa'am 'jug par

mdzad pa dang gang nas gshegs pa dang / gang du gnas pa'i don gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i mdzad pa shes par gyis shig /gang du 'di ni mngon bstan pas/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung ba dag /mngon par byang chub

gnas nyid las/ /'byung dang 'jug par gnas pa dang / /phrin las mdzad pa du mar ston/ /dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho tshul dang / /lhums su 'jug dang sku bltams dang / /gzhon nu rol dang khab gnas dang / /skyed mos

tshal byon gnas gzigs te/ /mngon par 'byung dang gshegs mdzad cing / /dka' skyed mdzad dang bzhengs pa dang / /byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang / /bdud bcom mngon par byang chub pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor

mdzad de/ /'di ni dus rnams kun du yang / /thog mar thun mong lam bstan cing / /rab tu dge ba mtshan ma med/ /tha mar the tshom sel ba yi/ /byang chub sems kyi spyod yul dang / /rnam par nges pa phra bar bstan/ /

sangs rgyas ma lus 'di dag nyid/ /zhi bar 'jug pa ston pa dag /bla na med pa'i spyod yul lo/ /sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yis/ /sems kyi rol mo las byung ba/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po ston pa yis/ /mdzad pa phyi nang

gsang ba ste/ /dga' ldan pho brang rang lus kyi/ /bde chen spyi bor gnas pa nyid/ /dam pa 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i gnas/ /rdo rje sngags kyi de nyid las/ /ting 'dzin mnyam par gyur pa ni/ /ji ltar skar mda' 'pho

ba ltar/ /byang chub sems kyi glang po ni/ /mche ba drug ldan du gyur pa/ /snying rjes chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rtsa yi pho brang kha sbyar du/ /byang chub sems ni zhugs par gyur/ /der gnas lhums su 'jug pa

nyid/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid 'jug /thabs dang shes rab nus thob pas/ /g.yas rtsa nas ni 'byung gyur pa/ /bltam pa'i mdzad pa zhes brjod do/ /bde ba'i nus pa 'phel ba las/ /rgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa

brgyad kyi/ /pad ma yi ges bgrod pa dag /gom pa bor ba'i dus yin no/ /rlung sems 'gro ldog gang gyur pa/ /'khor dang myang 'das bskyed pa ni/ /bram ze mtshan mkhan drang srong gis/ /lung bstan brjod pa de yin no/ /

de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa las/ /rjes thob yul la spyod gyur pa/ /spros bcas spros med rnam dbye bas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga la/ /gzhon nu rol pa'i spyod pa yis/ /lus kyi gnas sogs kun du rol/ /dbyangs

dang gsal byed gyur pa yi/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo'i yi ge rnams/ /pho mo ma ning dbye ba yis/ /yi ge'i gnas la mkhas pa yin/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag /'pho tshul grangs dang dbye bsdu yi/ /rgyu tshul spro bsdu gang gyur pa/ /

rtsis kyi gnas la mkhas pa'o/ /sa chu me rlung nus pa yi/ /glang po brkyal dang 'gegs pa dang / /lpags pa rim pa bdun gyur la/ /shing sogs rim par gnas gyur pa/ /rlung gi gzhu la me mda' yis/ /'phang ba chu
rgyun 'bab pa yin/ /dang por shes rab las thob pa/ /byang sems dmar po gsang gnas su/ /dbang byas btsun mo khab gnas shing / /'byung bzhi'i rlung rnams btsun mo'o/ /smin mtshams kyi ni mdud pa

der/ /thig le phra ba brtan pa ni/ /steng du nyi zla gzas zin pa/ /sgra can 'dzin du brjod pa yin/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /phyogs bzhir skyed tshal gzigs pa ni/ /zag bcas rtsa rlung thig le yis/ /

srid pa bskyed pa gang yin pa'o/ /zag med bde ba thob 'dod pas/ /de yi tshul la 'jug pa ni/ /rlung gi rta dang bcas pa yis/ /dbu ma'i mthongs las byung nas ni/ /byang chub sems kyi mchod rten dag /'khor ba'i

dra ba bcad nas ni/ /chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram nyid du/ /ye shes mngon du byed 'dod pas/ /btsan thabs su ni 'gog pa dang / /lus ngag gcung la bor ba yis/ /zug dang dka' thub spyad pa ni/ /mnyam rjes gnyis su

med pa yis/ /rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnas pa'o/ /aHthung gsos shing rgyun phab pas/ /'o ma'i bdud rtsi gsol ba yin/ /gang ba byang chub shing drung du/ /rdo rje skyil dkrung gyur pa yis/ /rtags dang yon tan 'thob byed

cing / /snang ba gsum ni thim pa'i tshe/ /zla ba nyi ma mun pa yi/ /rtog pa'i dra ba gang yin pa/ /bdud btul ba ni srod kyi dus/ /rnam rtog ye shes thim gyur pa/ /nye bar thob pa'i skad cig la/ /skad cig khyad par lnga pa

la/ /tho rangs skya ring shar ba'i dus/ /nam mkha' sprin med lta bu yi/ /nyams kyi shes pa 'od gsal ba/ /khyad par mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas thob pa yin/ /'khor lo bzhir ni bdud bcom pas/ /
bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod pa yin/ /mgrin par zag bcas rlung 'gags pas/ /klu yi gnas su zhugs pa ste/ /tshangs pa spyi bo nas 'pho zhing / /sa rlung thig le dang bcas pas/ /gser gyi 'khor lo ldan pa

yin/ /thams cad dbang du gyur pa ni/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus dang / /'gro drug sems can thams cad kyis/ /tshangs pa lha dang bcas pa dang / /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskul ba yin/ /sgrol

rgyu'i tshal ni mdzod spu ste/ /tshong dpon gnyis ni rtsa gnyis te/ /lam gyur stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /lnga sde bzang po zhes bya ba/ /dug lnga bskyed pa'i rtsa dang rlung / /bden bzhi chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /sprul pa'i gnas su gsungs

pa ste/ /bA ra na si zhes bya yi/ /thog mar chags pa'i gnas yin no/ /cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba/ /mu stegs gdul ba'i don du ste/ /dpa' skong kun brjod rdzu 'phrul dang / /byin gyis rlob pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /
log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad/ /mtshan ma med pa'i chos gsungs pa/ /snying ga'i gnas su bstan pa ste/ /rgyal po'i khab dang bya rgod spungs/ /gnas kyi khyad par theg pa che/ /khyad par 'khor rnams

bstan pa la/ /zab cing rgya che bstan pa yin/ /spyi bo mgrin pa smin mtshams dang / /gsang ba la sogs thams cad du/ /don dam ngo bo nyid kyi chos/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid don gsungs/ /gnas gzhan rnams su thub pa yis/ /

chos rnams thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis/ /mdzad pa sna tshogs gang bstan nas/ /srog rtsol de bzhin nyid thim zhing / /thams cad mngon du gyur pa yi/ /sku bzhi ngo bo nyid skur thim/ /bde

chen rang byung dri med pa'i/ /dag pa'i zhing khams rab mi gnas/ /rtog med ye shes nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang du mi mjed 'jig rten gyi/ /'dod khams dbang phyug gnas 'dir ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byung ba/ /

dpag med bskal pa 'das pa'i dus/ /thub pa chen po mar me mdzad/ /nga ni bram zer gyur pa yis/ /sems bskyed zhus tshe bsten pa na/ /mngon par lung bstan thob par gyur/ /de nyid 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang / /

gsang ba'i gnas 'di ma gsungs shing / /de yi gong rol sngar 'das tshe/ /sangs rgyas thub chen mchog nyid dang / /rin chen gtsug tor can dang ni/ /rnam par gzigs la sogs pas kyang / /gsang chen 'di ni ma gsungs

shing / /log par dad sel gser thub dang / /rgyal ba 'od bsrungs dag gis kyang / /gsang ba 'di dag ma gsungs te/ /de nyid ston pa'i don du ni/ /gsang chen gnas kyi don 'di dag /de dus sems can thams cad

la/ /gang du mngon par spyod pa dang / /thun mong bslab pa'i tshul bstan cing / /'di nyid gsungs par ma gyur to/ /gang du ma 'ongs dus na yang / /byams pa la sogs rgyal ba yi/ /bskal bzang sangs rgyas du

mas kyang / /'di dag lha mi'i mngon sum du/ /gsang ba ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /'gro drug sems can sna tshogs la/ /snyigs mar gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /dbang po rno zhing don spyod

pas/ /dus la bab par shes par bya/ /'di nyid nye bar 'byung ba yang / /gling 'di nyid las gzhan du min/ /gang yang 'og min zhing khams ni/ /ye shes snang ba rgyas pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bcom ldan gyis/ /rgyun mi

'chad cing khyab pa dang / /rtag cing 'gyur med mchog gis ni/ /gsang chen 'di ni kun du ston/ /gang yang 'das dang ma byon dang / /da ltar 'byung ba ma lus pa/ /gsang chen mchog 'dis ma bgrod par/ /byang chub thob par

mi 'gyur te/ /'di ni mthar thug gnas yin pas/ /de las gzhan pa'i spyod yul min/ /'di nyid gnas pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob/ /'di nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rim/ /phyogs mtshams

brgyad tu snang ba yi/ /dur khrod gnas brgyad sprul pa la/ /phyi nang gnas kyi dbye ba yis/ /phyogs skyong ba dang zhing skyong la/ /mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / /grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ste/ /snying po ye shes phyag rgya dang / /phrin

las rol pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /'jig rten pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ /dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos ye shes kun du rgyas pas phyag rgyas rtags mtshon pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mdzad pa'i phyag rgyas

rgyas gdab phyir/ /zhi ba'i don du phyogs skyong gyur/ /de yi rtags ni 'khor dang bcas/ /yum dang rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /grub pa'i rtags kyi rgyas gdab phyir/ /zhing skyong brgyad du khro bo'i tshul/ /ljon pa'i shing la brten

nas gnas/ /zhi ba'i tshul gyis rgyas gdab phyir/ /de yi zhon pa'i gdong brnyan byung / /phrin las phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir/ /tshar gcad rjes 'dzin las rnams mdzad/ /rdo rje dbyug to zhags pa dang / /be con

bgrang phreng ral gri dang / /ba dan tri shUl 'dzin par mdzad/ /snying po ye shes phyag rgya yis/ /rgyas gdab phyir ni gzhal yas kyi/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du bkod pa yin/ /rol pa'i phyag rgya spyod pa'i phyir/ /

dur khrod brgyad du gnas pa ste/ /lha dbang bcas dang ma mo dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dang / /'byung po'i tshogs dang drang srong dang / /sha za rnams dang rig 'dzin tshogs/ /sde tshan brgyad kyis bskor ba yin/ /zhing skyong

drag po'i las byed phyir/ /phyag na gri gug thod pa bsnams/ /shin du 'jigs pa gtum pa'i gzugs/ /shing brgyad nang nas lus phyed thon/ /lus kyi phyag rgya sbas pa yin/ /de yang so so'i yum dag ni/ /shing gi rtsa bar

gnas pa ste/ /zhal zas stobs pa'i tshul du gnas/ /glang po ma he chu srin dang / /rta mchog phyogs gcig gnas pa yin/ /ra dang ro langs ri dgas dang / /khyu mchog bzhi ni mtshams su gnas/ /steng phyogs tshangs

pa ngang pa zhon/ /'og phyogs sa bdag rus sbal zhon/ /lha dang lha mor mtshungs pa ste/ /'di dag rang bzhin gyis gnas yin/ /chags pa dang khro bo'i skus 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa

bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nyid kun du sprul mdzad pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs sbas nas/ /zhi ba'i skus ni mi 'dul ba'i/ /sems can gdug pa gdul ba'i

phyir/ /rang rig ye shes byang chub sems/ /drag po khro bo'i skur bstan pas/ /khro bo zhes ni rnam par brjod/ /gang du rjes su 'dzin pa ni/ /rnam par bsgyur te zhi bas na/ /slar yang zhi ba de bzhin gshegs/ /

chos nyid mnyam par 'byung ba'o/ /'di dag gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can don du thabs ston mdzad/ /shAkya thub pa bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag nyid chen po'i byin brlabs las/ /rnga bo che dang gaN Da dang / /

chos kyi dung las grags pa dang / /sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra las ni/ /gang zhig dam chos sgra byung ba/ /'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kyang / /chos kyi 'gro ba gang

yin dang / /dus der brgyud pa'i chos bstan pa/ /de snyed bde gshegs rgyal ba yi/ /dngos kyi byin brlab rig par bya/ /ston pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /mi gnas ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /don byed ston pa 'byung

ba ni/ /bla med bka' yi dgongs pa dag /yang dag nges par bkrol nas kyang / /gang du dam pa'i chos sgra yis/ /'gro ba smin par byed pa ni/ /de dus nga nyid der bstan pas/ /bstan bcos shin du rgyas par 'gyur zhes
gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas
gsang ba chen po thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi brtag pa bzhi pa las rdo rje dpal mchog

chen po gsang ba'i don gyi rgyal po'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje skye bo 'od chen po/ /'dod dang thar pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes gsang ba bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis

gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes kyi nor bu chen po du ma'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod par byas so/ /mchod par byas nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
mdun du bdar zhing 'dug ste gsang chen gyi don la phyogs gcig tu zhugs te yongs su spyod par gyur to/ /de la 'di ni gsang chen gyi/ /sku gsum bla med phyag rgya che/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus
pa'i/ /chos rnams 'dus pa'i mchog yin te/ /'di ni khyad par dus 'byung ba'i/ /dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas skus khyab pa/ /sku yi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /ji snyed sku yi rnam pa

mnga'/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po don grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gnas/ /gsung gcig gnas las gyur med kyi/ /mos pa du mas so sor thos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag la/ /ye shes sna tshogs ting 'dzin las/ /mi 'gyur nam mkha'i ngang bzhugs pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa nor bu'i lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /sems kyi rgyun ni mi 'gag phyir/ /ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya yi bar/ /

thub pa'i zhing khams bdag po ni/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod las byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las dang las kyi rnam par

smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu yi/ /snang ba mi 'gag stong pa nyid/ /de nyid rang bzhin gyis dag brjod/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thams cad du son pa'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dper na nam mkha'i khams 'di ni/ /thams cad rjes su song gyur kyang / /sems pa mi ldan de bzhin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas ma lus par mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
'dir ni sems can khams mtha' yas/ /de yi chos nyid rjes 'gro ba/ /rtog pa mi mnga' de nyid do/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po yon tan sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni rgyal ba'i sku nyid kyang / /
spros med de bzhin nyid dag pa'i/ /rjes 'gro rtog pa med pa nyid/ /spros pa med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa smra 'don dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa

mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yongs su dag pa'i snang ba gang / /mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las ni/ /spang blang dbri bsnan med par grol/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron me'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcu yongs su dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /chos sku ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /chu rlung nam mkhar dag pa gang / /gzugs sku'i rtogs pa mkha' la gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa ye shes brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sha'i spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thogs pa med pa rdo rje yi/ /pha lam ltar ni phrin las dag /
stobs bzangs kyis ni yul du gyur/ /snang med rnal 'byor pa yi gnas zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa dang ni gzugs dag ni/ /lha yi spyod yul gtsang ma'i gnas/ /'jig rten khams kun snang bar byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes las/ /dbyer med bden pa gnyis dag pa/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol brnyes sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi byang chub pa'i spyan rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba/ /chos kyi gter dang ldan pa las/ /rjes su dran pa'i spyan
gyis ni/ /dus gsum shes bya mi gzigs med ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gi gser sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyan rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang
chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus gsum mnyam nyid rnam dag pas/ /dus kyi 'du shes 'jug med pa/ /skad cig ye shes spyod yul ni/ /snang ba med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa sgra can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan lnga rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gzigs pa'i yul med pas/ /

blo snang btags pa'i tshul ma grub/ /de snang gdul bya'i don spyod pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i
lam bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes gzhal du med pa nyid/ /mi gnas rnam par mi gnas pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur
mi rtog pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'du shes dang ni sems pa dang / /lta ba phyin ci log spangs nas/ /ye shes mngon par byang chub pa/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes zag pa med pa'i dbyings/ /rang byung
bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /nam mkha'i khams ltar rten med pas/ /dmigs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa la/ /
mchod pa gnas kyi don 'di gsungs/ /me tog rigs ni lha mo'i cha/ /de nyid ye shes dbyings bstan pa'o mkhas pas ud pa la dag ni/ /'byung ba lnga yi rnam pa ste/ /pad ma rnam pa lnga nyid ni/ /'dod

yon lnga yi bye brag ste/ /dzA ti rnam gsum zhes bya ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lha mo ste/ /kar ni ka ra chu yi lha/ /ma li ka ni me yi lha/ /yu ti ka ni sa yi lha/ /ka ra bI ra rlung gi lha/ /lha mo 'dod

pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri rdo rje/ /ro dang reg bya rdo rje ma/ /spyan dang mA ma kI dang ni/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ste/ /lha mo dgu yi rol pa gang / /gsang ba lha mo ye shes mchod/ /

me tog nyi shu rtsa lnga yi/ /rnam pa gsal ba bstan pa'o/ /gna' ma'i me tog pad ma dang / /ta ma la dang tsam pa ka /ku mu ta dang na ga ge sar/ /na ba ma li da ma na/ pun ta ri ka da ma na/ /man+da ra ba pri yang ku/ /se pha

li ka su na ka /bil ba'i me tog ka tha ra/ /sa li ki la ku dza ta/ /a san ke ta sha 'bras bu/ /khardzu ri ka bak+ku la/ /rag ku ta dang a sho ka /kar ku To Da pun d+ha ste/ /me tog ji bzhin bdug spos dang / /zhal zas

bye brag shes par bya/ /dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang
ba'i lha mo'i mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos sku ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /spros pa med cing mtshan nyid med/ /rtog bral byang chub sems kyi ngang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa legs byin dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi ge rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun mtshan nyid rnam bral bas/ /

de phyir nyon mongs med ces bshad/ /rtog pa sna tshogs dag pas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yon tan dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi

snying po kun du 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos dbyings tshad med stong nyid pas/ /sangs rgyas sku yang de rjes 'gro/ /ye shes lus su yang dag

bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs tshad med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rdo rje'i rtogs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba'i gsung ni chos dbyings kyi/ /nam mkha'i gnas dang mtshungs par yang / /rdo rje'i gsung du ston pa pos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin gyis ni

dag pa'i bdag /bde gshegs thugs ni rjes 'gro bral/ /rdo rje thugs te mi bzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rta

bdun dpal rdo rje'i zer lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi dang nang du rtog med pa'i/ /dbus na ye shes mi shigs pa/ /gsang ba rol par yang dag 'byung / /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gya nom pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zla ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

nyer 'gro nyer spyod mi gnas pa/ /khams gsum bskyed dang sdud bral ba'i/ /byang chub mchog tu ston pa po/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros phra ba sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rten pa'i gling rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khrul pa dag cing dri ma spangs/ /sna tshogs spyod pa las grol zhing / /phyi rol rnam
rtog spangs pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'brug sgra'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /so sor snang ba du ma dang / /gong du gcig pa'i dngos gang yin/ /de nyid yongs su bsdus pas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad ma'i rtsa ba'i snal ma lta bur phra ba ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshogs drug
snang ba ma 'gags pa/ /sems dang yid dang rnam shes las/ /snying gi chu skyes sad byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i tog sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dal zhing dal ba'i gnas las skyes/ /zhi ba g.yo med nyid
du 'jug /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid/ /g.yeng ba bral ba'i bsam gtan la/ /mchog tu grub pa mthong byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par brtse ba chen
po yis/ /gcig dang du mar mi gnas par/ /sgra brnyan lta bur ston par mdzad/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhan gyi
sems shes pa'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams kyi sems can rnams/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma

gnas/ /de yi rgyu dang gnas shes pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo spong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du yul dang yul rnams kyi/ /dbye ba shes pas ye shes mtha'/ /sna tshogs rigs kyi rgyu nges

pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa sngon gyi gnas shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas kyi gtan tshigs rags pa dang / /phra ba ma lus pa yi gzhi/ /zhag gsum lon pa bzhin shes phyir/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa bden pa'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa'i rgyun ni

rnam bcad cing / /spong ba dag pa'i tshul gnas pa/ /spang du med pa'i ngang du grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par shes

pa drug dag pa'i rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu 'thun goms pa'i dbang gis ni/ /de yi 'bras bu 'grub par byed/ /de yi rtsa ba
ma skyes phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang

mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pa sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa kun dang khams dang ni/ /skye ba las ni yongs grol bas/ /

bral ba'i 'bras bu dag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa dang rtags rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang du gyur pas dngos po las/ /ldog pa med pa'i 'bras bu gang / /thob pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o
zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang las rdzogs pa/ /gang du dbus su legs gnas pa/ /

snying por gyur pa gtso bo ste/ /gzhan rnams len cing 'dzin par brjod/ /rdzus te skyes dang mngal las skyes/ /sgong nga las byung drod gsher skyes/ /'di dag dag pa'i lhar gyur pas/ /dkyil 'khor grong khyer de dang

mtshungs/ /gnas med ye shes tshul bstan pa/ /rdo rje rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /cho ga gsum dang mngon par ni/ /byang chub rnam pa lngar gsungs pa/ /gal te skad cig dran rdzogs gyur/ /thams cad rigs kyi dbye

ba yis/ /rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bstan/ /rigs ni dbye dang bsdu ba yis/ /bye brag mkhas pas shes par bya/ /'byung ba lnga nyid sangs rgyas lngar/ /mi yi lus ni brtag bya ste/ /dngos de nges par bsgoms
pa yis/ /rang sems mthu yis sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /phyi rol 'gro ba mi mdzes pa/ /slob pa'i 'gro ba'i slar ldog yin/ /mi slob pa yang ma lus yin/ /bde gshegs gsum du rnam par gshegs/ /

gzhan du rnam par 'khrul 'gyur bas/ /bla ma'i bka' las legs par blang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam
pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dri ma med pa gnas pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa sbyin sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi thugs rje'i khyu mchog rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin/ /bskyed pa'i tshul byung rnam dag pa/ /ye shes de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dga' ba dag pa tshad med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /thob med thob pa stong nyid sku/ /byang chub dang sems gcig tu bshad/ /dag pas rtog pa dag par 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i sku

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi btang snyoms chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyab pa'i sku yi phrin las dang / /'jam dbyangs gsung gi dbyangs gang dang / /skye med

ro gcig ye shes thugs/ /dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje rgyal po lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong gsum zhing khams snod bcud kun/ /ma lus sangs rgyas nyid kyi ngang / /snying po chos kyi don byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa blo dbyangs dpal byang chub don ston pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bas mtha' dben pa nags tshal du/ /gcig pu ri dgas kun gnas pas/ /

bsam gtan rnam thar sgo gsum gyi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyun gyi gnas pa rdo rje dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye bo kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ /drang srong dri med spyan mnga' ba/ /bag yod pa ni rten gnas yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa 'gro bas mchod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bkur sti rim gro'i gnas gyur pa/ /dran pa mi

brjed gnas bstan pa/ /thub pa blo gros bzang po ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i logs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i rnam par grol ba rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa las/ /bsgribs pa med cing 'bad med pa/ /re dogs rnam par bral ba yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung po'i gdon thams cad dag par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems
'di gsungs so/ /gang du mkha' la rgyu ba'i gdon gyi rigs/ /thams cad tshad med thugs rje'i chu rgyun gyis/ /tshim par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' che/ /de nyid bla med byang chub sems su brjod/ /ces

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ba bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku dang
gsung dang thugs kyis ni/ /byin brlabs ye shes rgya mtsho yi/ /mtshungs med bde bar sgyur ba ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpal ldan phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yis/ /sras po gcig

par dbang bskur ba/ /tshim byed ye shes mchog dbang po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du brjod pa'i cho 'phrul bstan

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs chos kyi sgra 'byung ba'i/ /sil snyan brag cha'i sgra mtshungs pa'i/ /rgyun chad med par rab ston pa/ /de nyid don dam chos rgyun
bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /sku yi rol pa mi zad pa/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams khyab par/ /rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud dpa' skong ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud dang nag po'i phyogs gyur la/ /skrag par byed pas tshar gcod pa'i/ /cho 'phrul

bcu drug bstan pa gang / /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mdo yi sde la sogs/ /bcu gnyis tshul dang ldan pa bzhi/ /bslab pa gsum gyi dbye ba yis/ /chos kyi de nyid bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang

ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don so sor yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul snang sems kyi ldog pa dang / /chos rnams ngo bo nyid shes na/ /

dag pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig so sor yang dag par rig pa rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yi ge'i gnas dang rkyen dag dang / /'byung ba'i tshul dang sde tshan gyi/ /rnam dbye mkhas pas dpyad par bya/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes
gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du dga' bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du thogs pa med pa yi/ /seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs byed cing / /dpal gyi gnas las kun du rgyal/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

don yod par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de dag mi dmigs

mnyam pa nyid/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med/ /rang bzhin dag pas snang ba gang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro ba bcom pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las

rdo rje dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po dang ni mtshan ma yi/ /rnam par rtog pa dag pa'i phyir/ /dngos por mi gnas gzhan snang la/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /dag pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /ye shes can rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsung ba gsung ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su
med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las lhag pa'i ye shes 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchog sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'i phyogs dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bdag 'dzin nyon mongs med/ /ngar 'dzin zhi ba'i chos can la/ /

bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dmigs med thugs rje yis/ /byams pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ /bla na med pa'i don bstan pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs
so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu sbyin par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dmigs

pa kun dang bral ba'i sems/ /nam mkha'i ngang las 'ja' tshon ltar/ /de nyid thogs med ye shes kyis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi dri za'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs rol mo'i cha dang ni/ /sil snyan rnams las sgra byung ba/ /ston pa'i chos kyi tshig

grags pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha ma yin gyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rnam par gtsang ba yi/ /dri ma rnam spangs bde ba'i lam/ /ye shes phyag rgyas brgyan pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha' lding gi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi
spyod yul ba/ /'di ni rnam dag byang chub lam/ /rnam grol rang rig bde ba che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'am ci'i gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che/ /gsung ba 'dzin
pa mtshungs med pa/ /rgyal ba rigs kyi bdag po'i dpal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi mdangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lto 'phye chen po'i
gdon dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa la gnas pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /dag pa chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i/ /shing rta chen po'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /bzhi

drug ldan pas bgrod pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshungs pa med pa chos kyi don/ /spros pa med pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'bras bur ldan pa'i gnas 'di las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o
gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
gnas pa med pa dri gsum spangs/ /thub pa rgyal ba spyan rdo rje/ /blo gros mi zad ye shes te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal mchog gi ka na ka sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi yi dags kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye ba med cing 'byung ba'ang med/ /grub pa med pa'i

chos nyid las/ /kun du snang ba mi slu ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i gtsug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srul po'i gdon dag pa rdo rje'i
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi 'jigs pa yi dngos po las/ /zag med dngos grub 'byung ba yi/ /dben pa rnam par mi rtog pa/ /

ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus srul po gdon dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi
sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal/ /thub pa byang chub shing drung du/ /bdud dpung sde rnams rab 'joms pa'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa spos gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skem byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /smra ba'i seng ge bla na

med/ /glang po chen po thogs pa med/ /pha rol 'joms pa gyad bzhin te/ /de yi nor bu'i tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dregs pa spangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smyo byed kyi

gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sna tshogs cho 'phrul tshogs/ /sems can mos pa'i snang ba la/ /du ma nyid du bstan gyur pa/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjed byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /'thun snang gang zag mos yul te/ /de bas yang dag sangs rgyas la/ /kun rtog mi mnga' lham me bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
tshangs par gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi grib gnon gyi gdon dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas la/ /'bad dang rtsol ba'i rtog mi mnga'/ /mtha' yas byang chub sems kyi ngang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sha

za'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tha dad rtog pa yongs mi mnga'/ /rang rig ye shes 'gro 'ong med/ /thams cad grub mtha'i 'dod

pas brtags/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med bdud kyi dpung las rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di
gsungs so/ /ma chags thogs med rdo rje yi/ /char sprin mdog 'dra'i rtog spangs nas/ /tshad med byams pa chen po yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng

ge'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag byang chub thabs ldan pa/ /gang tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos/ /de nyid rang bzhin

stong nyid grub/ /mtha' med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'dir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas shing gsang ba bla med kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar gnas pas
ni nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su spyod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par spyod par byed do/ /gsang ba 'dzin par
