mo mngon par ston cing mi zad pa'i ngang las yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma'i skur bstan nas thogs pa med par de bzhin

gshegs pa nyid du mngon par spyod par mdzad do/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /gsang chen ye shes dbang bskur ba/ /mnyam nyid bde ba chen po yis/ /ye shes dri med dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang / /

cod pan nyi shu rtsa lnga yis/ /rig pa'i dbang ni ston par mdzod/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin par gyur/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa'i/ /myi bskyod rang byung byang chub sems/ /

rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od/ /'khor lo 'dus pa'i rgyal chen por/ /rdo rje rtag pa ye shes can/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ro/ /dpal ldan yid bzhin gter 'chang

ba/ /dbang phyug chen po chags pa med/ /rin chen 'byung gnas nor bu 'dzin/ /rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /dpal ldan pad ma 'bar ba'i mdangs/ /rab 'bar rgyal ba'i spyan 'chang ba/ /'od dpag med pa

thub pa che/ /pad ma rigs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas phrin las sku/ /ye shes rgyal po sgyu 'phrul che/ /gdon mi za ba thogs pa med/ /las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta

a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye bru~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+ha tiSh+Tha badzra rata na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye a~M`/ oM na maH

sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra pad ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye hrIH oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye kha~M/ de yang chu'i dus su ni mi bskyod pa'i bum pa'i chus bkru bar

byed do/ /rin chen gyi ni me tog phreng ba rna ltag g.yas par ro/ /pad ma yi ni bum pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /las kyi ni rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni bkra shis du ma'o/ /rin chen 'byung

ldan gyis ni dbu rgyan rtse lnga pa nyid do/ /rdo rje mi bskyod pa ni bum chus char dbab pa'o/ /pad ma'i ni rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bcas pa'o/ /las kyi ni sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /brtag pa'i bkra shis brjod pa nyid do/ /snang

ba mtha' yas kyi ni rdo rje 'bar ba gtad pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ni khrus char ro/ /rin po che'i ni me tog rab tu gtor ba'o/ /las kyi ni sgra brnyan gyi tshogs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gsang sngags brjod pa'o/ /don yod grub
pa ni dril bu gtad pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ni khrus char ro/ /rin po che'i ni me tog char ro/ /pad mas ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lo mas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa'o/ /rnam par snang

mdzad kyi ni gsang mtshan gdags pa'o/ /rin chen gyi ni me tog spyi bor ro/ /pad ma'i rdo rje mgo thog tu'o/ /las kyis ni dril bu mgo thog tu'o/ /rdo rje ni rdo rje dril bu bsnol bas mgo thog bzhag cing bum chus gtor

ba nyid do/ /de ltar rigs kyi dbye bas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du rab tu shes par bya ba nyid do/ /gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags kyi lha tshogs rnams kyi sku sna tshogs pa lta bas ni kun du sku'i dbang ngo / /gsang

sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags du ma'i sngags brjod pa dang sgra du mas ni kun du gsung gi dbang ngo / /gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags kyi snying po dang ting nge 'dzin du mas ni kun du thugs

kyi dbang ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po mngon par thob par 'dod pas ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin par bya'o/ /spyod pa brtsam par 'dod pa la ni brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sems

can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu ji ltar thabs kyis 'dul gyur pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /gzhan dag drug dang bla ma ni/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /chos gos ri dgas rna ba ltar/ /

mar me mdzad dpal phyag rgya las/ /gsang ba chen po'i tshul bstan pas/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te/ /thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso/ /rkang gnyis gtso bor 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs phyag rgya sbyin mdzad de/ /

dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /dbang mchog thob pa tsam gyis ni/ /slob ma yon tan bdag por gyur/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa dang / /

der ni bdud las rnam rgyal zhing / /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yis/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /khyed rnams the tshom med pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig ma rnam par gzhug bya zhing / /bla

na med pa'i bla ma las/ /bdud rtsi dag pa'i blo blang bya/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i byang chub sems kyi rgyun/ /rang 'bab ye shes bcud kyis len/ /'chi med ye shes dbang bskur ba/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas

kyis/ /byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems bzang pos/ /bu khyod dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de nyid longs spyod rtsal sbyangs te/ /gsung gi rdo rje rab bsgrub phyir/ /rtog med bde ba'i gnas las

skyes/ /dri med gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas rig ma'i dbye ba ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /glang po can dang ri dgas ma/ /dung can ma dang sna tshogs can/ /pad ma can ni rim shes pas/ /phyag rgya'i dbang ni

thob byed yin/ /las kyi phyag rgya ma shes rab ma ste/ lo bcu gnyis ma 'am/ brgyad gnyis ma 'am/ bcu gnyis gnyis ma'i rim pa ste/ de yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par skyes pa 'am/ sngon gyi smon

lam rnam par dag pa'i stobs las grub cing ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun las byung ba 'am/ dbus kyi yul du skyes pa/ dbang po tshang ba/ yan lag nying lag yongs su rdzogs shing mtshan dang ldan pa/ dbang bskur ba thob cing

sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes pa las a ba d+hU tI ston pa 'am/ ston pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma de las kun 'dar gyi sna rtse las bskyod pa'i bde ba las dga' ba dang / mchog dga' dang dga' bral dang /

lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las ye shes mngon sum du nyams su myong ba skyed cing / de las thob pa des snang grags brtan g.yo ma lus pa la rgyas btab pa'i ye shes ro gcig pa'i ngang du rtag tu gnas par bya/ des

ni gsang ba'i spyod pa la gnas na shin du myur ba nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par byed do/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'od kyi rig ma las byung ba rang snang ba'i lha mo las rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya chen po ni lhan

cig skyes pa'i ye shes byin brlabs bla ma'i brgyud pa las thob par byed do/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa'i ye shes las 'da' ba med par spyod pa ste/ gsang ba zab dang rgya che ba'i/ /ye shes

rab tu mi gnas pa/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong ro gcig tu/ /bla med gsang chen dbang bskur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sras bcas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal mchog 'dir ni gang bstan pa/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du/ /rigs kyi dbye ba bsdus pa'i lam/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i khyad par gang / /bya ba spyod pa'i tshul kun gyi/ /rgyud sde sna tshogs lha rnams kyi/ /dbang bskur rab tu thob pas na/ /gnyis su

med pa'i rgyal zhes brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dbang

bskur ba chen po tshad med pa rdo rje'i le'u ste drug bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang ba dag pa'i tshul gnas te/ /phrin las sna tshogs sbas pa yi/ /de nyid rab tu bstan pa'o/ /'di

ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gsang ba'i dbang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i tshul yang dag par dbang bskur ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi phyed pa ste/ dpal
gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba la spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras thu bor gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyis grogs

tshangs par mtshungs par spyod par blta ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po du mas ni yang dag par srung bar byed do/ /lha mo'i tshogs rgya mtshos ni kun nas de la yongs su mchod par byed/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug chen

po dang / khyab 'jug dang / gu lang la sogs pa du ma lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa du ma rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang mchod pa'i rten du byed la/

dngos po phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed do/ /de'i phyir de'i gnas kyi sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te/ 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snying por bla na med par gnas pa kun du bzang po'i spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor du ma'i sgo nas sems can gyi bsam pa rdzogs par bya ste/
gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po tshad med pa bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dbugs
dbyung ba dang / gzeng bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa thob par byed pas 'bras bu'i lam las mngon par dga' bas rgyas par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor bzhugs/ /
dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pas/ /yang dag ye shes mtshan nyid can/ /gnyis med mnyam pa nyid sbyor bas/ /sna tshogs du ma las 'phro ba/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /dpag med 'od zer
tshogs las ni/ /dbang bskur gyur pa'i lhag pa'i lha/ /'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /lus ngag yid la gnas nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje'i rgyun las ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /dbyer med

ngo bo nyid gcig pa/ /bde ba chen po'i ngang bzhugs pas/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga las/ /mnyam par sbyar ba'i yan lag gis/ /bde dang bde chen lhan cig skyes/ /dpal mchog rang byung phyag rgya che/ /'di

las bcom ldan 'das bdag byed/ /sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab/ /yang dag dbang ni skur byed pa/ /de nyid bla ma yin par brjod/ /'dir dbang skur ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /slob dpon de las gces pa yi/ /srog

ni gzhan du yod ma yin/ /rdo rje byang chub sems nyid dang / /tha dad med phyir bla ma ni/ /rgyun du mchod cing bsten byar gsungs/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su ni/ /bla ma la ni nges par dbul/ /'dis ni dngos grub ma
lus pa'i/ /'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs par bstan/ /dpal ldan dbus kyi gnas gyur pa/ /'khor lo mchog gi 'khor lo nyid/ /bla ma mchog la dus rtag tu/ /spyi bos btud de phyag byar 'os/ /'di ni spyod pa

bstan pa la/ /zab pa yi ni spyod pa dang / /de bzhin rgya che ba yi tshul/ /gnyis med bde ba chen po yis/ /brtul zhugs tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /lha mo nyi shu'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan kun rol pa/ /'dir ni

rgya cher gyur pa ste/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms ma dang / /so sor 'brang dang rma bya che/ /tshal 'dzin ma dang rjes 'dzin ma/ /tsun da dang ni ral gcig ma/ /nor rgyun ma dang rin chen sgron/ /'od zer can dang dug sel ma/ /

ri khrod lo ma can dang ni/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mtha' yas sgo dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ /shes rab 'phel byed las sgrib sel/ /ye shes mi zad za ma tog /sangs rgyas chos kyi mdzod dang ni/ /

ku ru kul+le gdugs dkar mo/ /'di dag gzungs kyi lha mor brjod/ /zab pa'i spyod tshul bla na med/ /lha mo dgu dang lhan cig tu/ /gsang ba'i ye shes rol pa ni/ /mgon po kun du spyod pa'o/ /gnyis med ye shes

bde ba che/ /lha mo lnga dang bcas pa yi/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ni/ /mnyam bzhag chen po'i spyod pa yin/ /'di dag spros bcas spyod pa dang / /spros med ye shes tshul gyur pa/ /shin du spros pa med pas ni/ /

'dod dang bsam pa 'jug pa dang / /dus kyi khyad par rnam dbye bas/ /b+hu su ku dang kun du bzang / /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /tshar bcad pa dang rjes 'dzin gyi/ /phyogs

las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /brtan g.yo dbang du sdud pa'i phyir/ /bag med 'tshe ba rnam spangs pas/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul sbyor ba/ /stong nyid ye shes shes rab mas/ /khyogs dang brlabs dang khyung lding dang / /bkal

ba dang ni bskyod pa yis/ /tshangs par spyod dang bde bar rol/ /de nas gsang ba'i tshul gnas ma/ /rdzogs par rlung gi rnal 'byor bslab/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu mnyam bzhag las/ /'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bya zhing / /ji srid

'bum gyi bar du ni/ /sgra dang bral bar rtag tu bzlas/ /sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar ni/ /'bum bzlas yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /'chi bdag 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ /ye shes lnga yi bar dag tu/ /'chi ba bslus

par the tshom med/ /rtag tu nang par tho rangs dus/ /stong phrag gcig tu chags med par/ /de nyid rdo rje bzlas byas pas/ /bar du gcod las bzlogs pas na/ /de phyir rlung gi rnal 'byor la/ /kun du mnyam bzhag
gnas par bya/ /de nyid bum pa can bcings pas/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba 'thob/ /de nyid rig pas lus kun las/ /lus kyi khong stong rtsa sbubs dag /rlung gis nges par dag byas pas/ /de nyid rngub pa

dang bcas pas/ /khyad par 'joms pa rlung gi las/ /dbu ma nyid du gnas pa ni/ /'byung ba zag pa med pa dang / /shin du bde ba skyed byed yin/ /rlung gis sems ni skyon med par/ /rab zhi 'byung ba ldog pa dag /

gcig tu gnas par byed pa'i las/ /'di ni rnal 'byor lam du gsungs/ /sgo lnga'i rlung ni bsdu ba yang / /dbang po nang du zlog pa las/ /phyi rol nye bar dmigs mi 'gyur/ /'di ni yid kyi rlung zin pa'o/ /

g.yo bcas rnams la rengs byed pa/ /srog ni brtan pa'i tshul gyis su/ /'gyur ba med par gyur pa gang / /snang ba'i rlung ni brtan pa'o/ /brtan pa'i yal ga rlung gi lam/ /rab tu gtod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /srog rtsol

'bog par gyur pa na/ /g.yo med brtan pa nus pa thob/ /tshad dang grangs las 'das pa yi/ /mnyam med kun 'dar mar gnas pas/ /rtog pa ma lus nub pa'i tshe/ /nyon mongs bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /rtog pa kun las mi g.yo

ba/ /de nyid ye shes rgyal ba che/ /dkyil dkrung gcig la gnas byas te/ /byang chub shing la rgyab rten nas/ /mnyam bzhag nye bar bcings pa la/ /bsdams grol khyad med gyur pa dang / /kha zas gos kyi rtsol med pa/ /phung

po'i bdud las rgyal ba yin/ /rlung ni rgyu ba mi tshor dang / /dbu mar 'byung ba brtan pa yis/ /dngos rnams sgyu mar mthong ba yis/ /lha yi bu yi bdud las rgyal/ /rang rig ye shes kyis dag pa/ /nyon mongs dug gsum

rlung dag la/ /tshar bcad pas ni 'jig rten lha'i/ /gzugs dag 'gas par byed pa yin/ /rjes gzung bas ni slar sdud pa/ /gcig tu byed pa 'di las 'grub/ /nang du zla ba'i rlung bzung nas/ /'khrul 'khor drag spyod

gtum pa can/ /A li las byung dag pa las/ /zla bas 'pho bar mi nus so/ /gsang ba bzlog pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /chu tshod lnga yi bar dag tu/ /nyi ma'i rlung la kA li yis/ /bcings pas nyi ma 'pho mi 'gyur/ /gzung

dang 'dzin pa rnam bral bar/ /rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa nyid/ /phra ba sems kyi rnam pa las/ /rnam rtog ri bo bcom pa'i phyir/ /phyi rol ri bo 'joms pa dang / /thal bar yang ni byed nus pa/ /bsam pa phun sum tshogs

pas so/ /dug gsum las ni rang bzhin rnams/ /log rtog dri ma ma lus pa/ /gzhom byed mi g.yor gnas byas nas/ /dpung chen dengs par the tshom med/ /'khor ba'i chos nyid spangs pa na/ /dug nyid bdud rtsir sgyur ba dang / /

rang byung bdud rtsi sbyangs gyur pas/ /bkres skom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /bsam pa rnam par dag gyur la/ /dug sbrul 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ste/ /de las gzhan du bzlog pa yis/ /dug sbrul gzhan la spong bar byed/ /shin du

khros par gyur nas kyang / /klu rnams la ni bka' bsgo bas/ /log par lta ba'i rgol ba kun/ /dug sbrul chen pos za bar 'gyur/ /gal te dad gyur de dag la/ /ting 'dzin spo ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dug rnams skad cig gcig gis sel/ /

ye shes rlung las gyur pa yi/ /'pho med mi chod rdo rje las/ /sems can gdug pa'i srog chags che/ /stag sogs kha ni 'ching bar byed/ /gang du thabs dang shes rab las/ /mnyam sbyor khu ba'i rnam pa ni/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga de las ni/ /

bskyil dang bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gang gA la sogs chu bo rnams/ /gang zhig bzlog ste 'bab par gyur/ /rtsa gsum las ni byung ba dang / /rtsa phran gzhan las 'bab pa dag /gal te bzlog par gyur pa dag /shin du chu bo skems

par byed/ /srid rtse la sogs 'jig rten pa'i/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin gnas byas la/ /de nyid stong par bcug na ni/ /lha chen dag kyang 'jig 'gyur la/ /gzhan du ardza ka bzhin byed/ /de nyid du ni gsang chen gyi/ /phrin las

phran tshegs bstan pa ste/ /rgyud kun du ni ma bstan cing / /sbas pa lkog tu gyur pa yin/ /gzung 'dzin rtsa las rlung 'jug pas/ /'khor ba'i srid pa skyed par mdzad/ /yang dag kun 'dar nyid gnas na/ /rnam grol zhi ba

mchog thob 'gyur/ /lte ba'i gnas su srid zhi dag /sna tshogs 'dus par 'byung gnas te/ /rtsa bcings lha yi bu yi bdud/ /'byung po bye ba la sogs pa/ /phyi rol du ni 'dul bar mdzad/ /skyon dag yon tan gyur
pas na/ /mtshon cha'i char la sogs pa yang / /rin chen me tog dag tu 'bab/ /sdug bsngal bde bar shar ba'o/ /snying gar yang dag yongs gsol bar/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa nus gyur pas/ /yid bcings pas ni
phyi rol du/ /nyon mongs dri mas mi gos pa/ /spangs pa rnam dag lam gnas pas/ /nyon mongs bdud ni bcom pa'i phyir/ /mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs pa las/ /rnam par bskyod pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /mgrin par longs

spyod yongs grub pas/ /rlung bcings pas ni ro drug la/ /longs spyod bkres rgud mi mnga' ba/ /gnod pa sna tshogs zil gnon cing / /yan lag drug bcu'i dbyangs 'byung zhing / /phung po'i bdud las rgyal bas ni/ /mdangs

dang 'od zer lhag par 'byin/ /rlung 'bog zag med gnas thob pa'o/ /spyi bo gtsug tor 'byung gnas der/ /thig le 'gyur ba med brtan pas/ /'chi bdag bdud las rgyal ba ste/ /dge ba ye shes dri med lam/ /mthar phyin rnam

par rol pa yi/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bcings pa med cing grol med la/ /'gyur ba med par bzhugs pa'o/ /nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang / /drug brgya bcas pas rlung dag na/ /thams cad dbu mar thim pa

ni/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung / /kha sbyor du ni gyur pa las/ /sbyor ba de la goms byed na/ /des ni 'od gsal go 'phang gnas/ /gang gi rnal 'byor spangs pa dang / /rlung gi rnal 'byor spong byed pa/ /

des ni bde ba mi 'thob cing / /skyes bu tha shal de dag brlag /dus kun du ni g.yo ba yi/ /rlung la rnam par goms pas ni/ /lus sems gnas rnams byin brlabs phyir/ /kun du son par gyur pa'o/ /de las bde dang sdug

bsngal dang / /mtho ris ngan song gar 'jug pa/ /lus kyi sgo nas 'pho ba nyid/ /rang dbang du ni 'byung bar bstan/ /snying ga'i rtsa yi yan lag ni/ /brgyad po bkra shis yan lag gyur/ /de nyid lha mo lus gnas pas/ /

dpal be'u la sogs mdzes par byed/ /mgrin pa'i gnas su skyes pa yi/ /rtsa yi yan lag 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / /las kyi rigs las byung ba yi/ /sems dpa' bzhi bzhir yang dag 'byung / /de nyid

rnal 'byor rgyud du bstan/ /lte bar mngon par 'byung ba yi/ /rtsa yi ljon shing 'dab rgyas pa/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhir 'byung ba'o/ /spyi bo'i gnas su skyes pa yi/ /tshul ni yang dag sum bcu gnyis/ /mkha'

'gro sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag /yul dang yul du 'byung ba yin/ /nang du dbu ma'i khong stong du/ /du ba lta bu'i snang ba 'char/ /de las rnam par mngon gyur pas/ /gnod pa sra ba'i skyon bral te/ /brtsig pa dag la

mi rdug ste/ /bar snang bzhin du thogs pa med/ /nang du dbu mar rang byung ba'i/ /smig rgyu lta bu 'char ba ni/ /brtan pas lus la dbang thob byed/ /chu la sa bzhin bya ba la/ /nges pa nyid du mngon par 'byung / /kun 'dar

ma yi stong pa der/ /'byung ba me yi rang bzhin las/ /srin bu me khyer mthong gyur pa/ /'bar ba de nyid brtan pa las/ /bsregs kyang mi 'tshig grogs su 'char/ /brgyal bar gyur pa'i bde bar 'gyur/ /dbu ma'i khang

pa'i mthongs su ni/ /mar me 'bar ba gang gis mthong / /phyi nang rten 'brel 'dzom pa na/ /sna tshogs rlung gi stobs chen gyis/ /bskyod par mi nus phrin las te/ /gal te myur bar ye shes 'gro/ /gal te a ba

d+hU tI'i nang / /gzhal yas ye shes dag pa der/ /thams cad nam mkha' lta bu yi/ /stong pa nyid du 'char ba la/ /ye shes sprin med nam mkha' ltar/ /chags med mkha' la lding bar 'gyur/ /bu ga dgu nas rgyu ba'i rlung / /rnal

'byor pas ni mnyam zin pas/ /byung ba spangs pas gnas pa nyid/ /de tshe dri chen dri chu dang / /ngar snabs mi 'byung stobs su 'gyur/ /sku yi rdo rje'i rtags yin no/ /gang du lus kyi 'byung ba bzhi/ /me rlung

mgrin par brtan gyur pas/ /de nyid du ni sprul pa dang / /stod las me 'bar 'od zer stod/ /dgug pa'i las kyis 'grub pa yin/ /chu rlung snying gar brtan pa las/ /'byung ba chu ru 'bab byed cing / /kun du sdud par byed

pa dang / /zhi ba smad nas chu 'brub 'char/ /rlung gi rlung ni lte ba ru/ /mnyam par zin na phyi rol du/ /du mar sprul par nus pa dang / /rdo rje rkang mgyogs nyid thob byed/ /sa yi rlung ni gsang gnas su/ /zin pa de la ri bo ltar/ /

mi g.yo dkyil dkrung mi phyed cing / /glang po lta bu'i nus par 'gyur/ /de nyid srog dang rtsol ba ru/ /rab tu thim phyed rdo rje yin/ /snying gi rtsa mdud grol ba las/ /pad ma'i 'dab ltar rgyas par byed/ /smin mtshams

gnad kyi sgo phye nas/ /mdzod spu kun du 'byung bar byed/ /'dis ni 'gro ba'i lus kun la/ /'jug pa rdzu 'phrul cher ston to/ /'phel bar byed pa'i rlung gis ni/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i gter thob pas/ /bum pa bzang po

grub pa'o/ /yon tan dri ma med pa'i rlung / /sna tshogs lha mo rol pa can/ /bcu drug phrag ni bzhi dag tu/ /brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/ /de las kun du spyod pa yis/ /gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa 'grub/ /'dir ni bdud

rtsi bcud len du/ /nyams pa med pas dbang thob pas/ /mi snang bar ni byed pa yi/ /rdo rje bcud len mchog yin no/ /rtog pa'i tshogs ni bde don du/ /mi rtog ye shes rgyal po ru/ /bsgyur ba rlung gis byed pa can/ /gser

'gyur rtsi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /gang du dngos po yongs bsgyur nas/ /bde ba chen por spyod pa can/ /mi ro lus las dngos grub brten/ /ye shes ro langs dngos grub yin/ /chos kun sgrib med rang gsal du/ /rgyu 'bras

mtshan nyid don spyod pas/ /sa 'og gter mthong sa le ba/ /dngas pa'i ting 'dzin ngang las byung / /ting 'dzin ye shes log rtog la/ /rnam gcod ral gri'i dngos grub ste/ /gar 'dod dbang phyug grub pa'i rgyal/ /'dir

ni rlung sems sbyangs pas 'grub/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i pha rol du/ skad cig gis phyin nyi zer zhon/ /dngos po du ma'i snang ba la/ /sgyu mas sprul pa cher ston pas/ /mchil lham dngos grub phra mo yin/ /rags pa mchog ni

mkha' la spyod/ /gang du rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /mkha' la brten pa'i pho brang las/ /dag pa'i tshul gyur lus kyis ni/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gzhal med la/ /khyad par mkha' spyod zhes brjod do/ /sa 'og lha min

phug stong las/ /gang du brgyud pa rnyed nas ni/ /ri rab la ni mngon 'dzegs nas/ /gnas pa thun mong mkha' spyod de/ /gzhan du rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ /dkyil dkrung rdo rjer sangs rgyas pa/ /snying po mi 'gyur 'byung
gnas yin/ /gnas gzhan longs spyod 'phags pa'i yul/ /ri rab zhes bya mi yi lus/ /'byung ba bzhis ni bsdus pa dag /rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor ba'i/ /lha tshogs

dag tu gyur pa ste/ /de yi rdul phran lus las byung / /de nyid rten dang brten par bcas/ /de snyed bcas par yang dag 'byung / /dur khrod brgyad dang bcas par ni/ /'khor yug 'jig rten sprul pa dag /nges par 'byung

ba bstan pa yin/ /dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rig pa ni/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /phyi nang spyod pa'i dbye ba yis/ /lus kyi gnas su kun du rol/ /mar me'i rtse dang rab 'bar bcas/ /chu bo'i rgyun ni 'bab pa'o/ /

rtsa ni rgyas pa zhing skyong la/ /rlung bcu phyogs bcur gnas pa las/ /phyogs mtshams dbye bas phye ba yin/ /shing ni rdo rje can gyi rtsa/ /drung ni spros pa med pa ste/ /byang chub 'od gsal zhes bya ba/ /rtsa ni dbu

ma nyid las sten/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa dang / /srid zhi mnyam par spyod pa'o/ /'gro ba kun la khyab pa yi/ /bla med byang chub sems kyi mthus/ /zhe sdang gi ni gnyen po ches/ /khyab 'jug 'dul bar
mdzad pa'o/ /bdag nyid phung po khams dang ni/ /skye mched lha ru gsal ba las/ /'dod chags rtog pa dang bral ba'i/ /dbang phyug chen po 'dul ba'o/ /tha mal rtog pa dag nas ni/ /zhen med sku ru gnas

pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dul byed pa/ /gti mug dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje ra ba la sogs pas/ /brgya byin la sogs phyogs skyong bcu/ /nges par 'dul mdzad bsrung ba che/ /bka' yi 'khor lo bstan pa yin/ /

tshad med bzhi ni goms pa yi/ /ye shes mthu yis skar mda' gtong / /'di yis dga' rab dbang phyug ni/ /phrag dog bcom pas de bzhin gshegs/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /gsang ba 'dir ni mngon brjod

pas/ /'dir ni skyes bu gang 'jug pa/ /blo gros ldan pas chos 'byung ba'i/ /kun du bzang po nges par ni/ /'gro ba'i don du bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang

ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las las phran tshegs bstan pa dang spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mchog mkhyen pas/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /

dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ngos re zhing / /dpag tshad re la cha chen te/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /logs re la ni gnas pa ste/ /dpal ldan 'dus

pa'i dpal mchog las/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che/ /rnam par mkhas pas rtag par yang / /rigs rnams rab tu dgod bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lha mo dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /
gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po bzhir bcas pa'i/ /so so'i dbu mas gyur pa yi/ /'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /re re zhing du rigs kyi bdag /gsang ba rigs kyi bdag po yis/ /

rgyas gdab dkyil 'khor khyad par bya/ /lha rnams khyams la dgod pa ni/ /khro bo drug dang bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis las bsdus pa yi/ /tshangs pa dang ni gsang 'dzin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byung

bas na/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong dag ni/ /dbus su nye bar gzigs pa gang / /rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / /ral gri 'bar bas khyab pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo

ni/ /phyogs bzhir khyab par gnas pa ste/ /shin du rgya che'i rnam pa yis/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du/ /gru bzhi shin du gsal ba yi/ /mdzes pa rta babs dang ldan pa'i/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i pho brang las/ /

mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgya la sogs/ /gsang ba rab tu mchod pa'i phyir/ /shes rab can gyis gnas su bsam/ /

'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ /de la mchod pa rgya mtsho dbul/ /de nyid phyi nang gsang ba yi/ /rim pas rab tu phye ba yi/ /phyogs dang dus kyis gnas pa yi/ /lha mo drug brgya bdun bcu dang / /rtsa lnga yi ni mchod
pa nyid/ /nges par bsdus pas nyis 'gyur du/ /rin chen na bza' la sogs pas/ /byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi/ /gnas de yin par rnam par bsam/ /bdag ni thugs

kha'i sa bon las/ /mchod pa'i sprin rnams spros nas ni/ /nye bar gsang ba'i rim pa yis/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu lus kyi lha rnams mchod/ /de nas de nyid 'dus pa yi/ /snying po bskul
ba brjod par bya/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /khams kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /dpag med bye ba la gnas te/ /ye shes mngon par ston mdzad kyang / /

mi zad khams kyi ye shes las/ /'dod yon sgyu mar rol pa yis/ /yongs su spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /de nyid rnam par mi rtog pas/ /bskul ba med pas mi g.yor bzhugs/ /gang du gsang ba la spyod pa'i/ /rig 'dzin mngon

par brtson gyur la/ /spyan ras kyis ni mi gzigs te/ /gang du mngon par mi 'tsho la/ /kye ma rigs kyi bu 'di dag /gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gsang chen spyod pa'i tshul gnas la/ /yongs su rdzogs par gyur to

zhes/ /spyod pa med phyir rgyu 'di ru/ /snying po rab tu bskul bar bya/ /gang du mi mjed la sogs pa/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyar gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas chos 'dzin rgyal po ni/ /sprul pa'i skur ni gyur pa yi/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi dam tshig la/ /dmigs pa tshig gi lam brjod pas/ /gsang sngags mchog gi snying po yi/ /snying po rab tu gsang ba gsungs/ /gzugs kyi khams nyid oM du bsdu/ /'dod khams kyi ni A las te/ /
gzugs med hU~M du brjod par bya/ /khams gsum bdag nyid gcig pa'i ngang / /mchog gi khyad par gsang ba yi/ /snying po bskul ba nyid yin no/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i
'byung gnas nyid/ /sku gsung thugs ni ro gcig tu/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs par gsungs/ /spyod yul byung ba oM yin te/ /dmigs pa med pa A yin no/ /mi shigs hU~M du gyur pa'i phyir/ /tha dad

med pa'i spyod pa'o/ /'di ni longs spyod rdzogs sku yi/ /snying po mchog tu bskul bar gsungs/ /gsang ba rigs kun bdag po yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la/ /mi g.yo gnas med rtag pa las/ /gcig tu gyur

byed don du ni/ /gsang ba sku yi ngo bo oM / /dri med 'byung ba skye med AH/ /rtog med stong nyid ye shes hU~M/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /mi phyed gcig gyur lam 'di las/ /rgyun mi 'chad du bskul gyur na/ /
zhag bdun gyis ni nyer 'grub ste/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgya dag gis/ /thun mong ma yin gnas pa'o/ /ye shes yongs su dag pa'i gnas/ /sku yi snying po rab tu bskul/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor bye brag tu/ /

rang gi rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /ma 'dres dag par bskyed pa las/ /rnam par snang bar ston pa'o/ /de nyid rigs ni lnga dag gi/ /rnal 'byor yongs su spyod pa las/ /bla med phyag rgya chen po'i gnas/ /gsung gi snying
po bskul gyur pas/ /tshad med byang chub ngang las bskul/ /'di ni dam tshig chen po yin/ /mchog tu gsang ba bdag med pas/ /sa gsum du ni khyab pa yis/ /bde ba lhan cig skyes par bskul/ /de nyid dbyer

med sgyu ma'i lam/ /yi ge mchog gyur gcig pa las/ /rlung sems gnyis su med par ni/ /thugs kyi snying po mchog tu bskul/ /gang du lhag pa'i lhar gyur cing / /rdo rje 'dzin par gnas pa las/ /'od zer lcags

kyu ma 'dres pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lngas spros pa las/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin nyer spyod pa/ /spyi bo nas ni bskul bar mdzad/ /'di nyid dri med dbyangs gyur pa/ /'od zer kha dog lnga dag gis/ /gsung gi sgo nas bskul ba

gang / /ye shes sprin ni 'phro byed pa'o/ /'dir ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /khyad par thugs las bskul gyur pa/ /sa gsum du ni khyab byed yin/ /mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /

dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur phyin/ /grub pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /thams cad ro mnyam ngang du bskul/ /gang du rnal 'byor mchog 'dod pas/ /rdo rje dang ni b+ha ga dag /thabs dang shes rab tshul dag tu/ /mnyam par

sbyar ba'i dbang po yis/ /snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde thob pa/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag /rtsa gnyis 'dus par dbu mar ni/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i dngos po yis/ /srog rtsol gnyis kyi rlung dag dang / /e ba~M kha sbyor

sbyar ba gang / /des ni chos kun ma lus la/ /yongs su rgyas gdab gyur pa yin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags dam tshig ting 'dzin yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i snying po rab tu

bskur ba bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /mi phyed ye shes rab bsgrub pas/ /'dus pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /yang dag ye shes 'di gsungs so/ /'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten

na/ /go 'phang la ni byed 'gyur ba/ /dbang dang de bzhin dgug pa dang / /bskrad dang gsad pa nyid dang ni/ /rmugs byed rengs byed rmongs byed pa/ /tshig 'phrog bya dang brgyal ba dang / /sna tshogs gzugs su sgyur ba dang / /gzhogs

skams byed dang nus med du/ /byed pa las kyi cho ga yin/ /'di dag nyer 'grub tshul 'di ni/ /rgyu dang mtshan ma thabs dang ni/ /las dang spyod tshul rim pa ste/ /phyag rgya rig sngags 'khrul 'khor te/ /ltas dang nges par zlog

par byed/ /rnal 'byor pas ni grub dkyil 'khor/ /ye shes phrin las bstan pa'o/ /'di grub pa yi nges pa yang / /rdo rje slob dpon dag gis ni/ /rjes su gnang ba byin pa dang / /dbang gi dus su phrin las kyi/ /rig pa'i

brtul zhugs thob pas 'byung / /lam du lhag pa'i lha yis ni/ /brtan pas byin gyis brlab pa dang / /rig sngags phreng ba 'dzin pa las/ /grangs bshad pa las bdun 'gyur du/ /bsnyen pa nye bar grub par 'gyur/ /

kha cig phran tshegs las rnams las/ /bzhi 'gyur bsam gtan ldan pas 'grub/ /rlung gi nus pa brtan pa dang / /lta stangs thogs med 'byung ba yi/ /nye bar 'tshe ba'i gnod pa dag /bltas pa tsam gyis zhi ba yi/ /

rang sems gnyug ma'i shes pa la/ /dbang thob rdo rje'i stobs gyur pas/ /'byung ba'i skye mched zil non phyir/ /las tshogs thams cad nges par 'grub/ /byang chub sems ni rjes dran zhing / /pha rol gnod byed gyur pa yi/ /

srin mo sha za gtum mo dang / /'byung po dag gis gnod par bcas/ /de dag kun la dpa' bo yi/ /rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar na/ /gnod par nus pa ma yin te/ /me dang chu dang gcan gzan dang / /rgyal po'i chad pa mi rgod dang / /

seng ge glang po srin po ste/ /'jigs pa brgyad sogs mi 'byung byed/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed/ /zhal gsum phyag drug sbrul

gyis brgyan/ /sku mdog nag po 'bar ba'i sku/ /rang gi yum dang gnyis med pa/ /rang gi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pas/ /oM ya mAn ta krita hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni rdo rje can gyi bka'/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi las

rnams la/ /ma lus 'grub par byed pa yi/ /gsang ba nye bar 'grub pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan dam tshig che/ /rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /khro bo'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /kun du

skrag par byed pa yi/ /rdo rje khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las phyung / /khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /bdud dang log 'dren ma rungs pa/ /gang gis gdul dka' 'dul

mdzad pa/ /mi srin ma he'i zhal phyung zhing / /gtsigs pa khrag 'dzag kha dog dmar/ /steng du mngon par phyung ba dang / /dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pa'i sku/ /rigs kyi zhal drug 'bar ba mnga'/ /bcu drug zhabs kyis

gshin rje gnon/ /de phyir 'jigs byed chen por brjod/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po gdul don du/ /sum bcu rtsa bzhi'i phyag rgya can/ /dbang phyug drug po gdul ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba gyen du bsgreng ba'o/ /khyab 'jug
gdul phyir ma he'i zhal/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras pa dang / /rang gi 'khor lor dbus bzhugs tshe/ /lha mo rdo rje bde ma dang / /gnyis su med par gnas pa'o/ /de nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /

gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa yis/ /ljon shing 'dzeg ltar sbyor bar mdzad/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gsang ba 'grub/ /\u0f00 hrIHSh+TAHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ me thab dang ni dur

khrod ras/ /gsal shing bskyon dang rdo rje yi/ /tho ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje dgra sta thod tshal dang / /rlung gis khyer ba'i ras dag gis/ /'dus par dgug dang nges ster ba/ /gsad dang rab tu brdung ba dang / /rnam par mnan

dang shin tu gsad/ /chu bo bzlog dang rlung bcing ba/ /las kyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis shes par bya/ /de las gzhan du gyur pa yi/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs pa/ /'dir ni mi 'grub gang yang med/ /

de ltar tshar bcad las mdzad cing / /thugs rjes nye bar mi gtong phyir/ /zhi ba'i zhal ni spyi gtsug nas/ /kun nas nor bu'i snying por mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo rab tu 'bar ba dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin

las yang dag bstan pa'o/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dag dang / /tshan do nye ba'i tshan do dang / /'du sa nye ba'i 'du sa dang / /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod dang / /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /

phyi nang bslab pa'i tshul dag gis/ /sa ni bcu gnyis tshul du brjod/ /gnas ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis su/ /chos rnams rmi lam tshul 'char ba/ /mi slob zung 'jug thob byed phyir/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du 'byung / /

de nyid rim pa shes par bya/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yi/ /yan lag bcu gnyis dag gyur pa/ /tshul 'di rtogs par bstan pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug /rig pa dag pas sku rdo rje/ /tshor ba

sred pa len pa dag /mi dmigs gsung gi rdo rjer dag /srid pa skye ba rga shi rnams/ /rdo rje thugs kyis dag byed pa'o/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes pa rnam pa gsum/ /ye shes dag pa'i ngo bo

nyid/ /dbyer med rang 'byung ngo bor gyur/ /rtog pa med par bde ba'i ro/ /snang ba ngos bzung med pa yi/ /gnyis med bde ba'i rnam par snang / /bcom ldan ye shes sku gcig tu/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /rten

cing 'brel par 'byung ba yi/ /ye shes rdo rje rang byung ba'i/ /de nyid dang las sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i snang ba la/ /mi 'gag lam ni mngon gyur cing / /gsang ba rdzogs pa'i lam

dag pas/ /yang dag ye shes 'byung bar gnas/ /'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste/ /sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /dam tshig dag gis rdzogs gyur pa/ /gsang ba chen po'i

lam gyur ni/ /sngags kyi rim pa yan lag bzhis/ /lam gyi spyod pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /tshe gcig gis ni byang chub 'thob/ /gsang ba'i pad mar nyi ma 'khyil/ /mdzod spu'i gnas su bdud rtsi yi/ /zla ba sangs rgyas

kun gyi nya/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /gang du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor las/ /zhi bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /mA ma kI dang gnyis med pas/ /tshad med bum pa bzang po 'thob/ /rin chen nor bu'i dkyil 'khor
las/ /rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i 'phel byed pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /dpag bsam shing chen rab grub pa'o/ /pad ma 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /sngags pas chags med dbang sdud pa/ /gos

dkar lha mo ye shes che/ /'dod 'jo'i ba ltar rab grub byed/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /gang du sna tshogs phrin las spyod/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i khyad par las/ /cang shes rta yi stobs kyis bgrod/ /
'khor lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i rlung / /chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas/ /bsam 'phel nor bu thob byed pa'o/ /rgyu ba'i rlung ni rab zin pas/ /'jig rten

gsum po kun gyi ni/ /gzugs gsum phra rags med par ni/ /blo yi yul du mthong bar byed/ /rab tu rgyu ba rab zin pas/ /phyogs bcu kun du khyab gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje dri yi bye brag kun/ /ma lus tshor bar gyur pa

yin/ /mngon par rgyu ba zin pas na/ /sa gsum po ni grag pa yin/ /sgra yi tshogs rnams ji snyed pa/ /de kun drung na grag bzhin 'byung / /shin du rgyu ba zin pa yis/ /rdo rje ro yi bye brag kun/ /ma lus lus pa med

pa dag /myongs 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa kye/ /yang dag rab tu rgyu ba ni/ /shin du brtan pa thob pa las/ /srid zhi reg byar gyur pa dag /de yis nges par tshor bar 'byung / /gang du rdo rje brtan pa las/ /mi phyed srog ni

gcig gyur pa/ /de snyed snying las 'od 'byung ba'i/ /bsil zer rta bdun cha mnyam pas/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gar bcas pa'i/ /thabs dang thabs ldan bskyod pa'i rlung / /'dis ni mkha' la

rab lding 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha las ni/ /phyag rgya'i shu tra len byed pa/ /gsang ba rdo rje nang du ni/ /bde ba skyes pa til 'bru bzhin/ /de nyid yongs su dag pa ni/ /kun 'dar mar ni de bzhin gshegs/ /mkha'

dang thig le sangs rgyas sku/ /rab tu mthong byed rnal 'byor che/ /bde ba nyams pa med pa las/ /bcu drug cha yi rin chen rtse/ /ri rab steng du dbang po ni/ /thur bltas sum bcu rtsa gsum pas/ /ri bong 'dzin
phyir mi ldog pas/ /de nyid zag med khang bzangs na/ /bde ba chen por gnas gyur pa'o/ /khams rnams las ni gyur pa yi/ /sdud dang 'bar dang smin pa dang / /'degs pa brtan byed 'phrul 'khor las/ /zag

bcas rlung ni ldog pa dang / /zag med ting 'dzin thob pa las/ /sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / /brtan byed rgyu mthun rtags mthong phyir/ /'jug cing ldog pa med pas na/ /dbu yi gtsug tor de nas 'byung / /rang gi

ngo bo'i sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan phrin las thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas stong dang gnyis bcas pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul ye shes las byung ba'o/ /de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' chen po

ni/ /kun du bzang pos legs thob pa/ /gsang ba'i don ni 'di zhus yin/ /gang du sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /gnas sogs dbye ba sa yi cha/ /de nyid nye bar bstan pa dang / /sgyu ma'i dpe ni bcu gnyis las/ /chos

nyid ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la sogs pa yi/ /dus sbyor bcu gnyis dag las ni/ /khyad par ji skad thob pa'i tshul/ /'dir ni nye bar bstan du gsol/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /khyad par don du

bka' stsal pa/ /gnas ni pu li ra yar brjod/ /de bzhin dza lan d+ha ra dang / /au rgyan ar bu ta nyid de/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar brjod pa'o/ /ba glang bdag po nyer gnas te/ /ra me shwa ri nyid dang ni/ /de ba ko tsha

mA la ba/ /dri ma med pa'i sa rab gnas/ /kA ma rU pa o Ta ni/ /zhing du brjod pa nges pa yin/ /'od 'phro'i sa ni 'dir thob byed/ /tri sha ku Ni ko sa la/ /nye ba'i zhing steng sa bzhi pa/ /ka ling ka dang lam pa ka /

tshan do ha ste sa lnga pa/ /kan ny+tsi hi ma la yar ni/ /nye ba'i tshan do sa drug pa'o/ /pre ta pu ri khyim gyi lha/ /'dus pa can te sa bdun pa/ /sau raSh+Ta gser gling ste/ /nye ba'i 'dus pa sa brgyad pa/ /na ga ra dang sin d+hu ste/ /

dur phrod sa ni dgu pa yin/ /ma ro ku lu tha 'di dag /nye ba'i dur khrod sa bcu pa/ /chos kyi sprin du mngon par brjod/ /kong kha na dang kha ba'i ri/ /tsa ri tra dang ka~M` po tse/ /'thung gcod sa ni bcu gcig pa/ /ha ri ke

la ta~M b+ha la/ /tsa ra sing ha ri ldan pa/ /ni ri ti pa'i gling gyur pa/ /nye ba'i 'thung gcod brjod par bya/ /'di dag sa ni bcu gnyis te/ /khyad par 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i gnas/ /bcu gsum pa yi sa brjod la/ /

yongs su gnas pa bde ba che/ /khyad par gling ni bcu gnyis su/ /gsang ba'i rgyud rnams bstan pa ni/ /kla klo'i gling ni bcu gnyis su/ /rdo rje 'chang gis bstan pa yin/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /yang dag

tu ni ston par byed/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du byung / /ngo bo med cing gnas med pas/ /de ltar chos rnams shes gyis la/ /sems can don

la bla med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas rigs skye bar/ /'dir ni the tsom yod ma yin/ /chos rnams sprul pa lta bu ste/ /de nyid rjes su spyad pa na/ /rnam pa kun du zhi ba yi/ /tshul gnas las dang mnyam par 'byung / /

'di nyid mthar rtogs shin tu dben/ /rnam par mi rtog bye brag las/ /khyad par byin brlabs sprul pa yis/ /dngos po rgyas 'debs gyur pa'o/ /chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ /brag cha lta bur rang stong

zhing / /phyi nang med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /brjod du med pa'i sgra rnams la/ /rnam dag sgra med sgrar 'jug med/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa'i gnas/ /mngon par ston pa'i tshul gnas kyang / /de nyid sgra la

gnas pa min/ /chos rnams dri za'i grong khyer ltar/ /phyi dang nang dang bar du yang / /dngos po med de nges par snang / /sgro skur med de tha snyad 'das/ /chos nyid mngon par bsgrub dag pas/ /tshad med bslab pa nus ma

yin/ /chos rnams chu zla lta bur ni/ /snang ba ngos gzung med pa'i dngos/ /yang dag grub par gnas med de/ /de nyid khyab pas stong pa'i sar/ /gzung med bcing dang grol med pas/ /yang dag snang ba 'dir

mtshon rno/ /chos rnams smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /grub pa med pa'i dngos po las/ /de nyid chur mthong 'khrul pa'i lam/ /de ltar sna tshogs snang ba yang / /grub med stong pa'i snang ba las/ /gzhan med 'khrul bar ma
byed cig /chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste/ /rmi lam du ni 'jig rten dang / /'jig rten 'das pa ma grub ste/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bar bcas/ /'pho ba med cing skye ba med/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam

byed med/ /de nyid med bzhin snang ba yang / /'gag pa med par 'byung ba'i phyir/ /rnam dag gnas med snang ba bral/ /de ltar chos kun rmi lam dang / /ngo bo nyid gcig shes bya ste/ /rmi lam gyi ni tshul du yang / /

kun nas spyod pas khyab par bya/ /dngos snang ma lus chos khyab pa/ /thams cad rmi lam ri mo ltar/ /dngos med snang ba rab shes bya/ /rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rmi lam la mngon par chags pa spong ba

dang / rmi lam rab tu dben par shes pa dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la rmi lam lta bur byin gyis rlob pa dang / chos thams cad rmi lam dang tha mi dad par 'char ba'i don

dang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba dang / rmi lam nyid du'ang rnam par mi rtog cing mi spyod pa dang / rmi lam gyi 'jig rten khong du chud pa lta bur rab tu rtogs par bya ba nyid do/ /

de nyid bla med tshul 'di rtogs par bya/ /'di dag rmi lam lta bur khong chud cing / /chos kun srid pa ma lus snang ba yang / /rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs/ /'di ni yul dang phyogs la mi gnas te/ /rmi lam
rab tu zhi la de dag gzhol/ /rang bzhin mkhas shing rnam par rtog med ldan/ /rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba med/ /kun du rmi lam lta bur shin du spyod/ /dus gsum ma lus bag chags gzugs
brnyan rnams/ /shin du nyer 'byung lus 'das sbyang bar bya/ /rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur rab shes bya/ /de lus shi med 'gyur med skye ba med/ /phyogs rnams kun du yod min med pa'ang min/ /khams gsum

thams cad rmi lam tshul lta bu/ /'di la rnam par rtog med tshul byas shing / /shin du mkhas de'i sems la bcings pa med/ /'gro kun rmi lam rang bzhin tshul 'dra la/ /de dag mi gnas 'jig rten las rab dben/ /

rten med mi rtog 'jig rten rnam rtog med/ /rmi lam chos rtogs mkhas pas spyod pa bya/ /rmi lam 'gro ba rnam pa du ma snang / /tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /bye brag rnam mang rtog pa yongs su sbyang / /de nyid

tshul gyis rnam pa rab tu rtogs/ /mtshan nyid rnam 'das skal ba mnyam pa nyid/ /gcig las rnam mang du mar gang snang ltos/ /rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba rab tu shes/ /kun la rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang / /

zhing rnams rmi lam chos rnams rmi ltar byed/ /kun nyon mongs dang rnam byang tshul 'di la/ /rab tu rtog med rmi lam spyod pa yis/ /yang dag 'grub par 'gyur ba'i lam yin te/ /rmi lam smon lam rnam pas gnas

med pa/ /de ni chos rnams kun la mi gnas so/ /tshul 'di la ni cung zad byed gnas med/ /'jig rten 'di 'drar 'byung ba shes shing dag /tshul rtogs 'gro kun mi 'jigs chos la sbyor/ /'dir sbyong srid pa kun

du chud mi za/ /rmi lam brgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes/ /de nyid rmi lam mdzad pas sangs rgyas zhing / /yongs su sbyangs shing sems can smin byed la/ /rnam thar sgo thob chos kyi 'khor lo yis/ /tshad med ye

shes gzhal med gnas 'dir 'thob/ /chos thams cad la rmi lam yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bstan pa ste mngon par 'byung ba'o/ /chos rnams dbang po'i gzhu lta bur/ /rang byung dngos po med pa yi/ /

'od snang lus kyis spros pa med/ /bde ba zhi ba'i gnas zhes bya/ /chos rnams nam mkha'i sprin bzhin du/ /stong pa'i ngang nas kun nas ldang / /rlung las yang dag 'byung ba'i phyir/ /nyer len rang sar grol ba'i gnas/ /

chos rnams bar snang glog bzhin du/ /rang rig yid kyi rnam shes kyis/ /kun du khyab par rgyu ba ni/ /rtsa ba las rlung dag par bya/ /chos kun chu yi chu bur ni/ /rgya mtsho las byung ji bzhin par/ /chos nyid sna tshogs rgya mtsho

las/ /rtog pa'i dra ba dag par bya/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur 'char ba yang / /gang du rlung sems gcig tu ma dag na/ /'khrul pa sgyu ma lta bur dngos la zhen/ /de nyid srid pa kun du ston pa yin/ /de nyid dag pas

snang ba'i mngon zhen bral/ /rtog pa log pas brtan g.yo sgyu mar 'char/ /dngos rnams kun la chags pa med pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma'i tshul shes phyir/ /sgyu ma rab zhi spros pa med pa ste/ /gnas med chos

kyi dbyings la de gnas byed/ /chos rnams kun dang sgyu ma tha dad med/ /dbye ba rdul tsam du ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /rang lus sgyu ma'i rnam par rab shes pas/ /'gro kun skyes pa bud med sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad

gzugs ni sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /mkhas pas su dag de las gzhan du spyod/ /de ltar sgyu ma chags med sna tshogs pa'i/ /gnas kyi dbang phyug de la zhen mi byed/ /'jig rten dngos dang dngos med gang gnas pa/ /sgyu ma'i

tshul gyis gnas pa med par gnas/ /sgyu ma nyid du yang dag rab grol bas/ /de bzhin nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / /rjes thob gnyis med sgom dang bsgom bya bral/ /sems med de la sems las gzhan pa'i chos/ /

'jig rten tha snyad tsam du'ang mi brjod de/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes sgyu ma'i sku/ /skye med nam mkha'i sgyu ma 'di la ltos/ /thams cad stong nyid gzugs kyi glang po dang / /shing rta ma he 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyi/ /

rin chen bdun dang dpung chen thams cad kun/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs nyid de yi 'bras bu las/ /gang du 'byung zhing gang du'ang song ba med/ /'gro 'ong gnas sgyu rgyu 'bras sgyu ma'i chos/ /'di ni ljon shing rin
chen 'bru 'bab cing / /'dzam bu'i chu bos shing gi 'bras bu yang / /mi mnyam mnyam med dus gsum phyogs bcu po/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgyu ma'i bkod pas sbyong / /sems can sgyu mar tshogs gnyis

rab rdzogs pas/ /'bras bu sku bzhi sgyu ma'i ye shes can/ /'di ltar gang shes 'di ni mi skye ba'i/ /chos la bzod pa thob par rig par bya/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin

gyis chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'o/ /ro hi ta ste brgyal bar byed/ /mo he te ni yan lag 'byung / /b+ha dra bkra shis byed pa'o/ /bre sha pa ni dge ba ster/ /bi sha pa ni 'dus pa la/ /kurmA pa la 'tsho ba

skyong / /ma ka ra d+han+d+ha ba ni/ /mi phyed dbang po 'byung ba'o/ /ma ska ra ni dag par byed/ /bi tri ka ni rnam par rgyal/ /b+ha ku la ni rten pa ste/ /swap+na zhes pa bra ba gang / /ka ma ni zhes rgyan yin te/ /'di dag lus ngag yid dag
la/ /dkar phyogs bde ba 'phel byed yin/ /de las rnam par bzlog pa ni/ /nag phyogs ma rungs mngon brtson pa/ /bar mas gti mug rmongs par gnas/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'dir shes pas/ /las rnams thun

gyis 'dir dag pas/ /bcu gnyis dag tu bstan pa yin/ /khyad par bsdus pa'i tshul shes pas/ /rgyu dang thabs dang khyad par gyi/ /bla med ye shes tshul 'di bstan/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /de nyid rnam
par 'khrul gyur pas/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis su/ /lugs su 'byung bas 'khor ba yin/ /chos nyid sna tshogs 'khor lor ni/ /lam du spyod par rim shes bya/ /log pas lta dang brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /
de 'bral gol bas thar pa med/ /dman pas mngon mthong spyod pa las/ /dkar po'i phyogs gnas skyabs gsum las/ /mos pas nyan rang zhi ba'i lam/ /ngal bso tsam las rnam dag min/ /khyad par byang chub
sems dpa'i lam/ /rtsa ba sa bon byang chub sems/ /de las rin chen ljon shing gi/ /pad sdong lo 'dab me tog rgyas/ /'bras bu bde gshegs yid bzhin nor/ /dgos 'dod dri ma med pa'i gter/ /rten 'brel

lugs bzlog chos 'byung ba'i/ /zab dang rgya che'i snying po ni/ /grub mtha' du ma rtogs pa'i gnas/ /de ni yang dag gnas mi 'thob/ /gsang ba rdo rje theg pa las/ /rgyud sde'i snying po 'dus pa'i don/ /dug lnga'i

rtog pa sbyangs gyur pas/ /dbang dang las kyi rim pa las/ /sku gsum sa yi dbang phyug 'thob/ /phyi nang spyod pa'i don gnas la/ /dam tshig gnas pa'i tshul bzhin spyod/ /spyi dang khyad par sku gsum dang / /

sku bzhi ye shes rdzogs pa'i gnas/ /mngon par byang chub lnga dang ni/ /drug pa dang po'i mgon po las/ /ye shes rgya mtsho sprin 'phro bas/ /rigs ni brgya dang stong dag tu/ /spros dang sdud pa gsang chen gyi/ /
gcig pa mi zad sems bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yang / /dkyil 'khor snying por 'byung ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus
pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las snying po mchog tu bskul ba dang yongs su dag par ston pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba bla na med pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rab tu phyung ngo / /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi khu ba la sogs pas/ /
cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /rig ma gzugs bzang mdangs dang ldan/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis/ /dben
mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog /spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hU~M dang oM dag dang / /AHdang phaT kyang rab tu bsgom/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis/ /pad ma
rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dgar/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gzhag /
sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsam nas/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ /rang rigs las byung rab tu spro/ /'di ni bde ba mchog gyur pa/ /gsang ba ye shes grub pa'i gtso/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshul
du bya/ /rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi legs byugs pa/ /shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga yi/ /dkyil 'khor pad ma'i dbyibs gnas pa/ /kha dog dmar po e yi dbyibs/ /de la gsang ba'i
lha tshogs kyi/ /thig le dkar po sum bcu gcig /ba~M gyi rnam par brjod pa yin/ /der 'jug cho ga brtag pa yis/ /mkhas pas rim pa shes par bya/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs

gdol pa'i rigs can las/ /sme sha can ni bcu gnyis ma/ /lang tshor ldan zhing sgeg pa dang / /bzhin bzangs mig dkyus ring ba ni/ /mkhas pas mtshan nyid yongs shes pas/ /rig ma yongs su sbyangs pa gzhug /

bla ma la ni dbul bya zhing / /gang du maN+Dal me tog dang / /mchod pa ye shes sngon byas te/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba 'dzin/ /me tog bcas pa'i lha mo la/ /mnyam par phyag bya gsol ba gdab/ /

mgon po gsang ba 'dzin pa po/ /sems dpa' chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /thams cad stong pa bla na med/ /mtshan nyid nyams myong gcig pa nyid/ /rdo rje gsang bas bdag la gsol/ /

las dang skye ba las grol ba'i/ /tshe 'dir byang chub mchog thob la/ /khyod zhabs pad ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan du skyabs ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen po/ /de bas blo mchog mnyes par mdzod/ /de ltar

gsol ba gdab pa mchog /dam pa des ni thob gyur nas/ /dpal ldan bla ma yon tan mtshos/ /snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/ /bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur nas/ /rang gi brtse bar rab dga' zhing / /gsang ba rgyud las bde

thob pa/ /bzang po'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor bstan/ /de nas slob dpon snyoms zhugs nas/ /ka la sha 'am dung chos su/ /byang chub sems ni rab dbyung ste/ /oM AHbadzra d+h+rIg hU~M/ bzang po'i phreng ba nye bar sbyin/ /

de nas slob ma de la ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs te/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/ /dam tshig gsang ba sbyin gyur pa/ /rdo rje can ni phyed dus su/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /bkra shis sgra ni

bsgrags pa dang / /rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po yis/ /khams gsum rdo rjes dbang bskur ba/ /slob ma 'dud cing thal sbyar ba/ /'dir ni rab tu bskur ba yis/ /khyad

par nang du nges dbang bskur/ /phreng ba chu dang rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni/ /slob dpon dag dang gnang ba sbyin/ /dbugs dbyung gzeng bstod lung bstan pas/ /dbang bskur rim pa 'di sbyin bya/ /

de nas bdag byin brlab pa'i rim/ /bcud du bya ba'i thabs bstan pa/ /kun rdzob bden pa yang dag sbyin/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /khyad par bde chen dbang bskur ba/ /rig ma dag par sbyangs pa dang / /
maN+Dal me tog bcas pa yis/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /slar yang bla mas gsang ba brjod/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba/ /de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /

gtso bos bdag la bka' drin stsol/ /khyod zhabs pad ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/ /bdag la nges par dbang bskur cig /de ltar lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /

bla ma la ni bka' stsal zhu/ /lha mo gzugs bzang mdangs ldan pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed la/ /rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te/ /bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros ches/ /de yi lag

pa der gtad de/ /gzungs ma shin du nyams dga' 'di/ /bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /rdo rje pad ma rab sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba dam pa yang dag myong / /bde ba dpag med 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /ye shes chen po 'dir

rtogs bya/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /'di las gzhan pa mchog med de/ /'gro ba gsum po dag rig par/ /dga' ba yang dag rtogs par gyis/ /de bas nam yang 'di dang ni/ /khyed kyis bral bar ma byed cig /

'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /de nas dri zhim me tog spras/ /gcer bu chu skyes ston par mdzad/ /bshang gci la sogs

za ba dang / /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha / rtag par bud med mchog gus pas/ /b+ha ga'i pad mar 'o byed dang / /ji ltar spro bar byed dam ci/ /ji ltar bde bar smros shig bu/ /de ni nye bar gzung bya ba/ /bshang gci'i bdud rtsi bza'

bya ba/ /bud med rtag gus cis mi bgyid/ /gsang ba'i pad mar 'o byed pa/ /lha mo bdag ni cis mi spro/ /de ni nye bar gsan pa yis/ /gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par 'gyur/ /e ma ho bdag gi pad ma 'di/ /bde ba thams

cad kyi ni gnas/ /gang zhig cho ga bzhin sten pa/ /de yi mdun na bdag gnas te/ /sangs rgyas bsten pa la sogs pa/ /pad mar bya ba ji bzhin gyis/ /bde chen rgyal por rang nyid ni/ /'di nyid du ni rtag tu bzhugs/ /

b+hany+dza mok+Sha ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /bde

chen rang byung phyag rgya'i dbus/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrung la sems ni/ /nor bu'i nang du brtag par bya/ /rgyu 'thun la sogs bde ba las/ /ye shes skye bas de bzhin du/ /dri ma med pa'i don du ni/ /thob pa sbyor ba las byung ba/ /b+ha

gar ling+ga gzhag bya ste/ /byang chub sems ni dbyung mi bya/ /khams gsum ma lus thams cad las/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bde 'thob pa'o/ /tshangs spyad brtan pas gnas pa ni/ /

yongs su sdom pa rig pa 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gar mkhan te/ /sdom pa bcom ldan yang dag 'dzin/ /'dir ni rim pa 'di shes bya/ /sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i

rigs las nges bstan pa'i/ /spyad bya stobs ldan mchog 'di yin/ /g+ho/ sangs rgyas rigs ni dag pa yi/ /lha mo rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ /ba glang sha yi rigs dag pas/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i dam tshig yin/ /ku/ za byed

'thung zhing kun du rgyu/ /rin chen rigs la nges 'byung ba'i/ /khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /d+ha/ myur du 'gro zhing shugs dang ldan/ /pad ma'i rigs kyis byin brlabs

pa'i/ /rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/ /ha/ g.yul du dpa' zhing mi ldog pa/ /las kyi rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob 'gyur ro/ /mu/
pad ma'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/ /ha/ g.yul du dpa' zhing mi ldog pa/ /las kyi rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /glang po'i

sha yi dam tshig gis/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob 'gyur ro/ /mu phyag rgya chu yi rnam pa las/ /zhe sdang dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin/ /bshang gci dam tshig mchog 'di ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /b+hi/ bzhi

mnyam lus las 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gti mug 'dren pa 'khor lo che/ /rnam snang dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i dpal ldan 'gyur/ /maHsgo dgu nas byung rgyungs pa dang / /klad pa rkang du bcas pa las/ /

rin chen nga rgyal 'dzin pa'i skus/ /'dis ni pad ma'i mdangs can 'gyur/ /rA dza'i bu gar rang byung ba'i/ /rA ga 'bar ba'i 'od can ni/ /'dod chags chen po'i 'byung gnas las/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i 'od ltar

'gyur/ /shu/ lus kun las ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /kun da lta bu'i byang chub sems/ /las kyi phrin las ral gri che/ /phrin las sna tshogs dbang thob 'gyur/ /ma~M/ kun du myos byed bcud bsdus pa'i/ /snying po 'chi med

rtog med pa'i/ /ye shes 'byung gnas khu ba 'di/ /rnal 'byor pa yi grol ba'i rgyu/ /'jig rten kun du rgyal byed pa/ /gsang ba dag pa'i dam tshig gnas/ /hU~M b+h+ru~M trA~M hrIHkha~M la~M ma~M pa~M ta~M AH sgron me lnga ni rnam
dag pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu mchog ster byed/ /dug lnga bdud rtsir dag pas ni/ /ye shes lnga thob phyir mi ldog /'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can/ /rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad gzhug par bya/ /'dis ni gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gsang ba shes rab la brten pa'i/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag pa ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gnas/ /'di dag rim pas sbyang bar bya/ /

ji bzhin gzhi la spyod pa las/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs lam gyur pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pas ni/ /'dod yon lam du byed pa'o/ /gang du phyag dar khrod pa yi/ /gos 'chang spyod pa ku su lu/ /bskus te bor

ba'i sman za bas/ /'dir ni sna tshogs chos su spyad/ /spyod lam kun du 'dris pa las/ /phying bu tshal pa tsam 'dzin pa/ /'di ni phyogs med gos can te/ /rnam pa thal ba yis byugs yin/ /gang du chos gos gsum
pa ni/ /stod g.yogs glang po'i pags pa dang / /mi yi pags pa nyid la rten/ /smad dkris stag gi ko bas dkris/ /phyis mi len pa lan gcig ste/ /spros pa gcod par byed pa yis/ /byin gyis ma brlabs zas

dang gos/ /skad cig tsam du sten mi byed/ /rang nyid lhan cig phyag rgyar bcas/ /snod gcig za ba'i gtsang sbra las/ /du mar 'byung ba ma yin pa/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo gcig tu grags/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing

gcig drungs/ /gdug pa ma lus gdul don du/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'am gcig tu yang / /brtul zhugs sbyor bas gnas par byed/ /chu gling ri sul bla mgab med/ /der ni gcer bu'i rol pa yis/ /bdud rtsi za zhing rig

ma dang / /gcig par gnas pa'i spyod pa che/ /kha T+wAM TA ma rur bcas shing / /thod pa'i tshal bus rdzas khyer te/ /shin du gsang bas spyod pa ni/ /bas mthar gnas pa dben pa'o/ /dur khrod rab son dge 'dun sar/ /
chos kun bdag med mi rtog pas/ /rtog pa dor bas gnas pa gang / /dur khrod pa zhes brjod pa'o/ /tha dad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /du ma'i snang ba ro mnyam pas/ /kun du bsod nams byed pa dag /

ro snyoms ye shes spyod pa yin/ /'di dag ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dge slong chen por shes par bya/ /tshangs par spyod pa mi ldog pas/ /kun du ye shes 'bral mi byed/ /'jig rten sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /
chags pa med pa'i dgra bcom pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'thob pa'o/ /gsang ba sbyangs pa'i tshul 'di ni/ /gzhan du rtogs par mi 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa/ mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las mchog tu gsang ba'i dbang dang / spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste
don gcig pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /chos rnams thams cad mi 'gyur te/ /thams cad dbang bskur ye shes mchog /ye shes dkyil 'khor gsang ba bshad/ /zhing 'dir rin chen bdun dag gis/ /
mkhas pas khyab par yongs bkang ste/ /khyad par ye shes bde don du/ /shes rab ldan pas bla mar dbul/ /de mdun yan lag rnam dag pas/ /dpe med rol pas dbul bar bya/ /khu ba byung bas rang lus las/ /

dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spro ba ste/ /rigs kyi lha rnams cho ga bzhin/ /lus la nye bar dgod pa'o/ /ye shes 'bras bu thob 'dod pas/ /gnyis su med par btung bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /

bsdu ba nyid kyis nyer gsad pa/ /'di ni dngos grub rgya mtsho yi/ /bla med 'bras bu thob 'gyur ba'o/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje stong pa nyid/ /dbus gnas mngon par byang chub brjod/ /de nyid me long ye shes ldan/ /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtag /nyi ma mnyam nyid ye shes te/ /bdun dang ldan pa'i dbus nyid do/ /sngags ni dbus su gnas gyur gang / /sa bon so sor rtog pa ste/ /mngon par byang chub pa nyid do/ /
rdo rje la sogs gang gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /zhal gsum rtsa gsum brjod par bya/ /sku gsum lus ngag yid yin te/ /de nyid

mngon par byang chub brjod/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma dang / /nor bu ral gri 'bar ba las/ /rnam par 'phro ba bsam pa ste/ /bla med ye shes byang chub brjod/ /spro dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa'i mchog ni
kun ldan pa/ /skad cig gcig la rab rdzogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / /gsang sngags sa bon bskyed pa can/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags
pa yis/ /rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byed pa/ /de ni bskyed par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs/ /de nas gsang ba'i dngos bsdus pa'i/ /ye shes bsam gtan

gnyis kyis ni/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yi/ /dngos po sreg byed ye shes med/ /bsam gtan gnyis pos gcig tu yang / /stong nyid ngang du gnas byed pa'o/ /ril por 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gzung ba'i rtog

pa spong byed cing / /shes rab zab mo'i ngo bo nyid/ /de nyid bsdu ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /sgyu ma'i lus kyi snang ba nyid/ /dngos po'i chos nyid stong nyid 'jug /rjes su gzhig pas ting nge 'dzin/ /'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms byed pa/ /

thabs nyid rgya che'i rang bzhin can/ /de nyid spros pa'i tshul bstan pas/ /stong nyid gcig tu gnas pa ni/ /kun khyab ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gro/ /stong nyid ye shes chen po'i mes/ /rang bzhin rtog pa'i gnas ngan len/ /

mngon rgyu bag chags bcas pa yi/ /rang bzhin brgya dang drug bcu dang / /thog mtha' med pa'i byang chub sems/ /rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa'i ngang / /dngos dang dngos min rtog pa'i tshogs/ /snang ba tsam du 'dzin med par/ /

stong nyid 'od gsal nam mkha' la/ /dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ngang du 'gro/ /de nyid kun khyab kun gyi gnas/ /brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sku/ /thams cad 'od gsal mngon byang chub/ /

de ltar ma rtogs ma rig pas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /de dag rab tu mi shes shing / /thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi/ /bag chags rab tu bsags byed pa/ /de dag sngon gyi las kyis ni/ /skye dang 'chi bar yang dag 'byung / /

rig pa 'od gsal dbyings gnas kyang / /'gyu byed rlung las ma rig byung / /de las snang ba dang po dang / /mched pa dag dang thog pa dag /lugs su 'byung bas rnam shes la/ /rlung gi spyod pa shin du 'khrul/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid/ /

yid kyi rnam shes 'gyur ba yi/ /rlung las kun du 'khrul pa'i las/ /'byung ba de nyid kho na la/ /ma rig rmongs pas ltung ba ni/ /bla ma med phyir 'khyams pa'o/ /kun du brtags pa'i ma rig pa/ /dngas snyigs gnyis su rlung gis phye/ /dngas ma stong

nyid ye shes sems/ /kun gzhi rang byung chos nyid gnas/ /snyigs ma'i snod bcud khams gsum du/ /dug gsum ngang las 'byung ba ni/ /srog 'dzin rlung las zhe sdang skyes/ /gyen rgyu las ni 'dod chags byung / /gti mug khyab byed dus kun du/ /

'bral ba med pas gnas pa yin/ /de nas me dang mnyam pa las/ /phrag dog 'byung bar gyur pa yin/ /thur sel las ni nga rgyal dang / /ser sna mngon par byung ba yin/ /rlung rnams gang las 'byung ba ni/ /rig pa kun du rten gyur pa/ /sa bon cha las

'byung bzhi gnas/ /de las rtsa ba'i rlung du byung / /phyi rol 'od lnga'i snang ba las/ /zhen pas rgyu 'bras la rmongs shing / /ma rig pas ni de dag las/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul du 'khor/ /dug gsum las ni rtsa gsum ste/ /chags sdang dbang
gis pho mor byung / /de phyir sngon gyi las kyis ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi 'phor 'gyur/ /rab tu dngas pa rnam par shes/ /'od gsal byang chub gnas 'di yin/ /cung zad tsam du dngas pa la/ /
bde ba las ni 'dod par gyur/ /gsal bas gzugs khams kun du skye/ /mi rtog pas ni gzugs med du/ /nges par 'char ba chos nyid can/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin/ /
khams ni snyigs mar gyur pa las/ /kun du 'pho zhing rgyu byed pa'i/ /nus pa yon tan cung zad can/ /bskal pa dang po'i mi ltar 'byung / /yul gyis 'dod chags
sad pa las/ /tshogs pa ma rnyed de srid du/ /bar ma do yi srid par gnas/ /srid par ltung ba'i sems can ni/ /bgrod pas 'gro ba ji bzhin du/ /las kyi dra ba'i zhags pa yis/ /
'gro ba drug tu 'joms par byed/ /de nyid rgyu rkyen sngon 'gro bas/ /nyer len 'jug par 'dod pa dang / /rang dbang med par 'jug pa dang / /skyabs gnas tshol ba'i yid 'gro bas/ /
'phen pa stobs byung 'jug par 'gyur/ /gal te mi ru skye ba na/ /pha ma'i kun du 'khrig mthong bas/ /sdug bsngal nyid kyis gdungs gyur te/ /bzhon par bcas pa'i
myur 'gro ltar/ /rlung gi bzhon pa la brten te/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam la/ /shin du myur bar 'ongs gyur pa/ /dga' dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis/ /bde ba'i
ngang du sems zhen pas/ /kha yi lam nas thur du 'jug /ngan 'gro'i gnas la pha yi ni/ /bshang ba'i lam nas khang bzangs su/ /mthong nas kun du 'jug par 'gyur/ /
dus der pha ma gnyis dang ni/ /dus gcig bde ba myong byas pa'i/ /rtsa phran stong phrag bdun bcu las/ /rab brgyud de yi skad cig la/ /A li kA lir
zhugs gyur te/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag 'thob/ /khu ba dang ni khrag bcas pa'i/ /dbus su bar do'i shes pa ni/ /'dus pa thig le'i gzugs su gnas/ /
dang po'i rnam pa nur nur po/ /de las mer mer po ru gyur/ /ltar ltar po dang gor gor po/ /rlung rnams kyis ni bskul gyur pas/ /
sha yi rnam pa mkhrang gyur du/ /lnga pa'i dus su rkang lag 'gyu/ /yan lag lnga ni dod gyur pas/ /bdun du gyur tshe mtshan ma dang / /skra dang sen mo ba spu'i
tshogs/ /mkhrang ba'i cha shas rdzogs gyur pa'o/ /brgyad pa'i dus su cher rtags shing / /zla ba dgu na lus kun rdzogs/ /bcu pa yul gyi rtsol ba byed/ /nur nur rang bzhin mi bskyod pa/ /
mer mer po ni dkon mchog dpal/ /ltar ltar po ni 'od dpag med/ /gdon mi za ba gor gor po/ /rnam snang mkhrang gyur dag tu brjod/ /gnas skabs 'byung ba lnga ldan pa/ /
chu dang rlan gyis sdud pa dang / /drod dang me yis smin par byed/ /sas ni bstan dang bskyed pa las/ /rlung gis g.yo zhing 'phel bar byed/ /nam mkha' kun du rten gyur pa'o/ /dri chu khrag
ni 'dus pa yi/ /dri chu'i cha ni mi bskyod zhugs/ /bzhi mnyam rnam par snang mdzad de/ /khrag ni 'dod chags med pa'i cha/ /sha ni rin chen rgyal po nyid/ /khu ba gdon mi za ba'i lus/ /
zla ba me long ye shes te/ /nyi ma mnyam pa nyid gyur pa/ /sa bon rnam pa so sor rtog /phyag mtshan las ni de nyid de/ /thams cad cig gyur nan tan brjod/ /lus kyis
gong bu bsdus pa yis/ /stong nyid chos dbyings ye shes brjod/ /mngon par byang chub lnga yis ni/ /bskyed dang gnas dang sdud par mdzad/ /de nyid ye shes yongs dag pa/ /sangs rgyas
lnga yi byang chub sems/ /gsang ba mchog tu bstan pa yin/ /skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas/ /g.yon nas khu ba de bzhin te/ /
g.yas na de bzhin khrag yin na/ /de dag gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas/ /rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas ni/ /chos kyi 'byung
gnas pad ma'i snod/ /gdong ni nges par phyogs par gyur/ /dku g.yas su ni brten nas su/ /tsog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas/ /dku g.yon yang dag brten nas ni/ /
shes rab g.yas su mngon par phyogs/ /sa bon lhung bas dus kyis ni/ /mkhas pas dus kyis skad cig las/ /nges par brtag par bya ba yin/ /g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba na/ /thams cad du ni
skyes bur byed/ /g.yas nas nges par rgyu ba ni/ /kun du bu mor 'byung ba yin/ /thabs dang shes rab cha las ni/ /bzlog pa'i go rims shes par bya/ /gnyis ka'i dbus su rgyu bas na/ /
ma ning dang ni za mar 'byung / /'di dag 'gyur ba ngo shes pas/ /thob pa mtshan nyid brtag par bya/ /'di ltar gsang ba'i lus 'byung ba/ /bskyed dang gnas pa 'jig tshul du/ /'dir
ni rgyas par bstan pa'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan mgon gsungs la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /thams cad dgyes pa bskyed gyur cing / /kun du bzang po'i
tshul 'di zhus/ /mngon par byang chub ye shes las/ /rigs kyi khyad par 'byung ba'i don/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas rnam pa can/ /
ngo bo nyid shes snying po'i gnas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas gang gsungs pa/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnams ni phung po ru/ /rags dang phra dang shin du phra/ /
lus 'di dngos po'i tshul rtogs pas/ /phung por nges par skyes pa yin/ /srid pa skye ba'i rim shes pas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir/ /'di ni rnam pa kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye

shes mchog gi gnyen gyis gsungs/ /de dag sgrib pa rnam sel sogs/ /kun gyis thos shing khong chud la/ /legs so legs so zhes brjod cing / /ngo mtshar gyur cing rmad byung ba'i/ /dgongs pa cang ni mi gsung
bzhugs/ /'di dag chos kun rab tu zhi zhing gnyis med pa/ /phyogs bcu kun nas snang ba'i rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs/ /dus gsum sems can khams rnams 'dul ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /lam rgyud ma
lus gnas las grol byed mchog 'dir rgyal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sems can gyi khams bskyed pa dang bsdu ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang ba
dpal ldan byang chub sems/ /srid zhi mnyam par sdud mdzad pa/ /'bar ba drag pos tshul 'di gsungs/ /dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bu'i gnas/ /spyod pa sbyin pa'i tshul bstan pa/ /gsang ba
'gro ba'i dgos 'dod skong / /nor ster lcam dral 'dir bstan pa'o/ /dzA~M`k+Sh+NI~M`/ 'phags pa yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog /zhal gsum phyag drug gser gyi mdog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan spras pa/ /sku
mdog las byung rigs 'phro bas/ /don grub rgyal pos dbu brgyan pa/ /g.yas pa sngo zhing g.yon dmar ba/ /dang po gnyis kyis ne'u le yi/ /kha nas skyug byed nor bu 'dzin/ /g.yas g.yon gzhan gyis

rgyal mtshan dang / /bI dza pu ri rin chen gyi/ /bzang po'i snod bcas 'dzin par bsam/ /de las gsang ba bdud rtsi'i chu/ /rtsa lam lag mthil brgyud nas ni/ /dbul ba mkhas pa dag gis bya/ /nyin re zhing du mchod
byas nas/ /de la dngos grub nges ster byed/ /'phags ma nor ldan ma bskyed pa/ /zhal gsum phyag drug gur kum mdog /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ljang spyan gsum/ /dang po pi tsu da la dang / /g.yon pas

'bru yi snye ma 'dzin/ /lhag mas bum pa pad ma snod/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpal be'u 'dzin/ /'di ni rin chen sna tshogs pa'i/ /phreng ba 'od 'phro bsam par bya/ /de las spro dang bsdu ba ni/ /gnod sbyin mo ni

rnam mang po/ /zla ba bzang dang rab bzang ma/ /bde sbyin ma dang stobs chen mo/ /lha mo bkra shis sbyin pa mo/ /dpal sbyin ma dang don grub ma/ /rab dgyes bde sbyin mi 'khrug ma/ /yang dag rgyan ma 'di rnams
te/ /'khor los yongs su legs bskor ma/ /rin chen gzhal yas khang gnas pa'i/ /lha mo rnams la dus gsum du/ /bsreg spos dbul zhing phrin las gzhol/ /'di ni gsang ba ma lus
pa'i/ /gnod sbyin mo yi rtog par gsungs/ /'di las 'da' bar byed pa ni/ /gsang ba tshul gnas ma yin na/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal ba yi/ /gsung
gi rnam par 'phrul pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /'di nyid de ma thag phyung nas/ /ye shes dam pa bka' stsal to/ /hrIHshin du dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/ /dpal ldan 'jig
rten dbang phyug bsgom par bya/ /de nyid nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gnas sa bon dmar por 'phro/ /de las spro bsdu'i
'od kyi snang ba las/ /ma lus 'gro tshogs legs par sbyangs nas ni/ /dag par byed pa'i sa bon la zhugs te/ /pad ma ge sar 'od bcas yongs gyur pas/ /
skad cig de las rje btsun spyan ras gzigs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pad ma rA ga'i mdangs/ /g.yas pa kun+da ut+pal sngo 'dra g.yon/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan spras thugs rje
can/ /dang po gnyis kyis ye shes rig ma la/ /rdo rje se gol sbyor bas 'khyud par mdzad/ /bar mas pad ma sdong bu nor bu 'dzin/ /tha mas ral
gri 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /dar gyi cod pan sna tshogs kyis brgyan mdzes/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa/ /
rang srog sa bon hrIHyig rnam par bsam/ /de yi 'od zer ma lus tshogs 'phros pas/ /'gro ba ma lus
don ni phun tshogs pa'o/ /rtog pa'i rnyog ma ma lus sel byed pa/ /thub pa'i dbang po phyogs mtshams rab
'phros pas
sna tshogs nor bu 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas/ /slar 'dus rang la phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i/ /'khor lo'i lha tshogs du ma bsam
par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i snying po yi/ /kha dog dkar po rnam par bsam/ /hU~M/ 'od kyi sprin gyis
shin tu 'bar/ /zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil/ /gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yi/ /de ma thag tu 'byung
bar byed/ /lan gsum legs par sgoms pas ni/ /skyug pa dag tu rnam bsams nas/ /nam mkha' gang ba'i dug
kun yang / /de ma thag tu med par byed/ /'di ni dngos kyi dug zhi bar byed pa'o/ /AH'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang / /
gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /bsam pa tsam gyis med par
'gyur/ /pad ma 'bar ba 'dab brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su dug bsam nas/ /'od zer lnga ni rdzogs par spro/ /
dug bsdu ba ni kha dog nag /bskul ba'i zhi byed dkar po yin/ /bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba gang / /ye shes dri med gsang
chen yin/ /de la 'dis ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o/ /gang du sa bdag klu las gyur/ /gnod
pa ngan pa byung gyur pa/ /'dis ni skad gcig dag gis kyang / /nges par zhi bar byed pa yin/ /dpal ldan seng ge sgra sbyor
bas/ /gdug pa'i 'tshe ba zhi byed pa/ /pad sdong thod pa bdud rtsi bcas/ /de ni me tog rab bkang ba/ /tri sh+'ul sa gsum gnas
las skyobs/ /rgyal po rol pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /thugs rjes dug sel bar mdzad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyis
gsang ba gsang ba gsum gyis dam tshig gis de kho na nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
las phyungs pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta badzrA nA~M/ \u0f00 AHuSh+nI Sha badzra/ tsakra bi/ bi tsUr/ uSh+nIHbi dza ya/
tsakra biH b+h+ru~M b+h+ru~M b+h+ru~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a mu ka~M mA ra ya phaTaH/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rjes su dran/ /
sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms/ /zhags pa rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /
sangs rgyas 'gugs pa dam tshig yin/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum sbyor ba yin/ /'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal
chen po/ /rtag tu nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'di ni ye shes me sbyor bas/ /spar ba'i dngos grub
gnas thob byed/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /rdo rje
lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog /rdo rje las byung thams cad pa/ /
rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/ /rab tu mdzes ma'i mchog rnams kyis/ /snying gar rdo rje 'bar
bar sbyar/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /nges par rtag tu 'gugs par
'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'am/ /rang sngags don gyi yon tan gyis/ /gtsug tor 'khor los
sgyur sbyor bas/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun bsrung phyir ye shes mchog /rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/ /'di ni rdo rje ma lus pa'i/ /byang chub srung ba'i don chen bya/ /bcom ldan

'das kyi sku ye shes rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje rta mgrin du bsgom pa/ /khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag /

thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro/ /klu rnams ma lus zhabs kyis mnan/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /kha rlangs dug rnams zhi byed pa/ /klu rnams kyis ni rgyan du byas/ /kha dog 'bar ba dmar ba'i sku/ /rdzogs sangs dpag

med dbu rgyan can/ /bsams na rdo rje can 'di mnyes/ /'di ni ye shes rdo rje can/ /khro bo kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /gsang ba nye bar bstan pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje

'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas pad mo 'byung ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rab tu phyung ngo / /oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/ oM shrI badzra kro d+ha pad+mAn+ta kri

ta ha ya g+h+rI ba hU~M hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes/ /de nas 'jigs shing brgyal bar 'gyur/ /ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran/ /mkha' dbyings dug gis yongs gang ba/ /rdo rje ha la ha la

'od/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /dug rnams skad cig gis med byed/ /rdo rje rta mchog bskyed pa 'byung ba rdo rjes gsungs so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu

bsgoms la/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bcud gyur mchog /'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba can/ /rdo rje sprin ni kun du 'khrugs/ /khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang / /mche ba rab tu rno ba ni/ /rnga sgra'i dam tshig dbu brgyan pa/ /bsgoms na khro bo mchog

'di mnyes/ /'di ni khro bo thams cad kyis/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig yin/ /bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje'i dam tshig gi 'od zer stug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo mi 'chi

gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di rab tu phyung ngo / /oM AHhU~M/ oM AHbig+h+nAn+ta kr-i ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M` phaT/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom/ /'bar ba me stag

'phro ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la gdab bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis/ /gdug cing khro ba tshar gcad la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi dngos gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas byas pa na/ /spyi bo dang ni
mgrin pa dang / /snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /rdo rje phur bus rab tu bsgom/ /dam tshig 'di las 'da' mi bya/ /'di ni phur bu'i rnam par 'phrul/ /bsam gtan rdo rje phur bu yis/ /sangs rgyas
dag kyang nges par 'debs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /phur bus btab na med par 'gyur/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu ni/ /rdo rje sku yi phur bu ste/ /gti mug gnas la gdab par bya/ /pho rlung dag

pa'i gnas gyur pa'o/ /seng ldeng rtsa li phur bu ni/ /rdo rje gsung gi phur bu ste/ /'dod chags gnas la gdab bya ba/ /mo rlung dag pa'i gnas gyur pa'o/ /lcags las byas pa'i rdo rje gces/ /rdo rje thugs kyi phur pa ste/ /ma ning

rlung ni gnas gyur byed/ /zhe sdang gnas la nges gdab yin/ /dngos po tha dad 'dzin pa yi/ /ye shes sku gsum 'jig byed 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sku yi mthar/ /rig ma'i b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor gnas gyur pa/ /de dag gsal

bar dmigs nas ni/ /lha rnams gnad la dbab bya ba/ /byin rlabs shin tu myur 'dod pas/ /'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs ldan pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan rdo rje phur bu yi/ /b+ha ga la ni nges gdab pa/ /'di nyid sku gsung thugs gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje phur bu'i sbyor ba can/ /sku gsung thugs gsum lha

bskyed pa/ /gnas gang du ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /phur bus gdab par gyur pa yin/ /gsang ba'i pad ma nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje phur bu ling ga yis/ /byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi yis/ /bdud rtsi 'bab pas phur gdab

yin/ /bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i b+ha gar ni/ /bde bas phur bu nges par 'debs/ /de yi de ma thag tu yang / /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /lus kun la ni gnas gyur pa'i/ /lha rnams bdud rtsi'i
