cha dag tu/ /nges par zhu bas de las bskul/ /shin du zhu bar gyur pa las/ /byang sems bde ba'i khu ba dag /snang ba dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /phur bus btab na nges par 'chi/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje gsum/ /gsang ba'i tshul la gnas pa yis/ /rtsa rlung byang chub sems rnams ni/ /bde stong gnyis med gyur pas na/ /'chi ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /phyi rol nad gdon nyon mongs dag /bdud bzhi

bcom pas ldang bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba dam pa bsdus pa yis/ /snying po mchog tu 'byung ba nyid/ /rdo rje phur bu bstan pa gdab par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /'gro ba'i

gnod pa zhi byed pa/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rgyas pa po/ /de nyid ngang la gnas par gyur/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /sku yi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ /nges 'byung rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la/ /snyoms par zhugs te

tshul 'di gsungs/ /'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag nas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sku yi mthar/ /gzugs brnyan bsams nas sbyang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag

ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsams pa/ /sngags kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi/ /'dis ni rdo rje gnas gsum byed/ /chos nyid ye shes ngang las bsdus pa yis/ /stong nyid byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las/ /rang byung rten dang

brten par bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo spro dang bsdus byas la/ /hU~M dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /gur kum bzang po'i mdog can dmar ser la/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang sngo/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par

brgyan pa yi/ /phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa dang / /mdangs ldan ral gri dang ni ut+pa la/ /shes rab mda' gzhu legs par 'dzin pa mdzad/ /de nyid shin du gsal ba'i sku ru bsgom/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /

sa bon rgyas gdab de 'dra gnyis med bstim/ /ye shes dbang bskur dam pas rgyas gdab bya/ /ma lus rigs kyi 'khor lo spro ba yi/ /tshul gnas ye shes spyod pa go 'phang nyid/ /sa yi snying po phyag na rdo rje dang / /nam mkha'i snying po 'jig rten dbang

phyug dang / /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bar bcas/ /dpal ldan kun du bzang po zhes bya ba/ /de dag mig la sogs pa grangs bzhin du'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang / /reg bya dang ni chos dbyings rdo rje dang / /sa dang chu dang

me dang rlung rnams ni/ /ngo bo nyid gyur spyan la sogs par grags/ /gzugs dang tshor ba de bzhin 'du shes dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam par shes bshad pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bde gshegs te/ /rdo rje sa bon gyis ni

dbyung bar bya/ /k+ShI dzra~M kha~M ga~M khrA~M sa~M` zhes bshad pa/ /'di dag mig la sogs pa rnams kyi yin/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHkha~M ra~M zhes bshad pa/ /de dag gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'o/ /zhes bya bzhir bshad pa/ /de dag spyan la

sogs pa rnams kyi yin/ /b+h+ru~M a~M dzra~M kha~M hU~M zhes bya ba dag /rim pa ji bzhin rtag pa la sogs pa'i/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /rim bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs gyur/ /dpal ldan rdo rje'i
'dzin pa lta bur ni/ /chos nyid kyis ni phan tshun khyad par med/ /phyin ci log gi rtog pa las grol bas/ /bya ba ma lus par ni rdzogs par bya/ /thub pa'i 'khor lo ma lus mchod par bya/ /
mchog 'di de dag kun du rab tu dbul/ /zas la spyod tshe snying ga'i zla ba yi/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo rang gi gsang sngags kyis/ /kun du dmigs te byang chub sems kyis ni/ /ngo bo nyid gyur 'od dang ldan

par bsam/ /dngos po de dag gsum gyis bzlas bya ste/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rnam dag pa/ /de nyid sku yi rdo rje la sogs pa/ /lha rnams kun du tshim pa nyid du bya/ /phyi yi sbyin sreg cho ga ji lta bar/ /yid kyi spyod yul sems kyis

bya ba ste/ /phung po'i bud shing rnam par sreg byed pa/ /ye shes 'bar ba bla na med par bshad/ /dam tshig nyams la snying gar zla ba la/ /snying po sna tshogs rdo rje ji bzhin bsam/ /dpal ldan dam tshig rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba rang bzhin gyis

dag rnam bsams la/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i 'dab ma'i dbus su ni/ /sngar gyi rim pas dbang bskur kun du blang / /phyi rol dag tu khrus kyi cho ga la/ /rim 'dir khyad par yang dang yang bsam bya/ /thun mtshams rnams sku de bzhin mchod la sogs/ /

sngon du 'gro ba'i bzlas brjod byas nas ni/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo'i nang du chud par bya/ /snying rje shes rab ldan pas dbyings su nyal/ /ldang ba'i dus su dam tshig lha mo yi/ /yang dag glu yis dpa' bo yongs bskul ba'i/ /ldang bas thub pa

bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya ba yin/ /dngos grub nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni/ /de nyid gsum brjod byas nas rang gi sems/ /sngar bshad dkyil 'khor dag la gnas nas ni/ /rang 'dod go 'phang rab

tu bsgrub bya yin/ /bgegs rnams bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'khor lo yi/ /bsrung ba bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyar bya/ /de nyid bdud las rnam par rgyal byed yin/ /dbang bskur byas pa'i 'bad pas nges par gzhom/ /gang zhig dbus

su gnas par gyur pa yi/ /'khor lo de yang de yi cho 'phrul 'gyur/ /tha mal rnam rtog rgyun las ma gtogs par/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin te/ /de ni rnam par 'gog par 'gyur ba'i sems/ /sems ni mngon sum byin

brlabs kyis mngon 'gyur/ /zab cing rgya che ba'i bdag nyid can/ /der ni kun rtog gang yin snang mi 'gyur/ /yang dag sems las tha dad ma yin zhing / /kun brtags mtshan ma sngar ni bsgrub log pas/ /srid pa lan cig

tsam du ldang mi nus/ /gang du ldog pa med pas bgrod phul byung / /'dir ni mthong ba dang ni bslabs 'phel bas/ /rnam dag rtog pa yang dag 'gog pa ste/ /tha mal pa yi rang gzugs dngos po yis/ /bdag med sbyin sogs mi zad
gter mi 'gyur/ /'dir ni gnas med ye shes dge ba'i lam/ /'dir ni bden yang der ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rtogs nas snying rjer ldan pa dag /ye shes bsam yas skad cig gis bsgrubs pa/ /dpal ldan kun

du bzang po'i ngo bo nyid/ /mkhas pas gang zhig nges par bsam mi byed/ /gang du dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam las ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyis bgrod pa'i don/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes dam pa'i gzhi/ /

tshad med byang chub rgyan gyur gsang ba'o/ /'di ni mtshungs med dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa de nyid ngo bo nyid/ /yongs su shes pa'i lam gyur bsam mi khyab/ /'phags pa nyan thos dgra bcom
zag pa zad/ /de la thog mar rgyun du zhugs pa dang / /phyir mi 'ong dang lan cig phyir zhugs pa/ /de dag 'khor ba dag par 'dod pa'i lam/ /rang sangs rgyas ni 'byung tshul gnyis su gnas/ /
smon lam 'bras bu thob pa ngal bso'i lam/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po ltar/ /ri dgas phra mo skrag byed 'dir 'byung ba/ /ngang pa glang chen khyu mchog rtsal

gyis ni/ /ri dgas seng ge sha ra Na mchog dang / /mkha' lding ga ru Da li lding gyur pa/ /'brug sgra sgrogs byed cang shes rta yi rtsal/ /bya khyung chen po shang shang ru ru ste/ /ri bong dag gis rang spyod shugs bstan pa'o/ /'khor

ba'i rgya mtshor nor bu gnas pa'i gzhi/ /klu dbang rnams dang chu srin chen po dang / /ltos 'gro za byed shin tu mi bzad pas/ /rus sbal dung ltar ma 'dres gnas byas pa/ /de las mu tig la sogs sna tshogs pa/ /gang du yon tan ldan yang bag

med gnas/ /bag la nyal ba'i phyogs ni zlog pa gnyis/ /skabs las ma bab nus pa 'byung mi nus/ /sa bon phra mo kun nas ldang ba na/ /dus la bab tshe slu ba med par 'byung / /ded dpon thabs la mkhas pa'i gzings bcas pas/ /thar pa

thob byed yan lag kun ldan pas/ /rin chen nor bus dgos pa rab sgrub pa/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud du shes par bya/ /dbang thob byed pa rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir/ /bum pa bzhi ldan lam bgrod rdo rje dang / /dkyil 'khor chos 'byung pad ma'i

sdong por 'byung / /sa lam khyad par rigs dang ldan pa'i chos/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal rin chen bdun ldan pa'i/ /gsang ba'i mas 'jug yas babs tshul shes pas/ /spre'u khwa ta yi tshul las bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum dang zla ba

nyi ma dang / /mun pa dag gis rtogs pa gang yin pa/ /me long gzugs brnyan rdo rje sems dpa'i sku/ /ye shes 'ja' tshon chu yi zla bar ston/ /me 'od 'bar bas kun nas snang ba che/ /des khyab kun du ston pa de bzhin gshegs/ /

rigs kyi sku dang sa bon mtshan mar snang / /de nyid sangs rgyas mchog tu 'byung ba las/ /de dag gnas skabs phrin las dngos grub kun/ /du ma'i mthu stobs yon tan dpal du 'char/ /du ba smig rgyu srin bu me khyer ba/ /mar

me 'bar dang mkha' snang dag pa ste/ /sna tshogs rtags dang yon tan mi zad pa/ /grub pa spyod pas rgyu 'bras tha dad pa/ /ma 'dres yongs su dag pa dus med pa/ /bskal pa grangs med skad cig sgyu ma yis/ /

gsum gyi dus la 'da' ba dbang phyug mchog /kha sbyar bde chen sku ni rdo rje 'chang / /dkyil 'khor bdag po dpal ldan byang chub sems/ /des ni dag dang ma dag zhing khams su/ /mdzad pa rgya mtsho sprul pa'i snang ba yang / /

bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes rol par ston/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i mgon por ni/ /spros med bde chen mi 'gyur gcig pa nyid/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i rang byung ngang la bzhugs/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / 'dus pa

rnams kyis dgyes pas yongs su khyab cing sems kyi rtog pa yongs su chod de cang mi smra bar rang rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba
'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gnas par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu gsum pa'o// //

de nas gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje rgyal po 'khor lo'i gtso/ /bdag med ye shes rgyal po che/ /ci yang mi gsung bzhugs pa la/ /rdo rje dpal mchog chen po yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /ma lus kun gyis
bkur bar mdzad/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i gnas ni dag pa nyid/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po/ /yid dang ye shes spyod pa las/ /dam tshig mchog 'di bstan du gsol/ /

de nyid nye bar dgongs gyur nas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ltar/ /zab cing rgya che tshul bstan te/ /sngags kyi spyod pa tshad med cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /

rigs kyi phyi rol phyag rgya che/ /'di las gzhan du ma rtog cig /rigs kyi bu rnams mdor bsdu na/ /'di ltar sngags kyi spyod pa ni/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang dag tu/ /'dod yon mngon par rol gyur kyang / /
zag med bde ba chen po yi/ /ye shes kun du spyod pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rtog med lhan cig skyes par 'char/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ /
dper na nam mkha'i khams 'di ni/ /kun gyi rjes su song ba ste/ /chos rnams ma lus dkyil 'khor dag /nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin chos rnams ma lus pa/ /de dag ngo bo nyid dag pas/ /

khams gsum kun du mi gnas shing / /'byung ba bzhi la gnas mi byed/ /gang du 'gro 'ong rnam bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de des bsten na/ /ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa yi/ /chos rnams de ltar rjes rig bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /

don gyi dbang ni bla na med/ /'di ltar mkhyen pas 'chang mdzad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu rnams de ltar na/ /nam mkha'i tshig ltar nges brjod pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshig dag kyang / /de dag de ltar rjes rig bya/ /'di ni

gsang ba'i gnas yin no/ /chos can gcig la rtog pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba yin/ /bde sdug 'gro bar 'byung ba rnams/ /las kyi khyad par goms pa'i phyir/ /de phyir dge dang mi dge'i las/ /lus la sogs
pa'i rnam rtog byung / /rtog pa thams cad med grol ma/ /der rtog pa la gnas pa med/ /rtog pa las ni ye shes med/ /ma rtogs nyes pas ye shes 'joms/ /mi rtogs pa las rtog pa ru/ /ldog pa nam yang mi
srid do/ /gzhan du rtog pa'i gnyen po ru/ /ye shes bsam pa ma yin te/ /spang bya gnyen po gnyis med pas/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du/ /skye dang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bsam pa rdzogs
pa'i lam/ /nges par 'di ni rtogs pa rtags/ /ngo bo rgyu tshul 'byung ba khams/ /las dang dbye ba de nyid rlung / /'byung 'jug gnas pa rnam par brtag /'bru gsum sngags kyi ngo bo nyid/ /A li kA

li sbyor dbul bas/ /brtag pa grangs ldan bzlas pa nyid/ /sbyor dang byed par rtags ldan pa/ /ngag dben rlung gi rnal 'byor brtan/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyor ba gang / /snang ba gsum po 'char tshul te/ /dus dang

'byung 'gyur thabs khyad par/ /dbyer med ye shes gnas thob pa/ /spyod pa ye shes mngon du byed/ /slob dang mi slob der spyod pa'o/ /rang bzhin shes pa'i lam gyur pa/ /rnam shes sgyu mar mtshan pa'i chos/ /khyad par las

dang spyod pa gang / /dngos grub thob phyir bdag byin brlab/ /phyi nang mngon par byang chub tshul/ /rnal 'byor thob pa'i bsam gtan gnas/ /'jug dang 'byung ba rtags bcas pas/ /spyod tshul ye shes des 'thob bo/ /

lta dang nyams myong lus dang ngag /bsam gtan mnyam rjes spyod pa dang / /slob dang mi slob gnyis med cing / /rab tu mi gnas zung du 'jug /ji ltar gsungs pa'i sdom ldan pas/ /ji skad thob pa mnyam par spyod/ /

dam tshig med la blo ldan gyis/ /gzhan la gsang ba 'dus rig bya/ /snying rje gnas pa las byed pa/ /sangs rgyas mchod dang 'gro don dag /mthong na lus dang ngag las 'byung / /phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /
'di ni gsang ba nges bstan pa/ /yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing / /rtog pa'i tshul ni rnam spangs nas/ /gug bskyed thig le las 'das pa/ /'dir ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /sems can

thams cad 'jug pa ni/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin spangs/ /sems ni skul zhing rtog byas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /yod dang med pa gnyis ka mtha' yin te/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis ka 'di yang

mtha'/ /de bas mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par mi byed do/ /gang du nyan rang theg la mi bslab cing / /byang chub spyod pa de la nges bslabs na/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad pas rgyal yon tan/ /gling bzhi 'di

las rab byung chen por 'gyur/ /chos thams cad 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo

spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sa bon yang dag par phyung ngo / /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed sbyar ba las/ /gang du phreng ba bkod par byed/ /sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa dang / gsum pa

yi ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyin/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /uSh+ma yi ni mthar gyur pa/ /gnyis

pa'i thig le brgyan pa nyid/ /dbyangs kyi drug pas brgyan pa ni/ /mi bskyod pa'i gsang sngags brjod/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa sbyin/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /

USh+ma Na yi mtha' ma sbyar/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi lnga pa sbyin par bya/ /steng du thig le nA das

brgyan/ /'di ni rtag pa'i snying po brjod/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis par sbyar/ /steng du dbyangs kyi bcwa lnga pas/ /brgyan gyur 'di ni sa bon yin/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum

pas brgyan/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa tha ma sbyin/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /'di ni rin chen rgyal po yi/ /gsang sngags bsdus

pa'i tshul du brjod/ /dbyangs kyi dang po nyid la yang / /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa sbyin bya/ /dbyangs kyi bcu pa nyid la ni/ /gnyis pa gsum pas mthar brten pa'o/ /USh+ma Na ni bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig

bdun pas steng dang 'og /dbyangs kyi bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar/ /'di ni 'od dpag med pa yi/ /gsang ba 'jig rten dag pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i gnyis pa nyid la ni/ /dbyangs kyi thig le nA das brgyan/ /drug pa yi ni dang po la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /

gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /gsum pa yi ni lnga pas brgyan/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /gdon mi za ba'i rjes 'gro

ba'i/ /gsang ba las kyi rigs 'byung ba'o/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/ /dbyangs kyi bcwa lnga pas brgyan bya/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis pas brgyan bya/ /ush+ma yi ni dang po dang / /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis

pa las/ /lnga pa'i dang po nyid dag la/ /uSh+ma na yi gsum pas brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs kyi bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa sbyin bya/ /

ush+ma na yi tha ma las/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang / /bzhi ba'i dang po nyid dag la/ /uSh+ma na yi gnyis po sbyin/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan par bya/ /drug pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa'i lnga pas brgyan par bya/ /

an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa la/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pas dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa sbyin/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas sbyin par bya/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa yi ni

lnga pas brgyan/ /sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa sbyin/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /aN+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa las/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /uSh+ma na yi gsum pa sbyin/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan

par bya/ /'di ni 'byung ba dag pa yi/ /rigs kyi yum bzhi'i snying por brjod/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po las/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /mthar
gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa'i gsum pa bcas pa la/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni dang po la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pas mdzes/ /gsum

pa yi ni bzhi par ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa gsum pa ldan pa nyid/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni

gsum pa sbyar/ /drug pa'i tha ma gzung bar bya/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa'i gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /

gnyis pa gsum pa sbyar ba dang / /dbyangs kyi gsum pa steng nas sbyin/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga par bcas/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa'i dang po dang bcas pa/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang / /

bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang ldan par/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa thog mar sbyar/ /'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi/ /bla med rigs kyi sgo bzhi 'byung / /gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus rig pa'i gtso/ /

rtsa bar gyur pa'i don shes pas/ /nus pa sngon du 'byin par byed/ /thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /sngags kyi khyad par bstan pa yin/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa la ni/ /bcwa lnga pa yis sbyar ba gang / /'di ni sku ni gzi brjid mchog /

spyan 'dren pa ru gyur pa yin/ /sde tshan brgyad pa'i tha ma la/ /dbyangs yig drug pa sbyar bar bya/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i tha ma sbyin/ /'di ni sdud cing gshegs gsol ba/ /dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin can/ /gnas shing bzhugs par

byed pa'o/ /mi phyed ye shes 'byung ba ste/ /khyab cing dri ma med pa'o/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'am/ /khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pas/ /bzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag /rdza yi

phye ma so ma dag /so so yi ni rkang 'og tu/ /nyi zla gnyis su bri bar bya/ /de las khrus bya rgyan btags nas/ /de nas langs pa'i skyes bu 'di'ang / /thal mo snying gar sbyar byas shing / /steng 'og rlung la bslab par bya/ /de nyid mi

yi sha dang ni/ /bdud rtsi sbyar ba bsres de yang / /gu gul nag por bcas pas bdug /dang po rkang pa'i mthil dag tu/ /ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngo/ /ba dan gyis ni mtshan pa bsam/ /mdoms bar du ni me yin no/ /

sa bon dkyil 'khor 'bar ba bsam/ /lte ba rab las chu yi gnas/ /dkar po zlum po dgod par bya/ /de steng sa yi dkyil 'khor dang / /la~M las byung ba rdo rjes mtshan/ /gru bzhi mdzes pa nyid du bsam/ /lte bar dz+haiM dmar skul bar byed/ /

'bar ba 'od 'phro mi zad pa'o/ /snying gar hU~M mthing 'od 'bar dang / /spyi bor ha~M dkar bsil bar gyur/ /mgrin par a dmar rim pa ste/ /de dag kun la bla ma yis/ /hU~M tra~M a dz+he zhes bya ba'i/ /rigs sngags rdo rje bzlas pa dang / /

lha yi sa bon phreng sngags kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis kyang bsam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin mi rtog cing / /rtog pa gzhan dag ma gos pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lus gnas su/ /mi bskyod pa dang sku rdo rje/ /chos 'dzin pa dag

rang gis bsam/ /rang gi lte ba'i dz+te~M` 'od las/ /'od zer dpag med byung nas ni/ /lha gsum po ni bskul byas te/ /de nas khye'u lus kyi ni/ /yi ge dz+te+e la bskul bar bya/ /de las rlung dang bcas pa'i sgra/ /myur du zhugs te rkang

mthil gyis/ /rlung dang bcas pa'i ba dan bskyod/ /nyi zlas nam mkhar bteg nas ni/ /sum mdo'i me sbar chu yang khol/ /snying gar sa g.yos 'khor ba las/ /yi ge snga ma gsum bskul te/ /'od kyis lus kyi nang khengs

shing / /sna bug g.yas nas byung nas kyang / /der gnas pa yi 'gro kun gyi/ /sna bug g.yon du zhugs byas te/ /kun la 'od 'bar 'khor ba yis/ /lus nang rab tu khengs par bsam/ /de nas bdud rtsi lus la gtor/ /
rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs bya/ /des ni bskul bar the tsom med/ /gal te lus ngag yid gsum la/ /rtags rnams nges par ma byung na/ /lan gsum bar du bzlas par bya/ /des ni nges par bskul gyur pa'i/ /

'gul ba dang ni bskyod pa sogs/ /ma lus sngags kyi tshig 'byung ste/ /'di yis bskul ba ma lus pa'i/ /gsang ba rab tu gyur pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /ye shes mchog tu brtag pa'o/ /de nas rgyal

po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas/ /rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun rtog dag par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan

pa'o gang du dug gsum cha las ni/ /rtog pa'i snang ba rgyas pa las/ /rang bzhin 'byung bar gyur pa dag /thabs kyi rang bzhin shes rab kyi/ /yi ges dag par byed pa dang / /shes rab rang bzhin gyur pa la/ /thabs kyi yi ges

dag par byed/ /gang du 'gron par gyur pa la/ /tha mi dad pa'i yi ge yis/ /rtog pa mngon par sbyang ba ste/ /g.yas rtsa la ni brten nas ni/ /zhe sdang rtog pa gtso gyur pa/ /g.yon rtsa la ni brten pa yis/ /'dod chags rtog pa gtsor

byed 'byung / /sgra can la ni brten nas ni/ /ma rig pa ni 'byung zhing 'gro/ /gnas pa lus kyi yi ge las/ /'khor ba skyed byed rtog pa 'byung / /de nyid rang bzhin rtog pa yis/ /srog dang rtsol ba la sbyangs te/ /pho mo ma ning

rlung 'di dag /cung zad dul bar gyur pa na/ /lam gyi chos 'byung rtag 'char byed/ /rlung nyid shin du dag pa yis/ /yi ge gsang sngags dag gyur par/ /rtog pa ye shes chen por 'char/ /a zhes bya ba mi chags byed/ /

A zhes bya bas bar mar gnas/ /i zhes bya ba chags chen te/ /I zhes bya ba g.yeng bar 'gyur/ /u zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i yid/ /U zhes mya ngan bskyed 'gyur bas/ /ri zhes mya ngan gyis gdung byed/ /r-I zhes mya ngan gyis gnon

byed/ /l-i zhes cung zad zhi bar gnas/ /l-I zhes kun du rtog pa nyid/ /e zhes 'jigs pa tsam gyur pa/ /ai zhes bar ma'i 'jigs bcas pa/ /o zhes 'jigs pa chen po yin/ /au zhes sred pa'i zhen pa nyid/ /aM zhes bar ma'i

sred zhes bskyed/ /a zhes sred pa chen po yin/ /a zhes nyer len gzhis yin te/ /A zhes mi dge log lta can/ /i zhes pa ni bkres pa ste/ /I zhes skom pas gdungs pa yin/ /u zhes tshor ba'i bye brag myong / /U zhes

tshor ba'i bar ma gnas/ /r-i zhes tshor ba chen po dang / /r-I zhes rig par byed pa po/ /l-i zhes mi 'gyur rig pa 'dzin/ /l-I zhes rig pa'i yid 'jug zhi/ /e zhes so sor rtog sbyong ba/ /A+ai zhes ngo tshas bag yod byed/ /o zhes

snying rje bar sems pa/ /au zhes brtse ba byams par bcas/ /aM zhes bya bar dog par byed/ /a zhes bsags pa sna tshogs pa/ /k+sha zhes phrag dog rtog pa ste/ /'di dag rang bzhin rtag bcas yin/ /ka zhes bya ba chags sems

yin/ /kha zhes zhen par 'byung ba dang / /ga zhes dga' ba'i chags pa can/ /g+ha zhes bar ma'i dga' ba can/ /nga zhes shin tu dga' ba'i dges/ /tsa zhes bde bas yi rangs te/ /tsha zhes rab tu mgu bas rangs/ /dza zhes bya ba ngo mtshar skyes/ /dzA zhes bya ba dgod par byed/ /

nya zhes de nyid kyis tshim yin/ /Ta zhes 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ /Tha zhes 'o byed par 'dod pa/ /Da zhes 'jib par byed pa yin/ /D+ha zhes brtan pa'i sems gnas yin/ /na zhes brtson 'grus skyed byed pa/ /ta zhes nga rgyal rtog pa yin/ /

tha zhes lus ngag bya ba byed/ /da zhes 'phrogs pa bskyod pa yin/ /d+ha zhes stobs skyed khyad par la/ /na zhes sems spro dang ba bcas/ /pa zhes tha dad med bdag gyur/ /pha zhes tha dad med btang snyoms/ /ba zhes tha dad med pa'i dngos/ /

b+ha zhes drag po'i bde ba 'dod/ /ma zhes sgeg par byed pa'o/ /ya zhes rlung gis 'gres byed pa/ /ra zhes cung zad 'bar ba'i dge/ /la zhes gsal ba'i tshig brjod pa/ /wa zhes bden smra g.yo med pa/ /sha zhes brdzun du smra byed pa/ /

Sha zhes de bzhin nyid des byed/ /sa zhes nye bar mi 'dod pa/ /ha zhes sbyin par byed pa yin/ /k+sha zhes kun tu bskul 'dod pa/ /kla zhes pa ni de bzhin des/ /sla zhes pa ni dpa' bar 'dod/ /l+la zhes bag

med shes bzhin bral/ /sh+la zhes g.yo sgyu ston pa dang / /d+ha zhes mi srun par 'byung zhing / /da zhes byas gyur 'gro bar byed/ /'di ni kun du rtog par 'gyur/ /a A zhes par gyur pa gang / /bar ma'i chags gyur

ma rig che/ /i I zhes pa bar ma ste/ /rjes su 'dzin pa med pa la/ /U U zhes pa rnam gnon pas/ /'grub pa nyid du gnas pa yin/ /e ai zhes pa thob pa'i cha/ /'gog pa la ni 'jug pa'o/ /o o zhes pa tha ma ste/ /

yid ni skyo bar gyur pa'o/ /a aHbcas pa 'thibs pa nyid/ /le lo snyoms las gyur pa'o/ /r-i r-I l-i l-I 'byung ba las/ /mi phyed the tsom gyur pa ste/ /'di dag phra dang rags pa dang / /bar ma'i dbye ba bstan pa yin/ /thog ma dang ni

tha ma dang / /dbus su 'byung ba'i skad cig ma/ /skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa las/ /rang bzhin tha ma rtog las 'byung / /de nyid 'gro dang 'ong ba dang / /gnas pa yi ni rlung gi cha/ /thabs dang shes rab dbye ba yi/ /nyin dang mtshan du

'byung ba ni/ /brgyad bcu phrag gnyis nye bar 'byung / /sa bon cha dang rnam par smin/ /yul gyur rkyen 'byung 'di dag ni/ /kun du rtog pa chen po ste/ /'di las dge dang mi dge byung / /de las bag chags las byung ba/ /

bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag gis 'khor/ /'di dag lugs las bzlog gyur na/ /rang byung rnal 'byor pa ni 'gyur/ /'dir ni tshogs pa las skye ba/ /rten 'brel tsam du 'byung ba yin/ /

rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ /dper na gtsub shing gtsub stan dang / /skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba yi/ /rkyen gyis rab tu bskul gyur na/ /du ba med dang 'bar bcas pa/ /ji bzhin bar nas 'byung mod kyi/ /legs par
brtags shing btsal ba na/ /me de gang du'ang mi gnas pa/ /rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /bla med rang bzhin 'di dag kyang / /dam tshig stong pa nyid

gnas pas/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa/ /'gro 'ong med par rjes rig bya/ /de nyid 'di ni bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas rngam zhing mig

gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rmad byung chen po chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs gyur cing / /rnam par mi rtog dag pa la/ /kun rdzob tsam du gsungs pa mtshar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas/ thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag cing don dam pa'i gnas kyi dag pa chen po de kho na nyid du

bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog dbang phyug 'khor lo'i gtsos/ /rab tu byin brlabs snang ba las/ /bka' stsal rdo rje tshig 'di bstan/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gang du byin gyis brlob pa 'di/ nges par gyur pa 'di phyung ngo / /gang zhig skyes bu'i spyod yul du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /gang zhig mthong

zhing gang babs pa'i/ /yang dag ye shes rtog par bya/ /sku babs pas ni 'da' bar byed/ /'phar zhing gar dang phyag rgya 'byung / /thugs kyi snying po rab bskul ba/ /srog rtsol 'gog pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rings pa nyid kyang

gsum du 'gyur/ /rnam rtog dang ni yul rnams dang / /'byung ba 'gag cing bde bar 'gyur/ /smig rgyu la sogs mthong bar 'byung / /lha chen dag kyang dbab pa 'byung / /tshangs pas lus la byin brlabs na/ /
tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni ston par byed/ /brgya byin gyis ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /lkog tu gyur pa mthong bar byed/ /drag po bas ni stobs rnyed cing / /rig byed dag ni

'don pa dang / /u mA de bI la sogs pas/ /rtse 'jo chags pa skye bar ston/ /lha chen dag ni gang babs pa/ /'khor lo 'dzin pa'i brda dag dang / /sa 'og sa steng sa bla'o/ /dbang du byed pa ston par 'gyur/ /

'phags lam bzhi ni bden pa bzhi/ /chos rnams rtogs pa ston par byed/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi ni/ /grub pa'i mtha' ni ston pa dang / /spyad pa'i yon tan 'byung ba las/ /sde ba rnams kyang spyod pa dang / /bse ru lta bu'i

spyod tshul lo/ /theg pa dman par ltung ba'i rtags/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa gang / /tshad med bzhi dang de la sogs/ /lus ngag yid kyis gang byung ba/ /sems dpa'i lta stangs byed pa na/ /byang chub sems nyid 'grub 'gyur

ba/ /ngo bo nyid med tshig brjod 'gyur/ /gru gang dag tu 'phags pa ni/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan par byed/ /khru do ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /khru brgyad kyi ni phyir mi ldog /lnga pas lam lnga mthar phyin pa/ /tshe gcig 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /

gsang ba grub pa dag gis ni/ /'bad pas dbab pa brtag par bya/ /rdo rje sku ni byin brlabs shing / /gzugs kyi phung po babs gyur pas/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes ni/ /gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje gsung gis

byin brlabs shing / /'du shes phung po babs gyur pas/ /'od dpag med pa'i ye shes ni/ /'dod chags rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje thugs kyis byin brlabs shing / /rnam shes phung po dag byed babs/ /mi bskyod pa yi ye shes ni/ /

zhe sdang rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje yon tan gyis byin brlabs/ /tshor ba'i phung pos bdag byin brlabs/ /dkon mchog dpal gyi ye shes ni/ /nga rgyal rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje phrin las byin gyis brlob/ /'du

byed phung po babs gyur pas/ /gdon mi za ba'i ye shes ni/ /phrag dog rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni babs gyur cing / /sa yi khams ni byin brlabs na/ /dbang chen ri rab ltar brtan cing / /rdo rje rgyas pa'i las 'grub 'gyur/ /

mA ma kIs ni bdag rgyud la/ /chu yi khams ni byin brlabs ni/ /gdung ba rnams las bsil byed cing / /lha mo sgrol rnams 'grub pa'o/ /na bza' dkar mo bcas pa yis/ /me yi khams ni byin rlabs pas/ /bag chags de ni

bsreg byed cing / /rdo rje dbang du sdud par byed/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i gzi brjid kyis/ /rlung gi khams ni byin brlabs pas/ /thams cad skrod pa'i las byed de/ /rdo rje mngon spyod cher spyod do/ /lha mo gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /smig rgyu lta bur

mthong bar byed/ /lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /du ba lta bur 'char bar byed/ /lha mo dri yi rdo rje ma/ /skar ma srin bu me khyer 'char/ /lha mo ro yi rdo rje ma/ /mar me 'bar ba ltar gsal zhing / /lha mo reg bya rdo rje ma/ /thams cad stong pa'i

chos nyid la/ /nam mkha' khams ni babs gyur pas/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes skye/ /de yi mig gi rnam shes la/ /sa yi snying pos byin brlabs pas/ /gzugs kyi dngos po sna tshogs dang / /lkog tu gyur pa'i rdzas rnams mthong / /

de yi rna ba'i rnam shes la/ /lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pas/ /phra rags sgra rnams thos pa dang / /lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /de yi sna yi rnam shes la/ /nam mkha'i snying pos byin brlabs pas/ /sna tshogs dri rnams tshor ba dang / /

sna rtse'i 'od zer tshogs mthong 'gyur/ /de yi lce yi rnam shes la/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin brlabs/ /lha yi bdud rtsi myong byed cing / /gsung dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs 'byung / /de yi lus kyi rnam shes la/ /sgrib pa sel bas

byin brlabs pas/ /'jig rten khams ni gsum dag gi/ /reg bya'i khyad par mchog rnams thob/ /de yi yid kyi rnam shes la/ /kun tu bzang pos byin brlabs pas/ /dus gsum shes pa'i ye shes ni/ /zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran/ /de yi yid la

khyab byed par/ /byams pa mgon pos byin brlabs pas/ /nyon mongs ye shes gyur nas kyang / /rtog pa med par 'gro zhing lding / /de yi kun gzhi'i rnam shes la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin brlabs pa/ /lus kyi cha shas g.yo 'gyur zhing / /mkha'

la spyod pa nyid du 'gro/ /sku ni snang ba sgyur bar byed/ /gsung ni grag pa sngags su brjod/ /thugs kyi snying po rab bskul bas/ /srog rtsol bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi/ /de nyid byin gyis brlabs

gyur na/ /bar chad bdud dpung ma lus 'joms/ /brtan pa mchog tu 'bebs par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bcu rnams kyis/ /lus la nges par byin brlabs na/ /phyag rgya byed cing sdigs mdzub byed/ /phyogs skyong bcu po 'joms par byed/ /

g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang rdo rje'i gar/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgyur ba dang / /hU~M phaT rngams pa'i gad mo yis/ /rlung bcu dbang du sgyur bar gnas/ /khro bo du ma spro zhing sdud/ /ye shes thugs rje khros pa yis/ /dngos

por 'dzin pa'i gdon rnams 'joms/ /lus kyi cha shas 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa so sor rab tu bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod pas/ /gsang ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ /

sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /ta thA sa gra ha yi rgyud/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyis ni/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po'i rgyud/ /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa yis/ /zla gsang thig le'i rgyud gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas

thogs med grub pa yis/ /dam tshig gsum bkod rgyal po bshad/ /sangs rgyas spyan mas mnyam sbyor rgyud/ /mA ma kI ni he badzra/ /gos dkar ma ni 'khor lo sdom/ /sgrol ma sgyu 'phrul chen po nyid/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dbyings phyug mas/ /

rdo rje gdan bzhi gtsug lag rgyud/ /gzugs kyi rdo rjes gsang ba'i mdzod/ /sgra yi rdo rje'i lha mo yis/ /bde ba dam pa rtogs skyed gsungs/ /dri yi rdo rjes sangs rgyas thod/ /ro yi rdo rje'i lha mo yis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud mchog gsungs/ /

byams pa mgon pos rig mchog dang / /sa yi snying pos sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyan bkod gsungs/ /gsang ba'i bdag pos dbang bskur rgyud/ /nam mkha'i snying pos dpal ldan ni/ /gsang ba thig le'i rgyud mchog gsungs/ /

'jig rten dbang phyug mchog gis ni/ /pun+da rI ka dra ba can/ /'jam dbyangs dpa' bo rtsa ba'i rgyud/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel bas/ /a mo g+ha yi rgyud bstan pa/ /kun tu bzang pos gsang ba'i rgyud/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog

gis gsungs/ /gshin rje'i gshed pos dgra nag po/ /shes rab mthar byed khams gsum rgyal/ /rta mgrin gsang ba mchog tu rol/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas rdo rje sgo/ /mi g.yo mgon pos gsang ba'i rgyud/ /'dod rgyal thabs kyi

zhags pa phreng / /dbyug sngon gdug pa kun 'dul ba/ /stobs po che yis sgra rgyal rgyud/ /su~M b+ha rA dza sa rdo rjes/ /gtsug tor rdo rje gtsug tor rgyud/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mchog rnams kyis/ /rim par gsungs pa bstan pa'o/ /

rtsa ba'i rgyud gyur sum bcu gnyis/ /re re la yang phyi nang gsang ba bcas/ /khyad par phyi yi 'bum phrag sum bcu drug /yi ge'i dbye ba stong phrag sum bcu bzhi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rig mar bcas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis nges par

gsungs pa'o/ /'di dag 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /sngon rgyu'i nus pa rten can la/ /de nyid khro chags sku ru ston/ /bag la nyal dang phra ba yi/ /zag pa med pa'i spyod yul la/ /zhi ba spros med mdzad pa byed/ /zhing khams bye ba stong phrag tu/ /

mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pas/ /gcig las du ma rnam par 'phrul/ /sems can khams rnams skyes pa dang / /'byung ba gnas pa'i srid pa ru/ /rgyu dang rkyen las grub tshul dang / /nyon mongs khams dang dbang po dang / /

bag la nyal sogs dri ma rnams/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /rgyu 'bras phra ba'i phra ba la/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag 'dra/ /rdo rje'i spyan dang rdo rje'i snyan/ /rdo rje'i thugs dang rdo rje gnas/ /rdo rje spyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul

rnams/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub/ /yongs su ma dag kla klo'i gling / /tha dad par ni nyon mongs can/ /de dag shin tu dul bar mdzad/ /drag po'i nyams ni gar dgu rol/ /dbang la chags tshul drug

bcu bzhi/ /rgyas la khyad par bcu drug ste/ /zhi ba'i tshul ni bcu gnyis yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni yang / /gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa nyid/ /dpal mchog rtog pa bdun pa ste/ /rtog pa dang po gling slong ba/ /gsang ba rgyas par

bstan pa yin/ /rtog pa gnyis pa rdo rje'i rigs/ /mchog tu brtag pa chen po las/ /brjod bya brjod byed tshul ldan pa/ /ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa'o/ /rtog pa gsus pa rin chen rigs/ /'od zer snang ba'i ye shes che/ /tha dad med pa chos

kyi dbyings/ /byang chub chen po brjod pa'o/ /rtog pa bzhi po pad ma'i rigs/ /ma chags bde ba 'od 'bar ba/ /so so'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs nas/ /rtog pa'i ye shes 'char byed pa'o rtog pa lnga ba las kyi rigs/ /sna tshogs don kun

sgrub byed pas/ /shes rab ral gri yongs gcod pa'i/ /khyad par bsgrub pa brjod pa'o/ /rtog pa drug pa chos kyi dbyings/ /sangs rgyas du ma'i dgongs pa dag /gcig tu yang dag bsdus pa ni/ /de nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /rtog pa

bdun pa snang ba rgyas/ /ye shes lnga ni rab 'byung ba/ /'od zer sna tshogs tshad med pa/ /bkod pa mtha' yas sprin tshogs pas/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ /dpag med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /g.yas

dang g.yon gyis sbyar ba dang / /g.yon brkyang du ni nyer sbyor ro/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam par 'byung / /khro bo skyil krung longs spyod pas/ /thams cad ma lus bdud 'joms mdzad/ /rten cing 'brel las 'byung ba las/ /dngos
po thams cad rnam par brtag /bla ma sangs rgyas chos gyur cing / /dge 'dun kyang ni 'di nyid de/ /de yi drin gyis shes 'gyur ba/ /de bas dkon mchog gsum bdag yin/ /mi shes

rab rib kyis ldongs la/ /'di ni lam rab ston byed yin/ /bde ba kun gyi mchog gyur dang / /'dod pa'i don kun ster byed yin/ /de bas de dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod bya gzhan ni byed ma yin/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad

kyis/ /brtul zhugs ldan pas bla ma mchod/ /de mnyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na/ /khams gsum kun las mi rnyed de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig rten du/ /phun sum tshogs pa ston phyir gsungs/ /rnal 'byor pa 'di ci spyod kyang / /

thams cad du ni smad mi bya/ /rtog pa kun las rnam grol phyir/ /ji ltar 'dod pas bya ba med/ /de ni dngos kun ngo bo ste/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rang byung ji ltar 'dod pa spyad/ /sems can kun gyi snying la

zhugs/ /de nyid thams cad bla na med/ /'di ni rnal 'byor dbang po mchog /rnal 'byor skyes bur bshad pa ste/ /rjes su rnal 'byor rigs pa mchog /gnyis 'dus shin tu rnal 'byor te/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor

che/ /rnal 'byor de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dam pa nyid/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las/ /mar ni shin du 'du ba ltar/ /dba' rlabs 'dus pas stobs gyur pa/ /gzhan yang thams cad skye 'gyur zhing / /

'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /brtan dang g.yo ba'i chos kun gyis/ /srid gsum bdag po rnam par 'phrul/ /de ltar bdud rtsi las ni langs/ /nyan thos rang rgyal 'byung ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ni/ /

khyad par 'gro ba gcig pa nyid/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa sa dge ba/ /bcu gsum du yang rnam bshad pa/ /gru gsum rnam par 'byung ba ni/ /'dir ni chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ni/ /ji ltar kun du snang

gyur pa/ /de bzhin gnyis med ye shes 'dir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams la/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rgyan gyis brtags/ /rang byung gcig nyid gnyis su med/ /sems can bsam pa'i

dbang gis ni/ /lta dang grub mtha' sna tshogs bstan/ /tha dad lta bar 'jig rten pa/ /kun mkhyen gcig pu gnyis su med/ /gang du bdag dang phyag rgya dag /gnyis med bde bas brgyal gyur tshe/ /de yi bde bas kun

khyab byed/ /chos kun ngo bo gcig par ni/ /ye shes 'du 'bral med pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gsang ba yin/ /dga' ba skyed byed bzang po ste/ /ma lus don gyi 'bras rab ster/ /dngos po'i bdud rtsis lus gang

zhing / /nor bu rin chen sten par mnyam/ /yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /bde ba rdo rje can gyi gnas/ /nyon mongs ye shes gnas gyur pas/ /myur du bgrod pa'i go 'phang gis/ /ro mnyam mi mnyam 'phel ba

las/ /bde bas ma lus sa gsum po/ /thams cad tshim par byed pa po/ /gnyis med ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /'gro ba'i nor bu ster byed pa/ /ded dpon chen po 'dir gnas pa/ /bla ma'i gzugs su gang byung ba/ /nga nyid

thugs rje der zhugs pa/ /mi yi gzugs su nyer bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /mi phyed rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kun/ /rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs te/ /dgyes pas yongs

su khyad par 'gyur/ /de ni gsang ba'i chos can yin/ /rdo rje'i gdan du bzhugs nas kyang / /mnyam pa'i dkyil dkrung tshul gnas nas/ /nyi ma snang ba mched pa'i cha/ /gsal la snang ba mtshan mo'i cha/ /mtshams las thob pa mun par bcas/ /

dug gsum rang bzhin kun rnams las/ /nges 'byung bsnyen pas rtsa gnas las/ /zag bcas 'byung ba zlog par byed/ /bsgrub pas yi ge gsang ba las/ /thos pas sgra rnams dbyangs dbyung nyid/ /nyer sgrub shin tu mi shig pa/ /khams las

bdud rtsi dngas par gyur/ /srod dus mun pa'i dmag rum du/ /bdud bcom lha yi bu yi tshogs/ /rgol ba ngan pa zlog gyur cing / /de nyid kun du brtsams pa'o/ /tho rangs dus su 'das cha las/ /shin tu nyer thob rang byung las/ /bcu dang brgyad du mthar son

tshe/ /skya rengs nges par 'char dus su/ /mngon par byang chub legs mthong ba/ /'di ni mchog tu 'byung ba nyid/ /gsang ba yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsgom pa mchog gis bsgrub 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni thabs dang shes rab dag /gnyis med

ye shes snyoms 'jug pas/ /de yi chos kyi 'byung gnas su/ /bde chen sgyu ma'i rol pa yis/ /kun du dbang bskur gyur par ni/ /dngos grub ye shes thob byed yin/ /snga ma 'jig rten log rtog dag /dgag phyir mi rtag gzugs su

brtan/ /de nyid yongs su dag pa yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par gnas bsgyur bas/ /gzhon nu'i tshul du bstan pa ste/ /'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul lo/ /de ltar ye shes gnas thob pas/ /skad cig gis ni

sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa/ mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po thams cad

phyin ci ma log pa dag pa bsam pa sna tshogs pa'i don rab tu bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes gsang ba'i spyod yul phun sum

tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas yongs su ston par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar rab tu 'dud cing mchod pa rnam pa

du mas yongs su mchod la gsang ba'i don 'di dag rab tu zhus so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /mi 'gyur ba ni rgyas pa'i tshul/ /mgon po byang chub chen po ni/ /zab dang rgya che'i gnas 'di gsungs/ /dus gsum
sangs rgyas phyogs bcu yi/ /gnas sogs zhing khams ma lus pa'i/ /rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /til 'bru lta bu gang ba yi/ /ma lus rgya mtsho'i dbus bzhugs la/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun du rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje ral pa gcig ma'i dam tshig chen po'i/ rgyal mo rdo rje mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /oM

badzra e ka dza Ti khu li ni swA hA/ rdo rje ral pa gcig ma yi/ /gsang ba ye shes rang byung bas/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ma/ /kha dog mthing nag 'bar ma che/ /g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar ba'i mdangs/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin par

mdzad/ /rdo rje dang ni thod dbyug ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag du bsnams par bsgom/ /dril bu rdo rje'i zhags pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag tu bsnams par bsgom/ /rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /shin tu sgeg cing 'gying bar bsam/ /

'di ni klu yi bu mo rnams/ /rab tu 'gugs pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /sa g.yo ba yi dus su ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par shes/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams/ /tshig par gyur cing gos dang

bral/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran/ /gsang sngags rig pa 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams 'gug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /klu yi bu mo mig bzangs rnams/ /bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam

tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos chen po'i dam tshig 'di rdo rje khro gnyer ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba b+ha ya nA sha ya tra sa ni tra sa ya tra se yA b+ha ta ri b+h+ri ku Ti ti d+hi

b+he re tA+e ShI tA she ta dza ni Ni swA hA/ rdo rje'i lha mo khro gnyer can/ /sku mdog sngo ljang dngas pa la/ /zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum ma/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar cung zad khros/ /dang po gnyis kyis bde bar ni/ /thugs kar bsnol bas

'khor lo dang / /rin chen 'bar ba 'dzin pa'o/ /ral gri dang ni rtse gsum pa/ /g.yas pas nges par 'dzin par mdzad/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pa bum pa ni/ /g.yon du nges par 'dzin pa'o/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje dkyil

krung bzhugs par bsam/ /sku la 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro bas/ /gnod pa ma lus zhi byed bsam/ /'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po kun/ /rab tu 'dar bar gyur nas ni/ /ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran/ /rig pa 'dzin

pa'i lha mo mchog /gser gyi rna cha g.yon pa rnams/ /sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni/ /dam tshig la sogs pas bkug bya/ /gang du phrin las ma lus pa/ /gsang ba mchog tu bsgrub pa ni/ /'gog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /yongs su rdzogs pa

mdzes mchog gis/ /ye shes rdo rje gsum las 'byung / /kun nas de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po'i bsgom pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /tsu~M oM ma hA bid+yA d+ha ra tsa li tsu li tsun+dad le dz+nyA na bi shud d+ha sarba d+harmA bu swA hA/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /kun nas 'bar ba'i ye shes

spyan/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas chen ni/ /lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab/ /lha mo skul byed rdo rje bsam/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ma/ /dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje dang / /pad ma 'bar ba bsnams

pa'o/ /rin chen nor bu rdo rje sprin/ /zla ba chu shel 'bar ba dang / /phyag gzhan rnams kyis 'dzin par mdzad/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /bsams la sngags kyi yi ge dgod/ /nad rnams ma lus zhi byed

pa/ /gsang ba ye shes rgya mtsho nyid/ /bde ba mchog tu bsam par bya/ /'di na zhi ba'i las bsgrub pa/ /gsang ba nye bar bsdus pa'o/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi/ /'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs

pa dpa' bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje bsam gtan gyi dam tshig gi mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bI/ oM a badzra yak+Sha gar+b+ha ya rat+na d+h+rika phaT swA hA/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po/ /nam mkha' dbyings
kyi dbus su bsam/ /rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis/ /skyed pa 'di ni rnam par bsam/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /margad ta dang cha dgu pa/ /'khor lo uta pal sdong bu dang / /ral gri 'bar ba bsnams

par bsam/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /cung zad ser po rdo rje 'gying / /zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/ /de bsams rgyas pa'i las kun la/ /myur ba nyid du grub par byed/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams

cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin du 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rdo rje dpa' bo'i rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgom pa/ /sbyor tshul nyid kyis bya ba ste/ /'dis ni

dngos grub myur 'thob byed/ /dam tshig bskul ba byang chub sems/ /'gro ba'i don du rab 'jug pa/ /rdo rje gsum dbyer med gzugs can/ /de nyid las kyi phyag rgyar brjod/ /dam tshig stong pa bde ba che/ /'od zer spro

zhing sdud par mdzad/ /'gro la dngos grub rgyun byed pas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes che/ /gsang ba dam tshig bod pa ni/ /srog gi snying por gyur pa yi/ /sa bon sngags las rab grub pa/ /de nyid las ni 'da' mi byed/ /rtsa

gsum rlung gsum sku gsum ni/ /thig le sngags kyi sbyor bas ni/ /bcing ba rab grol phyag rgya che/ /de nyid sku gsum dag pa'i bdag /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni/ /dbyer med rdo rje'i dam tshig gnas/ /dbang bzhi'i

lam gyi dam tshig las/ /rang gi ngo bo'i dam tshig dang / /spyod pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / /longs spyod yan lag dam tshig ste/ /gsang ba bsrung ba'i gnas dang ni/ /de nyid bza' ba'i dam tshig ste/ /rnam pa rang bzhin ngo bo

dang / /mtshan nyid ldan pas dang po yin/ /snang ba rang bzhin bdag nyid can/ /dbyer med sbyor ba'i tshul ldan pa/ /rigs su dbye ba khyad par gang / /rigs su sgrub pa thun mong tshul/ /'di dag gsum pa'i don bstan pa'o/ /

longs spyod thob bya mi gnas tshul/ /'di ni dam tshig dag par brjod/ /'dis ni dam tshig rgya mtsho yi/ /sngags kyi gsang ba bsdus pa'o/ /sems ni rab tu dang bas rtse gcig rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /dam tshig gsang ba mi zad rgya mtsho

rab bsten na/ /de rings tshegs chung bde bas 'gro ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam nyid rtag pa nyid du mngon du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /ma las khams gsum sa

rnams kun/ /dbang phyug de yi longs spyod cing / /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rgyal sras thams cad bdag nyid yin/ /phung po 'di dag sangs rgyas te/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du gyur/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor bas/ /de nyid

de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog /ma lus sangs rgyas rgyu can te/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas sems/ /dkyil 'khor spro dang sdud pa'i gnas/ /bla na med pa tshad med mchog /mkhas brtson spro ba'i las bdag nyid/ /shin du rmad byung

ye shes can/ /bla na med pa'i chen po'o/ /sems bskyed smon dang 'jug pa dang / /zab dang rgya che dbyer med pa/ /mi ldog pa yi mngon gyur pas/ /khyad par 'phags pa theg pa che/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /dag pa dang ni ma dag pa'i/ /ye

shes ye shes khyad par che/ /bsam pa zag med tshul thob pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /bla med ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gsang ba dag pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ye shes dam pa bka' stsal mdzad/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas nyid dang / /dpa'

bo dang ni dpa' mo dang / /ston mor gyur pa nyid dang yang / /sna tshogs ston mo'i rim shes pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gsang ba yis/ /mchog tu gyur pa 'dir brjod yin/ /'dir ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge hU~M las

bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte ba'i cha la hU~M gnas pa nyid de/ 'og tu ya~M las bskyed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla kham rgyal mtshan sngo ljang gis mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du ra~M dmar po las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'bar ba du mas mtshan pa rnam

par bsam par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams thams cad thun mong du bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste/ der ka~M las byung ba'i thod pa skya bo gsum gyi steng gi bar snang gi char a dkar po las byung ba'i pad ma'i snod du blta ste/

de'i nang du bkod pa gur gum dang / /sman dang / ga pur dang / pad ma dang / me tog ste/ mu bi shu ra ma ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i cha 'og tu glang po che dang / rta dang / ba glang dang / khyi'i sha dang sna tshogs pa'i sha ste/ ha d+ha go ku na ste so sor thabs dang shes rab kyi

bdag nyid du sgyur ba ste/ hU~M b+h+ru~M trA~M hrI kha~M steng gi cha'o/ /a~M lA~M mA~M pA~M tA~M rnams 'og gi cha la ste yang na phyogs dang mtshams kyi cha'o/ /de dag kha dog so sor gsal bar ma 'dres par blta ste/ rdo rje las byung ba'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa dang / de'i

'od phyir log pas de nyid kyi nang du thim nas yi ge gsum mngon par bsngags te/ me'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'od 'bar ba rnams kyis de dag zhu bar gyur pa dang / dag cing skyon med par bya ba dang / dpe med pa'i ro mchog rdo rje'i mthu dang ldan

zhing yongs su smin pa'i bdag nyid du mos pa ste/ de'i steng du ye shes dang ldan pa'i yi ge oM dkar po 'bar ba dgod par bya'o/ /de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams de'i nang du yongs su thim nas/ oM AHhUM ces bya ba'i

sngags las 'od spro ba dang bcas pas mngon par bsngags pa 'di nyid 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dang / gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzlas par bya ba dang / rang nyid kyi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor gyi

'khor lo gsal bar dmigs te/ sbyang ba dang / spel ba dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bdud rtsi las blangs pa'i tshul du yi ge gsum zhu zhing 'dren pa'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'od zer gyi rnam par byon te de dag snga ma dang tshul gcig tu gyur par blta'o/ /de nas yang bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rig ma lha mo khro bo'i tshogs du ma'i snang bar gyur pa bar snang rab tu gang ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bdag dang bcas pa thams cad kyi ljags

la hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po nas kyi 'bru tsam pa de'i lte ba hU~M dang bcas pa las 'od zer gyi sbu gus drangs nas bdud rtsi gsol bar bya'o/ /des bdag gi lus kyi lha dang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa

yongs su mchod cing mnyes te tshim par blta'o/ /'dis ni ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas/ /bla med khyad par 'byung ba nyid/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mchog gyur pa/ /bde ba chen pos gnas par bya/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi'i

rnam pa ru/ /rab 'bab spyi bo nas rtag tu/ /lce dbang gis ni de btung ba/ /de las rga shi 'jig byed 'gyur/ /pad ma'i sdong po las ji ltar/ /nus pa chu ni 'dren pa ltar/ /bcud rnams nye bar 'thung byas pas/ /stobs

'gyur rnal 'byor 'tsho bar byed/ /gang du nang gi bdag nyid dus/ /de ni gsang ba bstan pa'o/ /nang gi bdag nyid can dus 'gyur/ /de nas ye shes phrin las 'byung / /zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus shes gang la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus shes bya ba 'di ni gsang

ba chen po shin du gsang ba/ shin du phra ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te de nyid rnam par mi rtog pa/ /chos nyid ye shes ches phra bas/ /de nyid rtsa las rgyu ba can/ /khong stong med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /sems can grol byed

ye shes yin/ /gsang sngags rnal 'byor dngos grub ster/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang dgug pa mngon spyod la/ /drag po 'chi byed 'joms pa po/ /ye shes mngon par grub pa ste/ /bcom ldan de la zhi ba gces/ /rang rig dbyings

su de bzhin gshegs/ /me tog dang ni dri bzhin du/ /rten dang brten par dbyer med pa/ /dngos med ngo bo gcig pa'i bdag /g.yo ba med par kun du gnas/ /de nyid 'gro snying rnam dag pa/ /ye shes phra ba'i tshul

gnas pa/ /dmar dang nag dang ser po dang / /dkar po de bzhin mdor bsdus pa/ /thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu/ /lus las 'gro dang 'ong ba dang / /gnas pas g.yo bar byed pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim bzhin du/ /nyin dang mtshan du mngon

par 'byung / /de las srog dang rtsol ba ru/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /dbu ma ru ni gnas pa yin/ /mi gnas de las rtog pa byung / /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams las/ /'khor ba mngon par sgrub pa yin/ /

rtog pa dag las rlung dag ste/ /ye shes kyis ni mya ngan 'das/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu dgyes shing tshim par gyur to/ /'di

ni thabs kyi khyad par las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa 'di nyid do/ /bdag nyid sems dpa' gsum brtseg tu/ /gnas pa gsang ba 'di 'byung ba'o/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa'i cha las ni/ /'od zer dpag med phyung

nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsal ba las/ /'gro ba kun la'ang thabs ldan pa'i/ /dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /ting nge 'dzin dngos las byung ba/ /bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /dkyil

'khor 'khor lor gyur nas kyang / /de nyid du ni thim byed pa'o/ /shin du phra mor gyur nas ni/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam gyi/ /thig le 'bar ba'i dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lhar bcas gyur pa dag /rten dang brten par bcas pa las/ /

byung ba'i 'od zer dpag med pas/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang / /dam tshig dag gis bskul ba na/ /de dag las byung 'od kyis ni/ /nang du ma lus gang byas te/ /des ni kun du mtha' yas par/ /ba spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i/ /snang ba chen

po dpag med pas/ /'jig rten khams kun khyab gyur te/ /slar log de nyid la zhugs gyur/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi/ /bdag nyid nye bar bsdu ba'o/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang bcas pa thim pa mngon du gyur pa

las rang gi rig ma'i chos 'byung gi pad ma'i ge sar du gyur pa'i ze'u 'bru'i sna rtser byang chub kyi sems las bskyed pa'i hU~M las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa nas tsam pa'i lte ba la nyi ma'i gdan dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i hU~M las

'phro ba'i rin po che shin du phra bar gyur pa nyungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa ste/ de lta bu'i yungs 'bru rin po che de dag gi dbus na rten dang brten par

bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga so sor bsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga so so'i dkyil 'khor bye brag tu gyur pa dgod par bya'o/ /de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba la dbang thob par bya ba ste cig car ram/ rims kyis yang

dang yang du bsam gtan la rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /de dag kyang rnam pa gsal na lha'i sku dang / sgra'i de kho na nyid yig 'bru la gnas pa dang / thig le'i ngo bo phyag mtshan du gsal ba 'od kyi gong bu dang bcas pa yin no/ /

'di nyid so sor rang rig pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po 'dus pa'i cha las yongs su sprul pa nyid la spro ba dang bsdu bas gnas par bya'o/ /de las brtan pa nyid du gyur pa na smig rgyu dang du ba lta bu la sogs pa'i rtags

rnams nges pa nyid du 'byung bar byed do/ /de nyid la bying ba dang rgod pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sgo nas bsam gtan bya'o/ /so so rang gis rig gyur pa/ /ye shes lnga yi gzugs gyur pas/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos

kun gyi/ /ma lus khyab pa'i byin brlab cing / /yul dang dbang po rnam sbyangs pas/ /'jug dang 'byung dang gnas pa dang / /bde ba chen por gyur pa'o/ /gsang ba ye shes bsdus pa las/ /yongs su gsal ba skyon med pa/ /

myur zhing phan tshun ma 'dres pas/ /sgra bcas phreng sngags brjod par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba rgyal po yi/ /lha rnams mnyes byed dngos grub ster ba'o/ /gsang sngags snying po sku gsum gyi/ /snying po yi ge'i
tshul gnas pa/ /A li kA li phreng ba las/ /sngags rnams dbyangs dang gsal byed las/ /'byung zhing 'jug par byed pa yin/ /gnas pa ye shes lam gyur pa/ /bde gshegs thugs las mnyam gnas pa/ /tshul gcig
par ni lam gyur pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta ste/ gsang

sngags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku spro ba dang / sdud pa dang / rab tu byung ba rdo rje'i gnas bying ba ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi
gnas sems la mi gnas so/ /chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de 'di ni ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yin no/ /chos kun sgyu ma rmi lam ltar/ /gsang ba'i ye shes kun 'byung ba/ /

mi rtog rnam par mi dmigs pas/ /zag pa med pa'i tshul 'byung 'gyur/ /de las kun tu dge ba yi/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i 'od gsal dbyings/ /spros med mkha' la kun khyab par/ /rang byung dri med tshul 'di bstan zhes gsungs

so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsang ba bdud
rtsi dag par ston pa rgyal po'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs

pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po bla na med pa'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug /gang na gnas/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag rang gi sku dang gsung

dang thugs kyi rgyud rdo rje la gnas so zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang /

khams gsum thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i snying po gang du gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ye shes rdo rje'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba sems
kyi rgyud snying po ye shes ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rjes

gsungs pa/ gang na'ang gnas pa ma yin no/ /de nas gzhan yang dngos grub thob pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ de la gsang ba chen po'i dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba'i

phyir dngos grub tha mal pa gang ci yang rung ba la 'tshol zhing bsten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa la sogs pa dag gi dngos grub dang / mngag gzhug pa don du gnyer ba'i dngos grub

dang / bum pa bzang po'i dngos grub dang / sa 'og gi dngos grub dang / rgyal srid kyi dngos grub dang / rgyas pa'i dngos grub dang / dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub dang / mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la sogs pa rnam mang don du gnyer bar mi bya ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gsang ba chen po bla na med pa'i don du 'jig rten pa'i las kyi dngos grub phra mo la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub 'ba' zhig la sems rtse gcig tu gnas

par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lus kyi spyod pa ma lus pa/ /

de nyid thams cad yang dag par/ /sku yi rdo rje las dbyung bya/ /de nyid ma lus dkyil 'khor du/ /sems can khams rnams thams cad la/ /dri med phreng bas sbyar ba'i dngos/ /rtag par dus gsum kun du yang / /sangs rgyas skur ni byed

pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas gang gi/ dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /brjod pa tshig gi lam rnams la/ /grag pa sgra rnams ma lus

par/ /khams gsum rdo rje'i gnas la ni/ /dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ /so so yang dag rig pa yi/ /tshig gi dngos grub bla na med/ /yid kyi sngags ni sdom pa po/ /dam tshig shin du 'da' dka'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas sems rdo rje'i dam tshig dngos grub 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung ngo / /yid kyi rtog pa ma lus pa/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad kun/ /bstan pa'i snying po gsang

ba che/ /rdo rje ye shes dag pa ni/ /mi phyed gsum ldan 'od gsal ba/ /rdo rje byang chub mngon byung ba/ /thams cad stong nyid ston pa las/ /dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no/ /kun du rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

dkyil 'khor la/ /sngags slob pas ni bsam gtan bya/ /bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kun du mdzes dga' kun du rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa

de dag thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ /e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/ /e ma'o gsang ba che bshad pa/ /gang du lus dang ngag sems med/ /de ru gzugs ni

rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje chen po'i dbyings 'byung ba/ /de nyid yang dag ston par mdzad/ /ces gsol to/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag byas nas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi mchog chen po/ /rdo rje gsum gyi mchog dbang

bsgyur/ /rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa yi/ /dngos grub kun nas bshad pa mdzad/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /gsang ba zab dang rgya che'i dbyings/ /thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo'i gtso/ /dngos grub 'dis ni bsdus pa yin/ /

zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du brjod pa yang dag par bstan pa/ gang du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ma lus pa snying po gcig

tu yang dag par gsungs pa ste/ 'di ni bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas/ phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ chos bla na med pa gsang chen rdo rje'i theg pa/ phyir rgol ba thams cad

kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrog pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa/ lam thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub pa med cing zil gyis mi non pa
bdud kyi rigs ma lus pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ kun du rgyu ba'i log sred can rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i yul/ tha snyad/ thams cad

las rnam par 'das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mtshungs pa med cing kun las gol ba'i don te/ gsang ba chen po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ /spyod pa bla na med pa

'di thos pa'o/ /lha dang mi dang lha min dbang po dang / /tshangs brtsegs rnam grol 'bras bu rab tu thob/ /gtsang ma lha rnams bya ba rab tu dga'/ /dbang po tshangs pa bar snang mkha' la gnas/ /bde bar gshegs la shin du mchod

par byas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /bar snang gnas te rab tu dga' gyur cing / /chu yi sprin med yid du 'ong ba dag /'gro ba'i dug sel dri zhim bdug par byed/ /lha yi dbang po rab bsgyur rab dang zhi/ /mkha'

las lha 'khor khrag khrig dpag med dang / /rim gror bcas pas gos rnams 'thor bar byed/ /yid 'ong gos brgya dag gis gtor bar gyur/ /'dod par spyod pa'i lha yi bu mo dag /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug rdul phran gyi/ /grangs

mnyam dag gis dgyes pa'i rol mos mchod/ /gzugs la spyod pa'i lha yi bu mang po/ /ri rab sum bcu rtsa drug rdul mnyam pas/ /kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ /rol mo brdung ba bye ba khrag khrig dag /rig

pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo dpag tu med/ /de snyed gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rjes 'brang zhing / /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa ston/ /e ma sgra dbyangs yan lag kun 'byung ba/ /kun du bzang po'i rnam 'phrul du mar shar/ /zhing

mchog gcig na bde gshegs bzhugs mdzad pa/ /zhing rnams du mar sku gzugs rab tu bstan/ /de nyid sangs rgyas stong phrag gcig nyid las/ /sangs rgyas bye phrag stong ni gong du bstan/ /gsung gcig gis ni rab tu

gang bstan pa/ /bsam yas gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed du/ /tshul rnams mi zad chos sgra sgrogs par mdzad/ /de snyed gsang ba mchog 'di rgyas par bkang / /gang du ye shes rdo rje mi 'byung ba'i/ /ting 'dzin gcig pa nges par

bzhugs nas ni/ /chos kyi dbyings las 'byung ba du ma yi/ /ting 'dzin sgo ni nam mkha' khyab par 'byung / /sangs rgyas skus ni zhing khams khrag khrig dag /yid 'ong sna tshogs khyab pa'i ye shes sku/ /chos dbyings rgya chen

yongs su rgyas par bkang / /ba spu gcig las bde ldan 'od bkye ba/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs yid 'ong zhi bar spro/ /zhing gi rdul phran zad par nus 'gyur gyi/ /'di dag bgrang bar shes par mi nus so/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i

dam par la las mthong / /la las sangs rgyas mtshan rab mnga' bar mthong / /la las rigs drug thub pa sprul par mthong / /zhing rnams la lar spyod pa mchog mdzad cing / /dag cing rkang gnyis zhi ba dam pa mthong / /dga'

ldan gnas na mgon po bzhugs pa dang / /rgyal tshab bsko mdzad nye bar 'pho ba bstan/ /gshegs dang gzigs pa de dag rab tu bstan/ /zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi lhums 'jug dang / /zhing rnams kun du skye ba

ston pa nyid/ /gzhon nu rol cing sgyu rtsal gnas pas mkhas/ /pho brang btsun mo'i nang na bzhugs par ston/ /'gro ba'i don du mgon po nges 'byung zhing / /dka' thub spyad cing de las ldang bar ston/ /mi g.yo go 'phang

du ni gnas byas shing / /bsam gtan bskul ba mdzad dang rgyal ba thob/ /rgyal ba'i dus las bslang ba 'di dag gis/ /gsang ba mngon par byang chub de nyid bstan/ /byang chub snying po rdo rje gdan du gshegs/ /de nyid bcom
ldan mngon par sangs rgyas la/ /sa yi lha mo dgyes pas khyab byas shing / /bdud sde bcom pas mi 'gyur mchog gi gnas/ /gsang ba 'og min 'di ni ye shes yul/ /gnyis med rdo rje'i gnas su rdzogs sangs
rgyas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo nges legs lam bstan pa/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du gsang ba bstan/ /rgyud sde yan lag phyi nang gsang ba yi/ /rnam pa gsum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /de ltar de bzhin

gshegs pas tshul 'di gsungs/ /stong pa zhi ba bdag med mtshan nyid bral/ /chos nyid rang byung mkha' dang mtshungs pa las/ /rgyal bas don dam rab tu mi gnas pa/ /chos nyid stong nyid de bzhin nyid du ni/ /rten

cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams la/ /rgyu rkyen 'bras bus grub pa yang dag lam/ /kun rdzob spyod yul yin par rab tu bstan/ /zhing mang mtha' yas kun du de nyid ston/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas pas gang

du ni/ /'gro ba'i gzugs brnyan du ma ston pa bzhin/ /de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa/ /kun du 'gro ba'i don du rab tu ston/ /thams cad ma lus chos nyid de 'dra ste/ /mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid
kyis 'dra/ /mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /bde bar gshegs pa'i lam 'di thob 'dod pas/ /rtog dang rnam rtog ma lus spang med pas/ /gsang chen tshul 'di gang gis spyod pa ni/ /dngos

dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis/ /gang du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma'i spyod yul gsang ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshungs pa med par spyod pa 'di la 'di lta ste/ gsang
ba chen po bla na med pa'i tshul 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rab tu spyod pa/ gsang ba
chen po chos kyi tshul/ chos kyi dbyings lta ba po med pa/ chos thams cad shes pa po med par yang dag par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du yang dag par lta ste/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pas

chos thams cad la lus med par rab tu mthong ba/ chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rgya mtsho la mi gnas pa'i tshul bstan pa nyid do/ /srid pa dang zhi ba'i chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba nyid nam mkha' lta bur
gnas pa/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par spags par mi byed la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dus byas su sgro btags pa thams cad kyis rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa ste/ 'di nyid

sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin brlab pa/ /bsod nams yongs su rgyas pa dag pa'i zhing / /snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i 'od zer ni/ /skye dgu kun gyi blo yi 'char byed pa/ /gang du sku gsung thugs kyi snang
ba ni/ /rnam par gsal ba sgrib pa med pa nyid/ /chos rnams kun la yang dag rab 'jug cing / /chos kyi dbyings las ye shes 'bral med pa/ /lus ngag yid gnas kun gyi rjes 'gro ba'i/ /skad cig
nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /skad cig thog mtha' med par rab ston pa/ /'di ni ye shes mi zad 'byung gnas kyi/ /tshul la gnas pa gsang ba'i spyod tshul lo/ /brtan pas kun du rtog pa rab

zhi ba/ /'di ni mi gnas gsang ba'i spyod yul 'thob/ /sems can rgyud na'ang mi spyod ma yin te/ /'di 'dra'i ye shes dam pa khong du chud/ /de la kun du rtog dang mi rtog med/ /blo mchog de dang 'gro kun kha lo
sgyur/ /rnam par smin pas gos med nam mkha' bzhin/ /'jig rten thams cad rgyu dang bcas pas na/ /chos rnams kun du rgyu med bstan pa min/ /'di nyid rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /phyogs bcur
ye shes bzhugs pa'i byang chub tshul/ /gsang ba dam pa'i spyod yul 'di bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi gnas ye shes kyi yul sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab 'byam tshad med pa'i rdo rje btsun mo'i

b+ha ga las mngon par 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor las/ yang dag pa'i thugs rje chen po'i ngang las ye shes kyi sprin rdo rjes

kun du khyab par spro ba dang sdud pa'i tshul gyis gang du mi gnas shing rang 'byung chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med par ngo bo nyid dmigs

su med pa nyid du ston to/ /de nas dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba mi zad pa'i tshul 'di

gsungs so/ /gsang ba spros med 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang / /kun du ma skyes skye med dga' ba'i dbyings/ /bde chen ro mnyam rgyal ba kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun rang bzhin yongs su mnyam pa nyid/ /mngon par chags med

mi gnas ye shes las/ /rlom sems med pa'i chos nyid skye ba med/ /ye shes chos kyi sgo yi ting nge 'dzin/ /nam mkha'i chos nyid 'byam klas thogs med pa/ /byang chub sems ldan bde gshegs spyod yul can/ /rdo rje lta

bu'i gnas las bstan pa dang / /phyir mi ldog pa ye shes 'byung gnas nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med 'bras bu'i yul/ /grangs med gzhal du med pa'i don 'byung ba'o/ /'di dag kyang ji ltar rtogs par bya ba yin

zhe na/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i sa khong du chud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rjes su chags pa med par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa med pa
sems bskyed pa shin du yangs pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma rab tu thob pa/ ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ don gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa rab tu 'jug pa bla na med pa'i ye

shes dam pa'i spyod yul yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i rgyud

'dir gsang ba'i yi ge de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur/ de skad ces

gsol pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsang chen gyi spyod pa rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsang ba'i yi ge

gang zhig lags/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje ste/ de dag nyid do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog ye shes ston mdzad pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal
to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi gsungs shing / /don chen 'bras bu lam gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i rgyud/ /rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa nyid/ /u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /'jig rten du
ni rnyed dka' ba/ /kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i mdo/ /gsang ba 'dus pa chen po yin/ /dbyings gyur khams gsum gsang ba che/ /
de nyid bde bar 'gyur bsams pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas mtshan pas/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje khyu mchog dgyes/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/ /'di ni gang zhig gnas byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
grags chen rnams/ /zhag bdun gyis ni phun tshogs pa'i/ /sku gsum dngos grub 'dir thob 'gyur/ /bcom ldan sku gsung thugs gsang ba/ /rdo rje bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dri med ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /

khyad par mchog 'di phyung ba'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa/ /cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob/ /gsang ba'i don 'di 'byung dka' ba'i/ /bla

med bde chen mi 'gyur ba/ /'di ni snying po bsdus pa ste/ /gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ba min/ /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa chen po 'di la skad cig thang cig yud

tsam gyis gnas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do/ /bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing rtsol kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de dpal

gsang ba 'dus pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de dag shin du dkon gyur pa/ /rnam grangs 'di na bstan pa'i
tshe/ /de tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /shin du gdung bas cher non te/ /gsang chen bskal pa ngan gyur ces/ /dus gcig bstan pa nyid gcig dang / /ston pa gcig las gzhan pa yi/ /spyod yul ma gyur
de yi tshe/ /ji ltar thabs 'di ston byed 'gyur/ /ming tsam du yang mi thos na/ /gzhan ci smos lta ga la dgos/ /de nyid kun du bsgrags gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/

de skad ces ma zer cig /yi ge 'di kun dang thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang / ma thob pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams

cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po mnyam pa nyid

la rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang na cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
rigs kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid las dmigs su med pa'i yi ge'i tshogs la
ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la
snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lha mo bzhi dag gis/ /tshad med ye shes dag pa'i sa/ /yang dag bskul ba mdzad pa las/ /de bzhin nyid las bzhengs par 'gyur/ /dpag med rdo rje'i tshul mchog las/ /'dod

chags gnas la spyod pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs na/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig skyes/ /dam tshig 'khor lor gnas pa yis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod nyer ldan pas/ /gnyis med byang chub sems

gnas te/ /dgyes pa yongs su spyod pa mdzad/ /de nas rdo rje'i lus kyi ni/ /rtsa yi khong stong thams cad du/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /yon tan phrin las dam tshig gi/ /

khu ba byang chub sems rgyun gyis/ /kun du khyab par gyur pa ni/ /dper na bum pa chus gang ltar/ /shin du bde bas rgyas par gnas/ /de nyid ye shes gyur pa'o/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i/ /'gro ba'i
phung po ji snyed kun/ /sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba/ /de la bdud rtsi'i 'od zer gyis/ /glog gi zer ma ltar 'phro bas/ /shin du bde bar rig nas ni/ /de nas brtsams te sems can khams/ /ma

lus lus pa med pa la/ /rdo rje dpal gyi reg byung bas/ /yang dag mchog tu byin brlabs shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ye shes dri med dbang bskur cing / /

ma lus kun kyang kun du bzang / /kun du bzang po'i dpal zhes par/ /bla na med par dbang bskur to/ /de ltar dbang bskur tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /

rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can/ /bde chen ngo bo nyid skur gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes spyod pa mthong gyur pas/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ /

slar gsol ba ni mthong lags so/ /ye shes spyod pa rdo rje che/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong zhes gsol/ /de ltar yang dag gyur pa'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga las/ /mngon par

byung nas 'di skad gsol/ /gang du 'dod chags chen po yi/ /yi ge'i tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub rjes su rtogs gyur gang / /de nas bcom ldan ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /de
nas rigs kyi bdag po yis/ /gsang ba mchog tu bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /de skad ces ni ma zer cig /de nyid ci yi phyir zhe na/ /chos rnams nam mkha'i rdo rje'i gnas/ /
de nyid mtshungs phyir stong pa nyid/ /rab tu mi gnas bdag nyid las/ /chos rnams 'od gsal dbyings gyur pa/ /de nyid ye shes 'byung gnas gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag

pa'i mnyam pa nyid spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig ma dang lha mo dang / khro bo'i rgyal po
du ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
