yams dang dug las thar/ /ma sa dri dang rak+ta dang / /khu ba chu dag sbyar ram bza'/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos grub ste/ /kun gyis spyad par bya ba yin/ /mdze dang rlung gi gnod pa sel/ /tshe ring lus kyang rgyas pa yang / /byang
chub dkar dmar mdangs dang ldan/ /yams dang mi gtsang dngos po sel/ /dri yi chu yi yon tan ni/ /klad rkang pho log grang ba sel/ /shin du zab ste gsang ba'i mchog /skal ldan rtogs pa rnams kyis spyad
pa las/ /skal med blo dman rnams kyis ga la yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha'i
dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus na sems can gdug pa can gyi dug bsal ba'i mtshan nyid dang / zhugs sa bstan du gsol/ nyon cig dbang po chen po legs par rab tu

yid la zung shig mtshan nyid rnams ni 'di lta ste/ rus pa sha dang pags pa dang / /rtsa dang khrag dang nang grol lo/ /bcud dang chus te lus kyi stobs/ /lus kyi rtsi dang mdog dang dbyibs/ /reg pa chu dang chu ser dang / /klad
pa lha ba lus kun la/ /zhugs sa rnams ni bco brgyad de/ /'on kyang gcig sogs grangs kyis brtag /rus pa la zhugs pa ni lus skems pa dang / zug gzer che ba dang / na thang nge ba dang / thig ler

na ba'o/ /sha la zhugs pa ni lus bems su 'dug pa dang / yang na lci se 'dug pa dang / mdog nag pa dang / dri ma ngan pa dang / sngar 'ong ba dang sha ro 'byung ba'o/ /pags pa la zhugs pa ni sha 'khrig pa dang mdog

skya ba'o/ /rtsa la zhugs pa ni lus sbrid ber ba dang / rtags ni de las bzlog dka' ba'o/ /sbrid lugs dang ni sbrid lci dang / /tsha ba 'dzag dang tsha rab dang / /tsha ker ba dang / tsha breng ba/ /lus la sogs pa

tsha thad pa/ /tsha pir ba dang yan lag 'bra/ /khrag la zhugs pa ni/ sna nas khrag kyang skabs su 'dzag /tsha ber ba dang lci yor ba/ /gdong pa rtag tu dmar ba dang / /'o ma'i pris ma ltar 'ong ngo / /nang grol

la zhugs pa ni/ glo snying mi bde skyug ting nge / /snying 'dar snying yang mi dga' ste/ /de ni bzlog par dka' ba'o/ /bcud la zhugs pa la bzhi ste/ /sa bon mi 'byung mtshan mi ldang / /khu ba skyo ma'i mdog tu

'ong / /khu ba dngas snyigs phye nas 'ong / /chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste/ /sbugs chu rgya skyegs khu ltar 'ong / /sna chu rtag tu skya bor 'ong / /mig gi chu yang rtag par 'dzag /du ba ser bu byung tsam gyi/ /gzhan
pas rab tu myur bar 'dzag /lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa ni/ /sgyid lug pa dang skyi zhum pa/ /lus kyi rgyu ba nyal nyal 'ong / /lus kyi rtsi la zhugs pa ni/ /rtsi la sogs te lus kyi dri/ /bya'i pags pa
bzhin sang gis 'gro/ /mdog la zhugs pa ni/ lce ni btsod kyi mdog bzhin 'ong / /dbyibs la zhugs pa ni/ lus kyang gnyer chung dag gis khengs/ /sor mo byi ba'i mjug ma 'dra/ /reg pa la zhugs pa
ni/ sna rtse la sogs lag rtse rnams/ /tsha yam tsha ber lus gtse ba/ /g.ya' bar 'ong ba dag yin no/ /chu la zhugs pa ni/ yan lag rengs shing na ba dang / /sha 'bur ba dang grang sing sing / /yan
lag tshogs rnams khol ba'o/ /chu ser la zhugs pa ni chu ser la lnga ste/ za khol ko la/ za ni tsag tsag /tsha ljibs ljibs/ lus la chu sgangs yod pa'o/ /chu sgangs byung nas rid mi lus/ /lus la 'brum

rjes sran ma 'dra'o/ /de ni bzlog par sla ba'o/ /klad pa la zhugs pa ni mgo bo phying phying skrangs pa dang / /'thom dang bem me ba dag dang / /skra rnams nul gyis byi la sogs/ /lha ba la zhugs pa ni/ gdong pa tsha lam lam 'ong ba dang /

grang ser ser 'ong ba'o/ /de ni bzlog par sla ba'o/ /lus ring gdong yang thal skya'i mdog /de ni bzlog par dka' ba'o/ /shin du khro bo'i klu rnams ni/ /rtag dang mi ldan thugs kyi 'od/ /bzlog dka' rma tshogs mi 'tsho

rtags mi ldan/ /bzlog sla gzhan yang yan lag phra ba dang / /sbom dang thung dang rings pa la sogs pa/ /klu'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o/ /rtag ni de dag 'ga' zhig ni nad zhig gzhan la 'ang las 'byung / /'ga' ni
klu'i gdon ma yin/ /las las 'byung ba dag kyang yod/ /de dag gi ni mtshan nyid ni/ /mkhas pas so sor shes par bya'o/ /nad gzhi las byung sman sogs dang / /'phrod pa'i zas ni phan pa yin/ /
nad rnams gzhan ma yun mi rtag /'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /shes nas myur du brtson 'grus kyis/ /sna tshogs thabs la ma rmongs pas/ /bzlog pa'i las la 'bad par bya/ /
chu yi thigs pa phra mo yis/ /dus su byung bas rdo ba 'bigs/ /gdug pa'i dbang can zha rid yang / /le lo dang bral rtse gcig sems/ /rgyun du lha bsgom bzlas brjod kyis/ /gdug pa'i
nad las thar bar nges/ /rtsol ba che la som nying bral/ /gang bsams de las mi 'grub med/ /'khor ba'i phung po srog bcas la/ /mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur gyis/ /brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o/ /
zhes dpal gtum po chen pos gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das slad ma'i dus dag na/ gdug pa can gyi yi dags rnams/ /dug rnams dbyung na ji ltar dbyung / /mchod pa'i las rnams ji ltar bya/ /chos kun bdag pos bka' stsol cig ces gsol to/ /bka' stsal pa/
lha'i dbang po nyon cig /mchod pa'i las dag byed 'dod na/ /gnyis dgon gtsug lag chu mig 'gram/ /mtshe'u lteng ka khron pa'i steng / /dbyar zla gsum la gnas par bya/ /dbyibs legs

rin mdzes byi dor bya/ /ba yi rnam lnga spos dang dri/ /thig le lnga dang ldan par bya/ /dbus su hU~M bri gsal bar bya/ /\u0f00 phA pho phai phoM 'di dag bzhi las rdzogs par bskyed/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ni/ /
lus dkar rin chen sbrul mgo gsum/ /lag na rin chen sdong bu'o/ /klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs/ /sbrul mgo gnyis pa kha dog ser/ /rin chen 'bar ba lag na'o/ /chu lha mgo lnga kha dog dmar/ /

lag na pad ma 'bar ba'o/ /klu rgyal shing la pu ra ka / lag na sprin phung kha dog ljang / /rgyal dang rje dang bram ze dmangs/ /so so'i rigs kyi rgyal po ste/ /spra tshil zha nye bag zan la/ /gzugs su
yang ni mdzes par bya/ /sems can 'khor gyis bskor bar bya/ /klu sman sna tshogs dkar dang mngar/ /tshogs par byas la mchod sbyin bya/ /kham phor slu gu mchu lnga par/ /blugs la kha bcad
gnas su sba/ /gso bar bya ba'i las ni rab/ /spyan das gdan dang phyag skyabs bstod/ /smon lam la sogs rgya cher bya/ /bden pa bdar zhing bsdigs par bya/ /
dug rnams dbyung ba'i las dag ni/ /ra~M ya~M kha~M las byung ba yi/ /'khor lo rnam gsum me rlung chu/ /bsreg gtor bkru bya stong nyid kyis/ /'khor lo chen po gnas par bya/ /hU~M las gyur par

ldan par bya/ /bzang skyob pa dang dogs nyes dang / /mnyam dang ldan pas mchod pa bya/ /de nas de bzhengs mtshan nas brjod/ /nya stong dus mchod sring zhus bskor/ /des ni don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje
gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dug dbyung zhing mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ dus ngan tha mar

gyur pa'i tshe/ /sdig la mi 'dzem mi dge spyod/ /mtshams med byed cing chos dkor 'jig /mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang / /skams dang zha grum gzhogs phyed na/ /de'i tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /nyon cig
dbang po 'khor gyi mchog /log sred gdul dka' gdol ba can/ /zhi bas mi 'dul gang zag gi/ /gshed du 'khor lo 'di bskos so/ /kro d+ha rA dza'i gzugs bcas la/ /rdo rje rgya gram mtha' skor rdo rje'i
rwa/ /brtson 'grus bzhi ldan dbus dang lnga ru de'o/ /de las rgyas pa dag tu bskor 'dod na/ /de la khyad par khyams dang yi ge ni/ /bcu gcig ldan byas mtshon re'i ming rus gcar/ /khyams gcig

hU~M dang ming rus mang na sbrag /dbus khyams sngags bri mang na de dang sbrag /gcig la rdo rje hU~M` bar mang na gcar/ /rkang pa mos ma shigs na pho yi las/ /de ma byung na pho mo sbrag pa'i las/ /bsod nams

can gyi skal bzangs ma thul na/ /srid pa'i stong bzlog 'khor lo dkrugs te bskor/ /ro ras la bri bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro/ /smyu gu byas la gdan nag yig sngon bri/ /dri rgod shing bsregs bong khrag bong dug sbyar/ /

dbus dang brtson khang bzhi por hU~M bar gcad/ /dgod pa kun byed las rnams thams cad kyi/ /sngags 'di pho dang mor bri bar du gsad/ \u0f00 badzra tsan Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ pho dang mor bskor rabs chad pho

mor gzhug /dbus kyi hU~M btags srad bu tshangs bug dbyung / /yak+Sha kha phaT phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje rab tu hU~M bar de bar bzhag /dug sna khrag snas ga'u nag por byug /gu gul rgya tshil

tshil chen ra lug rmang kha ni/ /khu ba nag pos bya bar rab tu shis/ /bong gri nag po'i rngog ma dri rgod shi skra dang / /yugs sa mo yi skra shad skud pas dkri/ /yugs sa mo yi dor rtas dril la sba/ /pho mo
thod pa steng 'og rgya gram bri/ /ri rab mnan byas mtha' gnyis dang po bzhi/ /bang rim sngags bris steng du rgya gram dgab/ /rgya gram 'og khung steng du khru do'i tshad/ /bang rim bzhi la sngags 'di

sku gsung thugs/ /nga yi ri rab dag tu mtshon phyir bri/ /o~M` la~M` hU~M la~M sta~M g+ha nA~M/ \u0f00 badzra tsaN DA nA~M` zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las drag po 'khor lo'i
le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de'i tshe de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la la ni/
g.yas su 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so/ /la la ni g.yon du 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so/ /la la ni bla 'og dgye dgu'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so/ /la la ni mtho dman dang grum
pa'i tshul gyis 'khrugs te de dag na gnas pa'i gdug pa can thams cad rab tu myos nas/ kha nas khrag ngan skyugs pa dag kyang bskus te/ thams cad kyang ga na ba der thad du 'dus
nas phyag 'tshal ste mgrin gcig tu skad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma snga ma ma mthong khro bdag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /rab tu drag pa ya mtshan e ma ho/ /thugs rjes dgongs
shig bdag cag 'bangs su mchi/ /de las 'gal na dmyal bar ltung bar shog ces gsol zhing 'khod do/ /de nas bdud kyi rgyal po bskos kyi bdag po bdud bye ba 'bum phrag dang bcas pas mgrin gcig
gis srog gi snying po phul ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ oM nag po tri Ta tri Ta tri ling tra ta ha ke Na/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na gnas pa der bdud kyis
'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /gang yid la dgos pa de grub par bgyid do/ /phas byad sngags dang sbyor ba btang ba yang phyir ldog go/ /de nas gza' rgod chen po rA hu la 'khor gza' 'bum phrag dang
bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ shu shu rak+Sha tshal pa/ kro d+ha kro le shwa ra/ rA hu la/ tsa ti tsa ti/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na gnas pa der
gza' rnams kyis 'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /phas gtang ba yang slar de nyid la mchi'o/ /'di 'dzin pa la ci 'tshal ba yang stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas dkar po dung gi thor tshugs can

la sogs pa'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag dang bcas pa lhags nas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ brah+ma pu Did Sha/ a ba ra ta rA dza d+ha na rak+Sha tsi ta phyung tsi ta rA dza phyung
rA dza tsi ta gtubs/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na mchis pa der yul 'khor dang dpag tshad du 'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /phas btang ba yang de nyid la slar mchi'o/ /de nas btsan
dmar po srog len btsan 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ A bi shu rA dza tri liM bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'di las 'da' bar mi

bgyid do/ /phas btang ba yang de nyid la slar mchi'o/ /de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po smigs pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ ya ma rA dza ya ma tsi ni
bdag gi rig pa spyod pa der bdag gi gnod pa mi spobs lags te/ gnod pa'i rgyun spangs nas phas gtang ma yang slar de nyid la mchi'o/ /de nas ma mo'i rgyal mo mkha' dbyings kyi
yum lnga dang / bdud kyi gshin rje'i sring mo srid pa'i phung byed re ma ti la sogs pa/ ma mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dag gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ rag mo mA mA ru lu snying kha
rak+Sha dza pA la ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /bdag cag gi gsang ba'i sngags 'di spyod pa der bsrung ba dang bskyab pa bgyid do/ /'khor dang bcas te bka' bzhin bgyid do/ /phas gtang ba yang slar de

nyid la mchi'o/ /de nas klu 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ nA gA rA dza nA ga ni/ gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po spyod pa der bdag gi klu'i gnod pa'i rgyun spong
ngo / /phas gtang ba yang slar de nyid la mchi'o zhes so so nas rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te dam bcas so/ /de nas dbang po chen pos/ khro bo'i bdag po de la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /srid pa dbang can 'di rnams kun/ /'khor los zlog na ji ltar bzlog /bzlog thabs khyad par bka' stsal cig /bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po mA ra ya'i
tsakra dag las so so'i sngags 'khor bri/ /byad sngags phyir zlog dam tshig bzlog btags so/ /mchu gsum snying lpags med pa'i thod pa dang / /ro nye sbal shugs phag thod rnam
gri mo/ /dri rgod skyud ga thod chen nang dag tu/ /rab tu drag tu bskor ba'i 'khor lo gzhug /'ong 'gro 'drul srang rgya gram lam dag tu/ /e dong bru byas rgya sol mi khyi ra/ /rta khrag rme khrag
nag pos sbyangs la bsku/ /dbus bcug mtha' bskor mnan pa'i las dag bya/ /yang na thun du spags la khros pas 'phang / /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang
ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can srog gi snying po phul ba dang / mngon spyod drag po'i las kyis bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye bstan
pa 'jig pa'i dus dag na/ /thun gyis tshar gcad bstan du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig /rdzas dang sngags bcas ting 'dzin gsum/ /khros pas zhe sdang bskyed
par bya/ /zhe sdang dran pas gdug rdzas bsag /yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe til/ /gze ma skyer pa se ba'i tsher/ /thun sngags 'di bzlas brnags la brab/ /a mu kam ni gtor ma 'am/ /mtshan ngan ka

pA la ru gzhug /o~M` badzra tsaN+Da Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya thun phob/ dbang po la yaM/ srog la yaM/ tsit+ta la yaM/ go ro tsa na la yaM/ gzas pa'i mtshan mos rdo rje'i thog tu dbab/ /gang dmigs gzas

pa'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul rnams/ /bdag la bsdu byas rtog pa'i bag chags bkru/ /sngags 'dis rol cig brjod cing b+ha ling dgril/ /oM ba liM ta/ ba li~M pU dza ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hoH/ badzra kro d+ha tsaN Da/ ba li~M` khA

hi khA hi/ badzra kro d+ha tsaN Da ha ha ha/ he he he/ b+ha TA swA hA/ sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang chu srin snying / /sha chen khrag chen longs spyod rnam pa kun/ /shes rab mchog gi phyag rgya cher bsam la/ /yaM gtor raM bsreg khaM bkrus

bdud rtsir bsgyur/ /a mr-i ta dag sngags 'dis sbyang bar bya/ /\u0f00 AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ /badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHthA/ o~M` ma hA raka ta dz+wa la raM khaM/ khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hA hA hA/ phyi nang
gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa kun/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams gang bar rab dmigs la/ /skyo med dang bas nyin mtshan brtson par bya/ /mi dmigs mnyam
bzhag ye shes rab ldan pa/ /sku gsung dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /sems dpa' sems ma khro bo khro mo'i tshogs/ /mchod pa chen po de mnyes sbyin bya'i sems can tshim/ /zhes gsungs so/ /
dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las thun drag mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po la sogs te/ ri rab dang bar snang la sogs pa la gnas pa'i lha thams cad

kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / bdug spos dang / sil snyan dang / byug pa dang / sgra sna tshogs pa dang / spos sna
tshogs pa thogs nas lhags so/ /'jig rten pa de dag kyang rang rang gi mchod pa sna tshogs pa thogs nas lhags te/ zhe sa dang gus pa byas te thams cad kyang mgrin gcig gi nga ros gsol pa/ khro

rgyal sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang / /dkar chab dngar chab spos kyi chab/ /sman chab bdud rtsi'i chab la sogs/ /khyod kyi sku la khrus chab gsol/ /A ha ra hU~M/ ga pur bzang drug sman gyi dri/ /a ga ru dang

du ru ska/ /gla rtsi spos kyi dri la sogs/ /'gag pa med pa shangs la 'bul/ /d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha hUM/ /rin chen lnga yi me tog dang / /chu las skyes dang thang las skyes/ /yid kyis sprul pa'i me tog rnams/ /

rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbu la 'bul/ /puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ /'bru yi mar me rtsi yi mar/ /'dam bu snang gsal rin chen sgron/ /spobs pa bcud len sgron ma rnams/ /khro bo gtum po'i spyan la 'bul/ /A lo ke

pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ /rnam lnga'i spos dang sman lngar sbyar/ /ra sa ya dang a mr-i ta/ /rdo rje 'dzin la dri mchog 'bul/ /gan d+he pU dza me g+ha hU~M/ /ro mchog brgya ldan bdud rtsi'i mchog /bde bar bzhes te dgyes par
dgongs/ /a mri tA b+ha ra hU~M/ /kun du grags pa'i sgra rnams ma lus dang / /dam chos sgra sgrogs sil snyan 'bul/ /s+phA ra Na khaM zhes mgrin gcig gis gsol nas de nyid du spro ba'i tshul gyis
gnas par gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i 'khor dag gis sri zhu dang gus pas mchod pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje khro bo des dregs
pa'i 'khor de dag la dam tshig ched du spyad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /mi gnas mtha' las 'das pa sems nyid mchog /sna tshogs cho 'phrul 'byung bas kun gyi gzhi/ /ma bcos rang bzhin rkyen gyis

byas pa med/ /de la gnas na rang dam bsrungs pa yin/ /de bzhin gyur kyang 'od 'gyed ched du blang / /nor bu 'bar ba ma mthong ston pa dang / /thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gdung ba'i nad sel ba/ /bdud rtsi
lta bu'i tshig gis tshim byed pa/ /kun gzhi'i yul du nus pa'i dbang 'bogs shing / /thugs rjes skyob par mdzad pa'i mgon po de/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun pas gnyen pa ste/ /snying bzhin skye med

rmi lam nang du bkur/ /ngag gi rdo rje chu bo'i rgyun bzhin drang / /skyo med nyin mtshan dus su brtson par bya/ /rdo rje'i phrag par mi gseng bsdams la drang / /brdzun med tshig gis dam pa de la bstod/ /bshad pa'i dbang
rnams rab tu ma bstan na/ /rdo rje'i lce la bdud rtsi 'dzag gyur kyang / /gzhan la zer thigs 'ga' yang spro mi bya/ /gsang 'os gnyer gtad sngags dang mtshan rnams gsang / /dus gsum 'gyur med

rdo rje'i sku mchod de/ /na dang 'chi sogs las kyi rnam smin gang / /sdug bsngal mi bzad nyam thag ci byung yang / /lhag par dran pa bskyed de rjes su gzung / /'gro nyal 'dug za spyod lam rnam pa bzhir/ /mi

mjed shes rab dag gis rjes su bzung / /slob dpon mtshang dang gsang tshig yi dam lha/ /srog gi phyir yang de dag mi spong ngo / /bzhi pa de bzhin de la de mi sems/ /dran pas rjes su de la bzung bar bya/ /

smig rgyu chu rgyun brtul zhugs bya ba bskyed/ /de las 'gal ba'i brtul zhugs rab tu spyad/ /rdol zhing zag 'gyur dug can dmad pa'i snod/ /de ru mu tig bdud rtsi mi blugs ltar/ /thabs kyi spyod pas rnam
dbye shes par bya/ /dpag tshad kun du nyams pa rnam par spong / /de dag 'gal na rdo rje dmyal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal chu bo reg cing bzod dka' bar/ /dus gsum rnams dang nga yis brjod mi nus/ /gzhan nas
gzhan 'phang thar pa'i dus kyang med/ /ma nyams brgal dkar 'gro bar gdon mi za/ /nga dang dus gsum kun kyang de la dgongs/ /gang la dmigs pa'i 'bras bu chud mi za/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyis dam
skyong de la bsrung / /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las sa ma ya bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'khor de dag la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /
nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun/ /don dam dbyer med phyogs cha kun dang bral/ /mi len mi gnas mi spong mi 'gog cing / /rang bzhin gnas pa de la bcos su med/ /rtog pa'i gnas min phra ba'i
spyod yul min/ /dngos por mi gnas mtshan ma kun dang bral/ /sgro dang skur pas de la dpag mi dpogs/ /stong pa ma yin tha snyad de las 'das/ /mi gnas mi rtog rkyen gyis bskyed pa med/ /dngos bral kun
gyi mtha' 'das brjod du med/ /'di zhes nges pa de la mtshon du med/ /dus gsum bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yab yum shul dang kun gyi dngos po yin/ /sems can 'jig rten
khams kyi rang bzhin dang / bud d+ha 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin kun/ /gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis de las med/ /gang yang ma 'gags gcig tu nges pa med/ /tha snyad brjod bral sangs

rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /de ltar grol ba rnal 'byor mchog gi lam/ /phra ba'i sgo mo rnams kyis rjes dpag dka'/ /de la spro dang bsdu ba'i dbang po med/ /gzugs dang kha dog rnam pa gang du yang / /de nyid
ma grub de la gnyen po med/ /'byung ba chen po nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /khu rlangs 'ja' tshon na bun sprin la sogs/ /than drag lhags rlung la sogs gang byung yang / /nam mkha' chen po de la g.yo ba
med/ /dang po byung yang de yi ngang las byung / /tha mar zhi yang de yi ngang du zhi/ /de dag de yi nang du 'ub kyis 'chus/ /yangs so che'o nam mkha'i khog par gnas/ /khams gsum sems can dus gsum

sangs rgyas rnams/ /don dam nga yi rang bzhin nga nyid yin/ /kun kyang dge dang sdig sogs gang byas kyang / /rang byung 'phrul ldan de la 'phel 'grib med/ /rang byung ye shes rgyu rkyen dngos po med/ /sems

can sangs rgyas gnyis shes rtog gi bu/ /de la dbye dang ming dang yig tshogs med/ /ces gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las gzhi byang chub snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //

de nas dregs pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas mgrin gcig gis 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rdo rje rdo rje
'dzin pa che/ /rdo rje sku ste che ba po/ /mi shes dri ma kun 'joms pa/ /sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lus te lus kyi mchog /lus rnams tha dad
rnams sprul cing / /lus dman pa dag 'jigs par mdzad/ /lus kyi nges don gting dpag dka'/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyis sdang ba 'joms/ /

rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje'i mtshon chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag na rdo rje ye shes che/ /zhal gyi rdo rje sdang ba 'bigs/ /rdo rje mche ba rno ba che/ /che ba rgya mtsho gsung chen bstod/ /rdo rje

pad ma byang chub che/ /thugs nyid sangs rgyas rang byung ba/ /rdo rje rgya che thugs kyi mchog /rdo rje rnal 'byor thugs chen bstod/ /'jigs byed drag po nag po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sdang byed pa/ /bsgrub
dka' bsgrub legs yon tan che/ /yon tan rdo rje mchog legs bstod/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /ha la ha la nag po che/ /rtog pa'i dus ngan rnam par sbyong / /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
ces mngon par bstod do/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las 'khor gyis mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /kyai rdo rje khro bo khyod/ /dus ngan bstan pa mi gnas tshe/ /'jig rten khams su chu 'khyags dbab pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po/ 'jig rten phung bar bya na nA ga'i chu 'khyags dbab/ /gsang ba'i

las rab 'di ni rab tu gnag /na mo bud d+hA ya/ badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra tsaN Da/ ki li ki li/ tsaN Da mo ra tsi Na/ tsaN Da tsaN De/ nA ga b+han d+hA ya phaT swA hA/ sor brgyad seng ldeng phur bu gu gul dang / /tshil chen sme khrag byug cing bdug rtsa

gzer sngags bsham/ /gdags bcwa thog ma'i gong nas grangs med bzlas pa'i mchog /klu yi gnas su btab na khyung gis mi thar 'ching / /phyogs btab ldog 'gyur zhing btab 'bu srin za/ /ldum ra rta bres gnag ra ra lug gnas/ /

btab nas mi skye ri snyil chu yang ldog /phal pa'i grong dang rgyal po'i sgor btab na/ /phal pa'i grong 'jig rgyal po'i 'khor gyi mi/ /'byer zhing nad kyis thebs 'gyur phyung na thar/ /nA ga'i gnas btab thams cad 'ching bar

'gyur/ /nag po gnas su song la las 'di bya/ /byang bltas chu mig rngom dang ngams skyibs gnag /mgo na rdo nag dreg pa chags pa yod/ /gnas der e nag 'dom bzhi rtse mo lho/ /dkar nag rdo ba glang dmar ra sgyed bya/ /skam po dum

bzhir phyi rol khrag dug gnag /ra khyi mi yi khrag bskol bya ting 'dzin bsam/ /ga ru'i sprul pa mang po shin du gces/ /dkar nag dud pas dran bskyed dbang du bsdu/ /de nas khyung bskul ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /hrIHdpag

bsam shing las bzhengs pa'i ga ru Da/ /ye shes gshog pa 'bar ba gser gyi mig /rdo rje'i mchu sder thogs med lcags kyu can/ /ri rab rtse nas rgya mtsho'i gting du sleb/ /klu rgyal gdan du 'dings shing klu phrug za/ /
klu rnams bka' las ma 'da' chu 'khyags phob/ /brjid gnon man tra mu dras zil gyis gnon/ /nA ga rA dza phut+ta phut+ta/ stong bzlas gshams sbrel ban+d+ha chu mig brdab/ /klu gzugs sbrul

mgo bdun sngon sgyed khar gzhag /mgo la khrag byung 'di nyid rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /nA ga nA ga la khrag nad mgo la phob/ /nA ga mgo la khrag thun rbad/ /rtsa brgyad brjod cing thab bya khrag lhag dang / /thal
'jim ban d+ha chu mig nang du brdab/ /thog dang ser ba ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'ong / /nA ga'i gzugs ni nag po gel chags che/ /mig nas glog 'gyu kha nas khrag ser 'bab/ /de ltar bsams na klu 'khrugs
ser ba 'bebs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las 'jig rten thog ser gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang lha'i dbang pos zhus pa/ mthar thug drag po'i las
kyis ji ltar dbab/ /rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i sbyar thabs gang / /sba gnas dus tshod mdzes pa gang la bgyi/ /bsrung ba'i go rims bcas pa ji ltar lags shes zhus pa las/ bka' stsal pa/
nyon cig skal ldan lha yi dbang po nyon/ /rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i sbyor ba 'di'o/ /mdze sha mdze tshil thod pa tshil chen dud/ /gzhob rnams blugs te spra ba'i me dang sprad/ /yugs sa'i zhal

dril khar nag bcing byas la/ /chu mig 'gram sar seng ldeng phur pa gdab/ /ston zla ra 'bring gza' rgod rgyu dus gtad/ /skya reng shar dang nyi phyed nya la gtad/ /rdzas mchog ma phyung chu 'khyags nyin re 'bab/ /
de nas klu rnams kun gyi gnyen po rak+ta tsa muN+Di zhes bya ba 'dis bskul bka' stsal to/ /hU~M sku ni gnam lcags 'bar ba la/ /dmar ser me yi ral pa can/ /khams gsum srid gsum kha na
khyer/ /srid pa gsum ni lto na 'phyo/ /ya 'gal gnam la ma 'gal sa/ /nyi ma'i sman dang spyan nas 'char/ /zla ba'i skyin dang zhal nas 'char/ /ri rab rtse dgu phyag na bsnams/ /mi bzad 'bar ma
gtum chen mo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan ma/ /'dul ba'i gnyen po klu 'dul ma/ /thugs dam klu yi ban d+ha 'dren/ /zas su klu yi sha la za/ /klu yi gnas ris dbang du sdud/ /sngags

bka' stsal pa/ oM nA ga zhung thun/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ phaT phaT swA hA/ las kyi go cha drug ni rab tu gces/ /log gnon gyi sngags bka' stsal pa/ nA ga li dum+pa ya sa

dom d+he ba' ku ru hU~M hU~M/ dzaHdzaHb+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'khor lo tshul du lus la'o zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las mthar thug drag po'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //
de nas 'khor de dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan nyid kyi mtshams bcad ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang / bka' stsal pa/ 'dul ba'i tshogs nyon cig /nga'i rang bzhin ni dus gsum

gyi bde bar gshegs par rtogs par byos shig /nga'i rang bzhin ni skye ba med par rtogs par byos shig /rang 'gag med rtogs byos nga'i rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid du rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i
bdag po'o/ /nga gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpar rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni gtum po chen po nyid
du rtogs par byos shig /nga gang yin pa de ni chos so/ /chos kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes shing dga'o/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs

gsang ba'i rgyud las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po a ba yu ga ta'i zhal snga nas zhus nas/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+ta ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas brgya byin lha'i
dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bstan pa dam pa'i dbang ji lta ba'i gsang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par

dag pa'i ngang las ma hA tsaN+Da kro d+hi hU~M zhes gsungs pas/ g.yon du khro mo gtum chen mo/ /mthing nag chen mo 'jigs tshul can/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen brdzes ma/ /spyan dmar sdang mig bgrad pa'i tshul/ /
mche gtsigs khro gnyer spyan gtum ma/ /phyag g.yas dril 'dzin gtso la mkhyud/ /g.yon pa thod khrag gtso la stob/ /zhabs gnyis gtso la dgyes tshul 'khril/ /hi hi dgyes dang ha la'i sgras/ /thams

cad g.yo zhing rlag par byed/ /dur khrod rgyan ldan me dpung nang / /sku la 'khril ba'i tshul du gzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po/ /dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /nyid kyi mkha' la hU~M oM

ldan/ /nor bu dang ni rdo rjer ldan/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo'i sbub mar phaT/ /yum gyi gsang bar pa tra ldan/ /pad ma dang ni ze 'brur ldan/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud
phyi ma las yum rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mkha' gsang rab tu ldan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bde rdzogs gang lags bshad du
gsol zhes zhus pas bcom ldan 'das bde rdzogs chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor lo bde rdzogs zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po mchog /bde skyong
'khor lo sum bcu gnyis/ /dung dang kun+da lta bur gnas/ /mi shigs hU~M ni kha 'og bltas/ /mgrin chen longs spyod 'dab bcu drug /dbus na gser zhun lta bu ma~M/ /ya ba ra la kha dog bzhi/ /phyogs
bzhi 'dab ma bzhi na gnas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad de/ /hU~M mu~M dbus te phyogs mtshams na/ /oM kro d+hi ha / /sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu bzhi/ /dbus na \u0f00 dkar de bzhin du'o/ /me yi

'khor lo drug gsum ra~M/ /rlung gi gzhu 'dra ba dan can/ /dza nya phaT dang ra~M ldan pa'o/ /dbab dang bskyil ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin du snod ldan dam pa la/ /srin mthib lces blang dbugs kyis drang / /byin brlabs

byas pa'i shes rab ma/ /rang lus thabs ldan gtad pa dang / /bde ba dang ni bde ba che/ /shin du bde chen bde mchog yin/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las 'khor lo bde rdzogs kyi le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can don du byin brlabs mthu/ /sngags kyi mthu rnams bka' stsol cig /ces gsol pas/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po sngon chad

nga la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin par dbang bskur te/ de ltar ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /'di ni klu thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/ /nyi ma sa sla la na~M/ nA ga ku na

zhi/ tsit+ta ma ling na~M`/ zlor byer/ nA ga shig /nA ga bzlog /nA ga byer/ nA ga da ha da ha mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga ha na ha na/ mA ra ya phaT/ gsang ba gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa'i/ /sngags des klu rnams brlag par byed/ /

rdzas su bstan pa 'di lta ste/ /rtsa ba dang ni skyobs su bcas/ /lce pog nag po rgya tshil dang / /mgo gnyis I dra ma g+ha d+ha/ /sa'i dri dang rnam lnga'o/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jil bar byed/ /shu dag tshil chen ra

gzhob dang / /dri chen dri chu rma bya'i mdongs/ /byug dang bdug par bya ba'o/ /mu zi gla rtsi dri can dang / /zhun chen dri chu sbyar ba rnams/ /ltor btang gdon rnams rang zhir 'gyur/ /'dir ni rang nyid srung bar byed/ /

nA ga sha ti dun dzi pas/ nA ga tsi ta na~M/ nA ga ni ra rbad/ shAn ting sha du rtsu pas/ nA ga o ra lig shams/ nA ga dun dun/ gyen gyen/ nA ga sha~M ti/ ya ya/ tshubs tshubs du sha rbud/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs
gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las klu thams cad brlag par byed pa'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'ching bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

'jig rten 'ching byed kyi sngags gsungs pa/ \u0f00 e ka ya ma/ he ka ya ma/ hri ma ya ma/ sartsa tsit+ta gzer thums bi g+h+nA~M/ zhes gsungs ma thag tu srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa la thug pa yin chad
sems rnam par myogs te/ lus ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par bcings par gyur to/ /de nas dpung rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dpung bzlog byed kyi sngags

gsungs pa \u0f00 e ka ya ma he dun rak+Sha he dun/ hU~M dzaHhU~M/ ya ma tsit+ta sha ma/ sha trU~M sta~M b+ha ya na~M d+h+r-i ka rbad/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'khrugs shing / dregs pa can
thams cad rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du gyur te/ myos par gyur to/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las 'jig rten bcing bzlog gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das khyung rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas khyung las la gzud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ grang ti tig tig /gra ta brag shi ta ta le he du hU~M phaT/ de nas yang dgra 'ba' zhig pa gsad pa thun mong ma yin pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje drag po thog 'bab ces bya ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ \u0f00 mA ra na sod sod/ mA ra na bying bying / mA ra na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra na ha la ha la/
mA ra na dun dun/ myogs myogs/ bying bying / thum ri li li rbad dza dza/ nA ga la sogs sha trU~M sbyar zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsang ba
sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das gdug pa can tshar bcad pa'i las khyad par can bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/

bcom ldan 'das khyung sgrol byed gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rab tu gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ \u0f00 tad+ya thA/ o~M` Ta ki tsa ti/ gur+ya la/ g+h+yu li mi li sha sha g+h+yu g+h+yu/ shad ti bi ri ti/
hU~M ya hU~M ya/ hU~M tu ti swA hA/ 'bras dang so ba nas nag dang / /a ru ra rnams zhib btags te/ /dgu dang bcu gcig bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' lding sgo nga sngags kyis bskor/ /'gram du bzhag
la bsgrub par bya/ /mA ra na sod/ mA ra na bying bying / mA ra na mugs mugs/ mA ra na ha na ha na/ mA ra na dun dun/ ha la ha la/ myos myos/ bying bying / thum ri li li dza dza/
de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /ba liM ta khA hi khA hi/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma hA rag si pa to/ sa mA ya swA hA/ gsol ba gdab cing phrin las bcol/ /gla rtsi shing kun sha chen dang / /lce pog
nag po sha ri ra/ /byi sku stag gi sder mo rnams/ /ras su gtums la lus la bcang / /\u0f00 nyi ma sa sla nAM/ g+hu ni zhi rtsi ta g+hu li nAM/ tsi tra mu tra zlog byer/ tsi ta g+hu li nAM/ ya khra
na ga zlog /nA ga shig /nA ga mgo la nAM/ ha pa sa khre/ rtag tu stom changs gtor mas mchod/ /zhi bas dug dbyung byad kyang dgrol/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru/ /nA ga'i
gzugs bris dug can gzhag /tshon skud sbrul bsgoms bcings pa de/ /spu gri 'bar bas gtubs shing dbye/ /ri rab chen po'i phyogs bzhi na/ /dug bzhi las skyes rigs bzhi'i klu/ /
sa chu me rlung dug bzhi'i bdag /bcings pa dgrol cing dug dbyung phyir/ /dug thub sgro la khyung bsam phyir/ /dug byab rang rang gnas su btang / /bden pa bdar zhing ting 'dzin gsar/ /dpal rdo rje

gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las rab tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bdud rtsi mchog bka'

stsal pa/ rin chen bum pa tshad ldan la/ /dri yi rgyal po la sogs lngas/ /byugs la bog nag dud pas bdug /rtsi ldan 'o ma 'bras dang nas/ /til dkar dang ni a ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /mngar gsum klu sman

sna tshogs dang / /tsan dan la sogs dri sbyar ba'i/ /chu bkang lcug ma 'o ma can/ /kha rgyan byas te mgul pa yang / /dar ras sngon pos bcings byas la/ /maN+Dal gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag /lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /

gri lcags sbu gur mchu btsugs te/ /dbugs ma shor bar rab tu bsnags/ /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad dang / /sngags kyi mda' mchog la yang bsnag /bum pa la sngags 'bum tshar re bton nas snying rje'i yul la bkru khong du btang na grol bar 'gyur dpal rdo rje

gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las bdud rtsi bum khrus kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bdud rtsi bum pa khrol bu la bsgrub pa gsungs pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso/ /ting 'dzin gsang

bar sgrub pa ni/ /dzA ti pha la nas sngon mo/ /'bras dang so ba ma gi ta/ /ting 'dzin gzhu btul byas te bsgrub/ /de la rtags byung phye mar bsgrub/ /byugs nas dri chus skyo mar sbyar/ /zhun chen sbyar te khong du gtang / /

bum pa'i chu la lcags sbugs sngags/ /mchod dang ting 'dzin brtson par bya/ /bum chus khrus bya 'de gus byug /skyo ma zhun chen khong du gtang / /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las bum pa
khrol bu phye ma dang / 'de gu dang / khong du gtang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po/ gdug pa'i dug la rnam mang yang / /bsdus na
rnam pa gnyis yod de/ /mngon sum dug dang rku dug ste/ /rkun thabs dug ni bzlog par dka'/ /gdug can nyon mongs gsum ldan te/ /gti mug che bas byol song rigs/ /'dod chags che bas
dbral bar dka'/ /shin du zhe sdang che bas kyang / /dug ni rkun thabs dag tu gtong / /de phyir slar yang ldog par byed/ /phrag dog che bas rang rten la/ /gzhan gyis gtses na gzhan la gnod/ /rkun
thabs dug gi mtshan nyid kyang / /thabs shing gdug pa'i dug glod kyang / /bar bar skabs su ldang bar byed/ /de bzlog thabs ni shin tu'ang dka'/ /de yi bzlog thabs dam pa 'di/ /ngas bstan pa
la the tshom du/ /gang zhig byed par gyur pa de/ /nam yang grub par mi 'gyur te/ /grub kyang g.yel bar gyur pa yin/ /de nas lha yi dbang po dag /the tsom med par nges par byos/ /tsan dan

dmar pos gtsor byas te/ /nA ga ge sar ma gi ta/ /rgya tshil rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang / /phag rgod dag gi sha dag ste/ /yang na rgya tshil ma gi ta/ /phag rgod sha dang sbyar byas te/ /lcags snod nang du lcags kyis
phur/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen byas nas/ /bsgrub pas dkar gsum gzhan mi bsten/ /'o ma sol chus lus bkrus te/ /nya la gnas drug thig le bya/ /'khur tshos gnyis dang dpral
ba dang / /snying ga rkog ma lag mthil gnyis/ /thig le mtshon gang pa re bya/ /lte ba pus mo gsang gnas su/ /ma gi ta nyid 'ba' zhig byug /thig le re la nyi shu gcig /de ltar lo gcig bar
du bya/ /gangs ri la ni nyi ma bzhin/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las rkun thabs kyi dug bzlog pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai ma
khro bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /gdug pa'i dug gi mtshan nyid gang / /zlog dang mi zlog ji lta bu/ /khro bdag chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /
dga' bas nyon cig lha yi dbang po khyod/ /bsnyen dang bsgrub pa rtags dang gnod pa rtags/ /lcags zangs mi dang gcer bu bum pa thogs/ /ba lang nya lcibs zas su za ba dang / /me chen 'bar dang zam pa
'dzugs pa dang / /skye shing 'dzugs dang nyi ma shar ba dang / /bzang ba yi ni rtags su shes par bya/ /nyi ma nub dang nam sros thur du babs/ /btson du bzung nas mi theg khur bskur dang / /
bsgrub po gzhan yul 'gro ba ngan pa'i rtags/ /lung pa dang ni skam nas chu byung dang / /nya sbrul sa rlung gsod dang 'tshod pa dang / /rid dang skems pa de dag khri la 'dug /
gcer bu spyi bcings kyis sems can gsol ba mthong / /'jigs pa'i chu mig skams dang rtag tu nor bu rgyud/ /sbal sbrul zas su za dang khyi spyang gsod/ /bzang ba yi ni ltas su
shes par bya/ /chu nang chud dang sbal sbrul lus la 'jug /de dag phyi bzhin du ni 'brang byed cing / /sbrang bu mchu ring la sogs lus la za/ /ba lang ma he'i tshogs kyis brdungs nas 'ded pa dang / /
khyi spyang tshogs kyis zugs dang 'dam du tshud/ /'bag seng bu chung la sogs ston pa ngan/ /gnod pa'i rtags su gting ring grog po ru/ /mi shong bzhin du phyin dang slar mi thar/ /ri brag dog
mo lung pa phug rdugs dang / /lha khang gnas khang hrul por mi shong bzhin/ /sgo la 'dzul nas slar yang mi thon dang / /chu ngan mtsho dang lu ma nya sbrul sogs/ /phag pa ba glang ma he
la sogs te/ /shin du yid du mi 'ong gzugs mang ston/ /ri gzer mi thar ce spyang tshogs kyis 'ded/ /de dag gnod rtags lus kyi nyams myong yang / /nul ba dang ni ku dang
chang la dga'/ /nad dang nyams lci yan lag na/ /sha ni 'gul 'khrig shu g.yan sha bkra dang / /ngo lhog sha ro skabs su zug gzer che/ /de dag gnod pa'i rtags su shes
par bya/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las bsnyen sgrub kyi ltas dang / gnod rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol ba/ kyai bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi lus la gdug pa'i dug lus la sleb pa'i mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /
sha mthangs bar du sleb pa'i dug /rtag tu snying yang mi dga' zhing / /sha rtsa za zhing 'gul dang 'khrig /rtag tu 'phrug snying 'dod pa dang / /sha yang 'o ma'i dpris ma bzhin/ /sha
mdog me lce 'dra ba'o/ /skabs su sha mthangs bar dag na/ /chu grang blug pa snyam byed dang / /shu ba bal bldags sha bkra 'ong / /gdug pa dug gis sha la sleb pa ni/ /'phrig 'gul
sha sbrid ber ba ltar/ /sha ni gnag cing dmar la bem/ /du ba mig tu song ba bzhin/ /mig gi tha ma chu yis gang / /mig kyang zlum la smin ma grugs/ /smin ma byi zhing mig kyang
'gul/ /sor mo rnams ni byi mjug 'dra/ /rtsa dang chu la zhugs pa ni/ /lus la dri ma nga ba 'byung / /chu bur dang ni chu rgangs dang / /de ni rtsa yi me tog yin/ /chu ser mdog ni dud khu 'dra/ /
chu ser mdog ni sko rul mnam pa dang / /ko ba rul pa dri mnam pa'i/ /chu ser dag ni 'byung ba yin/ /ro stod mi bde blo yang 'degs/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid 'di dag dang / /'byung bar 'gyur ba dag

kyang yod/ /me 'od tsha ba 'dra ba 'ong / /tsher ma zug pa 'dra ba 'ong / /lus po tsha la 'brum pa 'ong / /kor tshe shu ba 'byung ba dang / /rma dang ser ka mi 'tsho ba/ /kor tshe tshor ba med par 'byung / /na tsha
med pa'i shu ba 'byung / /tsha la 'khums pa 'byung ba yod/ /lus kyi nyams stobs chung bar 'byung / /glang shu ba dang sha bkra 'byung / /sha ro sbal mig 'dra ba 'byung / /sha sul thams cad 'gul
'phrig 'byung / /dug gis rus par sleb gyur na/ /phyi yi sha rnams kun skams te/ /mdog ni sngo skya sha mdangs 'chor/ /gos kyi mdangs kyang 'chor ba ste/ /de ni thar
bar mi 'gyur kyang / /sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshe ring skad gsang lus kyang bde/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gdug pa'i dug
rus pa la sleb pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai ma bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi 'gro ba la phan gdags
pa'i phyir rdzas kyi khyad par bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sems can rnams/ /gdug pa'i dug gis

nyen pa na/ /phan pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta bu/ /kun kyang sngags kyis bsgrub par bya/ /me 'od 'dra na spyang dug btang / /tsher ma zug ba lta bu la/ /ra dug dang ni re lcag go/ tsha la 'brum pa byung ba na/ /

btsod dang spang spos btang bar bya/ /sha ni kor tshe shu ba la/ /ra thug sre dang long rtol btang / /rma dang ser ka mi 'tsho na/ /khong du bsgrub pa'i ma gi ta/ /de nyid drag po'i sngags kyis gdul/ /kor

tshe tshor ba med pa la/ /stag sha gser gyi me tog dang / /rgya tsha sbyar te btang bar bya/ /sha bu thal ba bdud rtsis gso/ /yang na mu zi ba bla ldong ros dang / /dri chu sbyar te bsku bar bya/ /na tsha med pa'i

shu ba la/ /bong ril ti tsha mar dkar bsku/ /tsha 'khums lce pog rwa ru gzhob/ /tsha dang zhun chen sbyar bar bya/ /lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba na/ /bum pa'i chu dang ma gi ta/ /sbyar te bkru zhing btung bar bya/ /

dri chu zhun chen btang bar bya/ /sha bkra gur gum phag tshil lo/ /glang shu 'dra ba byung ba na/ /gser gyi me tog mu zi dang / /sngags kyi bya ba 'bad par bya/ /sha ro sbal mig 'byung ba dang / /sha yi sul rnams 'gul ba la/ /gla ba mu zi lce pog gnag /sha mthangs bar gyi dug

rnams la/ /sa yi dri dang ma gi ta/ /shu dag lce pog ru rta dang / /gu gul nag po dri ma dang / /ro yi ro dang btsan dug dang / /byi ku cig skyes mi phag bcud/ /yang na btsan dug lce pog dang / /ldong ros dang ni sa yi dri/ /zhun chen dri chus bsdus te bsku/ /

gu gul shu dag shing kun dang / /gla rtsi btsan dug ro yi ro/ /rus chen btags te zhun gyis bsdu/ /ril bu byas te bsregs nas kyang / /yang dang yang du sna bug bdug /dug chen klu dang de las gram pa'i gdon/ /skye dgu 'tshe byed gdon rnams gang

yin yang / /gdug pa dug chen po'i dri 'di tshor ba yis/ /gdug pa can rnams klad pa rab tu 'gas/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa ji bzhin no/ /sha la zhugs pa'i gdug pa'i dug rnams la/ /byug pa'i rdzas rnams phyi nas byug /bdug pa

can gyis rtag tu bdug /ma gi ta dang dri chu grang mor sbyar/ /bkra zhing khong du gtan du btang bar bya/ /nad rnams 'byang zhing spu stsogs byi ba skye/ /rtsa dang chu ba dag la gnas pa'i dug /byug pa bdug pa chu bo'i gzhung bzhin du/ /khong du btang ba'i rdzas

ni 'di lta ste/ /ma gi ta ni dri yi chus sbyangs te/ /a ru ra dang sbyar ba rgyun mi bcad/ /rtsa yi gnas su nad rnams dngas snyigs 'byed/ /dngas snyigs phyed pa'i nad ni phyi ru 'byung / /gangs kyi ri la nyi ma lta bu'o/ /dug rnams rus pa dag la rgyas/ /

khong du btang ba'i rdzas ni rgyun du btang zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gdug pa'i dug rdzas kyis gdul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan

'das gdug pa can shin du yang tshar gcod pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po'i lha/ /gdug pa shin du tshar gcad na/ /bsreg pa'i las la shin du brtson par bya/ /thab

khung gru gsum sor brgyad pa/ /khrag dang dur khrod sol bas byug /dkyil du rdo rje rtse gsum bri/ /zur du mchod rten gsum gzhag ste/ /de steng drag po'i snod bzhag la/ /nang du gru gsum rtse mo lho/ /gdug pa'i

shing yang zur gsum brtsig /dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar lhor bya/ /shing shun dag la sha trU~M yang / /brgya rtsa brgyad bya dug sna dang / /tsha ba gsum dang bong bu'i chu/ /rnga mo bya rog brun yang bsag /lha yi ting 'dzin mchod

bsngags kyis/ /ting 'dzin gsal te lha la 'bul/ /sreg pa'i sngags ni 'dis bya'o/ /sarba big+h+nan ma ra ya dz+wa la ra~M/ /stong rtsa brgyad dang brgya rtsa brgyad/ /lan grangs mang du byas pa yi/ /thal ba chu chen gzhung

la bor/ /thab khung 'og ma'i thal ba yang / /khyi yi dri chen tsha ba gsum/ /bsres te sha trU~M gzugs byas la/ /nA ga staM b+ha nan zhes rgya gram dkyil du mnan zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang
ba'i rgyud phyi ma las dregs pa can shin du tshar gcad pa bsreg pa drag po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das/ gnon pa'i las ni bgyi ba yi/ /

shin du tshar gcad ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lha yi dbang po chen po nyon/ /ru sbal khog pa kha sbyar du/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba khre rgod dang / /nA ga ge sar cu gang dang / /
dkar gsum sha chen sha rI ra/ /ma gi ta yis gtso byas te/ /ru rta dang sbyar ro nye'i shubs/ /re bas gtums te sngon dmar dkri/ /sngags kyis mda' la sum stong bsngags/ /nA ga stam b+ha nan/ brgyad
gsum dbus ma'i zla zer la/ /nub kyi rgya gram sum mdo 'am/ /yang na gnod pa'i sa phyogs su/ /shug pa'i phur pas khru gang brko/ /der bcug g.yam pa rgya gram can/ /de steng gnon pa'i ri

rab gzhag /de dag byed tshe dman zas spang / /kha zas dkar gsum mngar gyis bya/ /sha rul khrag rul rgya tshil dang / /sngags mda' sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /rang gnas brten pa'i bar du gcad/ /thog drag lta bur
sngags las bya/ /rtsa gcig bar du gnod mi 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las phyir mi ldog pa'i gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang pos yang
gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das gdug pa can de dag de nyid kho nar 'gro ba la rnam par 'tshe 'am/ de ge gzhan dang gzhan dag gi mthu yang gnon par 'gyur/ gal te gzhan dag gi mthus kyang 'gro ba ma rungs
par byed na/ de ji ltar yongs su gsal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig dbang po chen po lha/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sems can la/ /gdug pa'i

dug gcig zhugs gyur na/ /pho nya 'di dag ma rungs byed/ /btsan dang rgyal po 'gong po dang / /dngos grub 'tshe ba byed kun du/ /de dag de nyid shes gyur na/ /de dag rang gshed rang gis byed/ /rA dza tsit+ta rbad

nan/ tsa hur thums dzaHma rA ya rbad nan/ \u0f00 tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ hab shaM tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ ru tri tsit+ta rbad nan/ rA dza trig nan/ tsa hur thuM dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ sde brgyad spyir gdul ba

ni/ \u0f00 AHhU~M badzra sarba du sh+TA~M` trig nan/ e hur thu~M dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ gal te rgyal po gdug pa dag /shin du che bar gyur pa na/ /ku sha rtsa la brgya byin gzugs/ /mdze mo'i sog pa g.yas pa la/ /khrag

chen gyis bri snying gar stsal/ /tri badzra a ku sha dzaH lce pog gis bdug sngon dmar bcings/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /gru gsum nag por bcug byas la/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la dgug /tri badzra

tri badzra/ yak+Sha duSh+TAn badzra a~M ku sha dzaHkro d+hing / /kro la sha /rA dza tha ma na~M/ rA dza sha trU~M mA ra na phaT/ rA dza a mu kaM/ b+hak+Sha ni grI h+Na grI h+Na/ grI h+Na grI h+Na mA ra ya phaT/ phur ba gdab cing lcag gis brab/ /de nas bkar ba'i

'khor lo bca'/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ /ku sha'i gzugs gzhag phyi rtsibs la/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi ldan pa la/ /rtsibs la gzugs bris bong khrag sbyar/ /re'u mig cha la bkar sngags dgod/ /du tri pa tri

dkor ba kha~M rbad/ /ya tri dkor ba kha~M rbad/ /yung kar khrag sna dug snas brab/ /yang na chu bo'i gzhung la bskur/ /yang na phugs rdugs grog por gnon/ /de tshe zhing lcags drag tu bsnun/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang

ba'i rgyud phyi ma las dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi slob dpon a ba yug ti dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bla ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab

pa'o/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra ut+ta rot+ta ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor de ni

gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje gtum po zhes bya ba 'khod pa stan las langs te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mig 'dzum dang bcas pas rang gi spyod pa las shin du spa gong bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /kyai bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na/ gdug pa can gyi sems can la rnam par 'tshe zhing rnam pa gsum gyis sems can ma rungs par bgyid de/ reg pa'i dug gis kyang rab tu yang gzir bar bgyid

do/ /kha rlangs kyi dug gis ni rab tu myos shing shin du yang lci bar bgyid do/ /mthong ba'i dug gis ni za zhing 'phrug cing tsha bar byed do/ /'phro ba kha rlangs kyi dug can dang / reg pa lus kyi dug rnams kyi gdung ba bsal ba'i slad

du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig gnod sbyin gsang ba'i bdag /dug gsum dug gi rtsa ba yang / /dug gsum las ni byung ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i dug la

rang bzhin med/ /de ni dug gso sman gyi mchog /sman nyid rang 'byung gzhan las min/ /de nyid rang dang gzhan las grol/ /rtsa ba'i dug la rang grol na/ /dug gsum la sogs gzhan du med/ /dug lnga las 'phros 'byung

lnga'i dug /kun rdzob tsam du 'byung ba 'joms/ /de dag rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rang gzhan rang grol bdud rtsi yi/ /rtsa ba'i dug sogs 'joms par byed/ /lha yi sku dang sngags kyi mthu/ /ye shes 'byung ba chen po

yis/ /las kyi 'byung ba 'joms par byed/ /rdzas kyis kyang de bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las dug dang dug 'joms byed kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas
gnod sbyin gtum pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kyai bcom ldan 'das dug chen po de dag smin pa la/ gdon pa'i las dag gang gis bgyi/ /nan tan gyis ni bka' stsol cig ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ badzre sarba Sh+Ta~M tsit+ta rbad nan/ ma hA kA la tsit+ta rbad nan/ sarba sha trU~M mA ra ya rbad nan/ zhag grangs nyi shu gcig tu bya/ /nam langs nyi ma shar ga ru/ /stong tshar re ste de bzhin du/ /srod dang tho rangs nam gung la/ /me khrag gsum dang dug

sna dang / /drag po'i rdzas rnams dag gis brab/ /nA ga'i gzugs byas rdza yi nang / /gzugs nang phuHla sngags phreng bskor/ /rdza nang thal chen 'brub khung du'o/ /sngags par rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yis/ /kha chod sme gos nag po dgab/ /

de nas drag po'i sbyin bsreg bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las gdug pa srog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang gsungs pa/ nA ga'i gzugs la reg cha ni/ /

sngags kyi 'bru bzhin sngags bkod do/ /klu rgyal bzhi gzugs mthar bzhag nas/ /gdug pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /dang po'i zhi ba tha mar drag /dang por drag la tha mar zhi/ /thog mtha' gnyis ka zhi dang drag /\u0f00 nA ga rA dza sam / /a pa lA ya tsit+ta dz+wa

la ya/ sa ma ya swA hA/ nyi shu gcig gis mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma' phyi ma'i las dam tshig srog gi 'khor lo 'jam pa dang rtsub pa'i sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //

de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na bstan pa la gnod pa dang gdug pa can 'dul ba thun mong gi las bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thun

mong phyi ru gsad 'dod na/ /phrin las mi 'gyur 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lor gzhug dang gzugs la gdab/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo lto sbyar du/ /gang dmigs gzugs de khrag tu bri/ /snying gar ming bri lte ba la/ /shwa rI ra te mgo bo la/ /ban+d+ha

ban+d+ha zhes pa dgod/ /yan lag bzhi pa ha na ste/ /mA ra ya/ brla gnyis dang ni mtshan ma la'o/ /dmigs pa'i sa nas zag pa'i rdzas/ /blangs te bong bu'i chus sbrus la/ /sha trU~M gzugs bya yig 'bru rnams/ /gnas su bkod de sngon

dmar bcing / /dug rdzas gtum pa'i rdzas kyis gtum/ /btson khang bskur te thun rnams dbab/ /zla ba gcig tu gnag par bya/ /bdun bdun bskor bya bar bar du/ /mchod pa'i las bya mtshan thun dbab/ /bsreg dang

gnon pas mtha' brtul bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las phrin las mi 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/
kyai bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na/ gdul dka' ba'i gdol pa can rnams kyi lo tog 'joms pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lo tog 'joms

pa'i las byas na/ /nA ga gzir te gzhom par bya zhes stobs kyi yi ge 'bru bzhi dang / mi 'gyur ba'i yi ge 'bru gsum gsungs pa/ \u0f00 hU~M badzra ma hA ba la zhes gtum po stobs chen po'i sngags gsungs so/ /nA ga tsit+ta rbad nan/

zhes klu'i snying gzir drug pa gsungs so/ /sarba duSh+TA+o na/ zhes thams cad dbang du sdud pa gsungs so/ /phob shar shar phob/ ces chu 'khyags kyi snying po gsungs so/ /gcig tu dril zhing brdeg par bya/ /nA ga'i gzugs
bcas sngags bkod nas/ /yungs kar brdeg cing phur bus gdab/ /mdze thod nang du klu gzugs gzhug /khrag chen btsan dug gla ba'i khrag /yungs kar yungs nag sngags shing brdeg /klu gzugs nim pa'i chu

nas dbyung / /dang po cho 'phrul che bar 'dod/ /nyam thag pa na dbab las bya/ /gsad cing ro ru 'dug pa na/ /dus las yol te phebs mi 'gyur/ /rtags dang ldan par gyur pa na/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/ /drag po'i

sngags kyis klu gzugs btum/ /rdzas dang thod pa chu mig mnan/ /drag po rgyu ba'i dus dang sbyar/ /'jig rten ldog par the tsom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las chu

'khyags lo tog 'joms byed kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dregs pa can thams cad shin du yang yi rang bar gyur/ ljon shing la dus kyi rlung drag pos bskyod pa bzhin 'dar bzhin du 'khod de/ bka' bzhin du bgyid do zhes
'dzer cing spyan snga na 'khod pa las gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye+e bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i slad du las gnad la dbab tu gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ bdud rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /kha rag nag po khra mA ya nr-i mA ra dzA nr-i khug dzaH/ btsan rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /A bi shu rak+Sha tshal pa tshal pa a nr-i tri dzaHdzaH/ klu btsan las la gzhug

pa ni/ /nA ga rA dza shu la a/ tri dza dza mA ra ya nri lo sod/ rgyal po las la gzhug pa ni/ /tro ta ni tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ shU la shU la/ d+ha sha grI ba mA ra ya nr-i dzaHdzaHrbad/ klu rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ /nA

ga gur ling / snying khrag bam rul/ nA ga ra ra he sa tad rbad/ pu du ma shi kha la rak+sha rbad/ gnyan las la gzhug pa ni uta kha kha da ra sing ga rak+Sha kha la ni dun mA ra Na dun rbad dzaH/ de dag gi phyag brnyan

las la gzung ba ni dza la dza nr-i ha na nr-i ma du ma/ snying kha la nr-i dzaHdzaH/ dza nr-i rbad pu kha la rak+sha rbad/ ling ga byad gzhug re bas dril/ /rta nag thod par bcug nas kyang / /nub kyi phyogs kyi brag nag rtsar/ /mthun pa'i

rdzas dang ming byang sbrag /rta nag lug nag snying dag dang / /lug nag mthing nag dar gyis brgyan/ /rta nag thod bcug brag rtsar gtad/ /mthun pa'i ming bris dug gis brab/ /mthing nag dar dril mdze thod gzhug /ba dmar

rta dmar snying dung gzugs/ /thod par bshos cha dmar por gzhug /chu mig brag gi rtsa ba na/ /rtse na brag dmar yod par gtad/ /ming rus bris la za 'og dril/ /'jon me spre'u yi ka mgo co ru/ /rta dang bya dang lug dkar

snying / /spyan gzigs dkor 'bru za 'og dril/ /thod par bcug ste lha khang gi/ /them pa'i 'og tu mnan par bya/ /sha trU~M sbal nag lto bar bri/ /glang dmar rwa rur bcug la dril/ /rtsi sman 'bru dang rin po che/ /ba dmar

glang rur blug nas kyang / /nA ga gdug pa'i lag tu gtad/ /mdzo dre'i thod par ming byang gzhug /chu rta'i gzugs dang rta sngon snying / /thod par bcug ste rgya mtshor skyur/ /tsa ra dmar po'i thod pa ru/ /sha trU~M ming gzugs

dar dmar dril/ /sngon dmar dog pas dam du bcing / /bya dmar ra dmar snying dang gzugs/ /thod par bshos cha dmar po gzhug /byang phyogs brag dmar rtsa ru mnan/ /rnag pa'i ming byang bris nas kyang / /tse ra sngon mo'i thod

par gzhug /mdzo ltol ba lang dre'u'i yang / /thod par bcug ste chu 'gram dang / /shing gcig rtsa ru mnan par bya/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas rnams kyis/ /rang gi bya ba nan tan byos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs

gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las bstan pa la gnod pa cham la dbab pa'i le'u sngags kyi phong bstan pa ste drug pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kyai bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na gdug
pa can phyag brnyan bcas pa'i sbyor ba'i mthu bzlog pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas sbyor ba'i mthu bzlog na/ /rang lus sbas te de dag

gis/ /mig gi 'bras bu gcar bar bya/ /rang lus sba bar bya ba ni/ /skye 'gro mig gi 'bras bu gcar/ /nag po kha ta'i 'bras bu dang / /tsa ra rog po'i 'bras bu gnyis/ /mig la bskus te nor bu btsal/ /rnyed nas lus bcang

ri khrod 'grim/ /de dag rnyed par ma gyur na/ /gser dang dngul rdo zha nye'i rdo/ /spra tshil dang ni a ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang pi pi ling / /pho ba ris rnams cha mnyam ste/ /bzhu ste rdzi dang rlangs la gzab/ /de dag gzhan gyi sbyor

ba yis/ /bdag gam gzhan las 'tshe gyur na/ /dregs pa kun gyi 'bras bu gcar/ /lto 'phye'i sha dang sbal 'dra'i sha / sa chu dag na gnas pa'i mi/ /glang ma'i sgron shing 'bras bu dang / /me ma btang ba'i du ba dang / /nyag
gcig po yi dri chen dang / /sems ma chags pa'i sha rnams kun/ /legs par nan tan byas bcas nas/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams kyi/ /rnam par dag pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /gdug pa'i klu rnams 'gras pa'i
gdon/ /de dag 'bras bur gcar ba ni/ /phag pho rog po'i don snying lnga/ /lce pog nag po'i gser lum dang / /thar nu'i thangs nyams rnyed gdung ste/ /lus la bcangs par gyur pa na/ /sha mig rnam

par dag pa yi/ /klu chen brgyad kyis bltas gyur kyang / /mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma las lus rnam par sba ba'i le'u ste

bdun pa'o// // de nas lha yi dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje gtum po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje stobs po che dang / gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / de dag la sogs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs chen po rnams rab tu yid rangs te/ lan brgya stong du mar mchod cing bskor nas mngon par bstod do/ /de nas lag na rdo rje

bzhi la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje bzhi po dang / rgyud 'di dag gang na gnas par khyed kyang rjes su 'brangs la rgyud 'di 'chad pa dus gsum du mchod cing bkur bar gyis shig /de'i dgos pa gang ci yang rung ba ma
lus par bsgrubs shig /phyi ma'i dus na o tre yul du rgyas par 'gyur gyis der bsrung bar byos shig ces gsungs nas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la bzhugs so/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i

rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi slob dpon a ba yug ti la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bla ban

chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te/ bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM mu tsi ni swA hA/ mu khe se swA hA/

mo ha ni swA hA/ dan ti ri swA hA/ cho ga 'di chu khyor ba gang bzlas pa byas te/ 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rjes rmi lam ston par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //
